title: No-Bake Nut Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. firmly packed brown sugar 1/2 c. evaporated milk 1/2 tsp. vanilla 1/2 c. broken nuts (pecans) 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine 3 1/2 c. bite size shredded rice biscuits. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. firmly packed brown sugar 1/2 c. evaporated milk 1/2 tsp. vanilla 1/2 c. broken nuts (pecans) 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine 3 1/2 c. bite size shredded rice biscuits. Recipe: In a heavy 2-quart saucepan mix brown sugar nuts evaporated milk and butter or margarine. Stir over medium heat until mixture bubbles all over top. Boil and stir 5 minutes more. Take off heat. Stir in vanilla and cereal; mix well. Using 2 teaspoons drop and shape into 30 clusters on wax paper. Let stand until firm about 30 minutes.

title: Jewell Ball'S Chicken
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 small jar chipped beef cut up 4 boned chicken breasts 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 carton sour cream. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 small jar chipped beef cut up 4 boned chicken breasts 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 carton sour cream. Recipe: Place chipped beef on bottom of baking dish. Place chicken on top of beef. Mix soup and cream together; pour over chicken. Bake uncovered at 275\u00b0 for 3 hours.

title: Creamy Corn
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 (16 oz.) pkg. frozen corn 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese cubed 1/3 c. butter cubed 1/2 tsp. garlic powder 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 (16 oz.) pkg. frozen corn 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese cubed 1/3 c. butter cubed 1/2 tsp. garlic powder 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper. Recipe: In a slow cooker combine all ingredients. Cover and cook on low for 4 hours or until heated through and cheese is melted. Stir well before serving. Yields 6 servings.

title: Chicken Funny
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 large whole chicken 2 (10 1/2 oz.) cans chicken gravy 1 (10 1/2 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup 1 (6 oz.) box Stove Top stuffing 4 oz. shredded cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 large whole chicken 2 (10 1/2 oz.) cans chicken gravy 1 (10 1/2 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup 1 (6 oz.) box Stove Top stuffing 4 oz. shredded cheese. Recipe: Boil and debone chicken. Put bite size pieces in average size square casserole dish. Pour gravy and cream of mushroom soup over chicken; level. Make stuffing according to instructions on box (do not make too moist). Put stuffing on top of chicken and gravy; level. Sprinkle shredded cheese on top and bake at 350\u00b0 for approximately 20 minutes or until golden and bubbly.

title: Reeses Cups(Candy)
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. peanut butter 3/4 c. graham cracker crumbs 1 c. melted butter 1 lb. (3 1/2 c.) powdered sugar 1 large pkg. chocolate chips. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. peanut butter 3/4 c. graham cracker crumbs 1 c. melted butter 1 lb. (3 1/2 c.) powdered sugar 1 large pkg. chocolate chips. Recipe: Combine first four ingredients and press in 13 x 9-inch ungreased pan. Melt chocolate chips and spread over mixture. Refrigerate for about 20 minutes and cut into pieces before chocolate gets hard. Keep in refrigerator.

title: Cheeseburger Potato Soup
ingredients: Ingredients: 6 baking potatoes 1 lb. of extra lean ground beef 2/3 c. butter or margarine 6 c. milk 3/4 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. pepper 1 1/2 c (6 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese divided 12 sliced bacon cooked crumbled and divided 4 green onion chopped and divided 1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream (optional). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 6 baking potatoes 1 lb. of extra lean ground beef 2/3 c. butter or margarine 6 c. milk 3/4 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. pepper 1 1/2 c (6 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese divided 12 sliced bacon cooked crumbled and divided 4 green onion chopped and divided 1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream (optional). Recipe: Wash potatoes; prick several times with a fork. Microwave them with a wet paper towel covering the potatoes on high for 6-8 minutes. The potatoes should be soft ready to eat. Let them cool enough to handle. Cut in half lengthwise; scoop out pulp and reserve. Discard shells. Brown ground beef until done. Drain any grease from the meat. Set aside when done. Meat will be added later. Melt butter in a large kettle over low heat; add flour stirring until smooth. Cook 1 minute stirring constantly. Gradually add milk; cook over medium heat stirring constantly until thickened and bubbly. Stir in potato ground beef salt pepper 1 cup of cheese 2 tablespoons of green onion and 1/2 cup of bacon. Cook until heated (do not boil). Stir in sour cream if desired; cook until heated (do not boil). Sprinkle with remaining cheese bacon and green onions.

title: Rhubarb Coffee Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 c. butter 1 egg 1 c. buttermilk 2 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 1 tsp. soda 1 c. buttermilk 2 c. rhubarb finely cut 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 c. butter 1 egg 1 c. buttermilk 2 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 1 tsp. soda 1 c. buttermilk 2 c. rhubarb finely cut 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: Cream sugar and butter. Add egg and beat well. To creamed butter sugar and egg add alternately buttermilk with mixture of flour salt and soda. Mix well. Add rhubarb and vanilla. Pour into greased 9 x 13-inch pan and add Topping.

title: Scalloped Corn
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can cream-style corn 1 can whole kernel corn 1/2 pkg. (approximately 20) saltine crackers crushed 1 egg beaten 6 tsp. butter divided pepper to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can cream-style corn 1 can whole kernel corn 1/2 pkg. (approximately 20) saltine crackers crushed 1 egg beaten 6 tsp. butter divided pepper to taste. Recipe: Mix together both cans of corn crackers egg 2 teaspoons of melted butter and pepper and place in a buttered baking dish. Dot with remaining 4 teaspoons of butter. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour.

title: Nolan'S Pepper Steak
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. round steak (1-inch thick) cut into strips 1 can drained tomatoes cut up (save liquid) 1 3/4 c. water 1/2 c. onions 1 1/2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce 2 green peppers diced 1/4 c. oil. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. round steak (1-inch thick) cut into strips 1 can drained tomatoes cut up (save liquid) 1 3/4 c. water 1/2 c. onions 1 1/2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce 2 green peppers diced 1/4 c. oil. Recipe: Roll steak strips in flour. Brown in skillet. Salt and pepper. Combine tomato liquid water onions and browned steak. Cover and simmer for one and a quarter hours. Uncover and stir in Worcestershire sauce. Add tomatoes green peppers and simmer for 5 minutes. Serve over hot cooked rice.

title: Millionaire Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 large container Cool Whip 1 large can crushed pineapple 1 can condensed milk 3 lemons 1 c. pecans 2 graham cracker crusts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 large container Cool Whip 1 large can crushed pineapple 1 can condensed milk 3 lemons 1 c. pecans 2 graham cracker crusts. Recipe: Empty Cool Whip into a bowl. Drain juice from pineapple. Mix Cool Whip and pineapple. Add condensed milk. Squeeze lemons remove seeds and add to Cool Whip and pineapple. Chop nuts into small pieces and add to mixture. Stir all ingredients together and mix well. Pour into a graham cracker crust. Use top from crust to cover top of pie. Chill overnight. Makes 2 pies.

title: Double Cherry Delight
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (17 oz.) can dark sweet pitted cherries 1/2 c. ginger ale 1 (6 oz.) pkg. Jell-O cherry flavor gelatin 2 c. boiling water 1/8 tsp. almond extract 1 c. miniature marshmallows. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (17 oz.) can dark sweet pitted cherries 1/2 c. ginger ale 1 (6 oz.) pkg. Jell-O cherry flavor gelatin 2 c. boiling water 1/8 tsp. almond extract 1 c. miniature marshmallows. Recipe: Drain cherries measuring syrup. Cut cherries in half. Add ginger ale and enough water to syrup to make 1 1/2 cups. Dissolve gelatin in boiling water. Add measured liquid and almond extract. Chill until very thick. Fold in marshmallows and the cherries. Spoon into 6-cup mold. Chill until firm at least 4 hours or overnight. Unmold. Makes about 5 1/3 cups.

title: Buckeye Candy
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 box powdered sugar 8 oz. soft butter 1 (8 oz.) peanut butter paraffin 12 oz. chocolate chips. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 box powdered sugar 8 oz. soft butter 1 (8 oz.) peanut butter paraffin 12 oz. chocolate chips. Recipe: Mix sugar butter and peanut butter. Roll into balls and place on cookie sheet. Set in freezer for at least 30 minutes. Melt chocolate chips and paraffin in double boiler. Using a toothpick dip balls 3/4 of way into chocolate chip and paraffin mixture to make them look like buckeyes.

title: Quick Barbecue Wings
ingredients: Ingredients: chicken wings (as many as you need for dinner) flour barbecue sauce (your choice). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: chicken wings (as many as you need for dinner) flour barbecue sauce (your choice). Recipe: Clean wings. Flour and fry until done. Place fried chicken wings in microwave bowl. Stir in barbecue sauce. Microwave on High (stir once) for 4 minutes.

title: Taco Salad Chip Dip
ingredients: Ingredients: 8 oz. Ortega taco sauce 8 oz. sour cream 8 oz. cream cheese 1 lb. ground beef 1 pkg. taco seasoning shredded lettuce 1 large diced tomato 1 medium diced onion 1 large diced green pepper shredded Colby or Cheddar cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 8 oz. Ortega taco sauce 8 oz. sour cream 8 oz. cream cheese 1 lb. ground beef 1 pkg. taco seasoning shredded lettuce 1 large diced tomato 1 medium diced onion 1 large diced green pepper shredded Colby or Cheddar cheese. Recipe: Mix taco sauce sour cream and cream cheese. Spread on pizza pan. Brown meat. Drain off fat and add taco seasoning. Spread over cream mixture. Layer with raw vegetables. Top with cheese. Serve with chips.

title: Pink Stuff(Frozen Dessert)
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can pie filling (cherry or strawberry) 1 can crushed pineapple drained 1 can sweetened condensed milk 1 (8 oz.) container thawed whipped topping 2 Tbsp. lemon juice. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can pie filling (cherry or strawberry) 1 can crushed pineapple drained 1 can sweetened condensed milk 1 (8 oz.) container thawed whipped topping 2 Tbsp. lemon juice. Recipe: Mix all ingredients together. Pour into a 9 x 13-inch pan. Freeze until firm. Allow to set out approximately 15 minutes before serving.

title: Fresh Strawberry Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 baked pie shell 1 qt. cleaned strawberries 1 1/2 c. water 4 Tbsp. cornstarch 1 c. sugar 1/8 tsp. salt 4 Tbsp. strawberry jello. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 baked pie shell 1 qt. cleaned strawberries 1 1/2 c. water 4 Tbsp. cornstarch 1 c. sugar 1/8 tsp. salt 4 Tbsp. strawberry jello. Recipe: Mix water cornstarch sugar and salt in saucepan. Stir constantly and boil until thick and clear. Remove from heat and stir in jello. Set aside to cool. But don't allow it to set. Layer strawberries in baked crust. Pour cooled glaze over. Continue layering berries and glaze. Refrigerate. Serve with whipped cream.

title: Easy German Chocolate Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 pkg. chocolate fudge cake mix without pudding or 1 Jiffy mix 1/2 pkg. white cake mix without pudding or 1 Jiffy mix 1/4 c. Wesson oil. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 pkg. chocolate fudge cake mix without pudding or 1 Jiffy mix 1/2 pkg. white cake mix without pudding or 1 Jiffy mix 1/4 c. Wesson oil. Recipe: Mix according to directions and add oil. Bake in 9 x 13-inch pan.

title: Broccoli Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 large head broccoli (about 1 1/2 lb.) 10 slices bacon cooked and crumbled 5 green onions sliced or 1/4 c. chopped red onion 1/2 c. raisins 1 c. mayonnaise 2 Tbsp. vinegar 1/4 c. sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 large head broccoli (about 1 1/2 lb.) 10 slices bacon cooked and crumbled 5 green onions sliced or 1/4 c. chopped red onion 1/2 c. raisins 1 c. mayonnaise 2 Tbsp. vinegar 1/4 c. sugar. Recipe: Trim off large leaves of broccoli and remove the tough ends of lower stalks. Wash the broccoli thoroughly. Cut the florets and stems into bite-size pieces. Place in a large bowl. Add bacon onions and raisins. Combine remaining ingredients stirring well. Add dressing to broccoli mixture and toss gently. Cover and refrigerate 2 to 3 hours. Makes about 6 servings.

title: Strawberry Whatever
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. frozen strawberries in juice 1 small can crushed pineapple 3 ripe bananas 1 c. chopped pecans 1 large pkg. strawberry Jell-O 1 1/2 c. boiling water 1 pt. sour cream. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. frozen strawberries in juice 1 small can crushed pineapple 3 ripe bananas 1 c. chopped pecans 1 large pkg. strawberry Jell-O 1 1/2 c. boiling water 1 pt. sour cream. Recipe: Mix Jell-O in boiling water. Add strawberries pineapple crushed bananas and nuts. Spread 1/2 mixture in 13 x 6 1/2-inch pan. Allow to gel in freezer 30 minutes. Add layer of sour cream then remaining mixture on top. Gel and serve.

title: Eggless Milkless Applesauce Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 1/2 c. shortening 1 1/2 c. applesauce 3 level tsp. soda 1 tsp. each: cinnamon cloves and nutmeg 2 c. sifted flour 1 c. raisins 1 c. nuts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 1/2 c. shortening 1 1/2 c. applesauce 3 level tsp. soda 1 tsp. each: cinnamon cloves and nutmeg 2 c. sifted flour 1 c. raisins 1 c. nuts. Recipe: Mix Crisco with applesauce nuts and raisins. Sift dry ingredients and add. Mix well. Put in a greased and floured loaf pan or tube pan. Bake in loaf pan at 350\u00b0 to 375\u00b0 for 45 to 60 minutes layer pan at 375\u00b0 for 20 minutes or tube pan at 325\u00b0 for 1 hour.

title: Grandma Hanrath'S Banana Breadfort Collins Colorado
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. shortening 2 eggs (add one at a time) 1 tsp. salt 2 tsp. soda 2 c. flour 1/4 c. nuts 2 over-ripe bananas (chopped). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. shortening 2 eggs (add one at a time) 1 tsp. salt 2 tsp. soda 2 c. flour 1/4 c. nuts 2 over-ripe bananas (chopped). Recipe: Cream sugar and shortening. Add eggs salt and soda then bananas and flour. Add nuts. Mix well. Bake in loaf pan at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour.

title: Chocolate Frango Mints
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 pkg. devil's food cake mix 1 pkg. chocolate fudge pudding mix (instant) 8 oz. sour cream 3/4 c. water 1/2 c. Wesson oil 4 eggs 6 oz. chopped Frango mints. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 pkg. devil's food cake mix 1 pkg. chocolate fudge pudding mix (instant) 8 oz. sour cream 3/4 c. water 1/2 c. Wesson oil 4 eggs 6 oz. chopped Frango mints. Recipe: Mix ingredients together for 5 minutes. Scrape bowl often. Last fold in chocolate chip mints. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 to 40 minutes or until done (cake mix directions).

title: Cuddy Farms Marinated Turkey
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. 7-Up or Sprite 1 c. vegetable oil 1 c. Kikkoman soy sauce garlic salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. 7-Up or Sprite 1 c. vegetable oil 1 c. Kikkoman soy sauce garlic salt. Recipe: Buy whole turkey breast; remove all skin and bones. Cut into pieces about the size of your hand. Pour marinade over turkey and refrigerate for at least 8 hours (up to 48 hours). The longer it marinates the less cooking time it takes.

title: Spaghetti Sauce To Can
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 bushel tomatoes 1 c. oil 1/4 c. minced garlic 6 cans tomato paste 3 peppers (2 sweet and 1 hot) 1 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 c. salt 1 Tbsp. sweet basil 2 Tbsp. oregano 1 tsp. Italian seasoning. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 bushel tomatoes 1 c. oil 1/4 c. minced garlic 6 cans tomato paste 3 peppers (2 sweet and 1 hot) 1 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 c. salt 1 Tbsp. sweet basil 2 Tbsp. oregano 1 tsp. Italian seasoning. Recipe: Cook ground or chopped peppers and onions in oil for 1/2 hour. Cook tomatoes and garlic as for juice. Put through the mill. (I use a food processor and do my tomatoes uncooked. I then add the garlic right to the juice.) Add peppers and onions to juice and remainder of ingredients. Cook approximately 1 hour. Put in jars and seal. Yields 7 quarts.

title: Prize-Winning Meat Loaf
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. ground beef 1 c. tomato juice 3/4 c. oats (uncooked) 1 egg beaten 1/4 c. chopped onion 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 1/2 tsp. salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. ground beef 1 c. tomato juice 3/4 c. oats (uncooked) 1 egg beaten 1/4 c. chopped onion 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 1/2 tsp. salt. Recipe: Mix well. Press firmly into an 8 1/2 x 4 1/2 x 2 1/2-inch loaf pan. Bake in preheated moderate oven. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour. Let stand 5 minutes before slicing. Makes 8 servings.

title: Smothered Round Steak(Servings: 4)
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 lb. round steak 1/2 tsp. ground black pepper 1 tsp. ground white pepper 1/2 c. vegetable oil 2 bell peppers chopped 1 c. beef stock or water 2 tsp. salt 1 tsp. ground red pepper all-purpose flour (dredging) 3 medium onions chopped 1 celery rib chopped. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 lb. round steak 1/2 tsp. ground black pepper 1 tsp. ground white pepper 1/2 c. vegetable oil 2 bell peppers chopped 1 c. beef stock or water 2 tsp. salt 1 tsp. ground red pepper all-purpose flour (dredging) 3 medium onions chopped 1 celery rib chopped. Recipe: Alex Patout says \Smothering is a multipurpose Cajun technique that works wonders with everything from game to snap beans. It's similar to what the rest of the world knows as braising. The ingredients are briefly browned or sauteed then cooked with a little liquid over a low heat for a long time.\

title: Corral Barbecued Beef Steak Strips
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 lb. round steak 1/2 to 3/4-inch thick sliced in strips 1/8-inch thick (or thinner) and 3 1/2 to 4-inches long (easily sliced if partially frozen) 2 Tbsp. cooking oil 1 can (15 oz.) tomato sauce 1/3 c. water 2 Tbsp. brown sugar 1 Tbsp. prepared mustard 1 tbsp. Worcestershire sauce 1 medium sized onion thinly sliced. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 lb. round steak 1/2 to 3/4-inch thick sliced in strips 1/8-inch thick (or thinner) and 3 1/2 to 4-inches long (easily sliced if partially frozen) 2 Tbsp. cooking oil 1 can (15 oz.) tomato sauce 1/3 c. water 2 Tbsp. brown sugar 1 Tbsp. prepared mustard 1 tbsp. Worcestershire sauce 1 medium sized onion thinly sliced. Recipe: Brown strips in cooking oil. Pour off drippings. Combine tomato sauce water brown sugar mustard and Worcestershire sauce. Add sauce and onion to meat slices. Cover and cook slowly stirring occasionally 30 minutes or until meat is tender. Serve over rice or buttered noodles. Yields 6 to 8 servings.

title: Easy Fudge
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk 1 (12 oz.) pkg. semi-sweet chocolate chips 1 (1 oz.) sq. unsweetened chocolate (if desired) 1 1/2 c. chopped nuts (if desired) 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk 1 (12 oz.) pkg. semi-sweet chocolate chips 1 (1 oz.) sq. unsweetened chocolate (if desired) 1 1/2 c. chopped nuts (if desired) 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: Butter a square pan 8 x 8 x 2-inches. Heat milk chocolate chips and unsweetened chocolate over low heat stirring constantly until chocolate is melted and mixture is smooth. Remove from heat. Stir in nuts and vanilla. Spread in pan.

title: Taco-Filled Green Pepper
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. Ground Beef 1 pkg. taco seasoning 1 san Kidney beans 1 onion chopped 1 C salsa 4 green peppers 1 medium Tomato chopped 1/2 C cheddar cheese shredded 1/2 C sour cream. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. Ground Beef 1 pkg. taco seasoning 1 san Kidney beans 1 onion chopped 1 C salsa 4 green peppers 1 medium Tomato chopped 1/2 C cheddar cheese shredded 1/2 C sour cream. Recipe: In a large skillet brown the ground beef. Drain stir in taco mix kidney beans and salsa. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and let simmer for about 5 minutes. Cut peppers in half and clean it. Put peppers in boiling water for 3 minutes- drain- spoon the meat mixture into the green pepper. Put pepper in an ungreased pan. Cover and bake at 350 degrees for 15 to 20 minutes or until peppers are crispy and filling is heated through. Top with tomatoes cheese and sour cream.

title: One Hour Rolls
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. milk 2 Tbsp. sugar 1 pkg. dry yeast 1 Tbsp. salt 3 Tbsp. Crisco oil 2 c. plain flour. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. milk 2 Tbsp. sugar 1 pkg. dry yeast 1 Tbsp. salt 3 Tbsp. Crisco oil 2 c. plain flour. Recipe: Put flour into a large mixing bowl. Combine sugar milk salt and oil in a saucepan and heat to boiling; remove from heat and let cool to lukewarm. Add yeast and mix well. Pour into flour and stir. Batter will be sticky. Roll out batter on a floured board and cut with biscuit cutter. Lightly brush tops with melted oleo and fold over. Place rolls on a cookie sheet put in a warm place and let rise for 1 hour. Bake at 350\u00b0 for about 20 minutes. Yield: 2 1/2 dozen.

title: Punch Bowl Fruit Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 large cans sliced peaches 2 large cans fruit cocktail 1 large can diced pineapple 1 qt. fresh strawberries 2 red apples 2 yellow apples 4 large ripe bananas 1 lb. white grapes 1 lb. purple grapes. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 large cans sliced peaches 2 large cans fruit cocktail 1 large can diced pineapple 1 qt. fresh strawberries 2 red apples 2 yellow apples 4 large ripe bananas 1 lb. white grapes 1 lb. purple grapes. Recipe: In a 6-quart punch bowl mix all of the cans of fruit juice and all. Clean and slice berries. Wash and slice apples; leave peeling on apples. Dice apples. Slice bananas. Wash and cut grapes in half. Mix all together. Nuts or other fruit may be added.

title: Summer Chicken
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 pkg. chicken cutlets 1/2 c. oil 1/3 c. red vinegar 2 Tbsp. oregano 2 Tbsp. garlic salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 pkg. chicken cutlets 1/2 c. oil 1/3 c. red vinegar 2 Tbsp. oregano 2 Tbsp. garlic salt. Recipe: Double recipe for more chicken.

title: Cherry Pizza
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 cans cherry pie mix 1 box deluxe white cake mix 1 stick butter 1 c. ground nuts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 cans cherry pie mix 1 box deluxe white cake mix 1 stick butter 1 c. ground nuts. Recipe: Grease a 9 x 12-inch cake pan. Spread cherry pie mix. Sift cake mix and spread it dry over the cherries. Top with ground nuts. Melt butter and pour over top. Bake 45 minutes in a 350\u00b0 oven.

title: Potato And Cheese Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 eggs 1 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 2 c. half and half 3 c. potatoes shredded coarse 1 c. Cheddar cheese coarsely shredded 1/3 c. green onions. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 eggs 1 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 2 c. half and half 3 c. potatoes shredded coarse 1 c. Cheddar cheese coarsely shredded 1/3 c. green onions. Recipe: Beat eggs salt and pepper until well blended. Stir in half and half potatoes and onions. Pour into well-greased 8-inch baking dish. Bake in a 400\u00b0 oven for 35 to 40 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean and potatoes are tender. Cool on rack 5 minutes; cut into squares. Makes 4 large servings.

title: Tuna Macaroni Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 box macaroni and cheese 1 can tuna drained 1 small jar pimentos 1 medium onion chopped. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 box macaroni and cheese 1 can tuna drained 1 small jar pimentos 1 medium onion chopped. Recipe: Prepare macaroni and cheese as directed. Add drained tuna pimento and onion. Mix. Serve hot or cold.

title: Artichoke Dip
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 cans or jars artichoke hearts 1 c. mayonnaise 1 c. Parmesan cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 cans or jars artichoke hearts 1 c. mayonnaise 1 c. Parmesan cheese. Recipe: Drain artichokes and chop. Mix with mayonnaise and Parmesan cheese. After well mixed bake uncovered for 20 to 30 minutes at 350\u00b0. Serve with crackers.

title: Broccoli Dip For Crackers
ingredients: Ingredients: 16 oz. sour cream 1 pkg. dry vegetable soup mix 10 oz. pkg. frozen chopped broccoli thawed and drained 4 to 6 oz. Cheddar cheese grated. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 16 oz. sour cream 1 pkg. dry vegetable soup mix 10 oz. pkg. frozen chopped broccoli thawed and drained 4 to 6 oz. Cheddar cheese grated. Recipe: Mix together sour cream soup mix broccoli and half of cheese. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes uncovered. Serve hot with vegetable crackers.

title: Summer Spaghetti
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. very thin spaghetti 1/2 bottle McCormick Salad Supreme (seasoning) 1 bottle Zesty Italian dressing. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. very thin spaghetti 1/2 bottle McCormick Salad Supreme (seasoning) 1 bottle Zesty Italian dressing. Recipe: Prepare spaghetti per package. Drain. Melt a little butter through it. Marinate overnight in Salad Supreme and Zesty Italian dressing. Just before serving add cucumbers tomatoes green peppers mushrooms olives or whatever your taste may want.

title: Pear-Lime Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (16 oz.) can pear halves undrained 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lime gelatin 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese softened 1 (8 oz.) carton lemon yogurt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (16 oz.) can pear halves undrained 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lime gelatin 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese softened 1 (8 oz.) carton lemon yogurt. Recipe: Drain pears reserving juice. Bring juice to a boil stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Add gelatin stirring until dissolved. Let cool slightly. Coarsely chop pear halves. Combine cream cheese and yogurt; beat at medium speed of electric mixer until smooth. Add gelatin and beat well. Stir in pears. Pour into an oiled 4-cup mold or Pyrex dish. Chill.

title: Watermelon Rind Pickles
ingredients: Ingredients: 7 lb. watermelon rind 7 c. sugar 2 c. apple vinegar 1/2 tsp. oil of cloves 1/2 tsp. oil of cinnamon. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 7 lb. watermelon rind 7 c. sugar 2 c. apple vinegar 1/2 tsp. oil of cloves 1/2 tsp. oil of cinnamon. Recipe: Trim off green and pink parts of watermelon rind; cut to 1-inch cubes. Parboil until tender but not soft. Drain. Combine sugar vinegar oil of cloves and oil of cinnamon; bring to boiling and pour over rind. Let stand overnight. In the morning drain off syrup. Heat and put over rind. The third morning heat rind and syrup; seal in hot sterilized jars. Makes 8 pints. (Oil of cinnamon and clove keeps rind clear and transparent.)

title: Chicken Stew
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 lb. chicken boiled 4 medium potatoes diced 2 medium onions chopped 1 (16 oz.) can creamed corn 1 (16 oz.) can English peas 1 (16 oz.) can field peas 1 (16 oz.) can butter beans 1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes 1 (46 oz.) can tomato juice 1 small box macaroni 1 Tbsp. black pepper 1 Tbsp. salt 1 Tbsp. sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 lb. chicken boiled 4 medium potatoes diced 2 medium onions chopped 1 (16 oz.) can creamed corn 1 (16 oz.) can English peas 1 (16 oz.) can field peas 1 (16 oz.) can butter beans 1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes 1 (46 oz.) can tomato juice 1 small box macaroni 1 Tbsp. black pepper 1 Tbsp. salt 1 Tbsp. sugar. Recipe: Remove chicken from bone. Use the broth. Mix the vegetables and macaroni. Add sugar salt and black pepper. Cook until all vegetables are tender over medium heat.

title: Quick Coffee Cake(6 Servings)
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 Tbsp. softened butter or margarine 1/2 c. granulated sugar 1 egg 1 c. flour 1 1/4 tsp. baking powder 1/4 tsp. salt 1/3 c. milk 1/4 tsp. vanilla 1/3 c. brown sugar packed 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 Tbsp. softened butter or margarine 1/2 c. granulated sugar 1 egg 1 c. flour 1 1/4 tsp. baking powder 1/4 tsp. salt 1/3 c. milk 1/4 tsp. vanilla 1/3 c. brown sugar packed 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine. Recipe: Mix 3 tablespoons fat with granulated sugar. Add egg and beat until creamy. Mix flour baking powder and salt thoroughly. Add to sugar mixture alternately with milk. Add vanilla. Spread batter evenly in a greased 8-inch square baking pan. Mix brown sugar and cinnamon and sprinkle over batter. Dot with 2 tablespoons fat. Bake at 350\u00b0 (moderate oven) for 25 to 30 minutes.

title: Angel Biscuits
ingredients: Ingredients: 5 c. flour 3 Tbsp. sugar 4 tsp. baking powder 1 1/2 pkg. dry yeast 2 c. buttermilk 1 tsp. soda 1 1/2 sticks margarine 1/2 c. warm water. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 5 c. flour 3 Tbsp. sugar 4 tsp. baking powder 1 1/2 pkg. dry yeast 2 c. buttermilk 1 tsp. soda 1 1/2 sticks margarine 1/2 c. warm water. Recipe: Mix flour sugar baking powder soda and salt together. Cut in margarine dissolve yeast in warm water. Stir into buttermilk and add to dry mixture. Cover and chill.

title: Quick Peppermint Puffs
ingredients: Ingredients: 8 marshmallows 2 Tbsp. margarine melted 1/4 c. crushed peppermint candy 1 can crescent rolls. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 8 marshmallows 2 Tbsp. margarine melted 1/4 c. crushed peppermint candy 1 can crescent rolls. Recipe: Dip marshmallows in melted margarine; roll in candy. Wrap a crescent triangle around each marshmallow completely covering the marshmallow and square edges of dough tightly to seal. Dip in margarine and place in a greased muffin tin. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 10 to 15 minutes; remove from pan.

title: Fruit Pizza
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 box yellow cake mix 1/4 c. water 1/4 c. brown sugar 1/2 c. soft butter 2 eggs 1/2 c. chopped nuts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 box yellow cake mix 1/4 c. water 1/4 c. brown sugar 1/2 c. soft butter 2 eggs 1/2 c. chopped nuts. Recipe: Mix ingredients and spread into 2 greased pizza pans. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15-20 minutes.

title: Chocolate Mint Bars
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. flour 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. oleo softened 4 eggs 1 can chocolate syrup. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. flour 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. oleo softened 4 eggs 1 can chocolate syrup. Recipe: Mix together and bake in 9 x 13-inch pan at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes. Top should spring back when touched lightly; do not overbake. Cool completely then spread with mint layer.

title: Beer Bread
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 c. self rising flour 1 - 12 oz. can beer 1 Tbsp. sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 c. self rising flour 1 - 12 oz. can beer 1 Tbsp. sugar. Recipe: Stir the ingredients together and put in a greased and floured loaf pan. Bake at 425 degrees for 50 minutes. Drizzle melted butter on top.

title: Chicken Divan
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/4 c. margarine 1/4 c. chopped onion (or as much as you want) chopped celery to taste 1/4 c. flour 1/8 tsp. curry powder 1 can sliced mushrooms (save juice) 1 can cream of celery soup 1 pkg. chopped broccoli 1 cubed chicken shredded Monterey Jack cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/4 c. margarine 1/4 c. chopped onion (or as much as you want) chopped celery to taste 1/4 c. flour 1/8 tsp. curry powder 1 can sliced mushrooms (save juice) 1 can cream of celery soup 1 pkg. chopped broccoli 1 cubed chicken shredded Monterey Jack cheese. Recipe: Melt margarine in skillet; saute onions and celery. Remove from heat. Stir in flour and curry powder. Drain mushrooms and keep juice. Add water to juice to make 1/2 cup liquid. Stir liquid and soup into flour mixture; add mushrooms. Cook until thick. Arrange broccoli and cubed chicken in a large baking dish. Spoon sauce over chicken. Top with grated cheese. Bake in a 350\u00b0 oven for about 20 minutes or in microwave until cheese is melted.

title: Mexican Cookie Rings
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. sifted flour 1/2 tsp. baking powder 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 c. butter 2/3 c. sugar 3 egg yolks 1 tsp. vanilla multi-colored candies. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. sifted flour 1/2 tsp. baking powder 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 c. butter 2/3 c. sugar 3 egg yolks 1 tsp. vanilla multi-colored candies. Recipe: Sift flour baking powder and salt together. Cream together butter and sugar. Add egg yolks and vanilla. Beat until light and fluffy. Mix in sifted dry ingredients. Shape into 1-inch balls. Push wooden spoon handle through center (twist). Shape into rings. Dip each cookie into candies. Place on lightly greased baking sheets. Bake in 375\u00b0 oven for 10 to 12 minutes or until golden brown. Cool on racks. Serves 2 dozen.

title: Vegetable-Burger Soup
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 lb. ground beef 2 c. water 1 tsp. sugar 1 pkg. Cup-a-Soup onion soup mix (dry) 1 lb. can stewed tomatoes 1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen mixed vegetables. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 lb. ground beef 2 c. water 1 tsp. sugar 1 pkg. Cup-a-Soup onion soup mix (dry) 1 lb. can stewed tomatoes 1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen mixed vegetables. Recipe: Lightly brown beef in soup pot. Drain off excess fat. Stir in tomatoes tomato sauce water frozen vegetables soup mix and sugar. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes. Serve.

title: Chicken Ole
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 chicken breasts cooked 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 can green chili salsa sauce 1 can green chilies 1 c. milk 1 grated onion 1 pkg. corn tortilla in pieces. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 chicken breasts cooked 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 can green chili salsa sauce 1 can green chilies 1 c. milk 1 grated onion 1 pkg. corn tortilla in pieces. Recipe: Dice chicken. Mix all ingredients together. Let sit overnight. Bake 1 1/2 hours at 375\u00b0.

title: Creamy Coleslaw(Better Homes And Gardens)
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 c. shredded cabbage 1/2 c. shredded carrots 1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper 2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion 1/2 c. mayonnaise 1 Tbsp. vinegar 2 tsp. sugar 1 tsp. celery seed 1/4 tsp. salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 c. shredded cabbage 1/2 c. shredded carrots 1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper 2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion 1/2 c. mayonnaise 1 Tbsp. vinegar 2 tsp. sugar 1 tsp. celery seed 1/4 tsp. salt. Recipe: In a large bowl combine cabbage carrot green pepper and onion or can use package of slaw mix purchased from store.

title: Creole Flounder
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 lb. flounder or pollack fillets 1 1/2 c. chopped tomatoes 1/2 c. chopped green pepper 1/3 c. lemon juice 1 Tbsp. salad oil 2 tsp. salt 2 tsp. minced onion 1 tsp. basil leaves 1/4 tsp. coarsely ground black pepper 4 drops red pepper sauce green pepper rings. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 lb. flounder or pollack fillets 1 1/2 c. chopped tomatoes 1/2 c. chopped green pepper 1/3 c. lemon juice 1 Tbsp. salad oil 2 tsp. salt 2 tsp. minced onion 1 tsp. basil leaves 1/4 tsp. coarsely ground black pepper 4 drops red pepper sauce green pepper rings. Recipe: Heat oven to 500\u00b0. Place fillets in single layer in baking dish 13 1/2 x 9 x 2-inch. Stir together remaining ingredients except pepper rings. Spoon over fillets. Bake 5 to 8 minutes or until fish flakes easily with fork. Remove fillets to warm platter. Garnish with green pepper rings. Makes 4 to 6 servings.

title: Three Bean Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can green beans wash and drain 1 can yellow beans wash and drain 1 can kidney beans wash and drain 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. salad oil 2/3 c. vinegar 1/3 c. water. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can green beans wash and drain 1 can yellow beans wash and drain 1 can kidney beans wash and drain 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. salad oil 2/3 c. vinegar 1/3 c. water. Recipe: Mix together all of sugar salad oil vinegar and water until sugar is dissolved. Pour over beans and let stand overnight.

title: Dave'S Corn Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (16 1/2 oz.) can whole kernel corn drained 1 (16 1/2 oz.) can cream-style corn 1 (8 oz.) sour cream 1 (8 1/2 oz.) pkg. Jiffy corn bread mix 1 stick margarine. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (16 1/2 oz.) can whole kernel corn drained 1 (16 1/2 oz.) can cream-style corn 1 (8 oz.) sour cream 1 (8 1/2 oz.) pkg. Jiffy corn bread mix 1 stick margarine. Recipe: In a bowl mix corns sour cream corn bread mix and melted margarine. Pour into a greased 8 x 8 x 2-inch pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 50 minutes.

title: Casserole Italiano
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1/3 c. chopped onion 1 can tomato soup 2 c. cooked wide noodles 1/2 tsp. oregano 1/2 tsp. salt 1/3 c. water 1 c. cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1/3 c. chopped onion 1 can tomato soup 2 c. cooked wide noodles 1/2 tsp. oregano 1/2 tsp. salt 1/3 c. water 1 c. cheese. Recipe: Brown beef with onion and seasonings and combine in a 1 1/2-quart casserole with soup water and noodles. Place cheese around edges. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes.

title: Corned Beef And Cabbage Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 small cabbage shredded 1 tsp. dry mustard 1 can corned beef flaked 1 can cream of celery soup 1 medium chopped onion. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 small cabbage shredded 1 tsp. dry mustard 1 can corned beef flaked 1 can cream of celery soup 1 medium chopped onion. Recipe: Combine all ingredients and cook uncovered over low heat until cabbage is crisp-tender about 20 minutes.

title: Crab Cakes
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce 2 or 3 shakes Old Bay 1 tsp. dry mustard 2 Tbsp. mayonnaise 1 egg. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce 2 or 3 shakes Old Bay 1 tsp. dry mustard 2 Tbsp. mayonnaise 1 egg. Recipe: Mix together and carefully add 1 pound lump crab meat. Mix ahead of time and refrigerate so they will hold together better.

title: Taco Dip
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese softened 1/2 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing 8 oz. mild taco sauce 2 to 4 thinly sliced green onions 1/2 green pepper chopped 1 tomato chopped 1 c. Mozzarella cheese 1 c. Cheddar cheese 1/2 c. black olives (optional) tortilla chips. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese softened 1/2 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing 8 oz. mild taco sauce 2 to 4 thinly sliced green onions 1/2 green pepper chopped 1 tomato chopped 1 c. Mozzarella cheese 1 c. Cheddar cheese 1/2 c. black olives (optional) tortilla chips. Recipe: Mix together cream cheese and mayonnaise. Spread on to a large platter or two dinner plates. Freeze for 15 minutes. Spread taco sauce evenly on top. Layer remaining ingredients in the written order. Serve with tortilla chips.

title: Bonbon Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 lb. soft butter 1/2 c. peanut butter 1/2 lb. graham cracker crumbs 2 c. coconut 1/2 c. nut meats (optional) dash of vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 lb. soft butter 1/2 c. peanut butter 1/2 lb. graham cracker crumbs 2 c. coconut 1/2 c. nut meats (optional) dash of vanilla. Recipe: Cream together the butter and peanut butter. Add the remaining ingredients. Mix and form into balls (best to mix with your hands) and chill several hours even a day.

title: Forever Amber
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. orange sliced candy chopped 2 cans Angel Flake coconut 2 c. chopped pecans 2 cans condensed milk 1 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. orange flavoring. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. orange sliced candy chopped 2 cans Angel Flake coconut 2 c. chopped pecans 2 cans condensed milk 1 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. orange flavoring. Recipe: Mix together. Spread in a buttered pan. Bake for 30 minutes at 275\u00b0. While still hot sift 1 box of powdered sugar into it. Drop by teaspoons on waxed paper. Let dry. If it seems set on bottom turn over and let it continue to dry.

title: Gooey Coffee Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 yellow cake mix 2 eggs 1 stick oleo melted 1 c. chopped nuts 2 eggs 8 oz. softened cream cheese 1 lb. powdered sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 yellow cake mix 2 eggs 1 stick oleo melted 1 c. chopped nuts 2 eggs 8 oz. softened cream cheese 1 lb. powdered sugar. Recipe: Mix together cake mix 2 eggs and melted oleo. Put in greased 9 x 13-inch pan. Put chopped nuts on top of mixture. Mix together 2 eggs cream cheese and powdered sugar. Add on top of first mixture. Bake 15 minutes at 325\u00b0 then bake 20 minutes at 350\u00b0.

title: Phylis' Pineapple-Banana Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 large can chunk pineapple 4 to 5 bananas. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 large can chunk pineapple 4 to 5 bananas. Recipe: Drain pineapple and reserve juice. Cut bananas in chunks like pineapple.

title: Chicken Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 can cream of celery soup 1 cut up chicken 1/2 c. melted butter or margarine 1 1/2 c. uncooked rice. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 can cream of celery soup 1 cut up chicken 1/2 c. melted butter or margarine 1 1/2 c. uncooked rice. Recipe: Mix all ingredients together in baking dish. Cover and bake at 350\u00b0 for 2 1/2 hours. Bake the last 45 minutes uncovered to brown top of chicken.

title: Pineapple Nut Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 1 can sweetened condensed milk 1/2 c. crushed pineapple 1/3 c. chopped nuts 1/3 c. lemon juice. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 1 can sweetened condensed milk 1/2 c. crushed pineapple 1/3 c. chopped nuts 1/3 c. lemon juice. Recipe: Cream the cream cheese; add the milk and beat smooth. Add lemon juice pineapple and nuts. Beat well. Pour into graham cracker crust and chill. Slice in small servings (very rich) and top with dollop of Cool Whip.

title: Annie'S Diabetic Candy
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) Jell-O sugar-free vanilla or French vanilla pudding (put in dry) 1 (8 oz.) Philadelphia light cream cheese 2 Tbsp. butter 2 Tbsp. peanut butter or more if you would like. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) Jell-O sugar-free vanilla or French vanilla pudding (put in dry) 1 (8 oz.) Philadelphia light cream cheese 2 Tbsp. butter 2 Tbsp. peanut butter or more if you would like. Recipe: Mix all ingredients form in small balls and roll in chopped peanuts. Keep refrigerated.

title: Frozen Peach Mousse
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 medium peaches peeled and chopped 1 to 1 1/4 c. sugar 1 1/4 c. sour cream (use light) 1/4 c. lemon juice 3/4 to 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 medium peaches peeled and chopped 1 to 1 1/4 c. sugar 1 1/4 c. sour cream (use light) 1/4 c. lemon juice 3/4 to 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: Puree peaches in a blender. Add remaining ingredients. Blend and pour in container and freeze.

title: Strawberry Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 16 oz. Cool Whip 2 pkg. frozen strawberries * 2 (9-inch) deep pan pie crusts 1 3/4 c. sugar 12 oz. cream cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 16 oz. Cool Whip 2 pkg. frozen strawberries * 2 (9-inch) deep pan pie crusts 1 3/4 c. sugar 12 oz. cream cheese. Recipe: *Can also use blueberries or cherries.

title: Blueberry Surprise
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 stick margarine 1 1/2 c. graham cracker crumbs 1/4 c. granulated sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 stick margarine 1 1/2 c. graham cracker crumbs 1/4 c. granulated sugar. Recipe: Mix ingredients and press 2/3 mixture in bottom of square baking dish. (A bowl that has the same diameter top and bottom may be used 1 1/2 to 2-quart size.)

title: Moist Devil'S Food Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. sifted flour 1 1/2 tsp. baking soda 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 c. shortening 1 1/2 c. sugar 2 eggs separated 1/2 c. cocoa water 1 tsp. vanilla 1 c. milk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. sifted flour 1 1/2 tsp. baking soda 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 c. shortening 1 1/2 c. sugar 2 eggs separated 1/2 c. cocoa water 1 tsp. vanilla 1 c. milk. Recipe: Sift together the flour soda and salt; set aside. Combine shortening and sugar in a bowl. Beat until creamy. Add egg yolks; beat well. Combine cocoa water and vanilla to make 1 cup; mix well. Add to batter. Add flour mixture alternately with milk. Beat well after each addition; set aside. Beat egg whites until stiff peaks form when beater is lifted. Fold into batter. Bake in two 9-inch greased cake pans at 375\u00b0 for 30 minutes.

title: Dot'S Civil War Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 medium apples chopped 2 c. raisins 1 c. brown sugar 1 c. granulated sugar 2 Tbsp. shortening 2 c. cold water 3 c. flour 2 tsp. soda 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. nutmeg 1 tsp. cloves 1 tsp. salt 1 c. nuts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 medium apples chopped 2 c. raisins 1 c. brown sugar 1 c. granulated sugar 2 Tbsp. shortening 2 c. cold water 3 c. flour 2 tsp. soda 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. nutmeg 1 tsp. cloves 1 tsp. salt 1 c. nuts. Recipe: Combine and cook first 6 ingredients. Bring to boil and boil 5 minutes; cool. Add sifted dry ingredients to apple mixture. Stir and blend only. Add nuts. Pour into greased and floured tube pan. Bake 1 hour at 350\u00b0. Serves 16.

title: Potato Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 6 c. diced potatoes 1/2 c. chopped onion 3/4 c. melted butter 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 (8 oz.) sour cream 1 c. grated Cheddar cheese 2 c. crushed cornflakes. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 6 c. diced potatoes 1/2 c. chopped onion 3/4 c. melted butter 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 (8 oz.) sour cream 1 c. grated Cheddar cheese 2 c. crushed cornflakes. Recipe: Peel and dice potatoes; place in bowl of cold salted water. Drain potatoes and dry on paper towels. Mix 1/2 cup butter onions soup sour cream and cheese; stir well. Add potatoes to mixture and pour into a 2 1/2-quart casserole dish. Crush cornflakes mix with remaining butter. Sprinkle cornflakes and butter on top of potato mixture. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 50 minutes.

title: Dream Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: vanilla wafers butter. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: vanilla wafers butter. Recipe: Mix vanilla wafer crumbs with butter.

title: Divinity Fudge
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 2/3 c. sugar 2/3 c. white corn syrup (Karo) 2/3 c. cold water 2 egg whites 1 tsp. vanilla 1 c. chopped nuts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 2/3 c. sugar 2/3 c. white corn syrup (Karo) 2/3 c. cold water 2 egg whites 1 tsp. vanilla 1 c. chopped nuts. Recipe: Stir well together the sugar syrup and water. Allow to boil without stirring until it forms a hard ball in cold water. Pour this over stiffly beaten egg whites beating constantly. Cool; add vanilla and nuts. Beat until cool and thick enough to set. Pour into a buttered platter or drop by teaspoons on waxed paper.

title: Apple Crisp
ingredients: Ingredients: apples 1/2 c. sugar 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 c. sugar 1 c. flour dash of salt 1/2 c. corn flake crumbs 1 stick oleo. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: apples 1/2 c. sugar 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 c. sugar 1 c. flour dash of salt 1/2 c. corn flake crumbs 1 stick oleo. Recipe: Mix 1/2 cup of sugar and cinnamon. Spread on apples. Mix 1/4 cup sugar flour salt cornflake crumbs and oleo. Spread mixture on apples.

title: Sausage Balls
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. Bisquick 1 lb. sausage 8 oz. pkg. Cheddar cheese grated. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. Bisquick 1 lb. sausage 8 oz. pkg. Cheddar cheese grated. Recipe: Mix sausage and cheese together. Add Bisquick and mix thoroughly. Roll into medium size balls. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes or until golden brown.

title: Consomme Chicken
ingredients: Ingredients: chicken parts 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 can consomme 2 c. rice salt to taste pepper to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: chicken parts 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 can consomme 2 c. rice salt to taste pepper to taste. Recipe: Add enough liquid to chicken soup and consomme to make 4 cups of water. Season with salt and pepper. Cook at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour.

title: Spanish Hamburgers
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 c. celery 2 chopped onions 2 Tbsp. butter 1 lb. ground beef 2 Tbsp. vinegar 2 Tbsp. lemon juice 2 Tbsp. brown sugar 1 1/2 Tbsp. mustard 1 tsp. salt 1 1/2 tsp. pepper 1 c. catsup 1 c. water. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 c. celery 2 chopped onions 2 Tbsp. butter 1 lb. ground beef 2 Tbsp. vinegar 2 Tbsp. lemon juice 2 Tbsp. brown sugar 1 1/2 Tbsp. mustard 1 tsp. salt 1 1/2 tsp. pepper 1 c. catsup 1 c. water. Recipe: Brown celery onions and ground beef in butter. Add vinegar lemon juice brown sugar mustard salt pepper catsup and water. Simmer for 30 minutes.

title: Egg Drop Soup
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 (13 3/4 oz.) cans chicken broth 1 Tbsp. cornstarch 1 well beaten egg 2 Tbsp. sliced (1/4-inch) green onion. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 (13 3/4 oz.) cans chicken broth 1 Tbsp. cornstarch 1 well beaten egg 2 Tbsp. sliced (1/4-inch) green onion. Recipe: In saucepan slowly stir the chicken broth into cornstarch. Cook stirring constantly until slightly thickened. Slowly pour in the well beaten egg; stir once gently. Remove from heat. Garnish with sliced green onion. Makes 4 servings.

title: Mulled Cider
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 gal. apple juice 1 tsp. allspice 1 tsp. whole cloves 1 cinnamon stick 1 c. brown sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 gal. apple juice 1 tsp. allspice 1 tsp. whole cloves 1 cinnamon stick 1 c. brown sugar. Recipe: Simmer all of the ingredients. Strain into warmed mugs and top with a dash of nutmeg. This recipe can be doubled many times according to the number of guests present.

title: Sesame Ginger Chicken
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 Tbsp. sesame seed toasted 2 tsp. grated ginger 2 Tbsp. honey 2 Tbsp. reduced-sodium soy sauce 4 (4 oz.) skinned chicken breast halves vegetable cooking spray thin green onion strips. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 Tbsp. sesame seed toasted 2 tsp. grated ginger 2 Tbsp. honey 2 Tbsp. reduced-sodium soy sauce 4 (4 oz.) skinned chicken breast halves vegetable cooking spray thin green onion strips. Recipe: Combine first 4 ingredients in a small bowl stir well and set aside. Place chicken between 2 sheets of waxed paper or heavy duty plastic wrap and flatten to 1/4-inch thickness using meat mallet or rolling pin. Coat grill rack with cooking spray; place on grill over coals. Place chicken on rack and cook 4 minutes on each side basting frequently with soy sauce mixture. Transfer chicken to a serving platter and garnish with green onion if desired. Yields 4 servings about 200 calories.

title: Egg Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 Vidalia onion chopped 1 (16 oz.) pkg. fresh mushrooms 2 green peppers 1 clove garlic olive oil 6 pieces bread (buttered with either butter or margarine) 6 eggs milk (as much as you would like; to fluff eggs). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 Vidalia onion chopped 1 (16 oz.) pkg. fresh mushrooms 2 green peppers 1 clove garlic olive oil 6 pieces bread (buttered with either butter or margarine) 6 eggs milk (as much as you would like; to fluff eggs). Recipe: Saute together first 5\tingredients. In a separate 9 x 12-inch pan mix bread eggs and milk. Put pieces of bread into pan; add your vegetables then your eggs. Place\tin refrigerator overnight (at least 8 hours).\tAdd Cheddar cheese before cooking. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour.

title: Cranberry-Apple-Orange Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (12 oz.) bag raw cranberries (2 c.) 1 c. sugar 1 medium apple peeled cored and cut into wedges 1 orange peeled seeded and broken in wedges 1 (3 oz.) pkg. orange gelatin 1/2 c. nuts (optional). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (12 oz.) bag raw cranberries (2 c.) 1 c. sugar 1 medium apple peeled cored and cut into wedges 1 orange peeled seeded and broken in wedges 1 (3 oz.) pkg. orange gelatin 1/2 c. nuts (optional). Recipe: In food processor or blender grind cranberries apple and orange. Mix with sugar and set aside. Prepare gelatin according to package directions using 1/4 cup less of cold water. Chill until it begins to thicken. Add cranberry mixture and nuts. Mix well. Pour into a mold if desired or leave in a bowl and stir before serving. Chill until set. Can even be made a day ahead. Keeps well in refrigerator for a few days.

title: Brown Rice
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. raw rice 1 can beef consomme 1 can French onion soup 1 (4 oz.) can mushrooms 1/2 stick margarine cut up. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. raw rice 1 can beef consomme 1 can French onion soup 1 (4 oz.) can mushrooms 1/2 stick margarine cut up. Recipe: Put in a covered 1 1/2-quart dish. Bake 1 hour at 350\u00b0.

title: Cranberry Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 (3 oz.) pkg. softened cream cheese 2 Tbsp. margarine 2 Tbsp. sugar 1 (16 oz.) can whole berry cranberry sauce 3/4 c. crushed pineapple drained 1/2 c. chopped walnuts 1 c. whipping cream. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 (3 oz.) pkg. softened cream cheese 2 Tbsp. margarine 2 Tbsp. sugar 1 (16 oz.) can whole berry cranberry sauce 3/4 c. crushed pineapple drained 1/2 c. chopped walnuts 1 c. whipping cream. Recipe: Mix cream cheese margarine and sugar. Add fruit and walnuts. Whip cream and fold into fruit and cream cheese mixture. Pour into round mold. Freeze 6 hours. Remove from mold shortly before serving. Makes 12 servings.

title: Cheese Dip
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 lb. Velveeta cheese 1 (15 oz.) can Italian tomatoes 2 small cans green chili peppers 1/2 medium onion minced 3 cloves garlic 1/2 tsp. salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 lb. Velveeta cheese 1 (15 oz.) can Italian tomatoes 2 small cans green chili peppers 1/2 medium onion minced 3 cloves garlic 1/2 tsp. salt. Recipe: Dice tomatoes and peppers. Combine all ingredients in top of double boiler for 30 minutes. Serve hot over corn chips.

title: Funnel Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/3 c. flour 1 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. soda 2 Tbsp. sugar 3/4 Tbsp. baking powder 1 egg beaten 2/3 c. milk (more if batter is too thick) oil (for frying) powdered sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/3 c. flour 1 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. soda 2 Tbsp. sugar 3/4 Tbsp. baking powder 1 egg beaten 2/3 c. milk (more if batter is too thick) oil (for frying) powdered sugar. Recipe: Sift first 5 ingredients together in a bowl. Mix egg and milk together; add to dry ingredients. Beat until smooth. Hold finger over bottom of a funnel; pour in some batter. Remove finger to let batter drop. Drop batter in a spiral motion into pan filled with 1 inch of hot oil (375\u00b0). Fry until golden brown turning once. Remove from pan; drain on a paper towel. Sprinkle with powdered sugar and serve hot.

title: Fast Real Good Fudge
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 lb. confectioners sugar 1 c. cocoa 1 c. chopped nuts 1 lb. margarine (not whipped) 1 lb. Velveeta 1 Tbsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 lb. confectioners sugar 1 c. cocoa 1 c. chopped nuts 1 lb. margarine (not whipped) 1 lb. Velveeta 1 Tbsp. vanilla. Recipe: In large bowl put confectioners sugar cocoa and chopped nuts. In saucepan put margarine and Velveeta. Melt and add vanilla. Pour hot mixture over sugar mixture. Mix quickly and pour into buttered cookie sheet. Cool and cut into squares.

title: Squash Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 lb. squash 3 onions 1 pt. sour cream 3 carrots grated 2 cans chicken or mushroom soup 1 pkg. Pepperidge Farm stuffing mix 1 stick butter salt and pepper to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 lb. squash 3 onions 1 pt. sour cream 3 carrots grated 2 cans chicken or mushroom soup 1 pkg. Pepperidge Farm stuffing mix 1 stick butter salt and pepper to taste. Recipe: Cook squash onions and carrots until tender. Mash. Melt butter in pan; stir in stuffing until all is coated. Drain all water from squash. Stir in sour cream and soup. Place in a greased baking dish a layer of squash and a layer of stuffing. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 minutes.

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 pkg. cream cheese 2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese (8 oz.) 1 Tbsp. chopped pimento 1 Tbsp. chopped green pepper 1 Tbsp. chopped onion 1 tsp. lemon juice 2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce dash of Tabasco sauce dash of salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 pkg. cream cheese 2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese (8 oz.) 1 Tbsp. chopped pimento 1 Tbsp. chopped green pepper 1 Tbsp. chopped onion 1 tsp. lemon juice 2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce dash of Tabasco sauce dash of salt. Recipe: Combine softened cream and Cheddar cheeses. Add chopped up items. Mix and add liquids last. Mix well. Roll into ball and cover with chopped nuts.

title: *Apricot Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 large pkg. apricot jello (6 oz.) 2/3 c. sugar 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 2 jars Junior baby food apricots 1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple (20 oz.) 1 tall can evaporated milk chilled and whipped 2/3 c. water. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 large pkg. apricot jello (6 oz.) 2/3 c. sugar 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 2 jars Junior baby food apricots 1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple (20 oz.) 1 tall can evaporated milk chilled and whipped 2/3 c. water. Recipe: Dissolve jello in boiling water; add sugar. Blend in the cream cheese with a fork. Add can of crushed pineapple and apricot baby food. Refrigerate. Chill can of milk. When jello starts to set take milk out of the refrigerator and beat until stiff. Fold partially set jello into cream. Chopped nuts can be used for garnish. This is a large salad; could fill a 2-quart mold or 2 (1-quart) molds. Serves about 12.

title: Pound Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 c. plain flour (cake flour may be substituted for plain flour) 3 c. sugar 1/2 tsp. baking powder 3 dashes of salt 5 eggs 2 sticks margarine 1/2 c. butter flavor Crisco 1 c. sweet milk 1 to 2 Tbsp. flavoring (lemon vanilla or almond or a combination of the 3). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 c. plain flour (cake flour may be substituted for plain flour) 3 c. sugar 1/2 tsp. baking powder 3 dashes of salt 5 eggs 2 sticks margarine 1/2 c. butter flavor Crisco 1 c. sweet milk 1 to 2 Tbsp. flavoring (lemon vanilla or almond or a combination of the 3). Recipe: Have all ingredients at room temperature. Hand stir all dry ingredients together. Add eggs and stir. Add butter and Crisco and stir. Add milk and stir. Put batter in mixer and beat at high speed until well blended. Add 1 to 2 teaspoons of your favorite flavoring and mix well. Pour batter into greased and floured tube pan. Place in cold oven. Bake at 325\u00b0 for 1 hour and 20 to 30 minutes.

title: Monkey Bread
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 loaves frozen bread softened 1/2 c. margarine 1 c. brown sugar 1 large box vanilla pudding (not instant) 2 Tbsp. milk cinnamon to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 loaves frozen bread softened 1/2 c. margarine 1 c. brown sugar 1 large box vanilla pudding (not instant) 2 Tbsp. milk cinnamon to taste. Recipe: Use greased 9 x 13-inch pan or Bundt pan. Melt butter; add brown sugar pudding milk and cinnamon. Break up 1 loaf into round balls; place in pan. Pour mixture over and break second loaf over this. Rise 2 1/2 to 3 hours. Bake 30 minutes at 350\u00b0; turn out immediately to cool.

title: Chicken Roll-Ups
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) can crescent rolls 1 1/2 c. grated medium or sharp cheese 1 hen cooked and diced 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 1/2 c. milk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) can crescent rolls 1 1/2 c. grated medium or sharp cheese 1 hen cooked and diced 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 1/2 c. milk. Recipe: Unroll crescent rolls; add cooked chicken and grated cheese. Wrap roll over chicken and cheese; pinch sides together.

title: Beef And Spanish Rice Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can Spanish rice 1 can corned beef 1 diced onion 1/2 c. grated Cheddar cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can Spanish rice 1 can corned beef 1 diced onion 1/2 c. grated Cheddar cheese. Recipe: Spray a 1-quart casserole dish with Pam. Layer rice and meat diced onion and grated cheese. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes.

title: Baked Beans
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 (1 lb.) cans pork and beans 1/2 c. bell pepper chopped 1/2 c. onions chopped 3/4 c. catsup 1/3 c. brown sugar packed hard 1 tsp. salt 1/3 tsp. black pepper 1 lb. ground beef 1 Tbsp. oil. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 (1 lb.) cans pork and beans 1/2 c. bell pepper chopped 1/2 c. onions chopped 3/4 c. catsup 1/3 c. brown sugar packed hard 1 tsp. salt 1/3 tsp. black pepper 1 lb. ground beef 1 Tbsp. oil. Recipe: Cook onions and bell pepper in oil until onions are transparent. Add beef and cook until brown. Mix all ingredients together. Bake in 350\u00b0 oven for 45 minutes or after mixing together pour in crock-pot and cook 6 to 10 hours on low.

title: Sweet-N-Sour Chicken
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. diced cooked chicken 2 Tbsp. shortening 1/2 c. onion (large chunks) 2 c. carrot chunks 1 1/4 c. water 3 chicken bouillon cubes 1/4 c. packed brown sugar 2 Tbsp. cornstarch 1/4 tsp. ginger 1/4 c. catsup 2 Tbsp. vinegar 1 Tbsp. soy sauce 1 c. green pepper (large chunks) 8 oz. pineapple chunks. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. diced cooked chicken 2 Tbsp. shortening 1/2 c. onion (large chunks) 2 c. carrot chunks 1 1/4 c. water 3 chicken bouillon cubes 1/4 c. packed brown sugar 2 Tbsp. cornstarch 1/4 tsp. ginger 1/4 c. catsup 2 Tbsp. vinegar 1 Tbsp. soy sauce 1 c. green pepper (large chunks) 8 oz. pineapple chunks. Recipe: Saute onion in 2 tablespoons shortening. Add carrots water and bouillon cubes. Simmer 5 minutes. Combine next 6 ingredients. Add to vegetable mixture and cook until clear. Add pepper pineapple and chicken. Cover and simmer 5 minutes or until heated through. Serve with rice or angel hair noodles. Serves 6 people.

title: Ambrosia
ingredients: Ingredients: 8 to 10 juicy oranges peeled and diced 1 c. moist coconut 1/2 c. pecans chopped 1/2 c. cherries halved 1/4 c. sugar 1 c. orange juice. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 8 to 10 juicy oranges peeled and diced 1 c. moist coconut 1/2 c. pecans chopped 1/2 c. cherries halved 1/4 c. sugar 1 c. orange juice. Recipe: Combine all ingredients. Chill overnight. Yields 4 to 6 servings.

title: Crazy Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. creamy peanut butter 1 c. sugar 1 egg. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. creamy peanut butter 1 c. sugar 1 egg. Recipe: Mix together and roll into balls; flatten with fork. Bake on ungreased cookie sheet. Makes 2 dozen. Quick easy and good.

title: Brickle Bars
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 box yellow cake mix 2 eggs 1/3 c. soft margarine 1 can Eagle Brand milk 1 c. pecans 1/2 c. Bits 'O Brickle. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 box yellow cake mix 2 eggs 1/3 c. soft margarine 1 can Eagle Brand milk 1 c. pecans 1/2 c. Bits 'O Brickle. Recipe: Mix together with a fork: cake mix 1 egg and margarine. Press into a 13 x 9-inch pan. Next mix Eagle Brand milk 1 egg pecans and Bits 'O Brickle. Pour over cake mixture. Bake 30 minutes at 350\u00b0. Let cool and cut into bars.

title: Pancakes
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. flour 1 tsp. soda 1 tsp. salt 1 Tbsp. sugar 1 egg 3 Tbsp. margarine melted 1 c. buttermilk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. flour 1 tsp. soda 1 tsp. salt 1 Tbsp. sugar 1 egg 3 Tbsp. margarine melted 1 c. buttermilk. Recipe: Mix dry ingredients. Add egg margarine and buttermilk. Stir by hand until well blended. Pour onto non-stick pan or griddle with a little oil added. Cook until bubbly and turn over.

title: Crustless Vegetable Ham Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/4 c. butter 1/4 lb. mushrooms sliced 1 garlic clove minced 1 medium zucchini sliced thinly 1/4 c. chopped onion 1 c. diced cooked ham 4 eggs 2 c. Ricotta cheese 1 c. shredded Monterey Jack 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach thawed and drained 1/2 tsp. dill weed salt and pepper. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/4 c. butter 1/4 lb. mushrooms sliced 1 garlic clove minced 1 medium zucchini sliced thinly 1/4 c. chopped onion 1 c. diced cooked ham 4 eggs 2 c. Ricotta cheese 1 c. shredded Monterey Jack 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach thawed and drained 1/2 tsp. dill weed salt and pepper. Recipe: Preheat oven to 325\u00b0. In large frying pan melt butter and saute mushrooms garlic onion and zucchini until tender approximately 2 minutes. Add ham and cook 1 more minute; set aside.

title: Red Cabbage And Apples
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. red cabbage finely chopped 2 Tbsp. butter 2 apples finely sliced 1 Tbsp. brown sugar 1 Tbsp. vinegar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. red cabbage finely chopped 2 Tbsp. butter 2 apples finely sliced 1 Tbsp. brown sugar 1 Tbsp. vinegar. Recipe: In a saucepan filled with lightly salted boiling water cook red cabbage for 5 minutes; then drain.

title: German Potato Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 lb. potatoes cooked 6 slices bacon diced 1/2 c. sugar 3 Tbsp. flour 2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 c. cider vinegar 1 c. water 4 green onions sliced. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 lb. potatoes cooked 6 slices bacon diced 1/2 c. sugar 3 Tbsp. flour 2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 c. cider vinegar 1 c. water 4 green onions sliced. Recipe: Peel and cut potatoes in thin slices. Fry bacon until crisp. Remove bacon from grease and reserve 1/2 cup drippings to make dressing. Blend sugar flour salt and pepper. Stir into bacon drippings to make smooth paste. Add vinegar and water. Boil 2 to 3 minutes. Combine sauce potatoes and onions in skillet. Turn skillet off. Cover with a towel (not a lid) and let stand at room temperature 3 or 4 hours. Sprinkle with bacon.

title: Jan'S Winter Soup
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 Tbsp. butter 2 medium onions chopped 1 lb. ground beef or turkey 1 clove garlic minced 3 c. beef or chicken broth 1 (28 oz.) can tomatoes chopped 1 c. diced potatoes 3 carrots chopped 1 c. celery chopped 1 c. frozen green beans 1 c. dry red wine 1/2 tsp. basil 1/4 tsp. thyme salt and pepper to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 Tbsp. butter 2 medium onions chopped 1 lb. ground beef or turkey 1 clove garlic minced 3 c. beef or chicken broth 1 (28 oz.) can tomatoes chopped 1 c. diced potatoes 3 carrots chopped 1 c. celery chopped 1 c. frozen green beans 1 c. dry red wine 1/2 tsp. basil 1/4 tsp. thyme salt and pepper to taste. Recipe: Saute onions and garlic in butter until onions are tender. Add meat and brown. Drain well. Add the rest of the ingredients and simmer at least one hour.

title: Microwave Spice Tea
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (1 lb. 2 oz.) jar Tang 1 pkg. lemonade Kool Aid with sugar added 2 c. sugar 1 tsp. ground cloves 2 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 c. instant tea. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (1 lb. 2 oz.) jar Tang 1 pkg. lemonade Kool Aid with sugar added 2 c. sugar 1 tsp. ground cloves 2 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 c. instant tea. Recipe: Mix all ingredients together and store in airtight container. When ready to serve heat 1 cup water in microwave until boiling. Add 3 heaping teaspoons. Mix to water and stir well. Great for winter cold and to get the chill out.

title: Barbecue Noodle Cheese Bake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can Manwich 1 lb. hamburg American cheese slices noodles cooked and drained. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can Manwich 1 lb. hamburg American cheese slices noodles cooked and drained. Recipe: Cook hamburg and crumble. Add Manwich. Spray Pam in baking dish. Layer 1/2 of noodles then 1/2 hamburg mixture on noodles. Put enough cheese slices on to cover meat. Layer all again. Bake for 1/2 hour at 350\u00b0.

title: Cutout Cookie
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 c. shortening 1/2 c. butter 1 c. sugar 2 eggs beaten 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla 2 1/2 c. flour 1 tsp. baking powder 1/2 tsp. salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 c. shortening 1/2 c. butter 1 c. sugar 2 eggs beaten 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla 2 1/2 c. flour 1 tsp. baking powder 1/2 tsp. salt. Recipe: Mix all ingredients. Chill for several hours. Cut out with cookie cutters. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 minutes. Frost if you want to. Makes approximately 4 dozen.

title: Don Juan'S Sangria
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lime cut into wedges 1 orange cut into slices 1/2 large apple cut into thin wedges 1/2 to 3/4 c. sugar 1 bottle dry red Spanish wine 1/4 c. brandy 1/4 c. Triple Sec club soda. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lime cut into wedges 1 orange cut into slices 1/2 large apple cut into thin wedges 1/2 to 3/4 c. sugar 1 bottle dry red Spanish wine 1/4 c. brandy 1/4 c. Triple Sec club soda. Recipe: Squeeze the juice of lime orange and apple in a large pitcher; add 1/2 cup sugar and fruit pieces. Pour in the wine brandy and Triple Sec and stir with a long handled spoon until well mixed. Taste. If you prefer the sangria sweeter add up to 1/4 cup more sugar.

title: Ranch Beef And Beans
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. cooked crumbled hamburger (drained) 1 c. onion chopped 1 c. kidney beans cooked and drained 1 c. butter beans 1 c. baked beans 3/4 c. ketchup 1 sm. can mild green chilies chopped (opt.) 1 TBSP prepared mustard 1 tsp. beef bouillon 1/2 c. water 2 TBSP. honey 2/3 c. bell pepper chopped 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce 1/2 tsp. garlic pwd. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. cooked crumbled hamburger (drained) 1 c. onion chopped 1 c. kidney beans cooked and drained 1 c. butter beans 1 c. baked beans 3/4 c. ketchup 1 sm. can mild green chilies chopped (opt.) 1 TBSP prepared mustard 1 tsp. beef bouillon 1/2 c. water 2 TBSP. honey 2/3 c. bell pepper chopped 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce 1/2 tsp. garlic pwd. Recipe: Combine all ingredients in large pot; simmer 30-45 minutes or until onion and bell peppers become soft. This recipe triples and freezes well. Serve with cornbread.

title: Crisp Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 c. quick cooking oats 2 c. brown sugar packed 1 c. salad oil 2 eggs well beaten 1/2 tsp. salt 1 tsp. almond extract. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 c. quick cooking oats 2 c. brown sugar packed 1 c. salad oil 2 eggs well beaten 1/2 tsp. salt 1 tsp. almond extract. Recipe: Mix oats brown sugar and oil; let stand overnight or 8 hours. Preheat oven to 325\u00b0. Mix rest of ingredients into oat mixture. Drop by teaspoon onto greased baking sheet. Bake 15 minutes. Cool completely before removing from baking sheet.

title: Souper Tuna Crunch
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can Chinese noodles 1 can Campbell's cream of mushroom soup 3/4 c. water 1 (6 1/2 oz.) can Chicken of the Sea tuna drained and broken in chunks 1 c. cashews or peanuts 1 c. chopped celery 1/2 c. finely chopped onion 1/2 c. cooked peas soy sauce. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can Chinese noodles 1 can Campbell's cream of mushroom soup 3/4 c. water 1 (6 1/2 oz.) can Chicken of the Sea tuna drained and broken in chunks 1 c. cashews or peanuts 1 c. chopped celery 1/2 c. finely chopped onion 1/2 c. cooked peas soy sauce. Recipe: Reserve 1/2 cup Chinese noodles. In 1 1/2-quart casserole combine remaining noodles soup water tuna cashews celery onion and peas. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes or until hot. Stir; sprinkle reserved noodles around edge. Bake 5 minutes more. Serve with soy sauce. Makes about 4 1/2 cups.

title: Cheese-Ham Ball
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 lb. Cheddar cheese shredded 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 1 small flat can deviled ham 1 Tbsp. pimiento chopped approximately 1 Tbsp. dried parsley soaked in water then patted dry on paper towel dash of Worcestershire sauce 1/2 tsp. fresh minced onion. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 lb. Cheddar cheese shredded 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 1 small flat can deviled ham 1 Tbsp. pimiento chopped approximately 1 Tbsp. dried parsley soaked in water then patted dry on paper towel dash of Worcestershire sauce 1/2 tsp. fresh minced onion. Recipe: Mix all ingredients. Form into a ball and roll in chopped pecans. Serve with assorted crackers.

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 (8 oz.) cream cheese 2/3 can chopped black olives 1 jar Armour dried beef 4 green onions (tops and all) 1/2 jar mushrooms. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 (8 oz.) cream cheese 2/3 can chopped black olives 1 jar Armour dried beef 4 green onions (tops and all) 1/2 jar mushrooms. Recipe: Chop all and mix with hands. Form into ball and refrigerate for 1 to 2 days. Sprinkle with paprika and serve with Ritz crackers.

title: Pasta Chicken Salad(268 Calories Per Serving)
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 1/2 c. (8 oz.) large shells (uncooked) 2 c. cubed cooked chicken (light meat) 2 c. fresh raw broccoli flowerets 2 c. fresh raw cauliflower 1 c. sliced carrots 1 c. sliced green onions 1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms sliced 1 c. (8 oz. bottle) reduced calorie creamy Italian salad dressing 3/4 c. skim milk salt and pepper to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 1/2 c. (8 oz.) large shells (uncooked) 2 c. cubed cooked chicken (light meat) 2 c. fresh raw broccoli flowerets 2 c. fresh raw cauliflower 1 c. sliced carrots 1 c. sliced green onions 1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms sliced 1 c. (8 oz. bottle) reduced calorie creamy Italian salad dressing 3/4 c. skim milk salt and pepper to taste. Recipe: Cook large shells according to package directions. Drain and cool (rinse with cold water to cool quickly then drain well). Combine cooled large shells with remaining ingredients and toss lightly. Chill. Makes 8 servings.

title: Zucchini-Artichoke Continental
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (9 oz.) pkg. frozen artichoke hearts 2 Tbsp. water 3 medium zucchini (1 lb.) sliced 1/4-inch thick (4 c.) 2 c. fresh mushrooms halved 2 Tbsp. finely chopped green onion 2 cloves garlic minced 1 Tbsp. margarine or butter 2 medium tomatoes cut into wedges and seeded 1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (9 oz.) pkg. frozen artichoke hearts 2 Tbsp. water 3 medium zucchini (1 lb.) sliced 1/4-inch thick (4 c.) 2 c. fresh mushrooms halved 2 Tbsp. finely chopped green onion 2 cloves garlic minced 1 Tbsp. margarine or butter 2 medium tomatoes cut into wedges and seeded 1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese. Recipe: In 2-quart microwave-safe casserole microcook artichokes and water covered on 100% power (High) for 3 to 4 minutes or until thawed. Stir. Add next 3 ingredients. Cover. Cook on High for 9 to 11 minutes (low-wattage oven for 12 to 14 minutes) or just until tender; stir once. Drain well. Stir in garlic 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper. Dot with margarine or butter. Cover; cook on High for 1 minute. Stir in tomatoes; sprinkle with cheese. Let stand 2 minutes. Makes 6 servings.

title: Supreme Beef Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground chuck 1 tsp. shortening 1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes 1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce 2 tsp. salt 2 tsp. sugar 2 garlic cloves crushed 1 (5 oz.) pkg. egg noodles 1 c. sour cream 1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 6 green onions or scallions chopped (with tops) 1 c. grated cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground chuck 1 tsp. shortening 1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes 1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce 2 tsp. salt 2 tsp. sugar 2 garlic cloves crushed 1 (5 oz.) pkg. egg noodles 1 c. sour cream 1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 6 green onions or scallions chopped (with tops) 1 c. grated cheese. Recipe: Melt shortening in a skillet. Add beef breaking into pieces with a fork. Cook until brown. Drain off fat. Stir into meat the tomatoes and tomato sauce adding salt sugar and garlic. Simmer for 5 to 10 minutes. Meanwhile cook the noodles. Drain well and with a fork blend in sour cream cream cheese and onions.

title: Chicken Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (12.5 oz.) can chunk white chicken 2 c. chopped celery 1 small pkg. slivered almonds 1 c. water chestnuts 1 c. white grapes 1/2 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper 1 tsp. lemon juice curry powder to caste nonfat mayonnaise. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (12.5 oz.) can chunk white chicken 2 c. chopped celery 1 small pkg. slivered almonds 1 c. water chestnuts 1 c. white grapes 1/2 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper 1 tsp. lemon juice curry powder to caste nonfat mayonnaise. Recipe: Combine all ingredients; chill.

title: Chess Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 stick margarine 1 1/2 c. sugar 1 Tbsp. meal 1 Tbsp. vinegar 4 eggs (add one at a time) dash of salt 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 stick margarine 1 1/2 c. sugar 1 Tbsp. meal 1 Tbsp. vinegar 4 eggs (add one at a time) dash of salt 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: Mix ingredients in order given. Bake at 300\u00b0 to 325\u00b0 for 30 minutes or until firm.

title: Cold Spaghetti Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. vermicelli 1 lb. fine chopped bell pepper 2 small zucchini finely chopped 1 large purple onion sliced thin 1 large bottle Bernstien Italian dressing 1/2 to 3/4 jar Schilling Salad Supreme seasoning. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. vermicelli 1 lb. fine chopped bell pepper 2 small zucchini finely chopped 1 large purple onion sliced thin 1 large bottle Bernstien Italian dressing 1/2 to 3/4 jar Schilling Salad Supreme seasoning. Recipe: Cook noodles 1/2 done (do not rinse). Add all other ingredients; mix well. Marinate at least 3 hours. The longer it sits the better it gets!!

title: Cucumber Salad With Dill
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 cucumbers sliced very thin 1/3 c. white vinegar 1 tsp. salt 3 Tbsp. sugar 1 large onion sliced thin fresh dill. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 cucumbers sliced very thin 1/3 c. white vinegar 1 tsp. salt 3 Tbsp. sugar 1 large onion sliced thin fresh dill. Recipe: Combine all ingredients except dill making sure juices are mixed well. Garnish with dill. Chill.

title: Chicken Spaghetti
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (13 oz.) can cooked chicken 1 (10 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup 1 (10 oz.) can cream of chicken soup 1 (10 oz.) can Rotel tomatoes 1 to 2 c. cheese of your choice 1 (16 oz.) pkg. spaghetti 1 Tbsp. steak seasoning. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (13 oz.) can cooked chicken 1 (10 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup 1 (10 oz.) can cream of chicken soup 1 (10 oz.) can Rotel tomatoes 1 to 2 c. cheese of your choice 1 (16 oz.) pkg. spaghetti 1 Tbsp. steak seasoning. Recipe: Cook spaghetti and drain. Mix all other ingredients together. Add to spaghetti place in a 13x9 casserole dish. Cook for 30 minutes at 350 degrees.

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 (8 oz.) cream cheese 4 c. shredded sharp cheese 1/3 c. mayonnaise 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce 1/8 tsp. garlic salt 1/8 tsp. celery salt 1/8 tsp. onion salt 1/2 c. chopped pimento 1/4 c. chopped olives 1/4 c. parsley flakes 1/2 jar dried chipped beef. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 (8 oz.) cream cheese 4 c. shredded sharp cheese 1/3 c. mayonnaise 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce 1/8 tsp. garlic salt 1/8 tsp. celery salt 1/8 tsp. onion salt 1/2 c. chopped pimento 1/4 c. chopped olives 1/4 c. parsley flakes 1/2 jar dried chipped beef. Recipe: Mix all ingredients except chipped beef and parsley. Chill for 1 hour. Shape in ball. Roll in chipped beef and parsley until well coated. Keep in refrigerator. Serve with cracker (any kind).

title: Pistachio Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: pistachio pie filling (instant) 1 can crushed pineapple 1 c. miniature marshmallows 1/2 container Cool Whip (small). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: pistachio pie filling (instant) 1 can crushed pineapple 1 c. miniature marshmallows 1/2 container Cool Whip (small). Recipe: Mix together all ingredients and refrigerate. Serve on lettuce leaf. Use 9 x 13-inch pan.

title: Good Sweet Muffins
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 egg 1/2 c. milk 1/4 c. vegetable oil 1 1/2 c. flour 1/2 c. sugar 2 tsp. baking powder 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. blueberries (optional). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 egg 1/2 c. milk 1/4 c. vegetable oil 1 1/2 c. flour 1/2 c. sugar 2 tsp. baking powder 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. blueberries (optional). Recipe: Heat oven to 400\u00b0. Beat egg with fork. Add remaining ingredients except blueberries and stir until flour is moistened. Batter should be lumpy. Add blueberries if desired. Fill muffin cups 2/3 full. Bake 20 to 25 minutes. Serve warm.

title: Vanilla Creme Dessert
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. flour 1 stick margarine melted 1/2 c. crushed pecans 1 large pkg. cream cheese 1 large pkg. Cool Whip 1 c. powdered sugar 2 large pkg. instant vanilla pudding 3 c. milk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. flour 1 stick margarine melted 1/2 c. crushed pecans 1 large pkg. cream cheese 1 large pkg. Cool Whip 1 c. powdered sugar 2 large pkg. instant vanilla pudding 3 c. milk.
