Strip chicken from bones in large pieces and add to stew last 5 minutes of cooking.

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 2 Tbsp. mayonnaise 1 tsp. lemon juice 5 to 6 green onions 1 (6 oz.) pkg. smoked deli beef 1 small can chopped black olives 1 small green bell pepper chopped nuts Ritz crackers. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 2 Tbsp. mayonnaise 1 tsp. lemon juice 5 to 6 green onions 1 (6 oz.) pkg. smoked deli beef 1 small can chopped black olives 1 small green bell pepper chopped nuts Ritz crackers. Recipe: Mix together cream cheese mayonnaise and lemon juice. Finely chop onions beef olives and bell pepper. Add to cheese mixture and mix well. Chill at least 6 hours. Shape into a ball and roll in chopped nuts. Serve with Ritz crackers.

title: Marinated Carrots
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 lb. carrots cut in diagonal slices 1 large onion sliced in rings 1 (10 oz.) can tomato soup undiluted 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. pepper 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. salad oil 3/4 c. vinegar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 lb. carrots cut in diagonal slices 1 large onion sliced in rings 1 (10 oz.) can tomato soup undiluted 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. pepper 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. salad oil 3/4 c. vinegar. Recipe: Wash and scrape carrots. Cut in diagonal slices. Cook and drain. Cool. Combine carrots with raw onion rings in a bowl. Combine tomato soup sugar oil vinegar salt and pepper in saucepan. Bring to boiling point; stir to dissolve sugar. Pour hot mixture over vegetables and mix together. Cover and chill in refrigerator overnight.

title: Blueberry Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 eggs separated 2 c. sugar 1 c. shortening 1 tsp. salt 2 tsp. baking powder 2 tsp. vanilla 3 c. flour 2/3 c. milk 3 c. floured blueberries. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 eggs separated 2 c. sugar 1 c. shortening 1 tsp. salt 2 tsp. baking powder 2 tsp. vanilla 3 c. flour 2/3 c. milk 3 c. floured blueberries. Recipe: Beat egg whites until stiff; add 1 cup sugar. Set aside. Cream the shortening salt rest of sugar and vanilla. Add egg yolks. Beat until creamy. Add baking powder milk and flour to mixture alternately. Fold in egg whites then blueberries. Pour into a well-greased and floured 9 x 13-inch pan. Sugar the top. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 50 minutes.

title: Summer Squash Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 6 c. sliced yellow squash 1 c. finely chopped onion 1 can cream of chicken soup 8 oz. sour cream 8 oz. pkg. stuffing mix 1 stick butter. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 6 c. sliced yellow squash 1 c. finely chopped onion 1 can cream of chicken soup 8 oz. sour cream 8 oz. pkg. stuffing mix 1 stick butter. Recipe: Cook squash and onion (in pot with just enough water to coat bottom or steam them) drain and set aside. Mix the soup (do not add water) with the sour cream; combine with squash and onion. Melt butter and combine with stuffing. Put layer of stuffing along bottom of 6 X 10 inch baking dish. Alternate layers of squash and stuffing ending with stuffing. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20-25 minutes.

title: Skor Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 box German chocolate cake mix 1 can Eagle Brand condensed milk 1 jar Smucker's caramel sauce 1 container Cool Whip 6 Skor candy bars. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 box German chocolate cake mix 1 can Eagle Brand condensed milk 1 jar Smucker's caramel sauce 1 container Cool Whip 6 Skor candy bars. Recipe: Make cake according to directions on box and bake in 9 x 13-inch pan. Immediately after removing from oven poke holes all over cake and pour Eagle Brand milk and caramel sauce over top of cake. Allow cake to completely cool and then ice with Cool Whip. Crush Skor candy bars and sprinkle over cake. Keep refrigerated.

title: Never Fail Pie Crust(Double Pie Crust)
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 c. sifted flour 1 1/2 c. shortening 1 egg 1/2 c. ice cold water 1 Tbsp. vinegar 1 tsp. sugar 1/2 tsp. salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 c. sifted flour 1 1/2 c. shortening 1 egg 1/2 c. ice cold water 1 Tbsp. vinegar 1 tsp. sugar 1/2 tsp. salt. Recipe: Combine flour sugar and salt. Put shortening in a chilled bowl and add flour mixture. Blend with pastry blender to a coarse meal. Blend egg and ice cold water together then add vinegar and blend. Add to flour mixture and mix well. Roll out on floured surface.

title: Best Brownies
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/4 lb. butter 1/2 c. cocoa 2 c. sugar 4 eggs 2 tsp. vanilla 1 1/2 c. flour 1/4 tsp. salt 1 c. flaked coconut. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/4 lb. butter 1/2 c. cocoa 2 c. sugar 4 eggs 2 tsp. vanilla 1 1/2 c. flour 1/4 tsp. salt 1 c. flaked coconut. Recipe: Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Melt the butter. Pour into mixing bowl. Beat in cocoa and sugar. When mixture is smooth beat in eggs one at a time then add vanilla. Stir in flour salt and coconut. Pour in a 9 x 13-inch greased pan. Bake for 25 minutes. Let cool in pan and cut into squares. Yields about 30 bars.

title: Mushroom Caps Stuffed
ingredients: Ingredients: 20 to 24 white large mushrooms cut off stems and hollow out carefully reserving stems 1 lb. sweet sausage 3/4 c. Mozzarella cheese 1/2 c. seasoned bread crumbs. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 20 to 24 white large mushrooms cut off stems and hollow out carefully reserving stems 1 lb. sweet sausage 3/4 c. Mozzarella cheese 1/2 c. seasoned bread crumbs. Recipe: Fry and chop stems; drain. Fry and drain sausage. Mix cheese and bread crumbs and add mushroom stems and cooked sausage. Mix all ingredients together. Fill hollowed out mushroom caps with mixture. Put in shallow baking dish. Add a little wine. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes until cheese is melted. Serve immediately.

title: Toffee Brickle
ingredients: Ingredients: unsalted soda crackers 3/4 c. packed brown sugar 2 sticks butter 12 oz. bag chocolate chips. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: unsalted soda crackers 3/4 c. packed brown sugar 2 sticks butter 12 oz. bag chocolate chips. Recipe: Line bottom of\tlasagne size pan with soda crackers. Boil sugar and butter about 8 minutes. Pour over crackers. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes. Remove and sprinkle with chocolate chips. Spread melted chocolate chips with a knife. Cool and crack into pieces. Store in an airtight container.

title: Stir Fried Veggies Medley
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 medium carrots 2 celery stalks 1 medium or 2 small onions 1 medium bunch broccoli 1/2 lb. mushrooms 1/4 c. salad or olive oil 1/4 c. water 1 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. pepper 1 level tsp. sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 medium carrots 2 celery stalks 1 medium or 2 small onions 1 medium bunch broccoli 1/2 lb. mushrooms 1/4 c. salad or olive oil 1/4 c. water 1 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. pepper 1 level tsp. sugar. Recipe: Cut carrots and celery into thin strips. Thinly slice onions. Cut broccoli into 2 X 1/2 inch pieces. Cut mushrooms into quarters or in half if they are small. In five-quart or 12 inch skillet over high heat in hot oil cook vegies stirring quickly and frequently about 3 or 4 minutes. Add mushrooms water salt and sugar.\tOther spices may be added. Cover and cook 5 to 6 minutes longer until veggies are tender-crisp stirring occasionally.

title: Bacon And Egg Breakfast Bake
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 oz. fully cooked Canadian bacon or ham cut into small cubes 1/2 c. finely chopped Muenster Cheddar or Monterey Jack cheese 4 eggs 1 1/2 c. skim milk 1/2 tsp. pepper. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 oz. fully cooked Canadian bacon or ham cut into small cubes 1/2 c. finely chopped Muenster Cheddar or Monterey Jack cheese 4 eggs 1 1/2 c. skim milk 1/2 tsp. pepper. Recipe: Preheat oven to 450\u00b0. Spread bacon in bottom of 9-inch pie plate. Sprinkle with cheese. Beat eggs with milk and pepper. Pour over cheese. Bake for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 350\u00b0. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes longer until browned and firm in center. Place pie plate on wire rack to cool for 10 minutes. Cut in wedges. Yields 10 servings 249 calories per serving.

title: Spiced Tea
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/4 c. Tang 1/2 c. sugar 1/3 c. instant tea 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 tsp. cloves dash of salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/4 c. Tang 1/2 c. sugar 1/3 c. instant tea 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 tsp. cloves dash of salt. Recipe: Mix all ingredients. Use 3 to 4 teaspoons of mix for mug of hot water.

title: Fruit Pizza
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 tube cookie dough 1 pkg. cream cheese 1/3 c. Marshmallow Fluff sliced blueberries peaches kiwi and strawberries. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 tube cookie dough 1 pkg. cream cheese 1/3 c. Marshmallow Fluff sliced blueberries peaches kiwi and strawberries. Recipe: Prepare cookie dough in circular baking pan. Bake according to directions; cool.

title: Ham Roll-Ups
ingredients: Ingredients: 6 thin slices Prosciutto ham 3 oz. soft cream cheese 1 small finely chopped onion. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 6 thin slices Prosciutto ham 3 oz. soft cream cheese 1 small finely chopped onion. Recipe: Place ham slices one on top of the other on cutting board. Cut 1/2-inch strips lengthwise; do not separate. Combine cheese and onion. Spread thin layer on top of first slice of ham. Roll up first strips of slice and repeat next slice etc. Makes 30 roll-ups.

title: Pineapple Souffle
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/4 c. butter 1 1/2 c. sugar 1 large can pineapple drained 3 slices bread cubed 3 eggs beaten 1/4 c. milk cinnamon 1 Tbsp. sugar roasted pecans. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/4 c. butter 1 1/2 c. sugar 1 large can pineapple drained 3 slices bread cubed 3 eggs beaten 1/4 c. milk cinnamon 1 Tbsp. sugar roasted pecans. Recipe: Melt butter in pan (9 x 9-inch). Mix together the next 5 ingredients and pour into baking dish with melted butter. Sprinkle with cinnamon 1 tablespoon sugar and roasted pecans. Bake at 300\u00b0 for 40 minutes.

title: Real Whipped Cream That Keeps
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 tsp. unflavored gelatin 4 tsp. cold water 1 c. heavy cream pinch of salt 1/2 tsp. real vanilla 1 tsp. sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 tsp. unflavored gelatin 4 tsp. cold water 1 c. heavy cream pinch of salt 1/2 tsp. real vanilla 1 tsp. sugar. Recipe: In small ovenproof bowl spread gelatin over water. Set bowl in a saucepan of hot water. Let stand until gelatin dissolves. Remove from saucepan. Let cool 1 minute. Whip cream until almost stiff. Add gelatin salt and vanilla. Continue to whip until stiff. Makes 2 1/2 cups.

title: Montana Mud Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 sticks margarine 2 c. sugar 2 Tbsp. cocoa 4 eggs 1 tsp. vanilla 1 1/2 c. flour 1 1/3 c. coconut 1 c. chopped pecans. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 sticks margarine 2 c. sugar 2 Tbsp. cocoa 4 eggs 1 tsp. vanilla 1 1/2 c. flour 1 1/3 c. coconut 1 c. chopped pecans. Recipe: Cream first 3 ingredients. Add eggs and vanilla. Add flour then add coconut and pecans. Mix well. Bake in floured and greased 9 x 12-inch pan in 350\u00b0 oven for 30 minutes. Pour a jar of marshmallow cream over cake and top with frosting.

title: Diane'S Quick Quiche
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 eggs 1 1/2 c. margarine melted 1/2 c. Bisquick 1/4 tsp. salt pepper to taste 1 c. shredded Swiss cheese 1/2 c. crisp fried bacon crumbled 1/4 c. chopped onion pinch of basil pinch of marjoram 1 c. broccoli or favorite vegetable. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 eggs 1 1/2 c. margarine melted 1/2 c. Bisquick 1/4 tsp. salt pepper to taste 1 c. shredded Swiss cheese 1/2 c. crisp fried bacon crumbled 1/4 c. chopped onion pinch of basil pinch of marjoram 1 c. broccoli or favorite vegetable. Recipe: To make a grilled cheese sandwich properly you must first decide what kind of bread to use white wheat rye or raisin..raisin? Then consider the kind of cheese you have available American Swiss Cheddar Limburger..Limburger? You will also need butter or oleo or lard.. lard? A kitchen countertop will be useful as well as a knife spatula an iron skillet with a lid or cover a stove and a helper to clean up the mess when you are through.

title: Egg Drop Soup
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 Tbsp. peanut oil 1 c. chopped onion 1 1/2 tsp. minced garlic 7 c. chicken broth 2 Tbsp. soy sauce 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 c. thinly sliced carrots 1 tsp. minced ginger root 1 lb. lean pork cut in strips 1 (8 oz.) can bamboo shoots drained 1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts drained 6 oz. frozen pea pods 1/4 tsp. sesame oil 2 eggs well beaten. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 Tbsp. peanut oil 1 c. chopped onion 1 1/2 tsp. minced garlic 7 c. chicken broth 2 Tbsp. soy sauce 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 c. thinly sliced carrots 1 tsp. minced ginger root 1 lb. lean pork cut in strips 1 (8 oz.) can bamboo shoots drained 1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts drained 6 oz. frozen pea pods 1/4 tsp. sesame oil 2 eggs well beaten. Recipe: In a large saucepan or Dutch oven heat oil over medium heat. Add onion garlic ginger and pork; cook and stir until tender. Stir in broth soy sauce pepper and sesame oil; bring to a boil. Add carrots; simmer 15 minutes. Add all remaining ingredients except eggs; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Stir in eggs with a fork to separate into strands.

title: Summer Berry Sauce
ingredients: Ingredients: 3/4 c. frozen raspberry or raspberry blend juice concentrate thawed 2 Tbsp. honey 1 c. sliced fresh strawberries 1 c. fresh or frozen blueberries partially thawed 1 c. fresh or frozen raspberries partially thawed. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3/4 c. frozen raspberry or raspberry blend juice concentrate thawed 2 Tbsp. honey 1 c. sliced fresh strawberries 1 c. fresh or frozen blueberries partially thawed 1 c. fresh or frozen raspberries partially thawed. Recipe: In a large bowl combine juice concentrate and honey. Add fruit. Toss gently to combine. Store in refrigerator. Makes 3 cups.

title: Cherry Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 9-inch graham cracker crust 1 can condensed milk 1/3 c. lemon juice 1 can cherry pie filling 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 9-inch graham cracker crust 1 can condensed milk 1/3 c. lemon juice 1 can cherry pie filling 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: Cream cheese should be close to room temperature. Blend milk lemon juice and vanilla with cream cheese and pour into pie crust. Chill about 2 hours. Then pour cherry pie filling on top. Chill one more hour. Keep refrigerated.

title: Baked Bean Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 Tbsp. bacon drippings 3 Tbsp. garlic salt 3 medium onions sliced 1 large can pork and beans 1 regular can red kidney beans 1 can small green lima beans 1/2 c. catsup 1 tsp. dry mustard 1/2 tsp. black pepper 1 tsp. salt 1/2 c. brown sugar 1/4 c. vinegar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 Tbsp. bacon drippings 3 Tbsp. garlic salt 3 medium onions sliced 1 large can pork and beans 1 regular can red kidney beans 1 can small green lima beans 1/2 c. catsup 1 tsp. dry mustard 1/2 tsp. black pepper 1 tsp. salt 1/2 c. brown sugar 1/4 c. vinegar. Recipe: Cook at 350\u00b0 for 1 3/4 hours in a 2-quart casserole.

title: Pumpkin Bread
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. canned pumpkin 1 c. salad oil 3 c. sugar 3 1/4 c. flour 4 eggs beaten 2 tsp. salt 1 tsp. baking powder 1 tsp. baking soda 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. cloves 1 tsp. nutmeg. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. canned pumpkin 1 c. salad oil 3 c. sugar 3 1/4 c. flour 4 eggs beaten 2 tsp. salt 1 tsp. baking powder 1 tsp. baking soda 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. cloves 1 tsp. nutmeg. Recipe: Mix all ingredients together in a large bowl. Pour into 2 greased loaf pans. Bake at 350\u00b0 for at least 1 1/4 hours. Makes 2 loaves.

title: Fried Rice
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/4 c. onions chopped 2 Tbsp. green pepper chopped 2 Tbsp. salad oil 2 c. cooked rice 3 oz. sliced mushrooms 2 Tbsp. soy sauce 3 eggs beaten. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/4 c. onions chopped 2 Tbsp. green pepper chopped 2 Tbsp. salad oil 2 c. cooked rice 3 oz. sliced mushrooms 2 Tbsp. soy sauce 3 eggs beaten. Recipe: Cook and stir onions and green pepper in oil until onion is tender.\tStir in rice mushrooms and soy sauce.\tCook over low heat for 10 minutes stirring frequently stir in beaten eggs. Cook and stir 2 to 3 minutes longer.

title: Paw Paw'S Pancakes
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 eggs 1 1/2 Tbsp. sugar 1 1/2 c. self-rising flour 1 c. milk 3 to 4 Tbsp. oleo melted vanilla to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 eggs 1 1/2 Tbsp. sugar 1 1/2 c. self-rising flour 1 c. milk 3 to 4 Tbsp. oleo melted vanilla to taste. Recipe: Beat eggs. Add sugar and mix well. Stir in flour and milk. Beat until smooth. Add melted oleo and stir thoroughly. Add vanilla. Pour onto preheated skillet or griddle. Turn when bubbles appear.

title: Speedy White Clam Sauce
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can minced clams 2 cloves garlic minced 1/2 c. olive oil 1 Tbsp. minced parsley salt and pepper. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can minced clams 2 cloves garlic minced 1/2 c. olive oil 1 Tbsp. minced parsley salt and pepper. Recipe: Drain clams. Heat olive oil in skillet. Add garlic; brown lightly. Add parsley and seasoning. Heat 2 minutes. Serve over cooked spaghetti.

title: Pineapple Cranberry Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 c. cranberries 1 1/2 c. crushed pineapple 1 1/4 c. sugar 1 Tbsp. flour 3/4 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. nutmeg 1/4 tsp. salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 c. cranberries 1 1/2 c. crushed pineapple 1 1/4 c. sugar 1 Tbsp. flour 3/4 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. nutmeg 1/4 tsp. salt. Recipe: Cook fruit until cranberries burst. Cranberries on bottom. Blend dry ingredients and stir into fruit. Cook until thickened. Cool slightly and pour into 9-inch uncooked pie shell and bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes.

title: Strawberry Yum-Yum
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 stick margarine 2 c. graham cracker crumbs 2 pkg. Dream Whip 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 1 c. sugar 1 c. cold milk 2 c. strawberries. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 stick margarine 2 c. graham cracker crumbs 2 pkg. Dream Whip 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 1 c. sugar 1 c. cold milk 2 c. strawberries. Recipe: Melt margarine and stir in crumbs. Place half of mixture in bottom of baking dish. Whip Dream Whip and cream cheese with sugar and cold milk. Pour half of the Dream Whip mixture on crumbs. Spread strawberries on creamed mixture. Spread remainder of creamed mixture on top of strawberries. Sprinkle remainder of crumbs on top. Chill 3 hours or longer.

title: Blueberry Cream Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. commerical sour cream 2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour 3/4 c. sugar 1 tsp. vanilla extract 3/4 tsp. salt 1 egg beaten 2 1/2 c. fresh blueberries 1 unbaked 9-inch pastry shell 3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour 3 Tbsp. butter softened 3 Tbsp. chopped black walnuts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. commerical sour cream 2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour 3/4 c. sugar 1 tsp. vanilla extract 3/4 tsp. salt 1 egg beaten 2 1/2 c. fresh blueberries 1 unbaked 9-inch pastry shell 3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour 3 Tbsp. butter softened 3 Tbsp. chopped black walnuts. Recipe: Combine first 6 ingredients; beat 5 minutes at medium speed of an electric mixer or until smooth. Fold in blueberries. Pour filling into pastry shell. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 25 minutes.

title: Western Style Barbecue
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 frankfurters cut in 1-inch pieces 2 Tbsp. butter 1 (19 1/4 oz.) can Campbell's chunky old fashioned beans with ham soup 1 (12 oz.) can whole kernel golden corn with sweet peppers drained 1 (8 oz.) can lima beans drained 1/2 c. barbecue sauce. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 frankfurters cut in 1-inch pieces 2 Tbsp. butter 1 (19 1/4 oz.) can Campbell's chunky old fashioned beans with ham soup 1 (12 oz.) can whole kernel golden corn with sweet peppers drained 1 (8 oz.) can lima beans drained 1/2 c. barbecue sauce. Recipe: In saucepan brown frankfurters in butter. Add remaining ingredients. Heat; stir occasionally. Garnish with green pepper rings. Makes about 5 cups.

title: Cheese Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 pkg. lemon Jell-O 1 c. boiling water 3 Tbsp. lemon juice 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 1 c. sugar 1 small can drained crushed pineapple 2 tsp. vanilla 1 large can Milnot 2 pkg. graham crackers 1/2 c. oleo (1 stick). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 pkg. lemon Jell-O 1 c. boiling water 3 Tbsp. lemon juice 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 1 c. sugar 1 small can drained crushed pineapple 2 tsp. vanilla 1 large can Milnot 2 pkg. graham crackers 1/2 c. oleo (1 stick). Recipe: Mix first 3 ingredients. Mix next 4 ingredients. Whip Milnot until stiff. Roll graham crackers and mix with 1 stick of oleo. Press crackers (half) into bottom of pan. Combine the cream cheese mixture into the Jell-O mixture and fold in the Milnot. Put on top of graham crackers. Add remaining crackers on top. Chill several hours.

title: Angel Food Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 cup sifted cake flour 1 1/2 cups sugar 1 1/2 cups egg white (about a dozen) 1 1/2 tsp. cream of tartar 3/4 tsp. salt 1 tsp. vanilla 1/2 tsp. almond flavoring. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 cup sifted cake flour 1 1/2 cups sugar 1 1/2 cups egg white (about a dozen) 1 1/2 tsp. cream of tartar 3/4 tsp. salt 1 tsp. vanilla 1/2 tsp. almond flavoring. Recipe: Sift of sugar with flour 4 times. Beat whites to a foam. Add cream of tartar and salt and beat till it holds up peaks. Add remaining sugar and flavoring. Fold in flour.

title: Plum Nutty Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. self-rising flour 2 c. sugar 1 c. oil 2 jars strained plum baby food 3 eggs 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. allspice 1 c. pecans broken into small pieces. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. self-rising flour 2 c. sugar 1 c. oil 2 jars strained plum baby food 3 eggs 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. allspice 1 c. pecans broken into small pieces. Recipe: Mix all ingredients together. When fluffy cook at 300\u00b0 for 1 hour or until done.

title: Pinto Bean Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 c. sugar 2 sticks margarine melted 1 c. pinto beans mashed 4 beaten eggs 1 Tbsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 c. sugar 2 sticks margarine melted 1 c. pinto beans mashed 4 beaten eggs 1 Tbsp. vanilla. Recipe: Mix all ingredients; pour into 3 unbaked pie shells. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 minutes.

title: Speedy Little Devils
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 devil's food cake mix 3/4 c. peanut butter 1 stick oleo melted 1 (7 oz.) jar marshmallow cream. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 devil's food cake mix 3/4 c. peanut butter 1 stick oleo melted 1 (7 oz.) jar marshmallow cream. Recipe: Combine melted butter and dry cake mix. Reserve 1 1/4 cups of this for top crust. Pat remaining crumb mixture into ungreased 13 x 9 x 2-inch pan. Top that layer with combined peanut butter and marshmallow cream. Spread evenly. Crumble remaining cake mixture over that. Bake 20 minutes at 350\u00b0. Cool; cut into bars. Makes 3 dozen.

title: Martha Washington Candy
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 boxes confectioners sugar 1 can Eagle Brand milk 1 tsp. vanilla 7 oz. coconut (not frozen) pecans 1 box Baker's semi-sweet chocolate paraffin. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 boxes confectioners sugar 1 can Eagle Brand milk 1 tsp. vanilla 7 oz. coconut (not frozen) pecans 1 box Baker's semi-sweet chocolate paraffin. Recipe: Mix together 1 box confectioners sugar Eagle Brand milk and vanilla then thicken with coconut and then add as many pecans as desired. Mix well. Put in freezer for 2 to 3 hours or until extremely stiff then roll in balls using the other box of confectioners sugar to roll in. Set aside. Melt 1/2 to 3/4 of a block of paraffin and 1 box of Baker's semi-sweet chocolate.

title: 24 Hour Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 head lettuce 1 c. chopped onion 1/2 c. bacon bits 2 c. mayonnaise 1 pkg. shredded Swiss cheese 1 c. cauliflower (in pieces) 1 c. chopped celery 1 c. frozen peas 3 Tbsp. sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 head lettuce 1 c. chopped onion 1/2 c. bacon bits 2 c. mayonnaise 1 pkg. shredded Swiss cheese 1 c. cauliflower (in pieces) 1 c. chopped celery 1 c. frozen peas 3 Tbsp. sugar. Recipe: Layer vegetables in large bowl. Top with bacon bits. Mix mayonnaise and sugar together and pour on top of salad making sure top is covered completely. Cover and place in refrigerator overnight. Put shredded cheese on top just before serving.

title: Rocky Road Fudge
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 c. margarine 2/3 c. unsweetened cocoa 1/2 c. light corn syrup 1 Tbsp. water 1 tsp. vanilla 1 lb. confectioners sugar 1 c. miniature marshmallows 1/2 c. chopped nuts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 c. margarine 2/3 c. unsweetened cocoa 1/2 c. light corn syrup 1 Tbsp. water 1 tsp. vanilla 1 lb. confectioners sugar 1 c. miniature marshmallows 1/2 c. chopped nuts. Recipe: Grease 8 x 8 x 2-inch baking pan. In 2-quart saucepan melt margarine over low heat. Stir in cocoa corn syrup water and vanilla until well blended. Remove from heat. Gradually stir in confectioners sugar until well blended and smooth. Stir in marshmallows and nuts. Turn into prepared pan. Cover and refrigerate until firm. Cut into squares. Makes about 1 3/4 pounds.

title: Ice Cream
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 eggs 2 c sugar 1 can Eagle brand milk 1/2 pt cream 2 tsp vanilla pinch of salt 2 qts milk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 eggs 2 c sugar 1 can Eagle brand milk 1/2 pt cream 2 tsp vanilla pinch of salt 2 qts milk. Recipe: Beat with electric mixer. Put in freezer.

title: No Bake Persimmon Pudding
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. persimmon pulp 1 c. powdered sugar 2 c. graham cracker crumbs 1/2 c. peanuts chopped 1/2 c. miniature marshmallows whipped cream. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. persimmon pulp 1 c. powdered sugar 2 c. graham cracker crumbs 1/2 c. peanuts chopped 1/2 c. miniature marshmallows whipped cream. Recipe: Mix pulp sugar peanuts and marshmallows. Add graham cracker crumbs. Shape into roll adding more crumbs if needed to retain shape. Chill thoroughly. Serve with whipped cream.

title: Fruitcake Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. light brown sugar 3 eggs 3 c. self rising flour 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 c. milk 2 lbs candied fruit or 6 slices of candied pineapple and 2 cups of candied cherries 3 to 4 c. of pecans. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. light brown sugar 3 eggs 3 c. self rising flour 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 c. milk 2 lbs candied fruit or 6 slices of candied pineapple and 2 cups of candied cherries 3 to 4 c. of pecans. Recipe: Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs. Add other ingredients and mix well. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto a cookie sheet. Bake at 300 for 20 to 30 minutes.

title: Chicken And Tortilla Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 medium chicken 1 can (12) soft tortillas 1 large chopped onion 1 large chopped green pepper 1 can mushroom soup 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 can tomatoes and green chilies 1/2 tsp. chili powder 1/2 tsp. garlic salt 1 lb. Cheddar cheese grated. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 medium chicken 1 can (12) soft tortillas 1 large chopped onion 1 large chopped green pepper 1 can mushroom soup 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 can tomatoes and green chilies 1/2 tsp. chili powder 1/2 tsp. garlic salt 1 lb. Cheddar cheese grated. Recipe: Boil chicken; bone and cut up meat. To the meat add onion and green pepper. Mix soups tomatoes chili powder and garlic salt. Dip each tortilla in chicken broth then in a buttered 9 x 12-inch baking dish. Place a layer of tortilla 1/2 the chicken 1/2 the soup mixture and 1/2 cheese. Repeat layers; bake 30 to 40 minutes in 350\u00b0 oven until cheese melts.

title: Fruit Pizza
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 tube refrigerator enriched sugar cookie dough 8 oz. cream cheese softened assorted canned or fresh fruits sliced 1/2 c. powdered sugar coconut. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 tube refrigerator enriched sugar cookie dough 8 oz. cream cheese softened assorted canned or fresh fruits sliced 1/2 c. powdered sugar coconut. Recipe: Press out cookie dough flat on a 13-inch pizza pan or cookie sheet. Bake according to package directions. Cream together cream cheese and powdered sugar. Spread on cooled crust. Top with chopped or sliced fruits and sprinkle with coconut. Yields 1 pizza.

title: Harvard Beets
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine 2 Tbsp. flour 1/4 c. boiling water 1/4 c. vinegar 1/3 c. brown sugar 1/2 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper 1/8 tsp. ground cloves 2 1/2 c. diced cooked beets. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine 2 Tbsp. flour 1/4 c. boiling water 1/4 c. vinegar 1/3 c. brown sugar 1/2 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper 1/8 tsp. ground cloves 2 1/2 c. diced cooked beets. Recipe: Melt fat and stir in flour. Gradually add boiling water and cook until thickened stirring constantly. Add vinegar sugar and seasonings. Mix well until sugar dissolves. Add beets and cook until thoroughly heated. If canned beets are used substitute 1/4 cup liquid from the can of beets for the water. Makes 6 servings.

title: Clam Chowder
ingredients: Ingredients: 6 to 8 lean slices diced bacon 2 c. diced cooked potatoes 1 c. diced onion 2 cans minced clams drained (reserve 1 c. clam juice) 2 c. half and half 1 c. water 2 Tbsp. butter salt and pepper to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 6 to 8 lean slices diced bacon 2 c. diced cooked potatoes 1 c. diced onion 2 cans minced clams drained (reserve 1 c. clam juice) 2 c. half and half 1 c. water 2 Tbsp. butter salt and pepper to taste. Recipe: Dice bacon and onion. Saute in soup pot. Add remaining ingredients. Heat; do not boil. May be thickened if necessary.

title: Easy Cranberry Relish
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 small pkg. fresh cranberries 1 c. sugar (or more if you like) 1 whole orange walnuts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 small pkg. fresh cranberries 1 c. sugar (or more if you like) 1 whole orange walnuts. Recipe: In food processor mix cranberries sugar and whole orange (cutting it into 2 to 4 parts seems to work better). Mix ingredients in processor until chopped. Transfer mixture into a mixing bowl and add chopped walnuts. Chill and serve.

title: Banana Omelette
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 Tbsp. Butter 4 Bananas (sliced) 6 Eggs (separated) 1/2 tsp. Salt Dash of Cayenne Pepper 1/4 c. Milk 2 Tbsp. Chopped Parsley. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 Tbsp. Butter 4 Bananas (sliced) 6 Eggs (separated) 1/2 tsp. Salt Dash of Cayenne Pepper 1/4 c. Milk 2 Tbsp. Chopped Parsley. Recipe: Melt the butter in a skillet and saut the bananas about 5 minutes turning them frequently. Remove from the pan and set aside. Beat the egg yolks with the salt cayenne pepper and milk. Beat the egg whites until stiff and fold the yolks and whites together. Transfer to a buttered 7 x 10 inch shallow casserole and arrange the banana slices on top. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 20 minutes or until lightly browned. Sprinkle with parsley and serve from the casserole.

title: Taco Soup
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. hamburger 1 onion chopped 1/2 pkg. dry taco seasoning 1 can kidney beans 1 can butter beans 1 can tomatoes 1 small can tomato sauce 1 (12 oz.) can tomato juice or V-8 juice. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. hamburger 1 onion chopped 1/2 pkg. dry taco seasoning 1 can kidney beans 1 can butter beans 1 can tomatoes 1 small can tomato sauce 1 (12 oz.) can tomato juice or V-8 juice. Recipe: Brown hamburger with onion. Drain. Add taco seasoning. Combine meat mixture with all remaining ingredients. Simmer 20 minutes. Serve with Cheddar cheese sour cream crushed corn chips and chopped avocado. Let each person create their own. Delicious and fun!

title: Frosty Pudding Cones
ingredients: Ingredients: 2/3 c. sweetened condensed milk 2 Tbsp. lemon juice 6 sugar cones (the hard type) 1/2 c. whipped cream or Cool Whip 8 oz. fruit yogurt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2/3 c. sweetened condensed milk 2 Tbsp. lemon juice 6 sugar cones (the hard type) 1/2 c. whipped cream or Cool Whip 8 oz. fruit yogurt. Recipe: In a mixing bowl combine milk and lemon juice. Mix well. Add yogurt. Mix well. Spoon mixture into cones. Set upright in glasses or jars and place in freezer. Freeze 3 hours. Top each cone with 1 tablespoon whipped topping. Serves 6.

title: Easy Marinade
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 c. soy sauce 1/4 c. oil 1/4 c. red wine vinegar 1 tsp. oregano 1 tsp. basil 1 tsp. minced onion 1/4 tsp. pepper. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 c. soy sauce 1/4 c. oil 1/4 c. red wine vinegar 1 tsp. oregano 1 tsp. basil 1 tsp. minced onion 1/4 tsp. pepper. Recipe: Mix all ingredients together and pour over chicken. Let set as little as 1 hour or overnight for really juicy chicken.

title: Pina Colada Muffins
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 box Pillsbury yellow cake mix 1 tsp. coconut flavoring 1 tsp. rum flavoring 1 c. coconut 1/2 c. chopped nuts 1 c. drained crushed pineapple. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 box Pillsbury yellow cake mix 1 tsp. coconut flavoring 1 tsp. rum flavoring 1 c. coconut 1/2 c. chopped nuts 1 c. drained crushed pineapple. Recipe: Use electric mixer. Prepare cake as directed on box. Stir in remaining ingredients and mix 1 minute. Use muffin cups or grease muffin pans well. Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes. I frosted mine with cream cheese frosting.

title: Oriental Tossed Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 1/2 c. red wine vinegar 1 c. oil 3 Tbsp. soy sauce 2 pkg. Ramen noodles crushed 1 c. chopped walnuts 1 bunch chopped green onion 1 bunch broccoli florets 2 pkg. romaine lettuce. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 1/2 c. red wine vinegar 1 c. oil 3 Tbsp. soy sauce 2 pkg. Ramen noodles crushed 1 c. chopped walnuts 1 bunch chopped green onion 1 bunch broccoli florets 2 pkg. romaine lettuce. Recipe: Mix all together right before serving. Serves 12 to 15.

title: Applesauce Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 c. white sugar 2 c. brown sugar 1 stick margarine 1/2 c. oil 2 c. applesauce 2 tsp. soda 1/2 tsp. salt 2 eggs 1 c. ground raisins 1/2 c. walnuts or pecans 2 1/2 c. flour 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 tsp. cloves. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 c. white sugar 2 c. brown sugar 1 stick margarine 1/2 c. oil 2 c. applesauce 2 tsp. soda 1/2 tsp. salt 2 eggs 1 c. ground raisins 1/2 c. walnuts or pecans 2 1/2 c. flour 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 tsp. cloves. Recipe: Beat the sugars (white and brown) and oil together. Add eggs and beat again. Add applesauce raisins salt and soda then flour. Stir in walnuts or pecans. Bake in large flat pan 13 x 18-inches at 350\u00b0.

title: Mayonnaise
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 pt. oil juice of 1/2 lemon 1 egg yolk 1 tsp. honey. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 pt. oil juice of 1/2 lemon 1 egg yolk 1 tsp. honey. Recipe: Mix egg yolk slightly. Add oil 1 drop at a time until it begins to thicken then add slowly and steadily. Add lemon juice and honey. Store in fridge.

title: Shepherd'S Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. hamburg 1/4 c. chopped onion 1/4 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper 1 c. mashed potatoes. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. hamburg 1/4 c. chopped onion 1/4 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper 1 c. mashed potatoes. Recipe: Fry hamburg and onion until brown. Drain off liquid. Add salt and pepper. Spoon into 1-quart casserole and place potatoes on top. Put butter and paprika over potatoes. Bake in a 425\u00b0 oven for 15 minutes.

title: Fresh Apple Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 c. chopped raw apple 2 c. flour 2 c. sugar 1/2 c. shortening (I used 1 stick oleo) 2 eggs 1/2 tsp. salt 1 tsp. baking soda 2 tsp. vanilla 1/2 tsp. nutmeg 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1 c. chopped nuts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 c. chopped raw apple 2 c. flour 2 c. sugar 1/2 c. shortening (I used 1 stick oleo) 2 eggs 1/2 tsp. salt 1 tsp. baking soda 2 tsp. vanilla 1/2 tsp. nutmeg 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1 c. chopped nuts. Recipe: Mix all ingredients together. Bake in a greased and floured 13 x 9-inch pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes. I use a tube pan.

title: Brown Rice Pizza(Light)
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. cooked brown rice (without salt or fat) 1 1/2 c. (6 oz.) shredded part skim milk Mozzarella cheese divided 1 egg beaten (I use Second Nature) 1 tsp. oregano divided Pam 1 c. broccoli flowerets 1 c. sliced zucchini 1 c. sliced fresh mushrooms 1 small onion sliced 8 oz. can tomato sauce (no salt). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. cooked brown rice (without salt or fat) 1 1/2 c. (6 oz.) shredded part skim milk Mozzarella cheese divided 1 egg beaten (I use Second Nature) 1 tsp. oregano divided Pam 1 c. broccoli flowerets 1 c. sliced zucchini 1 c. sliced fresh mushrooms 1 small onion sliced 8 oz. can tomato sauce (no salt). Recipe: Combine rice 1/2 cup cheese and 1/2 teaspoon oregano in a medium bowl. Stir well. Press mixture evenly into a 12-inch pizza pan coated with Pam. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 25 minutes. Coat a large nonstick skillet with Pam. Place over medium-high heat until hot. Add broccoli zucchini mushrooms and onion. Saute until tender. Combine tomato sauce and remaining oregano. Spread evenly over baked crust. Top with sauteed vegetable mixture. Sprinkle with remaining 1 cup cheese. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 10 minutes or until pizza is thoroughly heated and cheese is melted. Yields 4 servings (255 calories each).

title: Creamy Shells With Broccoli And Ham
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (1 lb.) box medium size macaroni shells 1/2 lb. cooked ham 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli thawed 1 clove garlic crushed 1/2 c. margarine 1 c. heavy cream 1 c. grated Parmesan cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (1 lb.) box medium size macaroni shells 1/2 lb. cooked ham 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli thawed 1 clove garlic crushed 1/2 c. margarine 1 c. heavy cream 1 c. grated Parmesan cheese. Recipe: Cook shells according to package directions. Slice or cube ham; cut broccoli into 1/2-inch pieces. Saute garlic ham and broccoli in margarine in a large skillet until broccoli is crisp and tender (approximately 5 minutes). Stir in cream. Cook over medium heat 3 minutes. Stir in cheese. Lower heat and cook stirring often until cheese is melted. Drain shells and toss with sauce. Serve.

title: Chicken Over Rice
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 chopped onion 2 chopped bell peppers 1/2 bunch celery 1 can chicken broth 2 chopped potatoes little soy sauce and cornstarch. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 chopped onion 2 chopped bell peppers 1/2 bunch celery 1 can chicken broth 2 chopped potatoes little soy sauce and cornstarch. Recipe: Boil all ingredients until tender. Serve over rice.

title: Meatball Chop Suey
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 lb. ground beef 1/2 c. bread crumbs 1 c. milk 2/3 c. onion chopped 1 egg 1 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper 3 Tbsp. lard or drippings 2 beef bouillon cubes 3 c. hot water 1/4 c. soy sauce 2 c. celery cut in 1/2-inch strips 3 Tbsp. cornstarch 2 Tbsp. cold water 2 c. bean sprouts drained 1 c. mushroom stems (4 oz.) cooked rice or chow mein noodles. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 lb. ground beef 1/2 c. bread crumbs 1 c. milk 2/3 c. onion chopped 1 egg 1 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper 3 Tbsp. lard or drippings 2 beef bouillon cubes 3 c. hot water 1/4 c. soy sauce 2 c. celery cut in 1/2-inch strips 3 Tbsp. cornstarch 2 Tbsp. cold water 2 c. bean sprouts drained 1 c. mushroom stems (4 oz.) cooked rice or chow mein noodles. Recipe: Mix ground beef bread crumbs milk 2 tablespoons onion egg salt and pepper. Shape into 24 meatballs and brown in lard or drippings. Pour off drippings. Dissolve bouillon cubes in hot water; add bouillon remaining onion soy sauce and celery to meatballs. Cover tightly and cook slowly for 15 minutes. Remove meatballs.

title: Vegetable Beef Soup
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef cooked and drained 1 large can tomatoes (whole) 1 can tomato soup 1 small onion chopped 2 c. water 1 pkg. frozen mixed vegetables 1 c. potatoes cut up and cooked until tender 1 c. diced celery 1/4 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef cooked and drained 1 large can tomatoes (whole) 1 can tomato soup 1 small onion chopped 2 c. water 1 pkg. frozen mixed vegetables 1 c. potatoes cut up and cooked until tender 1 c. diced celery 1/4 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper. Recipe: Add beef tomatoes soup and onion in crock-pot. Add water frozen vegetables potatoes and celery. Add salt and pepper and other spices of preference. Stir well. Cook at lowest setting for 4 to 6 hours.

title: Hawaiian Marshmallow Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 24 Kraft jet-puffed marshmallows or 3 c. Kraft miniature marshmallows 2 cans (8 oz. each) crushed pineapple drained reserving 1/2 c. liquid 2 c. thawed Cool Whip nondairy whipped topping 1 prepared graham cracker crumb crust (6 oz.). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 24 Kraft jet-puffed marshmallows or 3 c. Kraft miniature marshmallows 2 cans (8 oz. each) crushed pineapple drained reserving 1/2 c. liquid 2 c. thawed Cool Whip nondairy whipped topping 1 prepared graham cracker crumb crust (6 oz.). Recipe: Microwave marshmallows and reserved 1/2 cup pineapple liquid in large microwave safe bowl on High 2 to 2 1/2 minutes or until smooth when stirred stirring halfway through heating time. Refrigerate 30 minutes or until slightly thickened; mix until well blended. Fold in pineapple and whipped topping. Pour into crust. Refrigerate several hours or overnight. Garnish with pineapple chunks and maraschino cherries. Makes 6 servings.

title: Sugar-Free Sweet-N-Sour Stir-Fry
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 tsp. vegetable oil 2 stalks celery sliced diagonally 1 head cabbage shredded 1/2 c. water chestnuts 1 recipe Sweet-N-Sour Sauce 3 carrots sliced diagonally 1 chopped onion 2 zucchini sliced 1/4 c. green pepper chopped. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 tsp. vegetable oil 2 stalks celery sliced diagonally 1 head cabbage shredded 1/2 c. water chestnuts 1 recipe Sweet-N-Sour Sauce 3 carrots sliced diagonally 1 chopped onion 2 zucchini sliced 1/4 c. green pepper chopped. Recipe: Cook vegetables 2 minutes and add water chestnuts and green pepper. Cook until crisp and add Sweet-N-Sour Sauce.

title: Graham Cracker Bars
ingredients: Ingredients: Graham crackers 1 stick of margarine 1 stick of butter 1/2 c sugar pecans. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: Graham crackers 1 stick of margarine 1 stick of butter 1/2 c sugar pecans. Recipe: Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Grease pan. Divide graham crackers into smallest part and put into bottom of pan. Melt together the butter and margarine. Add 1/2 c sugar boil for 2 minutes. Remove from heat add pecans (as many as desired). Mix and pour over graham crackers. Bake for 6 minutes on the bottom rack.

title: Red Cabbage
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 Tbsp. bacon drippings or olive oil 1 onion chopped 1 large red cabbage shredded 2 cooking apples chopped 1/2 c. wine vinegar 1 Tbsp. sugar 1 tsp. salt 1/2 jar currant jelly. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 Tbsp. bacon drippings or olive oil 1 onion chopped 1 large red cabbage shredded 2 cooking apples chopped 1/2 c. wine vinegar 1 Tbsp. sugar 1 tsp. salt 1/2 jar currant jelly. Recipe: Saute the onion in the bacon drippings or olive oil until tender. Add the cabbage and saute 10 minutes. Add the apples wine vinegar sugar and salt. Simmer covered 2 hours. Stir and check for burning. Add the jelly and simmer 1/2 hour more.

title: Ambrosia Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can chunk pineapple 1 can mandarin oranges 1 small jar maraschino cherries 1 container sour cream 1 small pkg. miniature marshmallows 1 can flaked coconut. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can chunk pineapple 1 can mandarin oranges 1 small jar maraschino cherries 1 container sour cream 1 small pkg. miniature marshmallows 1 can flaked coconut. Recipe: Drain pineapple oranges and cherries put in bowl and mix all ingredients together. Put in refrigerator.

title: Sour Cream Pound Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 c. sugar 2 sticks margarine 1/4 c. Crisco 6 eggs 3 c. sifted cake flour 8 oz. sour cream 1 tsp. vanilla flavoring. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 c. sugar 2 sticks margarine 1/4 c. Crisco 6 eggs 3 c. sifted cake flour 8 oz. sour cream 1 tsp. vanilla flavoring. Recipe: Mix sugar margarine and Crisco. Add eggs one at a time. Beat on low. Add flour sour cream and vanilla. Bake at 325\u00b0 for about 1 hour and 15 minutes.

title: Soft Delicious Pumpkin Bars
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. flour 2 tsp. baking powder 1/2 tsp. salt 2 tsp. cinnamon 4 eggs 1 c. nuts 2 c. pumpkin 1 tsp. soda 2 c. sugar 1 c. oil. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. flour 2 tsp. baking powder 1/2 tsp. salt 2 tsp. cinnamon 4 eggs 1 c. nuts 2 c. pumpkin 1 tsp. soda 2 c. sugar 1 c. oil. Recipe: Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes.

title: Barbecue Sauce
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can tomato sauce 1/4 c. brown sugar 1/4 c. vinegar 1/2 c. minced onion salt and pepper to taste 1 tsp. garlic powder. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can tomato sauce 1/4 c. brown sugar 1/4 c. vinegar 1/2 c. minced onion salt and pepper to taste 1 tsp. garlic powder. Recipe: Combine tomato sauce brown sugar vinegar onion salt pepper and garlic powder. Simmer on medium heat 5 to 8 minutes.

title: Sausage Strata
ingredients: Ingredients: 6 slices bread (crusts removed) 1 1/2 lb. sausage 1 c. Swiss cheese grated 4 eggs slightly beaten 1 1/2 c. milk 3/4 c. light cream 1/2 tsp. salt dash of pepper dash of nutmeg 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 6 slices bread (crusts removed) 1 1/2 lb. sausage 1 c. Swiss cheese grated 4 eggs slightly beaten 1 1/2 c. milk 3/4 c. light cream 1/2 tsp. salt dash of pepper dash of nutmeg 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce. Recipe: Arrange bread in bottom of greased baking dish (10 x 6-inch). Brown sausage and drain off fat. Spoon sausage evenly over bread. Sprinkle with cheese. Combine remaining ingredients and pour over all. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes. Can be made ahead and refrigerated until needed. If so bake for 30 to 35 minutes.

title: Pepperoni Spaghetti
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 large onion chopped 1 green pepper chopped 1 lb. ground beef 1 (3 oz.) pkg. sliced pepperoni chopped 1 (32 oz.) jar spaghetti sauce with mushrooms 1 (12 oz.) pkg. spaghetti 1 c. (4 oz.) shredded Mozzarella cheese 1 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 large onion chopped 1 green pepper chopped 1 lb. ground beef 1 (3 oz.) pkg. sliced pepperoni chopped 1 (32 oz.) jar spaghetti sauce with mushrooms 1 (12 oz.) pkg. spaghetti 1 c. (4 oz.) shredded Mozzarella cheese 1 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese. Recipe: Combine onion green pepper ground beef and pepperoni in a large skillet. Cook over medium heat until beef browns stirring to crumble. Add spaghetti sauce and bring to a boil. Cover reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes stirring occasionally.

title: Florida Punch
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. sugar 2 c. water 4 c. cranberry juice 4 c. pineapple juice 2 c. orange juice 1 qt. ginger ale. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. sugar 2 c. water 4 c. cranberry juice 4 c. pineapple juice 2 c. orange juice 1 qt. ginger ale. Recipe: Bring to a boil the sugar and water until sugar is dissolved. Add cranberry pineapple and orange juices. When ready to serve add ginger ale.

title: Peachy Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 c. flour 1 c. oil 4 eggs 3 tsp. vanilla 2 c. sugar 3 tsp. baking powder 1/2 c. peach juice from can 1 (20 or 29 oz.) can sliced peaches. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 c. flour 1 c. oil 4 eggs 3 tsp. vanilla 2 c. sugar 3 tsp. baking powder 1/2 c. peach juice from can 1 (20 or 29 oz.) can sliced peaches. Recipe: Beat eggs. Then add flour oil vanilla sugar baking powder and juice. Beat at medium speed until creamy. Grease and flour or spray with \Pam\ a 10-inch tubular pan. Pour 1/2 batter; line with sliced peaches (drained) 1/2 can. Sprinkle sugar and cinnamon. Pour remaining batter. Line with remaining sliced peaches; sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 to 1 1/2 hours until \tester\ comes out of cake dry. (I use a long knife.) Enjoy!

title: Fruity Ice
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 peeled oranges 2 peeled bananas 2 c. crushed ice 2 c. applesauce unsweetened 1/2 tsp. cinnamon. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 peeled oranges 2 peeled bananas 2 c. crushed ice 2 c. applesauce unsweetened 1/2 tsp. cinnamon. Recipe: Mix ingredients in blender adding ice slowly.

title: Five Way Chili
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 lb. ground beef 3 c. water 1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce 2 bay leaves 1/2 tsp. salt 2 tsp. ground cumin 1 tsp. ground cinnamon 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce 1 1/2 tsp. vinegar 1 1/2 tsp. ground allspice 2 Tbsp. chili powder. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 lb. ground beef 3 c. water 1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce 2 bay leaves 1/2 tsp. salt 2 tsp. ground cumin 1 tsp. ground cinnamon 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce 1 1/2 tsp. vinegar 1 1/2 tsp. ground allspice 2 Tbsp. chili powder. Recipe: Lightly brown beef. Add water and mix. Add all other ingredients. Simmer uncovered 3 hours. Stir occasionally or cook in crock-pot.

title: Hot Tomatoes And Cucumbers
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 medium cucumbers cut into 1-inch pieces 1 medium onion sliced and separated into rings 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine 4 medium tomatoes cut in wedges 1/2 tsp. salt dash of pepper 1 Tbsp. fresh dill or 1 tsp. dried dill. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 medium cucumbers cut into 1-inch pieces 1 medium onion sliced and separated into rings 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine 4 medium tomatoes cut in wedges 1/2 tsp. salt dash of pepper 1 Tbsp. fresh dill or 1 tsp. dried dill. Recipe: Cook and stir cucumbers and onion in butter or margarine in a skillet for about 5 minutes. Stir in tomatoes. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook until tomatoes are just heated through. Sprinkle with dill and serve hot.

title: Fluffy White Icing
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. 10x sugar 2 Tbsp. flour 1 egg white 1/2 c. Crisco 1 Tbsp. butter 1 tsp. vanilla 2 Tbsp. milk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. 10x sugar 2 Tbsp. flour 1 egg white 1/2 c. Crisco 1 Tbsp. butter 1 tsp. vanilla 2 Tbsp. milk. Recipe: Mix all ingredients together except milk. Beat at high speed; slowly add milk.

title: Dishpan Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. brown sugar 2 c. granulated sugar 2 c. oil 4 eggs 1/4 tsp. baking powder 1 tsp. salt 4 c. flour 1 1/2 c. quick cooking oats 2 c. coconut 4 c. corn flakes not crushed 6 oz. chocolate chips 1 c. nuts (optional). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. brown sugar 2 c. granulated sugar 2 c. oil 4 eggs 1/4 tsp. baking powder 1 tsp. salt 4 c. flour 1 1/2 c. quick cooking oats 2 c. coconut 4 c. corn flakes not crushed 6 oz. chocolate chips 1 c. nuts (optional). Recipe: Cream together the sugars oil and eggs. Add baking powder salt flour and oats; mix well. Then add coconut corn flakes chocolate chips and nuts (optional). Mix well. Drop on cookie sheet. Bake 10 to 12 minutes at 325\u00b0. This takes a very large bowl to mix in.

title: Toll House Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 eggs 1/2 c. all-purpose flour 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 c. packed brown sugar 1 c. butter melted and cooled 6 oz. chocolate chips 1 c. chopped walnuts 1 (9-inch) unbaked pie shell whipped cream or ice cream. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 eggs 1/2 c. all-purpose flour 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 c. packed brown sugar 1 c. butter melted and cooled 6 oz. chocolate chips 1 c. chopped walnuts 1 (9-inch) unbaked pie shell whipped cream or ice cream. Recipe: Preheat oven to 325\u00b0. In large bowl beat eggs until foamy. Add flour sugar and brown sugar. Beat until well blended. Blend in melted butter. Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts. Pour into pie shell. Bake for 1 hour. Serve warm with whipped cream or ice cream.

title: Crunchy  Onion Burger
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. ground beef 1 1/3 c. (2.8 oz. can) French fried onions or fried onion rings 3/4 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. salt 6 rolls. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. ground beef 1 1/3 c. (2.8 oz. can) French fried onions or fried onion rings 3/4 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. salt 6 rolls. Recipe: Mix beef 2/3 cup French fried onions and seasonings; shape into 6 burgers. Grill or broil 10 minutes or until no longer pink in center turning twice. Serve on rolls and top with 2/3 cup onions. Makes 6 servings.

title: Cheese Ball
ingredients: Ingredients: 16 oz. cream cheese softened 1 1/2 lb. Cheddar cheese grated 1 tsp. lemon juice 2 tsp. grated onion 1 tsp. dry mustard 1 tsp. soy sauce 1/2 tsp. paprika 1/2 tsp. salt 2 Tbsp. parsley. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 16 oz. cream cheese softened 1 1/2 lb. Cheddar cheese grated 1 tsp. lemon juice 2 tsp. grated onion 1 tsp. dry mustard 1 tsp. soy sauce 1/2 tsp. paprika 1/2 tsp. salt 2 Tbsp. parsley. Recipe: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Mix at low speed until well blended. Chill until firm. Shape into ball and roll in chopped pecans. Wrap in foil and refrigerate overnight.

title: Pumpkin Squares
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. flour 1/2 c. quick oats 1/2 c. brown sugar 1/2 c. margarine 1 (1 lb.) can pumpkin 1 (13 1/2 oz.) evaporated milk 2 eggs 3/4 c. sugar 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. ginger 1/4 tsp. cloves 1/2 c. walnuts 1/2 c. brown sugar 2 Tbsp. butter. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. flour 1/2 c. quick oats 1/2 c. brown sugar 1/2 c. margarine 1 (1 lb.) can pumpkin 1 (13 1/2 oz.) evaporated milk 2 eggs 3/4 c. sugar 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. ginger 1/4 tsp. cloves 1/2 c. walnuts 1/2 c. brown sugar 2 Tbsp. butter. Recipe: Combine flour oats 1/2 cup brown sugar and 1/2 cup butter in bowl. Mix until crumbly. Press into greased 13 x 9-inch pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes. Combine pumpkin evaporated milk eggs sugar and spices in mixing bowl. Beat well. Pour into crust. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes. Combine nuts brown sugar and butter. Sprinkle on top. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes until filling is set.

title: Old Time Buttermilk Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 9 inch unbaked pie shell 1/2 c. butter 2 c. sugar 3 tsp. flour rounded 3 eggs 1 c. buttermilk 1 tsp. vanilla dash of nutmeg (optional). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 9 inch unbaked pie shell 1/2 c. butter 2 c. sugar 3 tsp. flour rounded 3 eggs 1 c. buttermilk 1 tsp. vanilla dash of nutmeg (optional). Recipe: Soften butter and add sugar; cream together. Add flour and eggs; beat well. Stir in buttermilk vanilla and nutmeg. Pour into unbaked pie shell. Bake for 45 to 50 minutes at 350\u00b0. Place on wire rack to cool before serving.

title: Two Sweet Potato Pies
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 large potatoes 3 eggs 1 c. sugar 1 tsp. vanilla 3/4 c. milk grated coconut (optional) 1 (9-inch) pastry shell. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 large potatoes 3 eggs 1 c. sugar 1 tsp. vanilla 3/4 c. milk grated coconut (optional) 1 (9-inch) pastry shell. Recipe: Boil sweet potatoes; peel and mash. Beat eggs and combine with potatoes sugar and vanilla. Stir all together and pour into pastry shell. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes. Let set 15 minutes before serving.

title: Broccoli-Cauliflower Soup
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. broccoli 1 lb. cauliflower chicken broth water or bouillon 1/2 c. butter 1 small onion diced 1/2 c. flour 1 qt. milk 1 c. grated sharp Cheddar cheese black pepper. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. broccoli 1 lb. cauliflower chicken broth water or bouillon 1/2 c. butter 1 small onion diced 1/2 c. flour 1 qt. milk 1 c. grated sharp Cheddar cheese black pepper. Recipe: Cut vegetables into small pieces discarding any of the stem too tough to poke with a fingernail. Barely cover with broth and slowly cook until tender. In another pan saut onion in butter or margarine on medium heat. Add flour to make a roux; slowly add flour stirring constantly to thicken and prevent lumping. Slowly add milk while stirring constantly. Lower heat and cook 45 minutes; continue stirring occasionally. Serve with grated cheese and pepper.

title: Fresh Apple Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. Wesson oil 2 c. sugar 2 eggs beaten 3 c. peeled chopped fresh apples 3 c. sifted cake flour 1 tsp. salt 1 tsp. soda 2 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. Wesson oil 2 c. sugar 2 eggs beaten 3 c. peeled chopped fresh apples 3 c. sifted cake flour 1 tsp. salt 1 tsp. soda 2 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: Mix. Bake in\tthree 9-inch pans at 325\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes or until done.

title: Russian Tea
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. Tang 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. instant tea with lemon 1/2 tsp. cloves 1/2 tsp. cinnamon. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. Tang 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. instant tea with lemon 1/2 tsp. cloves 1/2 tsp. cinnamon. Recipe: Mix all ingredients. Use 1 tablespoon (heaping) per cup of water.

title: Hunter'S Delight
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 Tbsp. butter 1 Tbsp. onion 1 1/2 lb. ground beef 2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 (20 oz.) can cream-style corn 1/2 c. milk 1 qt. sliced pared potatoes. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 Tbsp. butter 1 Tbsp. onion 1 1/2 lb. ground beef 2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 (20 oz.) can cream-style corn 1/2 c. milk 1 qt. sliced pared potatoes. Recipe: Melt butter in skillet. Add onion and cook 5 minutes. Add meat and seasonings. Cook until browned. Add corn and milk. Put potatoes in a 2-quart casserole; cover with meat mixture. Bake uncovered in a 375\u00b0 oven for about 1 1/2 hours. Yield: 6 servings.

title: Pie Crust(Never Fail)
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 c. flour 1 1/4 c. shortening 1 tsp. salt 1 egg well beaten 5 Tbsp. water 1 Tbsp. vinegar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 c. flour 1 1/4 c. shortening 1 tsp. salt 1 egg well beaten 5 Tbsp. water 1 Tbsp. vinegar. Recipe: Cut shortening into flour and salt. Combine egg water and vinegar. Pour liquid into flour mixture all at once. Blend with spoon just until flour mixture is all moistened. This is an easy crust to handle and can be re-rolled without toughening. Bake at 450\u00b0 for 10 minutes.

title: Burnt Caramel Cake Icing
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. sugar 3/4 c. milk 1 Tbsp. white Karo syrup 1/2 c. sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. sugar 3/4 c. milk 1 Tbsp. white Karo syrup 1/2 c. sugar. Recipe: Put 2 cups sugar and milk in a saucepan. Add syrup. Put the 1/2 cup sugar in a small skillet and pour enough water over it to moisten good. Turn on low heat under saucepan. While it is heating brown the sugar in the skillet. When brown pour it into the saucepan. Cook until soft ball forms in cold water. Remove from stove and beat until ready to spread on the cake. Add butter the size of a walnut and flavoring.

title: Chicken Sweet-Sour
ingredients: Ingredients: cut up chicken 1 jar apricot preserves 1 bottle Catalina salad dressing 1 envelope Lipton onion soup (dry). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: cut up chicken 1 jar apricot preserves 1 bottle Catalina salad dressing 1 envelope Lipton onion soup (dry). Recipe: Mix ingredients; pour over chicken. Bake for 1 1/2 hours at 350\u00b0.

title: Microwave Fudge
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips 1 c. sweet chocolate chips 1 can sweetened condensed milk 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla nuts (optional). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips 1 c. sweet chocolate chips 1 can sweetened condensed milk 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla nuts (optional). Recipe: Stir and microwave first 3 ingredients for 3 minutes. Stir in vanilla and nuts. Put into pan.

title: Breakfast Rolls
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 bag frozen dinner rolls 1 (3 5/8 oz.) pkg. butterscotch pudding (not instant) 1/2 c. butter 3/4 tsp. cinnamon 3/4 c. brown sugar 1/2 c. chopped nuts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 bag frozen dinner rolls 1 (3 5/8 oz.) pkg. butterscotch pudding (not instant) 1/2 c. butter 3/4 tsp. cinnamon 3/4 c. brown sugar 1/2 c. chopped nuts. Recipe: Place nuts in bottom of greased Bundt pan. Arrange rolls on top. Sprinkle dry pudding over rolls. Cook butter sugar and cinnamon over low heat until sugar is dissolved and mixture bubbles; pour over rolls. Cover tightly with foil and let stand on counter overnight. Next morning bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes (take foil off before baking). Let stand 5 minutes then invert onto serving dish.

title: Kentucky Cream Candy
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 1/4 tsp. salt 1 tsp. vanilla 6 c. confectioners sugar finely chopped coconut. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 1/4 tsp. salt 1 tsp. vanilla 6 c. confectioners sugar finely chopped coconut. Recipe: Put cream cheese in mixer bowl 30 minutes to soften. Add salt and vanilla. Add 2 cups sugar; beat. Add 2 more cups of sugar; beat. Add remaining sugar and beat well. Cover and chill in refrigerator until firm. Shape into small balls and roll in coconut. Store in a foil-lined metal box in refrigerator.

title: Thousand Island Dressing
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 c. Miracle Whip 1 can tomato soup 1 Tbsp. vinegar 4 Tbsp. sweet relish 2 Tbsp. chili sauce 1 Tbsp. sugar 1 Tbsp. dry mustard 1 small grated onion 1 clove grated garlic. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 c. Miracle Whip 1 can tomato soup 1 Tbsp. vinegar 4 Tbsp. sweet relish 2 Tbsp. chili sauce 1 Tbsp. sugar 1 Tbsp. dry mustard 1 small grated onion 1 clove grated garlic. Recipe: Mix all ingredients together. Makes 1 1/2 quarts.

title: Rolls
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. milk 1 stick butter 1 yeast cake dissolved in 1/4 c. warm water 1/3 c. sugar 1 tsp. salt 2 eggs 4 1/2 c. sifted flour. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. milk 1 stick butter 1 yeast cake dissolved in 1/4 c. warm water 1/3 c. sugar 1 tsp. salt 2 eggs 4 1/2 c. sifted flour. Recipe: Scald milk with butter. Pour into large mixing bowl. Add sugar and salt. Let cool. Add eggs (unbeaten) yeast cake and 1 1/2 cups flour. Mix well for two minutes. Stir remaining flour. Put in icebox and let rise overnight. Make rolls at least two hours before cooking.

title: Brownies
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. white sugar 1 1/2 c. brown sugar 4 Tbsp. cocoa 2 c. flour 6 eggs 1 1/2 sticks oleo melted 1/2 c. milk 1 tsp. vanilla 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 c. nuts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. white sugar 1 1/2 c. brown sugar 4 Tbsp. cocoa 2 c. flour 6 eggs 1 1/2 sticks oleo melted 1/2 c. milk 1 tsp. vanilla 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 c. nuts. Recipe: Mix all ingredients together; add nuts. Pour into a greased and floured cookie sheet. Bake only 23 minutes in a 350\u00b0 oven. Cool and frost.

title: Diabetic Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. unsweetened applesauce 3/4 c. margarine 1 Tbsp. vanilla 2 c. oatmeal 1/2 tsp. allspice 1 1/2 tsp. soda 1 c. raisins 2 eggs 1/3 c. brown Sugar Twin 1 Tbsp. cinnamon 1 1/2 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 c. nuts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. unsweetened applesauce 3/4 c. margarine 1 Tbsp. vanilla 2 c. oatmeal 1/2 tsp. allspice 1 1/2 tsp. soda 1 c. raisins 2 eggs 1/3 c. brown Sugar Twin 1 Tbsp. cinnamon 1 1/2 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 c. nuts. Recipe: Mix applesauce margarine eggs vanilla and sugar. Add the remaining ingredients. Drop by teaspoon on cookie sheet and bake 15 minutes at 375\u00b0.

title: Chocolate-Dipped Strawberries
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 (1 oz.) sq. semi-sweet chocolate chopped 1/2 Tbsp. whipping cream dash of almond extract 8 strawberries. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 (1 oz.) sq. semi-sweet chocolate chopped 1/2 Tbsp. whipping cream dash of almond extract 8 strawberries. Recipe: Combine chocolate and whipping cream in a glass measuring cup or bowl. Microwave at Medium power for 1 minute or until the chocolate melts stirring after 30 seconds. Stir in the almond extract and cool slightly. Dip each strawberry into the melted chocolate allowing the excess to drip off. Place on waxed paper-lined baking sheet. Refrigerate or freeze for approximately 15 minutes until the chocolate is set.

title: Working Mother'S Mess(Renamed Dad'S Quick Delight)
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1 c. chopped onions 2 to 3 cut-up tomatoes 1 to 3 garlic buds (adjust for size and taste) 16 oz. chunky spaghetti sauce 1 to 3 Tbsp. tamari sauce (use smaller amount for low sodium diet) 1 (16 oz.) can cooked beans (navy pinto kidney or pork and beans). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1 c. chopped onions 2 to 3 cut-up tomatoes 1 to 3 garlic buds (adjust for size and taste) 16 oz. chunky spaghetti sauce 1 to 3 Tbsp. tamari sauce (use smaller amount for low sodium diet) 1 (16 oz.) can cooked beans (navy pinto kidney or pork and beans). Recipe: Brown meat over medium heat in a large skillet. Remove meat from pan and drain off fat. Stir 1 to 3 tablespoons tamari sauce into meat. Saute onion garlic and tomatoes. Add spaghetti sauce and heat. Add cooked beans and meat mixture. Stir gently to mix; then simmer to blend flavors. Serve when blended and heated through. Serves 4. Serve with garlic bread and green salad.

title: Chicken With Tarragon
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 chicken breasts skin removed 1/2 c. onion chopped fine 1/2 tsp. tarragon chicken bouillon. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 chicken breasts skin removed 1/2 c. onion chopped fine 1/2 tsp. tarragon chicken bouillon. Recipe: Lightly brown meat side of chicken breasts. Lay all 4 chicken breasts meat side down in small (8-inch) skillet. Add enough water with chicken bouillon added to just cover chicken. Add onion over top of chicken. Sprinkle with tarragon. Bring to boil and reduce heat to medium. Cover skillet with well-fitting lid and cook approximately 30 to 45 minutes or until chicken is done. Add a little water if necessary to replace any lost in steam.

title: Lemon Jello Vegetable Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 box lemon jello 1 c. hot water 3/4 c. cold water 1/2 c. grated cabbage 1/2 c. small chopped celery 1/4 c. grated carrot 1/8 c. finely chopped green pepper 1/2 c. pineapple tidbits. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 box lemon jello 1 c. hot water 3/4 c. cold water 1/2 c. grated cabbage 1/2 c. small chopped celery 1/4 c. grated carrot 1/8 c. finely chopped green pepper 1/2 c. pineapple tidbits. Recipe: Mix box of jello with the cup of boiling water. Mix until dissolved. Add cold water. Let jell slightly then add all other ingredients. Mix and jell in a flat 1 1/2-quart dish. Cut into squares to serve on a lettuce leaf.

title: Shrimp Batter
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. flour 1/2 tsp. cornstarch 1/2 tsp. soda 1/2 tsp. baking powder 1 beaten egg 1/2 to 1 c. cold water paprika. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. flour 1/2 tsp. cornstarch 1/2 tsp. soda 1/2 tsp. baking powder 1 beaten egg 1/2 to 1 c. cold water paprika. Recipe: Mix all ingredients with a mixer. Deep-fry shrimp.

title: Chicken-Cheese Ball
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 small can chicken (all white meat) 8 oz. cream cheese softened 1 Tbsp. minced onion 2 Tbsp. soy sauce or lemon soy sauce 1 Tbsp. mayonnaise chopped pecans maraschino cherry for garnish (if desired). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 small can chicken (all white meat) 8 oz. cream cheese softened 1 Tbsp. minced onion 2 Tbsp. soy sauce or lemon soy sauce 1 Tbsp. mayonnaise chopped pecans maraschino cherry for garnish (if desired). Recipe: Combine all ingredients except nuts and cherry. Form into ball. Roll in enough nuts to cover. (If too soft chill a little first then roll in nuts.) Can garnish with cherry on top.

title: Salted Nut Squares
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 c. salted peanuts without skins 3 Tbsp. butter or margarine 2 c. (12 oz.) peanut butter chips 1 can sweetened condensed milk 2 c. miniature marshmallows. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 c. salted peanuts without skins 3 Tbsp. butter or margarine 2 c. (12 oz.) peanut butter chips 1 can sweetened condensed milk 2 c. miniature marshmallows. Recipe: Place half the peanuts in an ungreased 11 x 7-inch pan. In saucepan melt butter and peanut butter chips over low heat. Add milk and marshmallows. Cook and stir until melted. Pour over peanuts. Sprinkle remaining peanuts on top. Cover; refrigerate. Cut into bars. Makes 5 to 6 dozen.

title: Date Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 pkg. dates cut fine 1 tsp. baking soda 1 c. hot water 1/2 c. margarine 1 c. sugar 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 c. walnuts 1 egg 1 1/2 c. flour. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 pkg. dates cut fine 1 tsp. baking soda 1 c. hot water 1/2 c. margarine 1 c. sugar 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 c. walnuts 1 egg 1 1/2 c. flour. Recipe: Sprinkle dates with baking soda and cover with hot water. Let stand until cool. Cream margarine sugar and egg. Add dry ingredients nuts and dates. Pour into lightly greased 8 x 8-inch pan and bake at 350\u00b0 for at least 45 minutes.

title: Crescent Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 pkg. yellow cake mix 1 stick margarine 1 egg beaten 1/2 c. chopped nuts 1 box confectioners sugar 8 oz. cream cheese 2 eggs beaten. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 pkg. yellow cake mix 1 stick margarine 1 egg beaten 1/2 c. chopped nuts 1 box confectioners sugar 8 oz. cream cheese 2 eggs beaten. Recipe: Mix yellow cake mix margarine egg and 1/2 cup chopped nuts. This mixture will be thick. Press into greased 9 x 10-inch pan. Mix confectioners sugar cream cheese and 2 eggs. Beat until smooth. Pour over cake batter. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes.

title: Freezer Pie Crust
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 lb. shortening 5 lb. flour 2 Tbsp. salt 3 c. water 1 c. white syrup. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 lb. shortening 5 lb. flour 2 Tbsp. salt 3 c. water 1 c. white syrup. Recipe: Combine water and white syrup in a very large bowl. Add all other ingredients and mix well. Roll into crust size balls wrap and freeze. Rolls out great. Makes 20 to 24 balls.

title: Basic Graham Cracker Crust
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/3 c. graham cracker crumbs (about 16 whole crackers) 1/4 c. sugar 5 Tbsp. unsalted butter melted. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/3 c. graham cracker crumbs (about 16 whole crackers) 1/4 c. sugar 5 Tbsp. unsalted butter melted. Recipe: Preheat the oven to 375\u00b0. In the bowl of a food processor fitted with the metal blade process the graham crackers and sugar to fine crumbs. With the motor running add the butter and process until the crumbs are moist and stick together. Press the graham cracker mixture into the bottom and sides of a 9-inch pie pan. Bake in the center of the oven for 8 minutes or until the edges are slightly brown. Makes a single 9-inch crust.

title: Creamy Chicken And Mushrooms
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 Tbsp. margarine 4 skinless boneless chicken breast halves 1 1/2 c. sliced mushroom 1 small onion sliced 1/8 tsp. garlic powder or 1 clove garlic minced 1 can (10 3/4 oz.) cream of mushroom soup 1/2 c. milk 2 Tbsp. dry sherry (optional) 1/8 tsp. pepper. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 Tbsp. margarine 4 skinless boneless chicken breast halves 1 1/2 c. sliced mushroom 1 small onion sliced 1/8 tsp. garlic powder or 1 clove garlic minced 1 can (10 3/4 oz.) cream of mushroom soup 1/2 c. milk 2 Tbsp. dry sherry (optional) 1/8 tsp. pepper. Recipe: In skillet in 1 tablespoon hot margarine cook chicken 10 minutes or until browned on both sides. Remove. In remaining 1 tablespoon hot margarine cook mushrooms and onion with garlic powder until tender and liquid is evaporated (stirring often). Add remaining ingredients. Heat to boiling. Return chicken to skillet. Cover; cook over low heat 5 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink stirring occasionally. Serves 4.

title: Sweet And Sour Red Cabbage
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 head red cabbage cut into small pieces 1 Tbsp. salt 1 tsp. salt 1 tsp. pepper 1 Tbsp. sugar 1/2 c. cider vinegar caraway seed to taste 1 onion chopped. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 head red cabbage cut into small pieces 1 Tbsp. salt 1 tsp. salt 1 tsp. pepper 1 Tbsp. sugar 1/2 c. cider vinegar caraway seed to taste 1 onion chopped. Recipe: In a pot of water with 1 tablespoon salt boil shredded cabbage until just tender. Cook it quickly perhaps 10 minutes at most to retain its Vitamin C. Drain; stir in chopped onion that has been glaceed in a nonstick frypan. Add salt pepper sugar and vinegar; stir at least two minutes until the vinegar permeates the cabbage which will become limp. Serve hot with Best Herbed Pork Roast.

title: Hot Rolls
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. warm water 1 pkg. dry yeast 3 1/2 tsp. sugar 1 tsp. salt 3 tsp. melted Crisco 4 c. plain flour. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. warm water 1 pkg. dry yeast 3 1/2 tsp. sugar 1 tsp. salt 3 tsp. melted Crisco 4 c. plain flour. Recipe: Use 1/2 cup water to melt yeast. Add remainder of water to other 4 ingredients. Mix well; knead in enough flour as for biscuits. Put in a greased bowl with Crisco and let rise until double in bulk. Grease top of dough with Crisco. When dough has doubled make out rolls. Put in greased pan and let rise. Bake in moderate oven until brown.

title: Chicken Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. uncooked rice 1 envelope onion soup mix 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 1/2 c. hot water 8 chicken breasts or thighs. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. uncooked rice 1 envelope onion soup mix 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 1/2 c. hot water 8 chicken breasts or thighs. Recipe: Spread rice in bottom of a 9 x 13-inch glass casserole dish. Sprinkle onion soup mix on top. Lay chicken pieces on top and spoon mushroom soup over all. Pour water around chicken pieces. Cover with foil and bake at 325\u00b0 for 1 1/2 hours. Take foil off the last 1/2 hour. Check liquid content and add if necessary.

title: Raisin Walnut Shortbread Bars
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/4 c. all-purpose flour 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 c. butter or margarine 2 eggs 1/2 c. firmly packed brown sugar 1 tsp. vanilla 1/8 tsp. baking soda 1 c. chopped walnuts 1 c. raisins 1/2 c. flaked coconut (optional). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/4 c. all-purpose flour 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 c. butter or margarine 2 eggs 1/2 c. firmly packed brown sugar 1 tsp. vanilla 1/8 tsp. baking soda 1 c. chopped walnuts 1 c. raisins 1/2 c. flaked coconut (optional). Recipe: Heat oven to 350\u00b0. Lightly grease an 8-inch square pan. Combine flour and sugar. Using pastry blender or fork cut in margarine until mixture resembles fine meal. Press into greased pan. Bake for 20 minutes or just until edges are golden.

title: Pineapple Parfait Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (9-inch) baked pie shell No. 2 can crushed pineapple drained 1 pkg. lemon Jell-O 1 pt. vanilla ice cream Cool Whip. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (9-inch) baked pie shell No. 2 can crushed pineapple drained 1 pkg. lemon Jell-O 1 pt. vanilla ice cream Cool Whip. Recipe: Heat 3/4 cup liquid from pineapple plus water (if needed) to boiling. Remove from heat. Add Jell-O. Dissolve. Add ice cream until melted. Chill until thickened (10 to 15 minutes). Fold in pineapple. Turn into pie shell. Chill until firm about 20 minutes. Top with Cool Whip.

title: Cherry Supreme
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. graham cracker crumbs 1/4 c. white sugar 1 stick butter 1 can cherry pie filling 1 small tub Cool Whip 1/2 c. powdered sugar 1 pkg. cream cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. graham cracker crumbs 1/4 c. white sugar 1 stick butter 1 can cherry pie filling 1 small tub Cool Whip 1/2 c. powdered sugar 1 pkg. cream cheese. Recipe: Mix graham cracker crumbs and white sugar together. Melt butter and pour over the sugar and crumbs; press into a cake pan. Stir and soften cream cheese powdered sugar and Cool Whip until it is light and fluffy. Add to cool crust then pour the cherry filling on top of the cream cheese. Store in refrigerator overnight.

title: Red Beet Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. sugar 3 eggs 1 1/2 c. cooked beets mashed 1 c. Crisco oil 2 squares unsweetened chocolate melted 1 1/3 c. flour 1 1/3 tsp. soda 1/2 tsp. salt 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. sugar 3 eggs 1 1/2 c. cooked beets mashed 1 c. Crisco oil 2 squares unsweetened chocolate melted 1 1/3 c. flour 1 1/3 tsp. soda 1/2 tsp. salt 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: Mix all together. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 35 minutes until done in center.

title: Reuben Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (7 oz.) can sauerkraut drained 1 small tomato sliced 2 Tbsp. Thousand Island dressing 1 (4 oz.) pkg. sliced corned beef cut in bite size pieces 3/4 c. Swiss cheese shredded 1/8 tsp. caraway seed 1 c. rye bread crumbs (soft) 1 Tbsp. butter or margarine. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (7 oz.) can sauerkraut drained 1 small tomato sliced 2 Tbsp. Thousand Island dressing 1 (4 oz.) pkg. sliced corned beef cut in bite size pieces 3/4 c. Swiss cheese shredded 1/8 tsp. caraway seed 1 c. rye bread crumbs (soft) 1 Tbsp. butter or margarine. Recipe: Spread sauerkraut in baking dish. Top with sliced tomato dressing and corned beef. Sprinkle with cheese and caraway seed. Toss rye bread crumbs with butter and sprinkle over casserole. Bake uncovered at 375\u00b0 for 20 to 25 minutes.

title: Potato Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 lb. Irish potatoes (boil peel and slice in 1/4 slices) 16 oz. (large) sour cream 16 oz. (large) Cheez Whiz 2 Tbsp. minced onions 1 Tbsp. dried parsley 1 lb. precooked sausage (sliced in diced cuts). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 lb. Irish potatoes (boil peel and slice in 1/4 slices) 16 oz. (large) sour cream 16 oz. (large) Cheez Whiz 2 Tbsp. minced onions 1 Tbsp. dried parsley 1 lb. precooked sausage (sliced in diced cuts). Recipe: Mix sour cream Cheez Whiz onions and parsley. Fold in potatoes. Fold in sausage. Pour in large baking pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes. Top with red pepper and a few sausage slices for looks.

title: Carrot-Pineapple Bread
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 beaten eggs 2 c. sugar 1 c. oil 1 small can crushed pineapple 2 tsp. vanilla 1 c. grated carrots 1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. soda 1/4 tsp. salt 3 c. flour 1 c. chopped nuts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 beaten eggs 2 c. sugar 1 c. oil 1 small can crushed pineapple 2 tsp. vanilla 1 c. grated carrots 1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. soda 1/4 tsp. salt 3 c. flour 1 c. chopped nuts. Recipe: Mix all ingredients well. Bake 1 hour at 350\u00b0 in two loaf pans lined with waxed paper or foil.

title: Easy Chicken And Dumplings
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 chicken cooked and cut into small pieces 1/4 stick margarine or butter 2 c. chicken broth 1 c. milk 1 can chicken soup 1 c. self-rising flour salt and pepper to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 chicken cooked and cut into small pieces 1/4 stick margarine or butter 2 c. chicken broth 1 c. milk 1 can chicken soup 1 c. self-rising flour salt and pepper to taste. Recipe: Layer chicken in bottom of casserole dish and pour melted butter or margarine over chicken. Next mix flour with milk and pour over chicken. Mix soup and broth and pour over top of casserole and gently stir across top; smooth out. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes or until golden brown and done in center.

title: Delicious Scalloped Potatoes(Without Cheese)
ingredients: Ingredients: 6 large potatoes 2 cans evaporated milk 3/4 stick margarine salt and pepper. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 6 large potatoes 2 cans evaporated milk 3/4 stick margarine salt and pepper. Recipe: Slice peeled potatoes in round pretty thin slices. Layer in a deep casserole dish with butter and salt. Pour can of milk over the potatoes. Make sure they are completely covered with milk. Bake uncovered for about 1 hour at 475\u00b0.

title: Peanut Butter Oat Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 c. butter 1 c. packed brown sugar 1/2 c. corn syrup 1 tsp. salt 4 c. quick cooking oats 1/2 c. peanut butter 1/2 c. chocolate chips 1 1/2 tsp. butter 2 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 c. butter 1 c. packed brown sugar 1/2 c. corn syrup 1 tsp. salt 4 c. quick cooking oats 1/2 c. peanut butter 1/2 c. chocolate chips 1 1/2 tsp. butter 2 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: Cream butter and brown sugar. Add corn syrup. Mix well. Spread mixture evenly in greased 13 x 9-inch cake pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes. Cool slightly. Spread peanut butter evenly over top. Melt chocolate chips and butter together until smooth. Drizzle over peanut butter. Cool to set then cut in squares.
