title: Cherry Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 cans cherry pie filling 1 can crushed pineapple not drained 1/2 c. pecans 1 c. miniature marshmallows 1 large container Cool Whip 1 can Eagle Brand milk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 cans cherry pie filling 1 can crushed pineapple not drained 1/2 c. pecans 1 c. miniature marshmallows 1 large container Cool Whip 1 can Eagle Brand milk. Recipe: Mix all ingredients together and refrigerate 1 hour before serving.

title: Scalloped Oysters
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 pt. oysters 2 c. cracker crumbs (Ritz) 1/2 c. melted butter 1/2 tsp. salt dash of pepper 3/4 c. cream 1/4 c. oyster liquid 1/4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 pt. oysters 2 c. cracker crumbs (Ritz) 1/2 c. melted butter 1/2 tsp. salt dash of pepper 3/4 c. cream 1/4 c. oyster liquid 1/4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce. Recipe: Drain oysters saving liquid. Combine crumbs butter salt and pepper. Spread 1/3 of butter and crumbs in greased casserole (2-quart). Cover with 1/2 of the oysters. Using another 1/3 of buttered crumbs spread second layer and add remaining oysters. Finish with last 1/3 of buttered crumbs on top. Combine liquid ingredients and pour over top. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 40 minutes.

title: Pie Crust
ingredients: Ingredients: 2/3 c. shortening 2 Tbsp. butter softened 2 c. flour 1 tsp. salt 1/4 c. cold water. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2/3 c. shortening 2 Tbsp. butter softened 2 c. flour 1 tsp. salt 1/4 c. cold water. Recipe: Cut shortening and butter into flour and salt mixture. Slowly add water while mixing with a fork (depending on weather slightly more or less water can be used). Form into ball. Cut in half for 2 crusts. Roll out using only a little flour. For baked pie shells: prick with fork and bake 8 minutes at 475\u00b0.

title: Oatmeal Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. boiling water 1 c. oatmeal 1/2 c. butter 1 c. white sugar 1 c. brown sugar 2 eggs 1 1/2 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. soda 1 tsp. baking powder 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. boiling water 1 c. oatmeal 1/2 c. butter 1 c. white sugar 1 c. brown sugar 2 eggs 1 1/2 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. soda 1 tsp. baking powder 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: Make oatmeal. Cool about 20 minutes. Add remaining ingredients; beat until well blended. Bake in a 9 x 13-inch pan at 350\u00b0 for 35 to 40 minutes.

title: Candle Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: lettuce pineapple slices banana mayonnaise cherries. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: lettuce pineapple slices banana mayonnaise cherries. Recipe: Put one lettuce leaf on each plate. Lay a pineapple slice on top of each lettuce leaf. Stand 1/2 a banana in the hole of each pineapple. Top the banana with a bit of mayonnaise. Put a cherry on top of the mayonnaise.

title: Salmon Croquettes
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (14 3/4 oz.) can pink salmon drained 1 1/2 c. mashed potatoes 1 small onion grated 1 large egg 1/2 tsp. pepper 1/4 c. packaged bread crumbs 3 Tbsp. vegetable oil. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (14 3/4 oz.) can pink salmon drained 1 1/2 c. mashed potatoes 1 small onion grated 1 large egg 1/2 tsp. pepper 1/4 c. packaged bread crumbs 3 Tbsp. vegetable oil. Recipe: Mix salmon potatoes onion egg and pepper until blended. Form into 8 patties each about 3/4-inch thick. Spread crumbs on waxed paper. Gently press patties in crumbs to coat. Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet. Add patties and cook over medium heat about 4 minutes per side until heated through golden and crisp. Serves 4.

title: Croquettes(Chicken Fish Or Meat)
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. chicken fish or meat 1 c. croquette sauce 1 egg 3/4 c. breadcrumbs salt to taste pepper to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. chicken fish or meat 1 c. croquette sauce 1 egg 3/4 c. breadcrumbs salt to taste pepper to taste. Recipe: Cut meat or fish in small pieces; add seasonings desired and croquette sauce. Mix together and shape. If mixture is not stiff enough to shape chill in refrigerator half an hour.

title: Corn Relish
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 large can corn 6 onions chopped 1 stalk celery chopped 1 pt. white vinegar 3 red sweet peppers chopped 3 green sweet peppers chopped 2 c. sugar 1 tsp. turmeric 1 Tbsp. dry mustard 1 Tbsp. celery salt 2 Tbsp. salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 large can corn 6 onions chopped 1 stalk celery chopped 1 pt. white vinegar 3 red sweet peppers chopped 3 green sweet peppers chopped 2 c. sugar 1 tsp. turmeric 1 Tbsp. dry mustard 1 Tbsp. celery salt 2 Tbsp. salt. Recipe: Combine ingredients and boil uncovered 15 minutes. Thicken with a small amount of flour if the mixture is too thin. Ladle into warm canning jars leaving 1/8-inch headspace. Seal immediately. Process in boiling water bath 15 minutes. Very good with roast men love it!

title: Flossie'S Gingerbread
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 c. shortening 1 egg 1 1/2 tsp. soda 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. ginger 1/2 tsp. salt 2 1/2 c. flour 1 c. hot water 1 c. molasses. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 c. shortening 1 egg 1 1/2 tsp. soda 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. ginger 1/2 tsp. salt 2 1/2 c. flour 1 c. hot water 1 c. molasses. Recipe: Mix in order given and bake in loaf pan in moderate oven 350\u00b0.

title: Vanilla Wafer Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 sticks butter (do not substitute) 2 c. granulated sugar 6 eggs 1/2 c. milk 12 oz. box vanilla wafers crushed 7 oz. flaked coconut 1 c. chopped pecans. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 sticks butter (do not substitute) 2 c. granulated sugar 6 eggs 1/2 c. milk 12 oz. box vanilla wafers crushed 7 oz. flaked coconut 1 c. chopped pecans. Recipe: Cream butter and sugar together until light and fluffy. Add eggs one at a time beating well after each addition. Add crushed wafers alternately with milk. Add coconut and pecans and mix well. Pour into a 12 cup tube pan greased with nonstick spray. Cook completely before removing from pan. May be glazed with powdered sugar and topped with pecan halves and maraschino cherries. Freezes well.

title: Double Baked Potatoes
ingredients: Ingredients: 6 medium size baking potatoes 1 medium to large onion diced 1 (16 oz.) pkg. bacon cooked and crumbled 1 1/2 c. cooked smoked ham cut in small cubes 1 1/2 c. cheese (I use part Mozzarella and part Cheddar) 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine 1/4 c. milk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 6 medium size baking potatoes 1 medium to large onion diced 1 (16 oz.) pkg. bacon cooked and crumbled 1 1/2 c. cooked smoked ham cut in small cubes 1 1/2 c. cheese (I use part Mozzarella and part Cheddar) 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine 1/4 c. milk. Recipe: Wash the potatoes rub them with oil and bake at 350\u00b0 until done. Let them cool and cut in half lengthwise leaving about 1/4-inch around the shell. Scoop out the potato. Set the shells aside.

title: Crabmeat Au Gratin
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can cream of shrimp soup 1/2 can milk (use soup can) 1 lb. faux crabmeat 4 c. celery chopped 1/2 c. green pepper chopped 2 pimentos chopped 2 Tbsp. onions chopped 1/3 c. slivered almonds 4 hard-cooked eggs chopped 1 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese buttered bread crumbs. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can cream of shrimp soup 1/2 can milk (use soup can) 1 lb. faux crabmeat 4 c. celery chopped 1/2 c. green pepper chopped 2 pimentos chopped 2 Tbsp. onions chopped 1/3 c. slivered almonds 4 hard-cooked eggs chopped 1 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese buttered bread crumbs. Recipe: Mix everything together except cheese and crumbs in casserole. Top with cheese then with bread crumbs. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 minutes.

title: Hobo Stew
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 lb. ground beef 1/4 c. catsup 1/4 c. mustard 1/4 c. barbecue sauce 2 (16 oz.) cans sliced potatoes drained 2 (16 oz.) cans pork and beans 1 (16 oz.) can whole kernel corn drained 2 Tbsp. minced onion flakes. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 lb. ground beef 1/4 c. catsup 1/4 c. mustard 1/4 c. barbecue sauce 2 (16 oz.) cans sliced potatoes drained 2 (16 oz.) cans pork and beans 1 (16 oz.) can whole kernel corn drained 2 Tbsp. minced onion flakes. Recipe: In skillet at medium heat brown ground beef; drain. Add catsup mustard barbecue sauce potatoes pork and beans corn and onion flakes. Reduce to low heat; simmer for 15 to 20 minutes or until heated through.

title: Lemon Crunch
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 stick butter 1 c. flour 1/2 c. pecans chopped 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese softened 1 c. confectioners sugar 1 small container Cool Whip 2 small pkg. lemon instant pudding (can also use chocolate) 3 c. milk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 stick butter 1 c. flour 1/2 c. pecans chopped 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese softened 1 c. confectioners sugar 1 small container Cool Whip 2 small pkg. lemon instant pudding (can also use chocolate) 3 c. milk. Recipe: Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.

title: No Name Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 box Duncan Hines butter recipe cake mix 1 c. milk 4 eggs 3/4 c. oil 1 can ready to spread coconut pecan icing 1 c. pecans. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 box Duncan Hines butter recipe cake mix 1 c. milk 4 eggs 3/4 c. oil 1 can ready to spread coconut pecan icing 1 c. pecans. Recipe: Beat cake mix milk eggs and oil together. Add can of coconut pecan icing and mix well. Add pecans. Grease and flour a Bundt pan. Bake at 340\u00b0 for 45 minutes then turn the oven down to 315\u00b0 and bake for 25 more minutes. Do not open the door during the first 45 minutes.

title: Gold Rush Brunch
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 pkg. potatoes O'Brien or homemade 1/4 c. butter 1/4 c. flour 2 c. milk 1 c. sour cream salt and pepper to taste parsley 8 slices Canadian bacon 8 eggs. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 pkg. potatoes O'Brien or homemade 1/4 c. butter 1/4 c. flour 2 c. milk 1 c. sour cream salt and pepper to taste parsley 8 slices Canadian bacon 8 eggs. Recipe: Prepare potatoes according to directions. In large saucepan melt butter; blend in flour salt and pepper. Add milk and stir until thick and bubbly. Remove from heat. Add sour cream parsley and potatoes. Place mixture in 9 x 13-inch baking pan. Arrange bacon in a row down center overlapping. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes. Make a depression in mixture on each side of bacon. Slip 1 egg into each depression. Bake until eggs are set 10 to 12 minutes. Serves 8.

title: Pot Roast
ingredients: Ingredients: chuck roast (5 lb. +/- blade in or out) ginger garlic salt pepper paprika 1 can tomato paste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: chuck roast (5 lb. +/- blade in or out) ginger garlic salt pepper paprika 1 can tomato paste. Recipe: You will need 1 large iron kettle (pot) or 2 iron skillets.

title: Ham Cheese Oven Omelet
ingredients: Ingredients: 8 eggs 1 c. milk 1 (3 oz.) pkg. smoked sliced ham beef or corned beef torn into small pieces 3 Tbsp. finely chopped onion 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt 1 c. Cheddar cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 8 eggs 1 c. milk 1 (3 oz.) pkg. smoked sliced ham beef or corned beef torn into small pieces 3 Tbsp. finely chopped onion 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt 1 c. Cheddar cheese. Recipe: Beat eggs milk and seasoned salt. Stir in remaining ingredients. Pour into greased oblong 12 x 7 1/2 x 2-inch dish or square 8 x 8 x 2-inch baking dish. Cook uncovered in 325\u00b0 oven until omelet is set and top is golden brown 40 to 45 minutes.

title: Never Fail Rolls
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. butter 3/4 c. sugar 1 c. boiling water (to melt margarine) 1 c. lukewarm water (for yeast) 2 pkg. yeast (dry) 2 eggs beaten 1 tsp. salt 6 1/2 c. flour (about). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. butter 3/4 c. sugar 1 c. boiling water (to melt margarine) 1 c. lukewarm water (for yeast) 2 pkg. yeast (dry) 2 eggs beaten 1 tsp. salt 6 1/2 c. flour (about). Recipe: Mix all ingredients; put in refrigerator for at least 2 hours. (Can be mixed at night and next day rolled out. Dough will be sticky.) Divide dough in 3 to 4 parts. Roll in circle; cut into pie shaped wedges. Roll up from the wide end to the narrow; place on oiled cookie sheet. Let rise. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 18 minutes. Enjoy.

title: Taco Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1 small onion chopped 1/2 tsp. garlic powder 1 envelope taco seasoning mix 1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce 1 c. sour cream 1 c. cottage cheese 2 c. crushed tortilla chips 2 c. shredded Cheddar or Monterey Jack cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1 small onion chopped 1/2 tsp. garlic powder 1 envelope taco seasoning mix 1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce 1 c. sour cream 1 c. cottage cheese 2 c. crushed tortilla chips 2 c. shredded Cheddar or Monterey Jack cheese. Recipe: Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. In a large skillet brown ground beef; remove from heat and drain off any excess liquid. Add onion garlic powder taco seasoning mix and tomato sauce; mix and set aside.

title: Warm Crabmeat Dip
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can crab 1 (8 oz.) cream cheese 2 Tbsp. mayo 3 tsp. lemon juice 3 tsp. Worcestershire sauce 1/16 tsp. garlic powder 1 Tbsp. finely chopped onion Parmesan cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can crab 1 (8 oz.) cream cheese 2 Tbsp. mayo 3 tsp. lemon juice 3 tsp. Worcestershire sauce 1/16 tsp. garlic powder 1 Tbsp. finely chopped onion Parmesan cheese. Recipe: Mix all together except Parmesan cheese. Put in small shallow pan. Sprinkle cheese on\ttop. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 30 minutes. Serve with crackers.

title: Herb Butter
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 Tbsp. dried herbs: equal parts of parsley tarragon chives and/or basil 1/2 c. margarine. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 Tbsp. dried herbs: equal parts of parsley tarragon chives and/or basil 1/2 c. margarine. Recipe: Blend all together and chill overnight.

title: Good 'N Easy Yeast Rolls
ingredients: Ingredients: 2/3 c. sugar plus 1 Tbsp. 1 scant c. shortening 1 c. hot water 2 pkg. yeast dissolved in 1 c. warm water (not hot) 2 eggs 6 c. plain flour with 1 tsp. salt mixed in. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2/3 c. sugar plus 1 Tbsp. 1 scant c. shortening 1 c. hot water 2 pkg. yeast dissolved in 1 c. warm water (not hot) 2 eggs 6 c. plain flour with 1 tsp. salt mixed in. Recipe: In a saucepan combine sugar. Melt over medium heat the shortening and 1 cup hot water. Set aside to cool. Dissolve yeast in small bowl with 1 cup warm water (not hot). Beat eggs in a large bowl. Sift flour with salt mixed in.

title: Southwestern Skillet
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1/2 c. minced onion 1 (14 1/2 oz.) can tomatoes chopped 3/4 c. Minute rice 3 Tbsp. chopped green pepper 1/2 c. sliced stuffed olives 1 1/2 tsp. chili powder 1/2 tsp. garlic salt 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. water 1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1/2 c. minced onion 1 (14 1/2 oz.) can tomatoes chopped 3/4 c. Minute rice 3 Tbsp. chopped green pepper 1/2 c. sliced stuffed olives 1 1/2 tsp. chili powder 1/2 tsp. garlic salt 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. water 1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese. Recipe: In a large skillet cook ground beef and onion. Drain fat. Stir in undrained tomatoes uncooked rice green pepper olives chili powder garlic salt salt and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes stirring occasionally. Top with cheese. Cover and heat for about 3 minutes or until cheese melts.

title: Delicious Baked Potato Dish
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 large baking potatoes 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese 1 c. whipping cream 1 tsp. chopped chives. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 large baking potatoes 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese 1 c. whipping cream 1 tsp. chopped chives. Recipe: Wash and peel potatoes slicing very thin. Use 1 tablespoon of the butter and place in a shallow baking dish. Evenly layer one half of the potatoes in the dish sprinkling lightly with salt and add 1/2 of the cheese. Layer remaining potatoes lightly salt and place remaining cheese on top. Sprinkle with chopped chives and bake at 450\u00b0 for 45 minutes until potatoes are tender and browned on top.

title: Quick Cream Of Broccoli Soup
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped broccoli partially thawed 1 envelope Lipton chicken soup mix with diced white chicken meat 3 1/2 c. milk 1 Tbsp. flour. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped broccoli partially thawed 1 envelope Lipton chicken soup mix with diced white chicken meat 3 1/2 c. milk 1 Tbsp. flour. Recipe: In medium saucepan bring 3 cups milk and broccoli to boiling then simmer stirring occasionally for 5 minutes. Stir in soup mix and flour blended with remaining milk. Bring to boiling point then simmer stirring occasionally 10 minutes or until soup is slightly thickened and broccoli is tender.

title: Cabbage Rolls
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 head cabbage 1 lb. hamburger 1 c. cooked rice 1/2 tsp. pepper 1 egg 1 tsp. salt chopped onion 1 can tomatoes. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 head cabbage 1 lb. hamburger 1 c. cooked rice 1/2 tsp. pepper 1 egg 1 tsp. salt chopped onion 1 can tomatoes. Recipe: Wilt cabbage leaves in hot water. Combine all ingredients and mix thoroughly. Form into rolls and wrap in cabbage leaves. Place cabbage rolls in a cooker. Add tomatoes and cook over medium heat until hamburger is done and cabbage leaves are tender. Delicious.

title: Coconut Custard Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 eggs 2 c. milk 1/2 c. Bisquick 1/3 c. softened oleo 1 tsp. vanilla 1 can coconut 3/4 c. sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 eggs 2 c. milk 1/2 c. Bisquick 1/3 c. softened oleo 1 tsp. vanilla 1 can coconut 3/4 c. sugar. Recipe: Put all ingredients into blender and blend well 1 to 3 minutes. Pour into an ungreased pie pan and bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes.

title: Zucchini Pizzas
ingredients: Ingredients: 3/4 c. spaghetti sauce (Garden-Style) 1/2 c. (2 oz.) shredded part-skim Mozzarella cheese 2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese 2 Tbsp. minced onions 1/4 tsp. fresh ground black pepper 1/4 tsp. dried oregano 24 (1/2-inch) slices fresh zucchini 24 slices fresh mushrooms. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3/4 c. spaghetti sauce (Garden-Style) 1/2 c. (2 oz.) shredded part-skim Mozzarella cheese 2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese 2 Tbsp. minced onions 1/4 tsp. fresh ground black pepper 1/4 tsp. dried oregano 24 (1/2-inch) slices fresh zucchini 24 slices fresh mushrooms. Recipe: Combine spaghetti sauce onions black pepper and oregano in a small bowl. Combine Mozzarella cheese and Parmesan cheese. Place zucchini coins on a cookie sheet which has been coated with vegetable cooking spray (approximately 1-inch apart). Top with sauce then a mushroom slice. Sprinkle with cheese mixture. Broil until hot and bubbly.

title: School Girl Pickles(Sweet Spear)
ingredients: Ingredients: 14 tsp. alum 12 lb. cucumbers (whole) 9 c. water 1 c. salt 8 lb. sugar pickling spice. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 14 tsp. alum 12 lb. cucumbers (whole) 9 c. water 1 c. salt 8 lb. sugar pickling spice. Recipe: Soak cucumbers 2 weeks in salt water. After 2 weeks wash and soak overnight in plain water. Cut lengthwise and soak in alum water for 6 hours. Drain off alum water and slightly rinse with cold water. Heat enough vinegar to cover to the boiling point. Cover cucumbers and let stand for 24 hours. Drain off vinegar (don't wash). Place layer of cucumbers and a layer of sugar until all are used. Add spices tied in a bag in the middle of cucumbers and let stand for 3 days. They are now ready to put in jars or any large covered container.

title: Earthquake Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 box German chocolate cake mix 8 oz. pkg. cream cheese 1 stick butter 3 c. powdered sugar 3/4 c. pecans chopped 1 c. coconut. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 box German chocolate cake mix 8 oz. pkg. cream cheese 1 stick butter 3 c. powdered sugar 3/4 c. pecans chopped 1 c. coconut. Recipe: Cover the bottom of a 13 x 9-inch pan with coconut. Sprinkle pecans over coconut. Mix the cake as box directs and pour over coconut and pecans. Mix cream cheese melted butter and powdered sugar. Mixture should be slightly thick (if more powdered sugar is needed add gradually until you feel mixture is thick enough). Drop over cake and bake until done at 350\u00b0. Cake will crack open. Frost with Coca-Cola Icing.

title: Mayonnaise Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. flour 4 Tbsp. cocoa 1 c. sugar pinch of salt 1 c. lukewarm water 2 tsp. baking soda dissolved in the warm water 1 c. mayonnaise. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. flour 4 Tbsp. cocoa 1 c. sugar pinch of salt 1 c. lukewarm water 2 tsp. baking soda dissolved in the warm water 1 c. mayonnaise. Recipe: Mix all together. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 to 35 minutes. Test with toothpick.

title: White Pear Cake(Quick Easy And Delicious!)
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 white batter cake mix 1 1 lb can pear halves undrained 2 egg whites 1 whole egg. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 white batter cake mix 1 1 lb can pear halves undrained 2 egg whites 1 whole egg. Recipe: High altitude: Add 1 tbsp flour and 1/4 C sugar.

title: Party Pink Punch
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice 1 c. sugar 1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade 1 (48 oz.) bottle cranberry juice 2 liters ginger ale chilled. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice 1 c. sugar 1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade 1 (48 oz.) bottle cranberry juice 2 liters ginger ale chilled. Recipe: Blend first 4 ingredients. Freeze. Take out of freezer for 2 hours before serving. Break into mush. Add chilled ginger ale at last minute so that it does not get flat.

title: Country Style Beef And Macaroni
ingredients: Ingredients: 8 oz. macaroni 2 medium onions sliced 1 pkg. (10 oz.) frozen peas cooked and drained salt and pepper. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 8 oz. macaroni 2 medium onions sliced 1 pkg. (10 oz.) frozen peas cooked and drained salt and pepper. Recipe: Cook and drain macaroni. Melt butter and next 3 ingredients. Cook over medium heat until beef is browned. Add macaroni and remaining ingredients. Mix well and heat to serving temperature.

title: Peanut Butter Cream Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 oz. fat-free cream cheese 2 Tbsp. skim milk 1 c. powdered sugar 1/2 c. reduced-fat peanut butter large container Cool Whip lite low-fat baked pie shell. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 oz. fat-free cream cheese 2 Tbsp. skim milk 1 c. powdered sugar 1/2 c. reduced-fat peanut butter large container Cool Whip lite low-fat baked pie shell. Recipe: Combine cream cheese milk and peanut butter until smooth. Stir in sugar. Mix in Cool Whip. Pour into pie shell. Refrigerate several hours.

title: Scalloped Corn
ingredients: Ingredients: dash of pepper 1 beaten egg 1/2 cup milk 1 - 8-3/4 ounce can cream-style corn 1 - 7 ounce can whole kernel corn drained. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: dash of pepper 1 beaten egg 1/2 cup milk 1 - 8-3/4 ounce can cream-style corn 1 - 7 ounce can whole kernel corn drained. Recipe: Combine ingredients and pour into 1 quart casserole dish. Bake at 350 degrees for about 35 minutes or until knife inserted near the center comes out clean. Makes 4 servings.

title: Waldrop Banana Pudding
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. milk 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. flour 2 eggs 1 tsp. vanilla pinch of salt bananas vanilla wafers. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. milk 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. flour 2 eggs 1 tsp. vanilla pinch of salt bananas vanilla wafers. Recipe: Mix first 6 ingredients together; beat well. Stir constantly when cooking; cook over medium heat until mixture thickens. Remove quickly from heat; layer in bowl with banana slices and vanilla wafers (best warm).

title: Hungarian Goulash
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 lb. beef for stew cubed 1 medium onion sliced 1 small clove garlic 1/4 c. shortening 1 1/2 c. water 3/4 c. catsup 2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce 1 Tbsp. packed brown sugar 2 tsp. salt 2 tsp. paprika 1/2 tsp. dry mustard dash of cayenne red pepper 1/4 c. cold water 2 Tbsp. flour. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 lb. beef for stew cubed 1 medium onion sliced 1 small clove garlic 1/4 c. shortening 1 1/2 c. water 3/4 c. catsup 2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce 1 Tbsp. packed brown sugar 2 tsp. salt 2 tsp. paprika 1/2 tsp. dry mustard dash of cayenne red pepper 1/4 c. cold water 2 Tbsp. flour. Recipe: Cook and stir beef onion and garlic in shortening until beef is brown; drain. Stir in 1 1/2 cups water catsup Worcestershire sauce brown sugar salt paprika mustard and red pepper. Heat to boiling. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until beef is tender 2 to 2 1/2 hours. Can also put in crock-pot on low for 8 to 9 hours. Shake 1/4 cup cold water and flour in tightly covered container. Stir gradually into beef mixture. Heat to boiling stirring constantly. Boil and stir 1 minute. Serve over hot noodles.

title: Plain Pound Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 c. sugar 3 c. Swans Down cake flour 7 eggs (medium) 1 c. milk 1/2 tsp. salt 1 tsp. vanilla flavoring 1 tsp. butternut flavoring 1 1/2 c. Crisco. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 c. sugar 3 c. Swans Down cake flour 7 eggs (medium) 1 c. milk 1/2 tsp. salt 1 tsp. vanilla flavoring 1 tsp. butternut flavoring 1 1/2 c. Crisco. Recipe: Mix all ingredients in a mixing bowl. Pour into pound cake pan. Bake at 300\u00b0 for 1 1/2 hours.

title: Ham And Country Dumplings
ingredients: Ingredients: ham bone ham bouillon flour 2 eggs 1 c. cold water. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: ham bone ham bouillon flour 2 eggs 1 c. cold water. Recipe: Boil ham bone in large pot; remove bone putting meat from bone back into the broth. Add ham bouillon to flavor.

title: Broccoli Rice Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 chopped onion 1 rib chopped celery 1/2 stick butter 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli cooked and well drained 2 1/2 c. cooked rice 1 (10 3/4 oz.) can condensed cream of chicken soup 4 oz. cheez Whiz dash of Tabasco pepper to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 chopped onion 1 rib chopped celery 1/2 stick butter 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli cooked and well drained 2 1/2 c. cooked rice 1 (10 3/4 oz.) can condensed cream of chicken soup 4 oz. cheez Whiz dash of Tabasco pepper to taste. Recipe: Saute onion and celery in butter until tender. Combine onions and celery with remaining ingredients. Pour into greased 1 1/2-quart baking dish. Bake at 350\u00b0. Better if prepared a day ahead. Freezes well.

title: Buckeyes(Cookies)
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (18 oz.) jar crunchy peanut butter 3 c. Rice Krispies 1 lb. powdered sugar 1 stick oleo 1 (12 oz.) chocolate chips 1/2 stick paraffin wax. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (18 oz.) jar crunchy peanut butter 3 c. Rice Krispies 1 lb. powdered sugar 1 stick oleo 1 (12 oz.) chocolate chips 1/2 stick paraffin wax. Recipe: Melt oleo and combine with other ingredients. Roll into small balls and place on wax paper. Then melt chocolate chips and paraffin wax. Then dip balls into chocolate mixture place on wax paper and cool. Makes 120 pieces.

title: Broccoli-Raisin Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 bunch broccoli heads 2 stems green onion (single stalks) or 1/2 medium whole onion 1/4 c. sunflower seeds 1/2 c. raisins 6 slices bacon fried and cooled 1/2 c. mayonnaise 2 Tbsp. vinegar 1/8 c. sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 bunch broccoli heads 2 stems green onion (single stalks) or 1/2 medium whole onion 1/4 c. sunflower seeds 1/2 c. raisins 6 slices bacon fried and cooled 1/2 c. mayonnaise 2 Tbsp. vinegar 1/8 c. sugar. Recipe: Mix broccoli onion sunflower seeds raisins and bacon.

title: Low-Fat French Fries
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 to 2 lb. baking potatoes 1/8 to 1/4 tsp. cayenne 1 to 1 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil nonstick cooking spray 1/3 to 1/2 tsp. garlic powder 1/4 to 1/2 tsp. salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 to 2 lb. baking potatoes 1/8 to 1/4 tsp. cayenne 1 to 1 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil nonstick cooking spray 1/3 to 1/2 tsp. garlic powder 1/4 to 1/2 tsp. salt. Recipe: Preheat oven to 425\u00b0. Peel potatoes or leave them unpeeled depending on your preference. Cut into two-inch strips. Mix garlic powder and salt and set aside. Place potatoes into large plastic container; pour oil and pepper over. Shake vigorously.

title: Chicken Pot Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 c. cooked and diced chicken 1 small pkg. frozen Veg-All 1 c. chicken broth 1 c. cream of celery soup 1/4 tsp. pepper 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. self-rising flour 1 c. milk 1/2 c. margarine melted. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 c. cooked and diced chicken 1 small pkg. frozen Veg-All 1 c. chicken broth 1 c. cream of celery soup 1/4 tsp. pepper 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. self-rising flour 1 c. milk 1/2 c. margarine melted. Recipe: Grease shallow 2-quart dish. Place vegetables and chicken in dish. Stir together broth soup salt and pepper. Pour over chicken. Combine flour milk and margarine. Stir until smooth. Pour over mixture. Bake in 400\u00b0 oven for 40 to 50 minutes.

title: Old-Time Bread Pudding
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 slices buttered toast 1/3 c. seedless raisins 2 eggs slightly beaten 1/4 c. sugar 1/8 tsp. salt 1 c. Pet milk 1 c. boiling water 1 tsp. vanilla 4 tsp. sugar 1/4 tsp. cinnamon. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 slices buttered toast 1/3 c. seedless raisins 2 eggs slightly beaten 1/4 c. sugar 1/8 tsp. salt 1 c. Pet milk 1 c. boiling water 1 tsp. vanilla 4 tsp. sugar 1/4 tsp. cinnamon. Recipe: Grease 1 1/2-quart baking dish. Place toast cut into quarters in dish. Sprinkle raisins over top. Combine eggs sugar salt milk water and vanilla. Pour over toast. Let stand 10 minutes. Sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean. Makes 4 servings.

title: Original Mayfair Dressing
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (2 oz.) can anchovies 1 Tbsp. black pepper 1 Tbsp. Accent 2 stalks celery 1 medium onion 1/4 c. mustard 1 1/2 cloves garlic 1 tsp. lemon juice 3 eggs 2 c. Mazola oil. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (2 oz.) can anchovies 1 Tbsp. black pepper 1 Tbsp. Accent 2 stalks celery 1 medium onion 1/4 c. mustard 1 1/2 cloves garlic 1 tsp. lemon juice 3 eggs 2 c. Mazola oil. Recipe: Blend together first 8 ingredients in electric blender until liquid consistency. (It is very important to use either a blender or a food processor in order to achieve a smooth creamy dressing.) Then add eggs one at a time. Beat well after each addition. Add Mazola oil a small amount at a time blending after each addition. Makes 1 quart.

title: Apple Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 eggs 1 tsp. soda 1 c. coconut 2 c. apples chopped 1 1/4 c. oil 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 2 c. sugar 1 c. pecans 3 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 eggs 1 tsp. soda 1 c. coconut 2 c. apples chopped 1 1/4 c. oil 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 2 c. sugar 1 c. pecans 3 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt. Recipe: Beat eggs sugar and oil. Add flour soda salt and cinnamon. Then add apples nuts and coconut. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 25 to 35 minutes.

title: Cheeseburger Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1 Tbsp. onions 1 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 3/4 tsp. Italian seasoning 1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste 1 pizza crust 8 oz. shredded Mozzarella cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1 Tbsp. onions 1 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 3/4 tsp. Italian seasoning 1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste 1 pizza crust 8 oz. shredded Mozzarella cheese. Recipe: Brown meat and seasoning in skillet. Drain off fat. Add tomato paste; blend. Turn mixture out on crust. Top with cheese. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 10 to 15 minutes.

title: Fried Cabbage
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 head cabbage 1 onion 1 bell pepper 1 ripe tomato 2 Tbsp. sugar 1 tsp. salt 1 tsp. pepper. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 head cabbage 1 onion 1 bell pepper 1 ripe tomato 2 Tbsp. sugar 1 tsp. salt 1 tsp. pepper. Recipe: Chop or cut up in small pieces; let stand at least 1 hour. Put 3 tablespoons of oil in skillet and heat. Drain vegetables. Put in skillet. Add 1/2 cup water and cook 20 or 30 minutes.

title: Jello Salad(This Is Almost Like A Dessert Yummy.)
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple drained 1 c. water pineapple juice 12 large marshmallows 1 pkg. lemon jello 1 pkg. orange jello 1 c. grated carrots 1 c. diced celery 1 lb. cottage cheese 1/2 c. mayonnaise 3/4 c. chopped nuts 1 pkg. Dream Whip or other whipped cream. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple drained 1 c. water pineapple juice 12 large marshmallows 1 pkg. lemon jello 1 pkg. orange jello 1 c. grated carrots 1 c. diced celery 1 lb. cottage cheese 1/2 c. mayonnaise 3/4 c. chopped nuts 1 pkg. Dream Whip or other whipped cream. Recipe: Cook until dissolved the water pineapple juice and marshmallows. Add lemon and orange jello stirring until dissolved. Cool until almost set at room temperature. Add carrots celery cottage cheese mayonnaise and chopped nuts. Fold into jello mix. Fold in Dream Whip or other whipped cream. Pour into mold and chill.

title: Wedding Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 stick unsalted butter (room temperature) 2 Tbsp. granulated sugar 1 tsp. vanilla 1 c. all-purpose flour sifted 1 c. finely chopped walnuts 1 c. powdered sugar sifted. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 stick unsalted butter (room temperature) 2 Tbsp. granulated sugar 1 tsp. vanilla 1 c. all-purpose flour sifted 1 c. finely chopped walnuts 1 c. powdered sugar sifted. Recipe: Preheat oven to 300\u00b0. Line 2 cookie sheets with parchment paper or leave them ungreased. Cream the butter sugar and vanilla until light and fluffy. Add the flour and mix on low speed until very well blended. Add the nuts and mix well until well blended. Measure out generously rounded teaspoonfuls of dough and roll them into balls with your hands. Place about 2-inches apart on the prepared cookie sheets. Bake the cookies until they begin to turn golden about 30 minutes. To test for doneness remove 1 from sheet and cut in half. There should be no doughy strip in the center. Roll the cookies in the powdered sugar while hot. Then cool on the cookie sheets. Serve after cookies have cooled.

title: Jezebel Sauce
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (18 oz.) jar pineapple preserves 1 (18 oz.) jar apple jelly 1 (5 oz.) jar horseradish 1 1/4 oz. dry mustard 1 Tbsp. coarse black pepper. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (18 oz.) jar pineapple preserves 1 (18 oz.) jar apple jelly 1 (5 oz.) jar horseradish 1 1/4 oz. dry mustard 1 Tbsp. coarse black pepper. Recipe: Blend all ingredients. Serve over cream cheese. Serve with crackers.

title: Banana Bread
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. sugar 2 eggs 2 c. flour 1 tsp. soda vanilla to taste pinch of salt 1/2 c. chopped nuts (optional) 1/2 c. shortening 3 bananas mashed. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. sugar 2 eggs 2 c. flour 1 tsp. soda vanilla to taste pinch of salt 1/2 c. chopped nuts (optional) 1/2 c. shortening 3 bananas mashed. Recipe: Sift together the flour and soda. Mix all ingredients together and bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes.

title: Mexicali Chicken And Cheese Bake
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 c. cubed cooked chicken 8 oz. (2 c.) shredded Monterey Jack cheese 12 oz. can whole kernel corn drained 10 3/4 oz. can condensed cream of chicken soup 1 c. flour 1/4 c. cornmeal 1 3/4 tsp. baking powder chili powder or seasoned salt 1 1/2 c. milk 1/2 c. margarine melted 3 eggs beaten 1/4 c. chopped onion 4 oz. can chopped green chillies 2 oz. chopped pimento drained. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 c. cubed cooked chicken 8 oz. (2 c.) shredded Monterey Jack cheese 12 oz. can whole kernel corn drained 10 3/4 oz. can condensed cream of chicken soup 1 c. flour 1/4 c. cornmeal 1 3/4 tsp. baking powder chili powder or seasoned salt 1 1/2 c. milk 1/2 c. margarine melted 3 eggs beaten 1/4 c. chopped onion 4 oz. can chopped green chillies 2 oz. chopped pimento drained. Recipe: Heat oven to 350\u00b0. Grease 13 x 9-inch baking dish. In large bowl combine chicken 1 cup cheese corn and soup; blend well. Spoon into prepared dish. Combine other ingredients in order listed. Mix until just moistened. Batter will be lumpy. Pour over chicken mixture. Bake 50 to 60 minutes. Sprinkle with cheese. Return to oven to melt cheese. Let stand 10 minutes before serving. Serves 8.

title: Ripe Tomato Ketchup
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 gal. chopped cabbage 1 gal. tomatoes 6 to 8 onions 6 small bell peppers 1 qt. vinegar 1 hot pepper 5 lb. sugar or to taste 1 Tbsp. allspice 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. nutmeg 1 Tbsp. salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 gal. chopped cabbage 1 gal. tomatoes 6 to 8 onions 6 small bell peppers 1 qt. vinegar 1 hot pepper 5 lb. sugar or to taste 1 Tbsp. allspice 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. nutmeg 1 Tbsp. salt. Recipe: Chop all ingredients. Add seasonings sugar and vinegar. Cook 40 minutes. Can and seal.

title: Fresh Broccoli Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 bunches fresh broccoli 10 slices bacon cooked and crumbled 2/3 c. raisins 1/2 c. onion chopped 1 c. salad dressing (Miracle Whip) 1/2 c. sugar 2 Tbsp. vinegar 1/2 c. slivered almonds (optional) 1/2 c. sharp cheese (optional). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 bunches fresh broccoli 10 slices bacon cooked and crumbled 2/3 c. raisins 1/2 c. onion chopped 1 c. salad dressing (Miracle Whip) 1/2 c. sugar 2 Tbsp. vinegar 1/2 c. slivered almonds (optional) 1/2 c. sharp cheese (optional). Recipe: Wash and cut broccoli into bite size pieces. Combine salad dressing vinegar and sugar; mix well. Pour dressing mixture over other ingredients and toss. Refrigerate 2 hours before serving.

title: Lemon Chicken
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 whole chicken cut up 3 large lemons 1 stick butter oregano. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 whole chicken cut up 3 large lemons 1 stick butter oregano. Recipe: Preheat oven to 400\u00b0. Cut up chicken and place in a pan. Melt butter and squeeze fresh lemon juice into butter. Baste chicken. Sprinkle with oregano and bake at 400\u00b0 for 1 hour.

title: Cherry Topsy-Turvy Pudding
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 Tbsp. butter 1 1/4 c. sugar divided 1 c. flour 1 tsp. baking powder 1/8 tsp. salt 3/4 c. milk 1 1/2 c. canned tart cherries (reserve the juice) 1/4 c. cherry juice. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 Tbsp. butter 1 1/4 c. sugar divided 1 c. flour 1 tsp. baking powder 1/8 tsp. salt 3/4 c. milk 1 1/2 c. canned tart cherries (reserve the juice) 1/4 c. cherry juice. Recipe: Cream together butter and 1 cup sugar. Sift together flour baking powder and salt. Add alternately with milk to creamed mixture. Pour into greased casserole dish. Combine cherries with remaining 1/4 cup sugar and 1/4 cup reserved cherry juice. Heat cherry mixture and pour over batter. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 to 40 minutes. Serves 6.

title: Strawberry Pan Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. sugar 3 level Tbsp. cornstarch 1 (9-inch) pie crust baked 1 pt. raw strawberries 1 c. water. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. sugar 3 level Tbsp. cornstarch 1 (9-inch) pie crust baked 1 pt. raw strawberries 1 c. water. Recipe: Mix sugar water and cornstarch. Cook until thick and clear. Add red food coloring. Let cool. Put raw strawberries in glaze. Stir and pour in a baked crust.

title: Chicken Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 large pkg. spinach noodles cooked in broth 1 c. chopped celery 1 large green pepper chopped 1 large onion chopped 6 chicken breasts boiled (save 1 c. broth for mixture) 1/2 lb. Velveeta cheese mushrooms (optional) 1 can mushroom soup. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 large pkg. spinach noodles cooked in broth 1 c. chopped celery 1 large green pepper chopped 1 large onion chopped 6 chicken breasts boiled (save 1 c. broth for mixture) 1/2 lb. Velveeta cheese mushrooms (optional) 1 can mushroom soup. Recipe: Cook chicken. Saute celery pepper and onion. Add cheese and soup. Add 1 cup chicken broth. Mix spinach with chicken mixture. Bake uncovered for 30 minutes at 350\u00b0.

title: Cream Tacos
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. hamburger onion 1 doz. corn tortillas green chili 2 small cans tomato sauce 1 can evaporated milk Cheddar cheese grated. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. hamburger onion 1 doz. corn tortillas green chili 2 small cans tomato sauce 1 can evaporated milk Cheddar cheese grated. Recipe: Fry hamburger with onion. Layer corn tortillas (cut in 1/4) in pan. Put 1 teaspoon hamburger on each piece 1 teaspoon green chili on top of hamburger then 1 teaspoon tomato sauce top with grated cheese. Repeat layers until all ingredients are gone. Pour can of milk over all. Cover with foil. Bake in oven at 350\u00b0 for 30 to 35 minutes until milk evaporates.

title: Scottish Shortbread
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 c. (1 stick) unsalted butter 2 c. all-purpose flour 1/4 c. sugar pinch of salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 c. (1 stick) unsalted butter 2 c. all-purpose flour 1/4 c. sugar pinch of salt. Recipe: Cut butter into small pieces and set aside to warm to room temperature. Grease an 8 x 8-inch square (not glass) baking pan with butter and set aside. Sift together dry ingredients in mixing bowl. Add the butter pieces and rub in with fingers. Knead mixture gently to make a soft dough. Press into the prepared pan and flatten using fingertips. Prick all over with a fork and bake in a preheated 325\u00b0 oven for 30 to 35 minutes or until a pale golden color. Cool slightly sprinkle with a little granulated sugar and cut into 1 x 2-inch fingers. Cool on a wire rack and store in an airtight container.

title: Slaw
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/3 c. sugar 3/4 tsp. salt 3/4 tsp. pepper 1 Tbsp. celery seed 1 Tbsp. prepared mustard 1/4 c. apple cider vinegar 1 c. mayonnaise 1 clove garlic cabbage. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/3 c. sugar 3/4 tsp. salt 3/4 tsp. pepper 1 Tbsp. celery seed 1 Tbsp. prepared mustard 1/4 c. apple cider vinegar 1 c. mayonnaise 1 clove garlic cabbage. Recipe: To make dressing mix together sugar salt pepper celery seed mustard and vinegar. Add mayonnaise slowly stirring well. Refrigerate dressing until ready to make slaw. Cut garlic in half rub salad bowl with cut side of garlic clove. Add cut cabbage. Pour desired amount of dressing over cabbage and mix well. Chill.

title: Hot Cheese Balls
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 lb. Cheddar cheese shredded 1 stick oleo 1 c. flour 1/4 tsp. paprika 1/4 tsp. salt dash of cayenne pepper (optional). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 lb. Cheddar cheese shredded 1 stick oleo 1 c. flour 1/4 tsp. paprika 1/4 tsp. salt dash of cayenne pepper (optional). Recipe: Have cheese and oleo at room temperature. Mix well together with your hands then add other ingredients. Roll in 1-inch balls. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes on ungreased cookie sheet.

title: Pizza Cups
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1/4 c. minced onion 1/2 tsp. salt (optional) 8 oz. tomato sauce 1 tsp. Italian seasoning 2 cans refrigerated biscuits (10 count) 1/2 to 3/4 c. grated cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1/4 c. minced onion 1/2 tsp. salt (optional) 8 oz. tomato sauce 1 tsp. Italian seasoning 2 cans refrigerated biscuits (10 count) 1/2 to 3/4 c. grated cheese. Recipe: Brown ground beef and onion. Drain. Stir in tomato sauce and seasonings. Cook 5 minutes. Place biscuits in greased muffin tins pressing to cover bottom and sides. Spoon meat mixture into biscuits. Top with cheese. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 12 minutes or until brown. Makes 20 pizza cups.

title: All-American Apple Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: pastry for double pie crust 6 c. thinly sliced cooking apples 1 Tbsp. lemon juice (optional) 1 c. sugar 2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour 1 tsp. ground cinnamon dash of ground nutmeg 1 Tbsp. butter or margarine. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: pastry for double pie crust 6 c. thinly sliced cooking apples 1 Tbsp. lemon juice (optional) 1 c. sugar 2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour 1 tsp. ground cinnamon dash of ground nutmeg 1 Tbsp. butter or margarine. Recipe: If apples lack tartness sprinkle with the 1 tablespoon lemon juice. In mixing bowl combine sugar flour cinnamon and nutmeg (for a very juicy pie omit the flour). Add sugar mixture to the sliced apples; toss to mix. Fill pastry-lined pie plate with apple mixture; dot with butter or margarine. Cut slits in top crust for escape of steam; place pastry atop filling. Seal and flute edge. Sprinkle some sugar atop if desired.

title: Strawberry Cake With Icing
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 box Duncan Hines strawberry supreme cake mix juice from 1 box frozen strawberries 4 eggs 1 c. Crisco 1/2 c. water 1 (3 oz.) box strawberry jello. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 box Duncan Hines strawberry supreme cake mix juice from 1 box frozen strawberries 4 eggs 1 c. Crisco 1/2 c. water 1 (3 oz.) box strawberry jello. Recipe: Mix all ingredients well with electric mixer. Bake in layers or in long pan until done.

title: Swedish Meat Balls
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. ground beef 1 box croutons (garlic and onion) 1/4 c. chopped onion 2 eggs salt and pepper to taste 1 (10 oz.) jar grape jelly 1 (10 oz.) bottle chili sauce. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. ground beef 1 box croutons (garlic and onion) 1/4 c. chopped onion 2 eggs salt and pepper to taste 1 (10 oz.) jar grape jelly 1 (10 oz.) bottle chili sauce. Recipe: Combine all ingredients except jelly and sauce. Mix well and make balls. Brown in skillet. Combine jelly and chili sauce and mix well. Pour sauce over meat balls and bake in a 350\u00b0 oven for 45 minutes or place in large skillet on top of stove and simmer for 20 minutes.

title: Calf Liver Braised In Wine
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. calf liver thinly sliced cut in serving pieces 1/4 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper 1/2 c. onion chopped 1/4 tsp. basil 3 Tbsp. butter or margarine 1 c. mushrooms sliced 1 cube beef bouillon 1/2 c. water (boiling) 1/2 c. dry red wine. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. calf liver thinly sliced cut in serving pieces 1/4 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper 1/2 c. onion chopped 1/4 tsp. basil 3 Tbsp. butter or margarine 1 c. mushrooms sliced 1 cube beef bouillon 1/2 c. water (boiling) 1/2 c. dry red wine. Recipe: Coat liver in mixture of flour salt and pepper. Set aside. Saute onion in butter until tender. Add liver and brown lightly on both sides. Dissolve bouillon in boiling water. Add mushrooms bouillon wine and basil. Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until liver is tender. Serves 4.

title: Sour Cream Pound Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. oleo 1 c. sour cream 3 c. sugar 5 eggs 3 c. plain flour 1/2 tsp. baking powder 1/4 tsp. baking soda 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 c. milk 2 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. oleo 1 c. sour cream 3 c. sugar 5 eggs 3 c. plain flour 1/2 tsp. baking powder 1/4 tsp. baking soda 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 c. milk 2 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: Cream together sugar\tand oleo. Blend in sour cream. Add 3 eggs; blend. Add remaining 2 eggs and blend. Combine dry ingredients. Stir vanilla into milk. Add dry ingredients and milk alternately to creamed mixture. Blend after each addition (do not beat as it would incorporate too much air and lighten texture).

title: Baked Beans
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 (15 oz.) cans Great Northern white beans 3/4 lb. bacon cooked and cut in pieces 3/4 to 1 c. ketchup 1 c. white sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 (15 oz.) cans Great Northern white beans 3/4 lb. bacon cooked and cut in pieces 3/4 to 1 c. ketchup 1 c. white sugar. Recipe: Combine all ingredients well in a casserole dish. Bake for 1 hour at 325\u00b0.

title: Vanilla Ice Cream
ingredients: Ingredients: 6 eggs 1 1/2 c. sugar 1 can evaporated milk 1 Tbsp. milk milk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 6 eggs 1 1/2 c. sugar 1 can evaporated milk 1 Tbsp. milk milk. Recipe: Combine sugar eggs evaporated milk and vanilla in large mixing bowl. Add enough milk to fill freezer 3/4 full.

title: Sparkle Cutout Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) cream cheese 1 c. margarine 2/3 c. sugar 1/2 tsp. vanilla 2 1/2 c. flour dash of salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) cream cheese 1 c. margarine 2/3 c. sugar 1/2 tsp. vanilla 2 1/2 c. flour dash of salt. Recipe: Combine softened cream cheese margarine sugar and vanilla until well blended. Add flour and salt. Mix well. Chill. On a lightly floured surface roll dough to 1/4-inch thickness. Cut with assorted cookie cutters. Place on ungreased cookie sheet. Decorate with colored sugar or icing. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 8 to 10 minutes just until edges start to brown lightly.

title: Taco Soup
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 lb. hamburger meat browned 1 medium chopped onion 1 pkg. (dry) Hidden Valley Ranch dressing mix 1 pkg. taco seasoning mix 1 can whole kernel corn 1 can red kidney beans 1 can pinto beans 1 small can chopped chilies 3 cans stewed tomatoes. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 lb. hamburger meat browned 1 medium chopped onion 1 pkg. (dry) Hidden Valley Ranch dressing mix 1 pkg. taco seasoning mix 1 can whole kernel corn 1 can red kidney beans 1 can pinto beans 1 small can chopped chilies 3 cans stewed tomatoes. Recipe: Mix and put in crock-pot. Cook all day. If cooked on range top simmer 2 to 3 hours.

title: Fruit Cocktail Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (No. 303) can fruit cocktail (juice also) 1 1/2 c. sugar 2 eggs 1 tsp. vanilla 2 tsp. soda 1 tsp. cinnamon 2 c. flour 1/2 c. brown sugar 1 c. pecans chopped. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (No. 303) can fruit cocktail (juice also) 1 1/2 c. sugar 2 eggs 1 tsp. vanilla 2 tsp. soda 1 tsp. cinnamon 2 c. flour 1/2 c. brown sugar 1 c. pecans chopped. Recipe: Mix all at one time except brown sugar and pecans. Beat 3 minutes. Pour into 9 x 13 greased pan. Sprinkle with brown sugar and pecans. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes.

title: Fa-La-La-La-Las
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. butter flavor Crisco 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg 3/4 tsp. salt 3/4 tsp. vanilla 1/2 tsp. almond extract 2 1/4 c. all-purpose flour. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. butter flavor Crisco 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg 3/4 tsp. salt 3/4 tsp. vanilla 1/2 tsp. almond extract 2 1/4 c. all-purpose flour. Recipe: Heat oven to 400\u00b0. Cream butter flavor Crisco and sugar in large bowl at medium speed of electric mixer until well blended. Beat in egg salt vanilla and almond extract. Stir in flour. Place dough in cookie press. Press into desired shapes 2 inches apart on cooled ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 5 to 7 minutes or until set but not brown. Cool on baking sheet one minute. Remove to cooling rack. Makes 4 to 4 1/2 dozen cookies.

title: Orange-Coconut Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/4 c. butter or margarine softened 1 c. sugar 3 eggs beaten 1/2 c. orange juice 1 tsp. lemon extract dash of salt 1 c. flaked coconut 1 (9-inch) pie crust unbaked. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/4 c. butter or margarine softened 1 c. sugar 3 eggs beaten 1/2 c. orange juice 1 tsp. lemon extract dash of salt 1 c. flaked coconut 1 (9-inch) pie crust unbaked. Recipe: Cream butter; gradually add sugar beating well at medium speed of an electric mixer. Add eggs and beat until blended. Stir in orange juice lemon extract salt and coconut mixing well. Pour into pie crust. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 to 50 minutes or until a knife inserted in center comes out clean.

title: Sour Cream Pound Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 sticks butter (real) 3 c. sugar 3 c. flour 6 eggs 1 tsp. vanilla 1/4 tsp. baking soda 1/2 pt. sour cream. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 sticks butter (real) 3 c. sugar 3 c. flour 6 eggs 1 tsp. vanilla 1/4 tsp. baking soda 1/2 pt. sour cream. Recipe: Preheat oven to 325\u00b0. Cream butter and sugar together. Beat well. Continue beating add eggs one at a time. Add flour and baking soda. Beat well. Add sour cream and vanilla. Pour into greased and floured tube pan. Bake one hour or maybe a little longer.

title: Company Chicken
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. instant rice 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 can cream of celery soup 4 chicken breasts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. instant rice 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 can cream of celery soup 4 chicken breasts. Recipe: Mix first 4 ingredients together. Place chicken on top. Put a pat of butter on each piece of chicken; season to taste. Bake for 1 hour at 375\u00b0.

title: Minestrone Soup
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. thinly sliced carrots 1 c. sliced celery 1/2 c. chopped onions 1 clove garlic minced 2 Tbsp. margarine 2 cans (15 oz.) Chef Boyardee Beefogetti 1 can chickpeas drained 2 c. water 2 beef bouillon cubes 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. crushed basil 1/4 tsp. pepper Parmesan cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. thinly sliced carrots 1 c. sliced celery 1/2 c. chopped onions 1 clove garlic minced 2 Tbsp. margarine 2 cans (15 oz.) Chef Boyardee Beefogetti 1 can chickpeas drained 2 c. water 2 beef bouillon cubes 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. crushed basil 1/4 tsp. pepper Parmesan cheese. Recipe: In a 2-quart saucepan saute carrots celery onions and garlic in margarine. Add remaining ingredients except cheese. Simmer covered for 15 minutes. Top each serving with Parmesan cheese. Serves six.

title: Cherry Topped Cheesecake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 pkg. yellow cake mix 2 Tbsp. oil 2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 1/2 c. sugar 4 eggs 1 1/2 c. milk 3 Tbsp. lemon juice 3 Tbsp. vanilla 1 can cherry pie filling. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 pkg. yellow cake mix 2 Tbsp. oil 2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 1/2 c. sugar 4 eggs 1 1/2 c. milk 3 Tbsp. lemon juice 3 Tbsp. vanilla 1 can cherry pie filling. Recipe: Preheat oven to 300\u00b0. Reserve 1 cup of dry cake mix. In large mixing bowl combine remaining cake mix 1 of the eggs and oil (mixture will be crumbly). Press mixture in bottom of 13 x 9-inch pan for crust. Press up sides.

title: Sweet 'N' Sour Sauce
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 c. vinegar 1/2 c. sugar 1/3 c. oil. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 c. vinegar 1/2 c. sugar 1/3 c. oil. Recipe: Blend all ingredients together well. Use for bean salad or cucumbers.

title: Easy Taco Dip
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 large pkg. cream cheese 1 can Hormel chili 2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 large pkg. cream cheese 1 can Hormel chili 2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese. Recipe: In a glass pie pan layer all three ingredients placing cream cheese on the bottom of the pan chili in the middle shredded Cheddar cheese on top. Place in microwave on High for about 5 to 6 minutes. Use nacho chips to dip with. Great for parties and snacks.

title: Monkey Bread
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 pkg. refrigerator rolls 1/2 c. melted margarine or butter 3/4 c. sugar 1 tsp. cinnamon. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 pkg. refrigerator rolls 1/2 c. melted margarine or butter 3/4 c. sugar 1 tsp. cinnamon. Recipe: Separate rolls. Dip each into margarine then into sugar and cinnamon mixture. Stack unevenly in casserole or ring pan. Bake at 425\u00b0 for 20 to 25 minutes. Turn out onto plate. Drizzle powdered sugar icing over top if desired.

title: Coconut Cream Pie Or Lemon Meringue Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 eggs separated 4 Tbsp. cornstarch 2 c. milk 2 Tbsp. butter 1 1/2 c. sugar 1 Tbsp. coconut flavoring 1 unbaked pie shell. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 eggs separated 4 Tbsp. cornstarch 2 c. milk 2 Tbsp. butter 1 1/2 c. sugar 1 Tbsp. coconut flavoring 1 unbaked pie shell. Recipe: Note: For lemon pie use 1 1/2 cups milk and 1/2 cup ReaLemon no flavoring.

title: Death By Chocolate
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 chocolate cake mix 2 (8 oz.) containers Cool Whip 2 envelopes Dream Whip 2 pkg. chocolate Jell-O instant pudding 3 c. cold milk 4 Heath bars (optional). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 chocolate cake mix 2 (8 oz.) containers Cool Whip 2 envelopes Dream Whip 2 pkg. chocolate Jell-O instant pudding 3 c. cold milk 4 Heath bars (optional). Recipe: Bake cake mix according to instructions on box. Cool completely; break into small pieces. Mix together Jell-O Dream Whip and milk; beat well. Refrigerate 1 hour.

title: Corn Meal Muffins
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. corn meal 2 Tbsp. brown sugar 3/4 tsp. baking soda 2 eggs well beaten 1 1/2 c. sour milk 1 c. flour 1 tsp. salt 1 tsp. baking powder 1/4 c. melted bacon fat. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. corn meal 2 Tbsp. brown sugar 3/4 tsp. baking soda 2 eggs well beaten 1 1/2 c. sour milk 1 c. flour 1 tsp. salt 1 tsp. baking powder 1/4 c. melted bacon fat. Recipe: Sift flour. Measure and sift with baking soda salt and baking powder. Mix with corn meal. Combine bacon fat sugar and eggs. Add sour milk. Combine with dry ingredients. Beat only until smooth. Fill well-oiled muffin pan 2/3 full. Bake in hot oven (435\u00b0) for 15 to 20 minutes.

title: Hot Taco Rice
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1 onion chopped 1 1/2 c. salsa sauce 1 chicken bouillon cube 1 can tomato sauce 1 1/2 c. Minute rice. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1 onion chopped 1 1/2 c. salsa sauce 1 chicken bouillon cube 1 can tomato sauce 1 1/2 c. Minute rice. Recipe: Brown meat and onion in skillet; drain. Add salsa and tomato sauce with bouillon cube. Bring to boil then simmer covered for 5 minutes.

title: Moist Devil'S Food Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 devil's food cake mix 1 can cherry pie filling 1/4 c. oil 3 eggs. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 devil's food cake mix 1 can cherry pie filling 1/4 c. oil 3 eggs. Recipe: Blend all ingredients together with electric mixer on medium speed for 3 minutes. Bake in greased and floured tube pan for 40 minutes at 350\u00b0.

title: Peanut Butter Twinkies
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 c. light Karo syrup 1 c. peanut butter 1/4 stick oleo 1 Tbsp. vanilla 6 to 8 c. cornflakes. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 c. light Karo syrup 1 c. peanut butter 1/4 stick oleo 1 Tbsp. vanilla 6 to 8 c. cornflakes. Recipe: In a saucepan bring sugar and syrup to a full boil. Remove from heat. Add peanut butter oleo and vanilla. Add enough cornflakes to be able to press into well-buttered 13 x 9-inch pan. Cut into squares while still warm.

title: Low-Calorie Pumpkin Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (16 oz.) can solid pack pumpkin 1 (13 oz.) can evaporated skim milk 1 egg 2 egg whites 1/2 c. biscuit mix (Bisquick type) 2 Tbsp. sugar 6 packets sugar substitute 2 tsp. pumpkin pie spice 2 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (16 oz.) can solid pack pumpkin 1 (13 oz.) can evaporated skim milk 1 egg 2 egg whites 1/2 c. biscuit mix (Bisquick type) 2 Tbsp. sugar 6 packets sugar substitute 2 tsp. pumpkin pie spice 2 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: Heat oven to 350\u00b0. Lightly grease or spray a 9-inch pie pan with vegetable spray. Place all ingredients in blender food processor or mixing bowl. Blend 1 minute or beat 2 minutes with mixer. Pour into pie pan. Bake for 50 minutes or until center is puffed up. Makes 8 servings (112 calories).

title: Zucchini Squares
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. zucchini shredded 1/2 c. onion chopped 1 clove garlic 1/2 c. grated Parmesan 1/2 c. oil 2 Tbsp. dried parsley 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt 1/2 tsp. oregano 2 eggs slightly beaten. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. zucchini shredded 1/2 c. onion chopped 1 clove garlic 1/2 c. grated Parmesan 1/2 c. oil 2 Tbsp. dried parsley 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt 1/2 tsp. oregano 2 eggs slightly beaten. Recipe: Mix all together and bake at 350\u00b0 in a greased 9 x 13-inch pan for about 1/2 hour. Top will turn light brown.

title: Pound Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 stick butter 1 c. Crisco 3 c. sugar 6 eggs 3 c. plain flour 1/2 tsp. baking powder 1 c. sweet milk 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 stick butter 1 c. Crisco 3 c. sugar 6 eggs 3 c. plain flour 1/2 tsp. baking powder 1 c. sweet milk 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: Cream butter Crisco and sugar. Add eggs one at a time. Add flour a cup at a time. Add milk a third at a time then mix good. Beat 3 minutes. Put in a tube pan (greased and floured). Place in cold oven. Turn to 350\u00b0 and bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes.

title: Chocolate Eclair Dessert
ingredients: Ingredients: 20 (about) graham crackers 2 (4 oz.) pkg. vanilla instant pudding mix 3 1/2 c. milk 8 oz. whipped topping 2 pkg. Choco-bake 2 tsp. light corn syrup 2 tsp. vanilla 3 Tbsp. margarine softened 1 1/2 c. confectioners sugar 3 Tbsp. milk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 20 (about) graham crackers 2 (4 oz.) pkg. vanilla instant pudding mix 3 1/2 c. milk 8 oz. whipped topping 2 pkg. Choco-bake 2 tsp. light corn syrup 2 tsp. vanilla 3 Tbsp. margarine softened 1 1/2 c. confectioners sugar 3 Tbsp. milk. Recipe: Line a buttered 9 x 13-inch serving dish with half the graham crackers. Beat pudding mix and 3 1/2 cups milk in mixer bowl for 2 minutes. Fold in whipped topping. Layer half the pudding mixture remaining graham crackers and remaining pudding mixture in prepared dish. Chill for 2 hours. Combine Choco-bake corn syrup vanilla and margarine in bowl; beat well. Add confectioners sugar and 3 tablespoons milk alternately beating well after each addition. Spread over dessert.

title: Butternut Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. butter 1 c. sugar 4 tsp. vanilla 4 c. flour 1 tsp. salt 4 c. finely chopped walnuts confectioners sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. butter 1 c. sugar 4 tsp. vanilla 4 c. flour 1 tsp. salt 4 c. finely chopped walnuts confectioners sugar. Recipe: Cream the butter sugar and vanilla until fluffy. Add flour and salt. Blend well. Add nuts. Mix well and shape into 1-inch balls. Bake at 325\u00b0 for 20 minutes. Do not brown. Cool and roll into confectioners sugar.

title: Hattie Coffer'S Kool-Aid Punch
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. water 2 c. sugar 1 qt. ginger ale 1 pkg. Kool-Aid (any flavor) 1/2 c. lemon juice 2 c. pineapple juice 10 c. water. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. water 2 c. sugar 1 qt. ginger ale 1 pkg. Kool-Aid (any flavor) 1/2 c. lemon juice 2 c. pineapple juice 10 c. water. Recipe: Make a syrup of the 1 cup of water and 2 cups of sugar. Cook until sugar is dissolved. Add the remaining ingredients. Makes about 30 cups.

title: Scalloped Corn
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 c. onions chopped 2 Tbsp. butter 2 Tbsp. flour 1 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. paprika dash of black pepper 3/4 c. milk 1 can whole kernel corn 1 egg slightly beaten breadcrumbs. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 c. onions chopped 2 Tbsp. butter 2 Tbsp. flour 1 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. paprika dash of black pepper 3/4 c. milk 1 can whole kernel corn 1 egg slightly beaten breadcrumbs. Recipe: Heat oven to 350\u00b0. Saute onion in butter until golden. Blend in flour and seasonings; cook until bubbly. Remove from heat. Add milk gradually stirring as you add. Bring to a boil and cook 1 minute; stir constantly. Remove from heat and add corn and egg. Place in baking dish. Top with breadcrumbs. Bake for 30 minutes.

title: Becky'S Punch
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 pkg. black cherry or cherry Kool-Aid 1 small box Jell-O (same flavor) 2 qts. warm water 1 can pineapple juice 1 can frozen lemonade 1 cup sugar 2 liters 7-up. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 pkg. black cherry or cherry Kool-Aid 1 small box Jell-O (same flavor) 2 qts. warm water 1 can pineapple juice 1 can frozen lemonade 1 cup sugar 2 liters 7-up. Recipe: Mix the Kool-Aid Jell-O and water together. Add sugar lemonade and pineapple juice. Stir well and freeze. Thaw one hour before serving and add 2 liters of soda.

title: Chicken Saltimbocca
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 whole large chicken breasts skinned boned and halved lengthwise 6 thin slices boiled ham 6 slices process Swiss cheese 1 medium tomato peeled seeded and chopped crushed dried sage 1/3 c. fine dry bread crumbs 2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese 2 Tbsp. snipped parsley 1/4 c. butter melted. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 whole large chicken breasts skinned boned and halved lengthwise 6 thin slices boiled ham 6 slices process Swiss cheese 1 medium tomato peeled seeded and chopped crushed dried sage 1/3 c. fine dry bread crumbs 2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese 2 Tbsp. snipped parsley 1/4 c. butter melted. Recipe: Place chicken boned side up between two pieces clear plastic wrap. Working out from the center pound each lightly with meat mallet to 5 1/2 x 5 1/2 inches. Remove wrap. Place a ham slice and a cheese slice on each cutlet cutting to fit within 1/4 inch of edges. Top with some tomato; sprinkle lightly with sage. Fold in sides; roll up jelly roll fashion pressing to seal well. Combine crumbs Parmesan and parsley. Dip chicken in butter then roll in crumbs. Bake in shallow baking pan at 350\u00b0 for 40 to 45 minutes. Remove to platter. Blend mixture remaining in pan until smooth; serve over chicken. Serves 6.

title: Toll House Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. shortening 3/4 c. brown sugar 3/4 c. white sugar 1 1/2 c. sifted flour 1 tsp. soda 2 eggs beaten 1 tsp. hot water 1 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. salt 2 c. oatmeal 1 c. chopped nuts 1 pkg. Toll House chocolate chips or butterscotch chips. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. shortening 3/4 c. brown sugar 3/4 c. white sugar 1 1/2 c. sifted flour 1 tsp. soda 2 eggs beaten 1 tsp. hot water 1 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. salt 2 c. oatmeal 1 c. chopped nuts 1 pkg. Toll House chocolate chips or butterscotch chips. Recipe: Mix together shortening brown sugar and white sugar. Sift and add flour soda eggs hot water vanilla and salt. Add oatmeal nuts chocolate\tchips or butterscotch chips. Drop by teaspoonful on cookie sheet. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 to 15 minutes.

title: Chicken Tortilla Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 12 tortillas 1 chicken cooked and boned 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 c. sour cream 1 c. picante sauce onion to taste Cheddar cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 12 tortillas 1 chicken cooked and boned 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 c. sour cream 1 c. picante sauce onion to taste Cheddar cheese. Recipe: Combine soups sour cream picante sauce and onion. Heat to almost boiling. Grease 9 x 9-inch baking pan. Break tortillas into pieces. Line pan with half of the tortillas. Spread half of chicken on tortillas and pour half of soup mixture over top. Repeat layers with remaining ingredients and top with cheese. Bake in 350\u00b0 oven for 30 to 40 minutes.

title: Chop Suey
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 to 1 1/2 lb. stew meat 1 can mushrooms 1 large can chop suey vegetables 1 medium onion 1 c. soy sauce. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 to 1 1/2 lb. stew meat 1 can mushrooms 1 large can chop suey vegetables 1 medium onion 1 c. soy sauce. Recipe: Brown meat and cook until tender 2 to 2 1/2 hours. Add mushroom and onions. Cook until onions are done. Add 6 to 8 cups water soy sauce and vegetables. Thicken with cornstarch in a mixture of 1/2 water and 1/2 soy sauce. Serve over rice or noodles.

title: Vegetable Pizza
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) pkg. crescent rolls 2 (8 oz. each) pkg. cream cheese softened 1 c. mayonnaise 1/2 (10 oz.) pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch mix 4 c. finely chopped raw vegetables (cauliflower broccoli carrots green onions etc.). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) pkg. crescent rolls 2 (8 oz. each) pkg. cream cheese softened 1 c. mayonnaise 1/2 (10 oz.) pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch mix 4 c. finely chopped raw vegetables (cauliflower broccoli carrots green onions etc.). Recipe: Press crescent rolls flat on baking sheet. Do not separate rolls. Bake according to package directions until golden brown. In a medium bowl combine cream cheese mayonnaise and dressing mix. Spread mixture on cooled crescent rolls. Top with finely chopped vegetables spreading evenly to cover rolls. Chill until firm. (Best made a day ahead.) Serves 12 to 15.

title: Log Cabin Toast
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/4 c. sugar 2 tsp. cinnamon 2 slices white or whole wheat bread soft margarine or butter. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/4 c. sugar 2 tsp. cinnamon 2 slices white or whole wheat bread soft margarine or butter. Recipe: Mix sugar and cinnamon in custard cup. Toast bread. Spread with soft margarine. Sprinkle with sugar-cinnamon mixture. Cut each slice of toast into 4 strips. Put them together on plate like stacked logs to make the wall of a log cabin. Start from the top and eat all the logs.

title: Yum Yum Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can cherry pie filling 1 large can drained crushed pineapple 1 can Borden milk 3/4 c. chopped pecans 1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can cherry pie filling 1 large can drained crushed pineapple 1 can Borden milk 3/4 c. chopped pecans 1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip. Recipe: Mix together and let stand overnight in refrigerator.

title: My Caramel Rolls
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 pkg. yeast 1/2 cup sugar 2 cups warm water 2 eggs 3 Tbsp. oleo 1 tsp. salt 6-7 cups flour. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 pkg. yeast 1/2 cup sugar 2 cups warm water 2 eggs 3 Tbsp. oleo 1 tsp. salt 6-7 cups flour. Recipe: Combine first four ingredients and beat with electric mixer until light and fluffy. Add remaining ingredients stirring well. Let rise once. While it rises prepare the caramel.

title: Spanish Hamburger #1
ingredients: Ingredients: 6 lb. hamburger salt and pepper 1 medium white onion 1/2 green pepper 1 stalk celery 1 (20 oz.) can tomato soup. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 6 lb. hamburger salt and pepper 1 medium white onion 1/2 green pepper 1 stalk celery 1 (20 oz.) can tomato soup. Recipe: Fry hamburger half done. Cut onion green pepper and celery in fine pieces and add. Let simmer 1/2 hour. Add salt and pepper then add tomato soup. Simmer 2 hours. Keep steam in for best results.

title: Turkey Vegetable Stir-Fry
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 Tbsp. cornstarch 2 Tbsp. soy sauce 1/4 tsp. ground ginger 1 (10 1/2 oz.) can chicken broth 1 carrot cut into julienne strips 2 Tbsp. vegetable oil 2 c. sliced mushrooms 4 green onions minced 1 stalk celery diagonally sliced 1 (6 oz.) pkg. snow peas thawed 2 c. coarsely chopped cooked turkey breast 2 c. brown rice cooked 2 Tbsp. slivered almonds toasted. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 Tbsp. cornstarch 2 Tbsp. soy sauce 1/4 tsp. ground ginger 1 (10 1/2 oz.) can chicken broth 1 carrot cut into julienne strips 2 Tbsp. vegetable oil 2 c. sliced mushrooms 4 green onions minced 1 stalk celery diagonally sliced 1 (6 oz.) pkg. snow peas thawed 2 c. coarsely chopped cooked turkey breast 2 c. brown rice cooked 2 Tbsp. slivered almonds toasted. Recipe: Combine cornstarch ginger chicken broth and soy sauce in a 2-cup glass measure. Stir well. Microwave uncovered at High for 2 to 3 minutes or until thickened stirring every 30 seconds. Set aside.

title: Mango With Tomatoes And Scallions Or Leeks
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 large mango or 2 small 2 medium tomatoes 1 large leek or 2 scallions (green onions) lemon juice with pulp 2 tsp. safflower oil pinch of dry mustard. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 large mango or 2 small 2 medium tomatoes 1 large leek or 2 scallions (green onions) lemon juice with pulp 2 tsp. safflower oil pinch of dry mustard. Recipe: Slice mango chunk tomatoes and slice leek; toss well. Whisk together the lemon juice and pulp safflower oil and dry mustard; pour over mango mixture. Toss well. Serve chilled or at room temperature.

title: Vegetable Pizza
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 cans crescent rolls 2 large pkg. cream cheese softened 1/2 c. mayo (not Miracle Whip) 1/2 c. Ranch dressing. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 cans crescent rolls 2 large pkg. cream cheese softened 1/2 c. mayo (not Miracle Whip) 1/2 c. Ranch dressing. Recipe: Spread crescent rolls flat bake and cut.

title: Luau
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 lb. pork sausage 2 c. white Minute rice 1 green pepper chopped fine 2 large onions chopped fine 1 bunch celery chopped fine 3 1/2 oz. chopped almonds 2 dry packs Lipton noodle soup. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 lb. pork sausage 2 c. white Minute rice 1 green pepper chopped fine 2 large onions chopped fine 1 bunch celery chopped fine 3 1/2 oz. chopped almonds 2 dry packs Lipton noodle soup. Recipe: Brown sausage. Remove sausage and cook the pepper onions and celery in as little grease as possible. Boil 7 cups water. In boiling water put soup rice and almonds. Don't cook. Immediately stir all ingredients together. Cover and bake at 350\u00b0 for 40 to 45 minutes. Stir once or twice while baking. Serves 10 to 12.

title: Ma'S Dill Pickles
ingredients: Ingredients: 7 c. water 3 c. vinegar 1/2 c. salt 1/2 c. sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 7 c. water 3 c. vinegar 1/2 c. salt 1/2 c. sugar. Recipe: Pack dills and cukes in jar. Boil brine and pour over hot and seal.

title: Stir-Fried Gumbo
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 to 4 c. okra salt and pepper flour oil 2 c. ground beef chicken breast or ham 3/4 c. green bell peppers sliced 1 small jalapeno pepper chopped (optional) 1 medium onion sliced thin 1 medium carrot or 3/4 c. thinly sliced 3/4 stick butter 1 can stewed tomatoes salt and pepper to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 to 4 c. okra salt and pepper flour oil 2 c. ground beef chicken breast or ham 3/4 c. green bell peppers sliced 1 small jalapeno pepper chopped (optional) 1 medium onion sliced thin 1 medium carrot or 3/4 c. thinly sliced 3/4 stick butter 1 can stewed tomatoes salt and pepper to taste. Recipe: In a large skillet melt butter and saute bell peppers jalapeno onion and carrot; cook until onion is clear. Add the stewed tomatoes; stir and cook about 5 minutes. Add 3/4 cup water stirring until mixture boils. Add meat stirring well.

title: No Bake Chocolate Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. sugar 1/3 c. cocoa 1/2 c. milk 1 stick oleo 1 tsp. vanilla 1/2 c. peanut butter 3 c. quick oats. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. sugar 1/3 c. cocoa 1/2 c. milk 1 stick oleo 1 tsp. vanilla 1/2 c. peanut butter 3 c. quick oats. Recipe: Mix sugar cocoa milk and oleo in a saucepan. Bring to a boil and boil for 1 minute. Remove from stove and add remaining ingredients. Stir well. Drop by teaspoon on wax paper. Makes 4 to 5 dozen.

title: Carrot Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. flour sifted 1 tsp. soda 1 tsp. salt 2 c. sugar 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 1/2 c. oil 4 eggs 2 c. grated carrots 1 c. nuts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. flour sifted 1 tsp. soda 1 tsp. salt 2 c. sugar 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 1/2 c. oil 4 eggs 2 c. grated carrots 1 c. nuts. Recipe: Place dry ingredients in a large bowl and mix thoroughly. Add rest of ingredients and mix well. Bake in well-greased and floured pans. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes. Remove from pans and cool. Makes 2 (9-inch) or 3 (8-inch) layers.

title: No Fat Rice And Vegetable Dish
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. rice cooked 1/2 c. summer squash sliced 1/2 c. zucchini sliced 1/4 c. onions chopped 1/2 c. mushrooms sliced 1/2 c. fresh tomato chopped 1 tsp. garlic chopped 1/2 tsp. basil lemon pepper and salt to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. rice cooked 1/2 c. summer squash sliced 1/2 c. zucchini sliced 1/4 c. onions chopped 1/2 c. mushrooms sliced 1/2 c. fresh tomato chopped 1 tsp. garlic chopped 1/2 tsp. basil lemon pepper and salt to taste. Recipe: Spray skillet with vegetable spray and saute squash and onion until tender. Add mushrooms tomatoes and seasonings. Cook 5 minutes. Mix with cooked rice.

title: Oyster Fritters
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. flour 2 tsp. baking powder 1/2 tsp. baking soda 3 eggs 1/4 c. buttermilk salt to taste 1 pt. oysters (reserve juice). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. flour 2 tsp. baking powder 1/2 tsp. baking soda 3 eggs 1/4 c. buttermilk salt to taste 1 pt. oysters (reserve juice). Recipe: Sift flour baking powder and baking soda. Beat eggs well. Add buttermilk and salt and beat again. Then mix in dry ingredients and oyster juice. Add oysters and stir to coat. Deep fry at 350\u00b0.

title: Quick Coffee Cake(Double Recipe)
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. flour 6 tsp. baking powder 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 c. sugar 1 tsp. salt 2 beaten eggs 1 c. milk 1/2 c. melted oleo or butter. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. flour 6 tsp. baking powder 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 c. sugar 1 tsp. salt 2 beaten eggs 1 c. milk 1/2 c. melted oleo or butter. Recipe: Mix all together. Spread in a 13 x 9-inch pan or two 8-inch pans. Sprinkle top thickly with sugar and cinnamon (is good with chopped nuts). Bake at 375\u00b0 for 15 to 21 minutes.

title: Belly Buttons
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 box crust mix flour butter or margarine softened brown sugar cinnamon. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 box crust mix flour butter or margarine softened brown sugar cinnamon. Recipe: Preheat oven to 400\u00b0. Follow directions for pie crust mix. Roll out pie crust on a flat floured surface. Butter crust with butter or margarine. Sprinkle on brown sugar until it covers pie crust then sprinkle cinnamon over brown sugar. Roll crust like a long thin cinnamon roll. Cut sections 1-inch thick. Place sections on a buttered 13 x 9-inch casserole dish in an upright position so that the swirls are showing on both sides. Bake 15 minutes. Let cool 3 minutes and enjoy.

title: Tater Tot Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground lean beef 1 large onion chopped 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 can mixed vegetables (partially drained) Tater Tots as needed. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground lean beef 1 large onion chopped 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 can mixed vegetables (partially drained) Tater Tots as needed. Recipe: Sear meat and onion until browned; add mixed vegetables and soup and mix well. Turn into buttered casserole dish and top with Tater Tots. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes.

title: Cheesy Cornbread
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 slices bacon 1 (16 oz.) pkg. cornbread mix 2 eggs beaten 1 (15 oz.) can cream-style corn 3/4 c. Kraft mayonnaise 1 c. (4 oz.) shredded Swiss or Cheddar cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 slices bacon 1 (16 oz.) pkg. cornbread mix 2 eggs beaten 1 (15 oz.) can cream-style corn 3/4 c. Kraft mayonnaise 1 c. (4 oz.) shredded Swiss or Cheddar cheese. Recipe: Cook bacon in an 8-inch cast-iron skillet until crisp. Remove bacon reserving 2 tablespoons drippings. Heat skillet with drippings in a 425\u00b0 oven for 5 minutes. Combine crumbled bacon and cornbread mix and remaining 4 ingredients stirring just until dry ingredients are moistened. Remove skillet from oven. Pour mixture into skillet. Bake at 425\u00b0 for 30 to 35 minutes or until golden brown.

title: Rice Crispy Chicken
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 c. Rice Krispies 1 tsp. paprika 1 egg 3/4 c. milk 3/4 c. all-purpose flour 1 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 tsp. poultry seasoning 3 Tbsp. margarine melted 3 lb. frying chicken pieces cleaned and patted dry. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 c. Rice Krispies 1 tsp. paprika 1 egg 3/4 c. milk 3/4 c. all-purpose flour 1 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 tsp. poultry seasoning 3 Tbsp. margarine melted 3 lb. frying chicken pieces cleaned and patted dry. Recipe: Measure Rice Krispies cereal; crush to 2 cups. Place in shallow dish. Stir in paprika. Set aside.

title: No-Fat Added Oven Fried Chicken
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 skinless boneless chicken breast halves (about 3 oz. each) vegetable cooking spray 3 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese 1/2 c. dry bread crumbs 1 tsp. dried thyme 1/4 tsp. garlic powder 1/4 tsp. onion powder 1/4 tsp. ground black pepper 1/4 tsp. salt (optional) 3/4 c. nonfat buttermilk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 skinless boneless chicken breast halves (about 3 oz. each) vegetable cooking spray 3 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese 1/2 c. dry bread crumbs 1 tsp. dried thyme 1/4 tsp. garlic powder 1/4 tsp. onion powder 1/4 tsp. ground black pepper 1/4 tsp. salt (optional) 3/4 c. nonfat buttermilk. Recipe: Heat oven to 350\u00b0. Rinse chicken with cold running water; blot dry with paper towels. Coat nonstick baking sheet with vegetable cooking spray.

title: Sauerkraut Salad
