ingredients: Ingredients: 1 qt. sauerkraut drained 1 c. green bell pepper chopped 1 c. celery chopped 1 (4 oz.) jar pimento 1 medium onion chopped 1/2 c. vinegar 1 1/2 c. sugar 2 Tbsp. oil. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 qt. sauerkraut drained 1 c. green bell pepper chopped 1 c. celery chopped 1 (4 oz.) jar pimento 1 medium onion chopped 1/2 c. vinegar 1 1/2 c. sugar 2 Tbsp. oil. Recipe: Mix sauerkraut green bell pepper celery pimento and onion together.

title: Sour Cream Meat Loaf
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 lb. ground lean beef 1 1/2 c. grated raw carrot 1/4 c. grated unpeeled apple 1 1/2 c. grated raw potato 1 onion quartered and studded with 4 cloves 6 slices fried bacon crumbled 2 beaten eggs 2 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. pepper 1/8 tsp. nutmeg 1/8 tsp. dry mustard 2 c. sour cream. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 lb. ground lean beef 1 1/2 c. grated raw carrot 1/4 c. grated unpeeled apple 1 1/2 c. grated raw potato 1 onion quartered and studded with 4 cloves 6 slices fried bacon crumbled 2 beaten eggs 2 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. pepper 1/8 tsp. nutmeg 1/8 tsp. dry mustard 2 c. sour cream. Recipe: Combine all ingredients in large mixing bowl; blend well. Pack in a 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 1/2 to 1 3/4 hours. Serves 6.

title: Stuffed Chicken Breast
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 box Stove Top stuffing or homemade stuffing 1 medium green pepper (optional) 1/4 c. hot water 1 can cream of mushroom soup 8 boneless chicken breasts garlic salt pepper paprika. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 box Stove Top stuffing or homemade stuffing 1 medium green pepper (optional) 1/4 c. hot water 1 can cream of mushroom soup 8 boneless chicken breasts garlic salt pepper paprika. Recipe: Preheat oven to 375\u00b0. Cook stuffing as directed on package. Slice green pepper in small strips then cut strips in half. Mix water and soup in a bowl.

title: Meg'S Power Peanut Butter Balls
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 c. graham cracker crumbs 1 c. crunchy peanut butter 1 box confectioners sugar 2 sticks butter or margarine 2 oz. paraffin chocolate chips. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 c. graham cracker crumbs 1 c. crunchy peanut butter 1 box confectioners sugar 2 sticks butter or margarine 2 oz. paraffin chocolate chips. Recipe: Melt butter and pour over the graham cracker crumbs confectioners sugar and peanut butter. Mix well and shape into bite size balls. Melt chocolate chips in double boiler with the paraffin. Dip the peanut butter balls in the chocolate and place on a greased cookie sheet. Mmmmmmm good!

title: Indian Meat Loaf
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1/2 lb. ground pork 1 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1/2 tsp. sage 1 egg beaten 1/2 c. corn meal 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/4 c. diced green pepper 1/2 c. cream-style corn 1 1/4 c. canned tomatoes. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1/2 lb. ground pork 1 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1/2 tsp. sage 1 egg beaten 1/2 c. corn meal 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/4 c. diced green pepper 1/2 c. cream-style corn 1 1/4 c. canned tomatoes. Recipe: Combine beef pork and seasonings. Mix well. Add remaining ingredients. Place in a loaf pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 1/2 hours.

title: Creamy Cheese Crab Dip
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) and 1 (3 oz.) pkg. Philadelphia cream cheese 1/2 c. white wine 1 lb. crabmeat 1/8 tsp. garlic powder. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) and 1 (3 oz.) pkg. Philadelphia cream cheese 1/2 c. white wine 1 lb. crabmeat 1/8 tsp. garlic powder. Recipe: Mix the cream cheese wine and garlic powder. Add the crabmeat. Bake in a casserole at 350\u00b0 for about 20 minutes. Serve with crackers or toast rounds.

title: Skillet Beef And Macaroni
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 to 1 1/2 lb. ground beef 1/2 c. chopped onion 2 cans (8 oz.) tomato sauce 1 c. water 1 (7 oz.) pkg. macaroni 1/2 c. chopped green pepper 2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce 1 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 1/2 Tbsp. chili powder. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 to 1 1/2 lb. ground beef 1/2 c. chopped onion 2 cans (8 oz.) tomato sauce 1 c. water 1 (7 oz.) pkg. macaroni 1/2 c. chopped green pepper 2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce 1 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 1/2 Tbsp. chili powder. Recipe: In a skillet cook beef and onion until the meat is browned and onion is tender. Drain. Stir in the remaining ingredients; bring to boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer until macaroni is tender about 20 minutes. Stir occasionally adding additional water if needed. Yields 4 to 6 servings.

title: Jiffy Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1 pkg. dry onion soup mix 1/2 tsp. ginger 3 c. medium noodles 1 (3 oz.) can sliced mushrooms 3 c. hot water 2 Tbsp. flour 1 c. sour cream. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1 pkg. dry onion soup mix 1/2 tsp. ginger 3 c. medium noodles 1 (3 oz.) can sliced mushrooms 3 c. hot water 2 Tbsp. flour 1 c. sour cream. Recipe: Brown meat. Sprinkle onion soup mix and ginger over meat. Arrange layer of noodles over meat and add mushrooms. Pour water over noodles. Cook on low 20 minutes. Blend flour into sour cream and add to stroganoff. Cook 3 minutes.

title: Baked Cheese Sandwiches
ingredients: Ingredients: 5 eggs 3 c. milk 1 tsp. mustard bread cheese slices. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 5 eggs 3 c. milk 1 tsp. mustard bread cheese slices. Recipe: Make 4 cheese sandwiches (with 2 slices of American cheese in each sandwich). Remove crusts and arrange in baking dish. Mix eggs milk and dry mustard and pour over sandwiches. Bake in 400\u00b0 oven for 20 minutes or until brown on top.

title: Teresa'S Brisket
ingredients: Ingredients: garlic onion celery powder minced onion bottle of liquid smoke brisket Worcestershire sauce black pepper. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: garlic onion celery powder minced onion bottle of liquid smoke brisket Worcestershire sauce black pepper. Recipe: Cover with all ingredients and refrigerate overnight in a 13 x 9-inch pan. Next morning add 1 bottle Worcestershire sauce and black pepper. Bake in 275\u00b0 oven for 6 to 8 hours. Cover with barbecue sauce.

title: Heavenly Rice
ingredients: Ingredients: 3/4 c. rice (without salt) 1 small can pineapple drained sugar to taste 1 c. cream whipped miniature marshmallows. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3/4 c. rice (without salt) 1 small can pineapple drained sugar to taste 1 c. cream whipped miniature marshmallows. Recipe: Cook rice. Drain off excess water. While hot mix in drained pineapple. Add sugar to taste. Let set until cold. Whip the cream and fold into rice. Add a few marshmallows if you like.

title: Baked Salmon Loaf
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (1 lb.) can salmon 1/2 c. chopped celery 1/4 c. chopped onion 1/4 lb. chopped fresh mushrooms 1/4 c. evaporated skim milk 2 egg whites or egg substitute to equal 1 egg 1 c. bread crumbs or oat bran cereal. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (1 lb.) can salmon 1/2 c. chopped celery 1/4 c. chopped onion 1/4 lb. chopped fresh mushrooms 1/4 c. evaporated skim milk 2 egg whites or egg substitute to equal 1 egg 1 c. bread crumbs or oat bran cereal. Recipe: You may add 1 1/2 tablespoons dill weed (fresh if possible); I don't.

title: Favorite Vegetable Soup(Low-Fat)
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/4 c. diced onion 2 packets instant chicken broth and seasoning mix 2 garlic cloves minced 1 1/2 c. thinly sliced zucchini 1/2 c. each thinly sliced carrots and chopped seeded tomato 1 tsp. chopped fresh parsley 1/4 tsp. basil leaves 1/8 tsp. pepper. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/4 c. diced onion 2 packets instant chicken broth and seasoning mix 2 garlic cloves minced 1 1/2 c. thinly sliced zucchini 1/2 c. each thinly sliced carrots and chopped seeded tomato 1 tsp. chopped fresh parsley 1/4 tsp. basil leaves 1/8 tsp. pepper. Recipe: In 1 1/2-quart nonstick saucepan combine onion broth mix and garlic; cook stirring occasionally until onion is translucent. Add remaining ingredients and stir to combine; cover and cook over low heat stirring occasionally for about 10 minutes. Add 2 cups water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium cover and cook until vegetables are soft about 20 minutes. Using a slotted spoon remove about 1/2 cup vegetables from saucepan and set aside. In blender container in 2 batches puree remaining soup; return pureed mixture to saucepan add reserved vegetables and heat. Makes 2 servings.

title: Sour Cream Lasagna
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) pkg. egg dumpling noodles 1 1/2 lb. ground beef 1 tsp. salt dash of pepper 1/4 tsp. garlic salt 1/4 tsp. liquid smoke 1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce 1 Tbsp. brown sugar 1 c. cottage cheese 1 (12 oz.) carton sour cream 6 green onions chopped 3/4 c. grated Cheddar cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) pkg. egg dumpling noodles 1 1/2 lb. ground beef 1 tsp. salt dash of pepper 1/4 tsp. garlic salt 1/4 tsp. liquid smoke 1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce 1 Tbsp. brown sugar 1 c. cottage cheese 1 (12 oz.) carton sour cream 6 green onions chopped 3/4 c. grated Cheddar cheese. Recipe: Cook noodles according to package directions; rinse and drain. Brown hamburger in skillet. Add next 6 ingredients; mix well. Cook for 5 minutes; remove from heat. Combine noodles with cottage cheese sour cream and green onions. Alternate layers of noodle mixture and meat mixture in 2-quart baking dish ending with meat mixture. Top with Cheddar cheese. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes or until heated through.

title: Tater Tot Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 3/4 to 1 lb. ground beef or turkey 1 small onion chopped (optional) 1 can cream soup (celery mushroom or chicken) 1 can whole kernel corn drained 1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese frozen Tater Tots (I use Schwan's Quik Taters). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3/4 to 1 lb. ground beef or turkey 1 small onion chopped (optional) 1 can cream soup (celery mushroom or chicken) 1 can whole kernel corn drained 1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese frozen Tater Tots (I use Schwan's Quik Taters). Recipe: Lightly brown ground meat and onion. Drain off fat. Spread in bottom of casserole dish. Mix cream soup with 1/2 can milk. Spread corn over meat and soup over corn. Don't stir. Sprinkle cheese over soup. Cover top with frozen Tater Tots. Bake at 325\u00b0 covered about 30 to 40 minutes or longer if potatoes are not done.

title: Earthquake Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. chopped pecans 1 1/2 c. shredded coconut 1 box German chocolate cake mix 1/2 c. oleo or margarine 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 3 c. 4x sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. chopped pecans 1 1/2 c. shredded coconut 1 box German chocolate cake mix 1/2 c. oleo or margarine 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 3 c. 4x sugar. Recipe: Prepare cake mix according to package directions. Grease 9 x 13-inch pan. Combine pecans and coconut; sprinkle in bottom of pan. Pour prepared cake mix over pecan and coconut mixture.

title: Raw Gluten
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 lb. whole wheat flour 1 qt. water. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 lb. whole wheat flour 1 qt. water. Recipe: Mix whole wheat flour with water into a firm texture. Make sure all flour is mixed well (medium to firm dough). Let set for 45 minutes (no less). Put dough in a colander and while running cold water continually squeeze dough to wash out starch from mixture. Continue to squeeze dough while at the same time making sure dough stays firmly together. Keep rinsing until all graininess is removed and water is clear from rinsing. Cover with water until ready to use. Yield: 1 pound.

title: Lemon Chicken And Zucchini
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. chicken breasts and thighs 1/4 c. chicken broth 1 Tbsp. cornstarch 2 Tbsp. soy sauce 1 tsp. sugar 2 Tbsp. cooking oil 1 tsp. grated ginger root 3 1/2 c. sliced zucchini 2 Tbsp. lemon juice. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. chicken breasts and thighs 1/4 c. chicken broth 1 Tbsp. cornstarch 2 Tbsp. soy sauce 1 tsp. sugar 2 Tbsp. cooking oil 1 tsp. grated ginger root 3 1/2 c. sliced zucchini 2 Tbsp. lemon juice. Recipe: Skin split and bone chicken breasts. Skin and bone thighs. Cut chicken into 1-inch pieces. Blend chicken broth into cornstarch; stir in soy sauce and sugar. Set aside.

title: Meat Balls
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 lb. ground beef 10 oz. jar sweet relish 2 tsp. garlic powder 1/2 c. minced onions 1/2 tsp. onion salt 1 egg 1 box barbecue Shake 'N Bake. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 lb. ground beef 10 oz. jar sweet relish 2 tsp. garlic powder 1/2 c. minced onions 1/2 tsp. onion salt 1 egg 1 box barbecue Shake 'N Bake. Recipe: Mix beef sweet relish garlic powder onion powder onion salt and egg. Form into balls. Put into bag of Shake 'N Bake. Cover good. Cook at 350\u00b0 for 30 to 40 minutes.

title: Butternut Chewies
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 c. margarine melted 2 eggs 2 c. light brown sugar 1 tsp. vanilla 1 1/2 c. flour 2 tsp. baking powder 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. chopped nuts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 c. margarine melted 2 eggs 2 c. light brown sugar 1 tsp. vanilla 1 1/2 c. flour 2 tsp. baking powder 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. chopped nuts. Recipe: Beat eggs until light and foamy. Beat in sugar vanilla and margarine until creamy. Combine flour baking powder and salt. Add to egg mixture. Mix until blended. Stir in nuts. Mixture will be stiff. Spread in 13 x 9-inch greased pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes. Makes 2 dozen.

title: Tennessee Tea
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 c. Country Time Lemonade 1/2 c. Instant Tea (not lemon flavored) 1 c. white grape juice. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 c. Country Time Lemonade 1/2 c. Instant Tea (not lemon flavored) 1 c. white grape juice. Recipe: Put all ingredients in gallon pitcher. Finish filling with water. Stir. Chill or serve over ice.

title: Apple Waldorf Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 Granny Smith apple 1 red Delicious apple 1/2 c. celery chopped 1 Tbsp. pecans 1 Tbsp. lemon juice 1/4 c. nonfat yogurt dash of cinnamon dash of nutmeg. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 Granny Smith apple 1 red Delicious apple 1/2 c. celery chopped 1 Tbsp. pecans 1 Tbsp. lemon juice 1/4 c. nonfat yogurt dash of cinnamon dash of nutmeg. Recipe: Chop apples; do not peel. Sprinkle with lemon juice. Add celery yogurt pecans and spices. Serve on purple cabbage or lettuce leaf. Makes 4 servings. Calories: 61.8. Fat grams: 1.405.

title: Jackie'S Coconut Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 sticks butter 1 c. buttermilk 3 c. sugar 7 oz. can coconut 8 eggs 2 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 sticks butter 1 c. buttermilk 3 c. sugar 7 oz. can coconut 8 eggs 2 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: Melt margarine. Add eggs and sugar to margarine and beat. Add buttermilk and mix thoroughly. Add vanilla and coconut. Mix thoroughly. Pour into 2 deep dish pie shells. Bake at 300\u00b0 for 1 hour.

title: Navy Bean Soup
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 (16 oz.) cans navy beans undrained 1/2 c. diced salt pork (optional) 2 (14 1/2 oz.) cans stewed tomatoes undrained 2 medium potatoes peeled and diced 2 small onions diced 2 carrots diced 1 Tbsp. salt 1/2 tsp. pepper celery salt to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 (16 oz.) cans navy beans undrained 1/2 c. diced salt pork (optional) 2 (14 1/2 oz.) cans stewed tomatoes undrained 2 medium potatoes peeled and diced 2 small onions diced 2 carrots diced 1 Tbsp. salt 1/2 tsp. pepper celery salt to taste. Recipe: Mix all ingredients in a large Dutch oven. Add water if needed to reach your favorite consistency. Cook until vegetables are tender but not mushy! Makes 6 servings.

title: Layered Banana Pineapple Dessert
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. graham cracker crumbs 1/4 c. sugar 1/3 c. margarine or butter melted 3 bananas sliced 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese softened 3 1/2 c. cold milk 2 pkg. vanilla instant pudding and pie filling 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple drained 1 (8 oz.) tub Cool Whip thawed. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. graham cracker crumbs 1/4 c. sugar 1/3 c. margarine or butter melted 3 bananas sliced 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese softened 3 1/2 c. cold milk 2 pkg. vanilla instant pudding and pie filling 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple drained 1 (8 oz.) tub Cool Whip thawed. Recipe: Mix graham cracker crumbs sugar and margarine in a 13 x 9-inch pan. Press evenly onto bottom of pan. Arrange banana slices on crust. Beat cream cheese in large bowl with wire whisk until smooth. Gradually beat in milk. Add pudding mixes. Beat until well blended. Spread evenly over banana slices. Spoon pineapple evenly over pudding mixture. Spread with whipped topping over pineapple. Refrigerate 3 hours or until ready to serve.

title: Scalloped Potatoes
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 large onion sliced thin 1 Tbsp. butter 2 large potatoes sliced thin 2 Tbsp. lemon juice 1 tsp. thyme 1/2 tsp. salt nonstick vegetable cooking spray 1 Tbsp. whole wheat flour 1 c. skim milk 2 Tbsp. bread crumbs. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 large onion sliced thin 1 Tbsp. butter 2 large potatoes sliced thin 2 Tbsp. lemon juice 1 tsp. thyme 1/2 tsp. salt nonstick vegetable cooking spray 1 Tbsp. whole wheat flour 1 c. skim milk 2 Tbsp. bread crumbs. Recipe: Saute the onion in the butter until translucent. Add the potatoes and combine. Add the lemon juice thyme and salt. Mix well.

title: Herb Butter
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/4 lb. Heritage butter room temperature 1 Tbsp. lemon juice 3 Tbsp. fresh herb parsley 3 Tbsp. taragon basil salt and pepper to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/4 lb. Heritage butter room temperature 1 Tbsp. lemon juice 3 Tbsp. fresh herb parsley 3 Tbsp. taragon basil salt and pepper to taste. Recipe: Cream butter and lemon juice. Beat in herbs salt and pepper and chill. Use on corn-on-the-cob or other vegetables.

title: Turnip Greens
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 bucket turnip greens 1 c. bacon grease 1 Tbsp. salt 1/4 tsp. baking soda. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 bucket turnip greens 1 c. bacon grease 1 Tbsp. salt 1/4 tsp. baking soda. Recipe: Wash greens in cold water to remove grit or any dirt. In a large pot filled 3/4 full of water add the bacon grease and salt. Bring to a boil. Add the greens by the handful to the pot letting them have a little time to start to cook down before adding more. When pot is full you will need to poke the greens down for a few minutes as they like to come to the top of the pot and run over. Add 1/4 teaspoon of baking soda to the greens to take the bitterness out. Cook at a boil until greens are tender perhaps a half hour. Drain well. While greens are draining in the colander cut them up using two knives.

title: Bourbon Balls
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 c. (1 stick) butter 1 lb. (1 box) 10x confectioners sugar 4 1/2 tsp. 100 proof bourbon 8 sq. (1 oz. each) semi-sweet chocolate broken into pieces 36 pecan halves. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 c. (1 stick) butter 1 lb. (1 box) 10x confectioners sugar 4 1/2 tsp. 100 proof bourbon 8 sq. (1 oz. each) semi-sweet chocolate broken into pieces 36 pecan halves. Recipe: Beat butter in medium-size bowl until light and fluffy. Beat in gradually 10x confectioners sugar. Slowly beat in bourbon. Chill 1 hour or until mixture is stiff enough to shape. Roll into 1-inch balls. Arrange in single layer on wax paper-lined tray. Chill 1 hour. Melt chocolate in top of double boiler over simmering water. Remove chocolate from heat; cool until a good dipping consistency. Dip bourbon balls with 3-pronged fork halfway into chocolate. Return to wax paper-lined tray. Place pecan half on top of each ball. When all the bourbon balls have been dipped return tray to refrigerator. Chill about 30 minutes or until firm. Makes about 3 dozen.

title: Pinto Beans
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. dry beans 3/4 tsp. ground ginger 3 Tbsp. melted meat drippings 1 1/2 tsp. salt or to taste 1 heaping Tbsp. sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. dry beans 3/4 tsp. ground ginger 3 Tbsp. melted meat drippings 1 1/2 tsp. salt or to taste 1 heaping Tbsp. sugar. Recipe: Look over beans and remove all split beans and gravel (if any). Rinse well. Put into 2 to 3-quart saucepan. Add ginger; bring to boil and cover with lid. Cook until beans have swollen and turned color about 1 hour. Add grease and salt and continue to cook keeping water about 1-inch above beans at all times. When beans begin to get tender add sugar and cook until very tender.

title: Cook While You Sleep Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 egg whites pinch of salt 1 c. chocolate chips 1/4 tsp. cream of tartar 2/3 c. sugar 1 c. chopped nuts coconut (optional). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 egg whites pinch of salt 1 c. chocolate chips 1/4 tsp. cream of tartar 2/3 c. sugar 1 c. chopped nuts coconut (optional). Recipe: Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Beat egg whites until foamy; add salt and cream of tartar. Beat until stiff. Add 2 tablespoons of sugar at a time beating well after each addition. Stir in vanilla chocolate chips nuts and coconut. Drop by teaspoon onto foil lined cookie sheets. Put in the oven and turn off oven immediately. Do not open the door for at least 8 hours. Carefully remove cookies from foil. Makes 40 to 50 cookies.

title: Chili Spaghetti
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. hamburger 1 mango chopped (green pepper) 1 onion chopped 3 cans tomato sauce dash of chili powder. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. hamburger 1 mango chopped (green pepper) 1 onion chopped 3 cans tomato sauce dash of chili powder. Recipe: Fry mango and onion with piece of butter then brown ground beef in same skillet. Pour tomato sauce and chili powder in. Let simmer together about 20 minutes.

title: Cherry Delight
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 small container Cool Whip 1 small can crushed pineapple drained 1 small pkg. cherry jello 1 small container cottage cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 small container Cool Whip 1 small can crushed pineapple drained 1 small pkg. cherry jello 1 small container cottage cheese. Recipe: Into a medium size bowl put in pineapple. Add dry jello. Stir. Then add cottage cheese. Stir and finally add Cool Whip. Stir. Refrigerate.

title: Banana Split Dessert
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. crushed graham crackers 2 c. powdered sugar 2 eggs lightly beaten 1 large can crushed pineapple 1/4 c. crushed nuts butter 1 tsp. vanilla extract firm bananas 2 c. whipped cream maraschino cherries. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. crushed graham crackers 2 c. powdered sugar 2 eggs lightly beaten 1 large can crushed pineapple 1/4 c. crushed nuts butter 1 tsp. vanilla extract firm bananas 2 c. whipped cream maraschino cherries. Recipe: Combine cracker crumbs and 6 tablespoons melted butter mixing well. Press crumb mixture into bottoms of a 13 x 9-inch pan. Combine 1/2 cup butter sugar vanilla and eggs. Beat until fluffy. Spread sugar mixture over crumb layer. Slice bananas lengthwise. Arrange over sugar mixture. Spoon pineapple over bananas. Cover pineapple layer with whipped cream. Sprinkle with nuts. Garnish with cherries. Chill for 6 hours before serving.

title: Strawberry Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 crushed bananas 1 can crushed pineapple 1 small pkg. frozen strawberries or 1 pt. fresh strawberries 2 pkg. strawberry Jell-O 1 c. boiling water 1 carton sour cream. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 crushed bananas 1 can crushed pineapple 1 small pkg. frozen strawberries or 1 pt. fresh strawberries 2 pkg. strawberry Jell-O 1 c. boiling water 1 carton sour cream. Recipe: Add water to Jell-O. Stir to dissolve. Add strawberries bananas and pineapple. Pour half into pan. Let harden.

title: Peanut Butter Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 eggs 1 c. corn syrup 1/2 c. peanut butter 1 tsp. vanilla 1 unbaked 8-inch pie crust. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 eggs 1 c. corn syrup 1/2 c. peanut butter 1 tsp. vanilla 1 unbaked 8-inch pie crust. Recipe: Beat eggs. Mix eggs corn syrup sugar peanut butter and vanilla together. Pour into unbaked pie crust. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 to 60 minutes until top is brown and crisp.

title: Foolproof Fudge
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 (6 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips 1 (14 oz.) can Eagle Brand milk dash of salt 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla 1/2 c. chopped nuts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 (6 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips 1 (14 oz.) can Eagle Brand milk dash of salt 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla 1/2 c. chopped nuts. Recipe: In a heavy saucepan over low heat melt chips with milk. Remove from heat stir in remaining ingredients. Spread evenly in 8-inch square dish. Chill 2 hours before cutting then store at room temperature. Makes 1 3/4 pounds.

title: Hamburger Party Balls
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. hamburger 1/2 c. chopped dill pickles 1/4 c. Carnation cream 2 Tbsp. Shake 'n Bake for chicken 1 onion chopped (optional). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. hamburger 1/2 c. chopped dill pickles 1/4 c. Carnation cream 2 Tbsp. Shake 'n Bake for chicken 1 onion chopped (optional). Recipe: Mix well. Shape into balls. Roll in remainder of Shake 'n Bake and bake in 350\u00b0 oven for 20 to 30 minutes or until done. Toothpicks can be put in balls when done.

title: Pigs In Blanket
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 pkg. cocktail hot dogs 5 cans crescent rolls. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 pkg. cocktail hot dogs 5 cans crescent rolls. Recipe: Wrap wiener rolls around hot dogs and cook as directed on package. Serve warm with mustard. (Can be done ahead of time and warmed in microwave.)

title: Fresh Tomato Salsa
ingredients: Ingredients: 5 medium tomatoes diced 1/3 c. tomato sauce 1/4 c. purple onion finely chopped 3 cloves garlic minced 1 or 2 small jalapeno peppers seeded and minced 2 Tbsp. cilantro 1 tsp. minced oregano 2 Tbsp. lime juice 1 tsp. salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 5 medium tomatoes diced 1/3 c. tomato sauce 1/4 c. purple onion finely chopped 3 cloves garlic minced 1 or 2 small jalapeno peppers seeded and minced 2 Tbsp. cilantro 1 tsp. minced oregano 2 Tbsp. lime juice 1 tsp. salt. Recipe: Combine all ingredients stirring gently; cover and chill.

title: Fresh Apple Cake #2
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. cooking oil 2 eggs 1 tsp. salt 2 tsp. baking powder 1 c. chopped nuts 3 c. raw chopped apples (2 to 3) 1 3/4 c. sugar 2 1/2 c. flour 1 tsp. soda 1 c. coconut 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. cooking oil 2 eggs 1 tsp. salt 2 tsp. baking powder 1 c. chopped nuts 3 c. raw chopped apples (2 to 3) 1 3/4 c. sugar 2 1/2 c. flour 1 tsp. soda 1 c. coconut 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: Mix oil sugar and eggs in bowl. Beat until creamy. Add a little at a time the flour salt soda and baking powder. Add apples nuts coconut and vanilla. Bake for 1 hour in angel food pan at 350\u00b0

title: Pumpkin Pie Dessert
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 1/4 c. crushed butter flavored crackers (about 50) 1/2 c. sugar 3/4 c. melted margarine 2 cups cold milk 2 packages instant vanilla pudding mix 1 can (15 oz.) solid pack pumpkin 1 tsp. pumpkin pie spice 1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon 1/4 tsp. ground ginger 1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg whipped topping chopped peanuts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 1/4 c. crushed butter flavored crackers (about 50) 1/2 c. sugar 3/4 c. melted margarine 2 cups cold milk 2 packages instant vanilla pudding mix 1 can (15 oz.) solid pack pumpkin 1 tsp. pumpkin pie spice 1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon 1/4 tsp. ground ginger 1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg whipped topping chopped peanuts. Recipe: In a bowl combine the cracker crumbs sugar and butter. Press into a greased 9x13 pan. Set aside. In a bowl whisk milk and pudding mix for 2 minutes. Stir in pumpkin and spices. Spread over crust. Refrigerate for 3 hours or until set. Garnish with whipped topping and nuts.

title: Vermicelli Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (12 oz.) vermicelli noodles prepared according to pkg. and rinsed with cold water 1 large jar black olives drained pitted and chopped 5 or 6 green onions chopped 1 large jar pimento drained and diced 1/2 c. Wesson oil or 1/4 c. olive oil and 1/4 c. Wesson oil 2 Tbsp. Tex Joy steak seasoning 4 Tbsp. lemon juice 1/2 to 1 c. mayonnaise. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (12 oz.) vermicelli noodles prepared according to pkg. and rinsed with cold water 1 large jar black olives drained pitted and chopped 5 or 6 green onions chopped 1 large jar pimento drained and diced 1/2 c. Wesson oil or 1/4 c. olive oil and 1/4 c. Wesson oil 2 Tbsp. Tex Joy steak seasoning 4 Tbsp. lemon juice 1/2 to 1 c. mayonnaise. Recipe: Make the night before and refrigerate.

title: Two Potato Bake
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 c. peeled thinly sliced sweet potatoes (about 1 1/4 lb. divided) 4 c. peeled thinly sliced round red potatoes (about 1 1/4 lb. divided) 2 Tbsp. minced fresh onion 3 Tbsp. oleo melted and divided 1/2 tsp. salt divided 3/4 c. skim milk 2 Tbsp. minced fresh parsley 2 Tbsp. grated fresh Parmesan cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 c. peeled thinly sliced sweet potatoes (about 1 1/4 lb. divided) 4 c. peeled thinly sliced round red potatoes (about 1 1/4 lb. divided) 2 Tbsp. minced fresh onion 3 Tbsp. oleo melted and divided 1/2 tsp. salt divided 3/4 c. skim milk 2 Tbsp. minced fresh parsley 2 Tbsp. grated fresh Parmesan cheese. Recipe: Coat an 11 x 13 x 2-inch baking dish with vegetable cooking spray. Layer 2 cups sweet potatoes in half of dish. Layer 2 cups of red potatoes in other half. Sprinkle evenly with onion. Drizzle with 1 1/2 tablespoons of oleo. Sprinkle with 1/4 teaspoon of salt and 1/8 teaspoon of pepper. Repeat procedure with remaining potatoes oleo salt and pepper.

title: Spinach Dip
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 loaves round unsliced sourdough bread 2 boxes frozen chopped spinach (thaw and press all excess liquid from spinach) 1 c. sour cream 1 c. mayonnaise 1 c. chopped green onions 1 pkg. Knorr vegetable soup mix (not instant) or Lipton country vegetable soup mix. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 loaves round unsliced sourdough bread 2 boxes frozen chopped spinach (thaw and press all excess liquid from spinach) 1 c. sour cream 1 c. mayonnaise 1 c. chopped green onions 1 pkg. Knorr vegetable soup mix (not instant) or Lipton country vegetable soup mix. Recipe: You can also add some shrimp or crab meat or both.

title: Scalloped Potatoes
ingredients: Ingredients: 6 c. frozen hash brown potatoes 2 cans cream of chicken soup 1 c. sour cream 2 Tbsp. chopped chives 2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 6 c. frozen hash brown potatoes 2 cans cream of chicken soup 1 c. sour cream 2 Tbsp. chopped chives 2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese. Recipe: Lightly grease a 9 x 13-inch pan. Mix soup sour cream and chives together. Layer in pan the potatoes soup mixture and cheese. Repeat ending with grated cheese on top. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour.

title: Pork Chop Dinner
ingredients: Ingredients: 5 or 6 pork chops sliced potatoes (thick) sliced fresh mushrooms drained (canned mushrooms are okay). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 5 or 6 pork chops sliced potatoes (thick) sliced fresh mushrooms drained (canned mushrooms are okay). Recipe: Layer ingredients in a 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan. Pour envelope of dry onion soup and 2 cups of water over top. (For richer broth add another envelope of onion soup and one more cup of water.) Lay foil over top and bake at 350\u00b0 for 2 hours.

title: Chicken Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 c. cooked chicken 1 c. chopped celery 1 c. cooked rice 3/4 c. mayonnaise 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 Tbsp. lemon juice 3 Tbsp. chopped onion 3 hard-boiled eggs 1 can water chestnuts (optional) 3/4 to 1 stick butter 1/2 c. slivered almonds (optional) 1 c. crushed corn flakes. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 c. cooked chicken 1 c. chopped celery 1 c. cooked rice 3/4 c. mayonnaise 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 Tbsp. lemon juice 3 Tbsp. chopped onion 3 hard-boiled eggs 1 can water chestnuts (optional) 3/4 to 1 stick butter 1/2 c. slivered almonds (optional) 1 c. crushed corn flakes. Recipe: Mix first nine ingredients. Saute 5 minutes butter almonds and corn flakes. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 minutes. Makes 4 to 6 servings.

title: Cabbage And Noodles
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 head cabbage 1 to 2 onions sliced 1/2 pkg. egg noodles 1 stick butter or oleo. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 head cabbage 1 to 2 onions sliced 1/2 pkg. egg noodles 1 stick butter or oleo. Recipe: Cut cabbage and boil until tender. Boil noodles until tender. In a frying pan saute onions in butter. When onions are tender add cabbage and noodles. Keep stirring and adding butter if needed so it doesn't stick. Add salt and pepper to taste.

title: Scalloped Tomatoes(Heart Smart)
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes in juice chopped 2 Tbsp. minced green pepper 2 Tbsp. minced onion 1 garlic clove minced 1 tsp. basil crushed 1/8 tsp. pepper 2 slices stale or day old bread (whole wheat) cut into cubes (1 1/2 c.) 4 tsp. margarine melted. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes in juice chopped 2 Tbsp. minced green pepper 2 Tbsp. minced onion 1 garlic clove minced 1 tsp. basil crushed 1/8 tsp. pepper 2 slices stale or day old bread (whole wheat) cut into cubes (1 1/2 c.) 4 tsp. margarine melted. Recipe: Preheat oven to 375\u00b0. In a 1-quart casserole sprayed with nonstick cooking spray place tomatoes in juice. Stir in green pepper onion garlic basil and pepper. In a small bowl combine bread cubes and margarine; sprinkle over tomatoes. Bake about 30 minutes until hot and bubbly. Makes 4 servings.

title: Hobo Dinner
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/4 lb. hamburger 1 small potato sliced 1/2 carrot sliced 1 slice onion salt and pepper 1 patty of butter. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/4 lb. hamburger 1 small potato sliced 1/2 carrot sliced 1 slice onion salt and pepper 1 patty of butter. Recipe: Shape hamburger into patty. Place vegetables on top of hamburger (which is in the center of a 12-inch square piece of foil). Season with salt pepper and butter. Fold ends of foil in a drugstore wrap. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 1 hour. Serves 1 person.

title: Monkey Bread
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 regular size cans buttermilk biscuits cut into quarters 1 c. granulated sugar 2 tsp. cinnamon in a medium sized plastic bag 1/2 to 3/4 c. pecan pieces 10 to 15 maraschino cherries cut in half 1 1/2 sticks margarine or butter 1 c. brown sugar 1 Tbsp. cinnamon. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 regular size cans buttermilk biscuits cut into quarters 1 c. granulated sugar 2 tsp. cinnamon in a medium sized plastic bag 1/2 to 3/4 c. pecan pieces 10 to 15 maraschino cherries cut in half 1 1/2 sticks margarine or butter 1 c. brown sugar 1 Tbsp. cinnamon. Recipe: Put pecan pieces and maraschino cherries into bundt pan. Add the 1 c. granulated sugar in a plastic bag along with the 2 tsp. cinnamon. Toss a few of the biscuit quarters in the mixture and put into bundt pan. Continue coating all the biscuit pieces. Heat margarine or butter brown sugar and 1 Tbsp. cinnamon. Pour over the biscuits. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 minutes. Cool 15 minutes then turn out onto cake dish. Serve warm.

title: Mixed Up Marinade
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/4 c. A.1. steak sauce 1/4 c. red wine vinegar 2 Tbsp. soy sauce 2 Tbsp. ketchup 1 tsp. garlic salt dash of pepper pinch of onion powder. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/4 c. A.1. steak sauce 1/4 c. red wine vinegar 2 Tbsp. soy sauce 2 Tbsp. ketchup 1 tsp. garlic salt dash of pepper pinch of onion powder. Recipe: Stir all ingredients together. Pour over steaks. Marinate at least 2 hours. Grill or broil steaks as usual.

title: Banana Nut Muffins
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. whole-wheat flour 1 c. chopped walnuts 1/2 c. toasted wheat germ 1/2 c. brown sugar 1 Tbsp. baking powder 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg 2 ripe bananas mashed 3/4 c. milk 5 Tbsp. melted butter 1 egg cinnamon sugar (optional). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. whole-wheat flour 1 c. chopped walnuts 1/2 c. toasted wheat germ 1/2 c. brown sugar 1 Tbsp. baking powder 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg 2 ripe bananas mashed 3/4 c. milk 5 Tbsp. melted butter 1 egg cinnamon sugar (optional). Recipe: Preheat oven to 400\u00b0. Fit 12 muffin cups with paper liners. Coat each with cooking spray. Mix flour walnuts wheat germ brown sugar baking powder cinnamon salt and nutmeg in large bowl. Stir in bananas milk butter and egg. Mix just until blended. Using an ice cream scoop fill muffin cups evenly with batter. Sprinkle with cinnamon sugar if desired. Bake muffins until a skewer inserted into centers comes out clean 20 to 22 minutes. Cool 1 minute then remove from the muffin pan and cool on a wire rack. Makes 1 dozen muffins.

title: Fudge Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 eggs well beaten 1 c. sugar 1 stick butter 1/2 c. flour (self-rising) 2 Tbsp. cocoa pinch of salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 eggs well beaten 1 c. sugar 1 stick butter 1/2 c. flour (self-rising) 2 Tbsp. cocoa pinch of salt. Recipe: Mix all ingredients together and pour into greased and floured pie pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes.

title: Brazilian Coffee Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/3 c. shortening 1/2 c. granulated sugar 1 Tbsp. milk 2 c. flour 1/2 c. brown sugar packed 1 egg 2 Tbsp. powdered instant coffee 1/2 tsp. salt 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla 1/4 tsp. baking soda 1/4 tsp. baking powder. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/3 c. shortening 1/2 c. granulated sugar 1 Tbsp. milk 2 c. flour 1/2 c. brown sugar packed 1 egg 2 Tbsp. powdered instant coffee 1/2 tsp. salt 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla 1/4 tsp. baking soda 1/4 tsp. baking powder. Recipe: Mix shortening sugars egg vanilla and milk until fluffy. Sift dry ingredients together. Add to sugar mixture; mix thoroughly. Shape dough into 1-inch balls. Place 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheet. Flatten to 1/8-inch thickness. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 8 to 10 minutes or until lightly browned.

title: Quick-Energy Pickups
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 or 4 sq. graham crackers 1 c. powdered sugar 1 c. crunchy peanut butter 1 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips 1/2 c. instant nonfat dry milk or 3 Tbsp. milk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 or 4 sq. graham crackers 1 c. powdered sugar 1 c. crunchy peanut butter 1 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips 1/2 c. instant nonfat dry milk or 3 Tbsp. milk. Recipe: Crush graham crackers. Mix remaining ingredients in a bowl. Shape teaspoonfuls of mixture into 1-inch balls. Roll the balls in the graham cracker crumbs until coated. Refrigerate until firm.

title: Chicken With Rice(Arroz Con Pollo)
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (2 1/2 lb.) ready to cook chicken cut up 2 chopped cloves garlic 2 tsp. salt 1 chopped green pepper 1 Tbsp. onion 1/4 c. olives 1 Tbsp. achiote coloring or Bijol 2 c. water or broth 1 c. peas 1/2 tsp. oregano 2 chopped tomatoes 1 chopped onion 1 Tbsp. capers 1 lb. rice 4 pimentos 1 can tomato sauce. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (2 1/2 lb.) ready to cook chicken cut up 2 chopped cloves garlic 2 tsp. salt 1 chopped green pepper 1 Tbsp. onion 1/4 c. olives 1 Tbsp. achiote coloring or Bijol 2 c. water or broth 1 c. peas 1/2 tsp. oregano 2 chopped tomatoes 1 chopped onion 1 Tbsp. capers 1 lb. rice 4 pimentos 1 can tomato sauce. Recipe: Mix salt garlic oregano tomato sauce tomatoes peppers onion achiote olives and capers. Add the chicken and cook for a few minutes. Add the rice and water. Stir and cook until the water has been absorbed then cover until the rice is done. Serve hot. Garnish with strips of pimentos and peas.

title: Puff Pancakes
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 eggs 1/2 c. flour 1/2 c. milk 2 Tbsp. melted butter 1 Tbsp. sugar 1/4 tsp. salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 eggs 1/2 c. flour 1/2 c. milk 2 Tbsp. melted butter 1 Tbsp. sugar 1/4 tsp. salt. Recipe: Preheat oven to 425\u00b0. Grease a 10-inch cast-iron or ovenproof skillet. Beat eggs and add rest of ingredients. Beat until smooth. Pour into skillet and bake 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 350\u00b0 and bake 10 to 15 minutes or until puffy and golden brown. Serve with Vanilla Cream Syrup. Serves 6.

title: Easy Hot Dish
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can Franco-American spaghetti onion and celery chopped 1 can Veg-All mixed vegetables 1 lb. hamburger 1 can cream of chicken soup (not diluted). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can Franco-American spaghetti onion and celery chopped 1 can Veg-All mixed vegetables 1 lb. hamburger 1 can cream of chicken soup (not diluted). Recipe: Brown hamburger with onion and celery. Mix with remaining ingredients. Put in oven dish and bake uncovered until thoroughly heated. Or keep it warm in frying pan on top of stove.

title: Hot Spiced Tea
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/3 c. Tang 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 c. instant tea 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. cloves. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/3 c. Tang 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 c. instant tea 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. cloves. Recipe: Mix together; makes 2 cups.

title: Easy Spaghetti
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) pkg. spaghetti 1 lb. ground beef 4 Tbsp. olive oil 1 medium onion chopped 1 clove garlic chopped 2 Tbsp. chopped parsley 1/2 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper 2 1/4 c. (No. 2 can) tomato juice 1 can tomato paste (2/3 c.) 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce 1 tsp. oregano 1 pkg. spatini 1 Tbsp. brown sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) pkg. spaghetti 1 lb. ground beef 4 Tbsp. olive oil 1 medium onion chopped 1 clove garlic chopped 2 Tbsp. chopped parsley 1/2 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper 2 1/4 c. (No. 2 can) tomato juice 1 can tomato paste (2/3 c.) 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce 1 tsp. oregano 1 pkg. spatini 1 Tbsp. brown sugar. Recipe: Saute onion garlic and parsley in olive oil until soft; add meat and seasonings. Brown lightly. Blend in remaining ingredients and simmer for approximately 1 hour. Makes 4 to 6 servings.

title: Cashew Chicken
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 chicken breast 1 green pepper 1 c. blanched cashews 6 pineapple rings 1 box frozen snow peas 3/4 c. water 1 chicken bouillon cube 1 tsp. cornstarch sherry soy sauce powdered ginger peanut oil. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 chicken breast 1 green pepper 1 c. blanched cashews 6 pineapple rings 1 box frozen snow peas 3/4 c. water 1 chicken bouillon cube 1 tsp. cornstarch sherry soy sauce powdered ginger peanut oil. Recipe: Cut chicken breast into thumb sized cubes; marinate in a soy sauce/sherry mixture for 4 to 6 hours (overnight is better).

title: Corn Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 c. margarine 1 red or green pepper chopped 1 medium onion chopped 1 (17 oz.) can corn 1 (17 oz.) can creamed corn 3 eggs slightly beaten 1 pkg. corn muffin mix 1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 c. margarine 1 red or green pepper chopped 1 medium onion chopped 1 (17 oz.) can corn 1 (17 oz.) can creamed corn 3 eggs slightly beaten 1 pkg. corn muffin mix 1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese. Recipe: Saute the pepper and onion in the margarine. In large bowl combine the can of corn with the liquid the creamed corn the eggs and the muffin mix. Add the pepper and onion mixture and mix well. Pour into a well-greased 2-quart casserole. Top with the grated cheese. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 55 to 65 minutes.

title: Rhubarb Crumble
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. brown sugar 3/4 c. quick rolled oats 1 c. flour 1/2 c. melted butter 1 tsp. cinnamon 4 c. diced rhubarb 1 c. sugar 2 tsp. cornstarch 1 c. water 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. brown sugar 3/4 c. quick rolled oats 1 c. flour 1/2 c. melted butter 1 tsp. cinnamon 4 c. diced rhubarb 1 c. sugar 2 tsp. cornstarch 1 c. water 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: Mix brown sugar oats flour butter and cinnamon. Press 1/2 of mixture into a 9-inch square pan. Cover with rhubarb. Mix sugar and cornstarch together. Add water and vanilla. Cook until thick and clear. (Add 3 drops red coloring.) Pour over rhubarb. Sprinkle remaining brown sugar mixture on top. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour. Top with whipped cream or ice cream.

title: Skillet Pineapple Upside-Down Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/4 c. butter 1 c. brown sugar 8 slices canned pineapple 8 maraschino cherries 3 eggs beaten 1/2 tsp. salt 1 1/2 c. cake flour sifted 1 tsp. vanilla 1 1/2 tsp. baking powder 3/4 c. scalded milk 2 Tbsp. butter 1 1/2 c. sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/4 c. butter 1 c. brown sugar 8 slices canned pineapple 8 maraschino cherries 3 eggs beaten 1/2 tsp. salt 1 1/2 c. cake flour sifted 1 tsp. vanilla 1 1/2 tsp. baking powder 3/4 c. scalded milk 2 Tbsp. butter 1 1/2 c. sugar. Recipe: Melt butter in skillet. Spread brown sugar evenly over butter. Place 1 slice of pineapple in center of the skillet. Arrange other slices around the center slice. Place a cherry in center of each pineapple slice. Cover with the following batter.

title: Kim'S Chicken Alfredo Pizza
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. Ragu light alfredo sauce 1/2 c. green pepper chopped onion 2 jalapenos finely chopped garlic salt pepper (coarse) jerk spice or any spice you prefer dried parsley flakes 2 chicken breasts cooked Mozzarella cheese pizza crust cornmeal. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. Ragu light alfredo sauce 1/2 c. green pepper chopped onion 2 jalapenos finely chopped garlic salt pepper (coarse) jerk spice or any spice you prefer dried parsley flakes 2 chicken breasts cooked Mozzarella cheese pizza crust cornmeal. Recipe: Make pizza crust according to directions. If you use a pizza stone sprinkle with cornmeal before rolling out crust. Cover crust with sauce and all ingredients ending with cheese. Bake at 450\u00b0 for 15 minutes.

title: Don Hill'S Lasagna
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. hamburger meat 1 onion chopped 1 bell pepper chopped garlic to taste 1 (15 1/4 oz.) jar spaghetti sauce salt and pepper to taste 1 (8 oz.) pkg. hearty wide egg noodles 3 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese (12 oz.) 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese 3 c. shredded Cheddar cheese (12 oz.). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. hamburger meat 1 onion chopped 1 bell pepper chopped garlic to taste 1 (15 1/4 oz.) jar spaghetti sauce salt and pepper to taste 1 (8 oz.) pkg. hearty wide egg noodles 3 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese (12 oz.) 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese 3 c. shredded Cheddar cheese (12 oz.). Recipe: Cook hamburger onion and bell pepper until tender and meat is no longer pink. Add garlic spaghetti sauce salt and pepper; set aside. Cook egg noodles in pot until almost tender. Layer casserole dish with half of noodles. Spread half of sauce mixture over noodles. Layer with half of each of the cheeses. Repeat the layering: noodles sauce Mozzarella cheese and Cheddar cheese with Parmesan cheese on top. Bake in oven until brown.

title: Layered Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 head lettuce chopped 1 red onion sliced 1/2 lb. bacon fried crisp and crumbled 1/2 head cauliflower separated into small pieces 1/4 c. sugar 2 c. mayonnaise 1/2 c. Parmesan cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 head lettuce chopped 1 red onion sliced 1/2 lb. bacon fried crisp and crumbled 1/2 head cauliflower separated into small pieces 1/4 c. sugar 2 c. mayonnaise 1/2 c. Parmesan cheese. Recipe: Layer first four ingredients in order shown. Combine sugar mayonnaise and cheese. Put on top. Refrigerate several hours and toss before serving.

title: Apple Cream Coffee Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 c. chopped walnuts 2 tsp. cinnamon 1 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 c. softened butter or margarine 2 eggs 1 tsp. vanilla 2 c. flour 1 tsp. baking powder 1 tsp. baking soda 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. sour cream 1 large apple sliced thinly. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 c. chopped walnuts 2 tsp. cinnamon 1 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 c. softened butter or margarine 2 eggs 1 tsp. vanilla 2 c. flour 1 tsp. baking powder 1 tsp. baking soda 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. sour cream 1 large apple sliced thinly. Recipe: Heat oven to 375\u00b0. Mix in separate bowl 1/2 sugar cinnamon and walnuts. In large bowl mix soft butter or margarine and sugar. Beat until light and fluffy. Add eggs and blend well; add vanilla. Sift together flour baking powder soda and salt. Mix into creamed mixture alternately with sour cream. Spread half mixture into greased 10-inch tube pan. Add sliced apples all around. Sprinkle with half cinnamon mixture. Add rest of batter then top with remaining cinnamon mixture. Bake 45 minutes.

title: Apple Crunch
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 medium apples pared and sliced 1/4 c. packed brown sugar 1/3 c. melted margarine 3/4 c. flour 3/4 c. white sugar 1/4 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. cinnamon 1 egg. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 medium apples pared and sliced 1/4 c. packed brown sugar 1/3 c. melted margarine 3/4 c. flour 3/4 c. white sugar 1/4 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. cinnamon 1 egg. Recipe: Mix apples with brown sugar in baking pan and set aside. Mix flour sugar salt and cinnamon; set aside. Beat egg. Mix with flour mixture. Spread over fruit. Pour margarine over top. Bake at 375\u00b0 for about 45 minutes until lightly browned. Serve warm.

title: Ambrosia
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (20 oz.) can pineapple chunks drained 1 (11 oz.) can mandarin orange segments drained 1 1/2 c. seedless grapes 1 c. miniature marshmallows 1 c. flaked coconut 1/2 c. nuts 3/4 c. sour cream or vanilla yogurt 1 Tbsp. sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (20 oz.) can pineapple chunks drained 1 (11 oz.) can mandarin orange segments drained 1 1/2 c. seedless grapes 1 c. miniature marshmallows 1 c. flaked coconut 1/2 c. nuts 3/4 c. sour cream or vanilla yogurt 1 Tbsp. sugar. Recipe: Combine pineapple oranges grapes marshmallows coconut and nuts. Mix together sour cream and sugar. Stir sour cream mixture into fruit mixture. Chill.

title: Chocolate Covered Cherries
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/3 c. butter 2 c. marshmallow cream dash of salt 1 tsp. almond flavoring 4 c. confectioners sugar sifted 36 maraschino cherries 12 oz. chocolate chips 1/4 cake paraffin (optional). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/3 c. butter 2 c. marshmallow cream dash of salt 1 tsp. almond flavoring 4 c. confectioners sugar sifted 36 maraschino cherries 12 oz. chocolate chips 1/4 cake paraffin (optional). Recipe: Cream butter. Beat in marshmallow cream salt and flavoring. Add confectioners sugar gradually mixing well after each addition. Turn onto waxed paper and knead well. Refrigerate one hour. Drain cherries. Roll in fondant covering completely. Chill balls in refrigerator. Melt chocolate in double boiler. Dip chilled fondant into chocolate and place on waxed paper to set.

title: Pork Medallions
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. lean boneless pork tenderloins thinly sliced 1 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil 3 cloves garlic 1/4 tsp. rosemary 2 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice (fresh) 1/4 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. black pepper. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. lean boneless pork tenderloins thinly sliced 1 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil 3 cloves garlic 1/4 tsp. rosemary 2 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice (fresh) 1/4 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. black pepper. Recipe: Combine olive oil and garlic in blender or food processor. Process then add rosemary and whirl 1 minute more.

title: Coconut Kisses
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 egg whites 2/3 c. sugar 1/2 tsp. vanilla 2 c. cornflakes 1 (3 1/2 oz.) can flaked coconut 1/2 c. pecans chopped. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 egg whites 2/3 c. sugar 1/2 tsp. vanilla 2 c. cornflakes 1 (3 1/2 oz.) can flaked coconut 1/2 c. pecans chopped. Recipe: Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Beat egg whites at high speed until foamy. Gradually add sugar one tablespoon at a time beating until stiff peaks form. Fold in vanilla cereal coconut and nuts. Drop by tablespoon on a foil lined cookie sheet. Place in oven and immediately turn off oven. Do not open door for 8 hours. Carefully peel cookies from foil. Store tightly sealed. Yield: 3 dozen.

title: Lemon Chess Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. sugar 4 eggs 1 Tbsp. flour 1 Tbsp. cornmeal 1/2 c. milk 1/4 c. melted butter 1/2 c. lemon juice. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. sugar 4 eggs 1 Tbsp. flour 1 Tbsp. cornmeal 1/2 c. milk 1/4 c. melted butter 1/2 c. lemon juice. Recipe: Combine sugar and eggs. Toss together flour and cornmeal then add to egg mixture. Add milk gradually then butter and lemon juice. Pour into unbaked pie shell. Bake for 45 minutes at 350\u00b0.

title: Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. butter flavored shortening 1 1/4 c. brown sugar 2 eggs 2 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. baking soda 2 c. (12 oz.) chocolate chips 1 c. chopped nuts 1/2 c. sugar 2 Tbsp. milk 1 3/4 c. flour 2 1/2 c. oatmeal. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. butter flavored shortening 1 1/4 c. brown sugar 2 eggs 2 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. baking soda 2 c. (12 oz.) chocolate chips 1 c. chopped nuts 1/2 c. sugar 2 Tbsp. milk 1 3/4 c. flour 2 1/2 c. oatmeal. Recipe: Beat margarine and sugar until creamy. Add eggs milk and vanilla and beat well. Add flour baking soda and salt. Mix well. On ungreased cookie sheet drop by tablespoonful. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes. Cool one minute before removing from cookie sheet. Cool completely on cooling rack.

title: Dirty Pudding
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 small pkg. Oreo cookies 1 large Cool Whip 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 1 c. powdered sugar 2 (3 oz.) pkg. French vanilla instant pudding mix 3 c. milk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 small pkg. Oreo cookies 1 large Cool Whip 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 1 c. powdered sugar 2 (3 oz.) pkg. French vanilla instant pudding mix 3 c. milk. Recipe: Crush cookies and place half of them in 9 x 13-inch pan. Mix together Cool Whip cream cheese and powdered sugar. Mix pudding and milk in separate bowl. Combine both mixtures and pour over crumbs. Spread remaining crumbs over top. Refrigerate before serving.

title: Pickled Bologna
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 qt. white vinegar 1/2 c. sugar 1 tsp. salt 1 tsp. pickling spice. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 qt. white vinegar 1/2 c. sugar 1 tsp. salt 1 tsp. pickling spice. Recipe: Boil ingredients together for 10 minutes. Remove skin from 2 rings bologna--slice--pack in a glass jar.\tPour hot syrup over meat. Put lid on jar and refrigerate. Ready to use the next day. Can also use small party hotdogs.

title: Nutty Oven Fried Chicken
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. buttermilk biscuit mix 1/3 c. finely chopped pecans 2 tsp. paprika 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning 1/2 tsp. dried sage 1 (2 to 3 lb.) chicken cut up or 6 breasts 1/2 c. evaporated milk 1/3 c. melted margarine. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. buttermilk biscuit mix 1/3 c. finely chopped pecans 2 tsp. paprika 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning 1/2 tsp. dried sage 1 (2 to 3 lb.) chicken cut up or 6 breasts 1/2 c. evaporated milk 1/3 c. melted margarine. Recipe: In shallow mixing dish combine biscuit mix pecans and seasoning. Mix well. Dip chicken in milk. Coat generously with pecan mixture.

title: Wayne'S Cajun Bean Soup
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 potatoes 1 medium onion 1 c. celery 3 cans Northern beans 1 qt. tomatoes 1 or 2 cans tomato soup 1 1/2 tsp. chili powder 1 lb. smoked sausage sliced thin. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 potatoes 1 medium onion 1 c. celery 3 cans Northern beans 1 qt. tomatoes 1 or 2 cans tomato soup 1 1/2 tsp. chili powder 1 lb. smoked sausage sliced thin. Recipe: Cook potatoes celery and onion until tender. Add beans tomatoes soup chili powder and smoked sausage. Simmer and serve.

title: Grandma'S Cheesecake(New York Style)
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. graham cracker crumbs 4 Tbsp. sugar 1/4 lb. (1 stick) butter 3 (8 oz.) cream cheese bars 1 c. sugar 5 eggs separated whites 1 pt. sour cream 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. graham cracker crumbs 4 Tbsp. sugar 1/4 lb. (1 stick) butter 3 (8 oz.) cream cheese bars 1 c. sugar 5 eggs separated whites 1 pt. sour cream 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Melt butter; add sugar and graham cracker crumbs. Mix and line spring-form pan for crust. Room temperature cream cheese; sour cream leave out several hours before mixing. Beat cream cheese sour cream sugar egg yolks and vanilla.

title: Preacher Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. sugar 1 stick butter or margarine 1/2 c. milk 1/2 c. powdered cocoa 2 c. quick oats 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. sugar 1 stick butter or margarine 1/2 c. milk 1/2 c. powdered cocoa 2 c. quick oats 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: Put sugar butter and milk in a heavy saucepan. Bring to a boil and boil for 3 minutes while stirring constantly. Remove from heat. stir in cocoa oats and vanilla. Mix well. Drop by teaspoon onto waxed paper. Cool 30 minutes. Yields 3 dozen.

title: Punch Bowl Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 18.5 oz. box yellow cake mix 1 large box instant vanilla pudding 20 oz. can cherry pie filling 20 oz. can crushed pineapple drained 12 oz. container Cool Whip 6 oz. pkg. frozen coconut 1/2 c. chopped pecans. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 18.5 oz. box yellow cake mix 1 large box instant vanilla pudding 20 oz. can cherry pie filling 20 oz. can crushed pineapple drained 12 oz. container Cool Whip 6 oz. pkg. frozen coconut 1/2 c. chopped pecans. Recipe: Make cake as directed in 2 layers. Make pudding as directed.

title: Sour Cream Apple Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 unbaked 9-inch pie shell 3/4 c. granulated sugar 1/3 c. all-purpose flour 1/4 tsp. each ground nutmeg and salt 1 tsp. ground cinnamon 1/4 c. butter or margarine softened 3 to 4 large tart green apples peeled and sliced to make 5 c. 1 Tbsp. lemon juice 1 c. sour cream. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 unbaked 9-inch pie shell 3/4 c. granulated sugar 1/3 c. all-purpose flour 1/4 tsp. each ground nutmeg and salt 1 tsp. ground cinnamon 1/4 c. butter or margarine softened 3 to 4 large tart green apples peeled and sliced to make 5 c. 1 Tbsp. lemon juice 1 c. sour cream. Recipe: Heat oven to 350\u00b0. Place pie shell on cookie sheet. In medium bowl combine sugar flour spices and salt. With pastry blender or two knives cut butter into sugar mixture until crumbly. Sprinkle 2 tablespoons on bottom of shell. Arrange apple slices in overlapping rows in shell. Sprinkle each row with a few drops of lemon juice and remaining sugar mixture. (Apples will round slightly in pie shell.) Bake 25 minutes. Spoon and spread sour cream over top. Bake 15 minutes longer. Makes 1 pie.

title: Meat Loaf
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. ground round 3 to 4 medium slices whole wheat bread 1 c. milk 1 egg beaten 1/4 c. chopped onion 1 1/4 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce 1 Tbsp. catsup. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. ground round 3 to 4 medium slices whole wheat bread 1 c. milk 1 egg beaten 1/4 c. chopped onion 1 1/4 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce 1 Tbsp. catsup. Recipe: Mix all ingredients thoroughly. Spread in ungreased loaf pan 9 x 5 x 3-inch. Bake in 350\u00b0 oven for 1 1/2 hours.

title: Cumin Rice Dish
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. uncooked rice 1/3 c. chopped onion 1/4 c. bell pepper 2 cans consomme 3/4 Tbsp. cumin 1/2 tsp. salt 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce 2 Tbsp. bacon fat. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. uncooked rice 1/3 c. chopped onion 1/4 c. bell pepper 2 cans consomme 3/4 Tbsp. cumin 1/2 tsp. salt 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce 2 Tbsp. bacon fat. Recipe: Saute onion pepper and rice in bacon fat until brown. Add remaining ingredients and bring to a boil. Turn heat down and simmer 30 to 40 minutes covered.

title: Prune Punch Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 c. Crisco 2 eggs 1 c. prune juice 1 tsp. soda 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 c. sugar 1 c. cooked prunes 2 c. flour 3/4 tsp. salt 1 1/2 tsp. nutmeg. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 c. Crisco 2 eggs 1 c. prune juice 1 tsp. soda 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 c. sugar 1 c. cooked prunes 2 c. flour 3/4 tsp. salt 1 1/2 tsp. nutmeg. Recipe: Grease and flour a 9 x 13-inch pan. Mix all of the ingredients and pour into prepared pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 until done. Remove cake from oven and top with 2 teaspoons sugar mixed with the juice of an orange to make 1/3 cup. Put on top of cake while warm. Mix sugar and cinnamon to sprinkle on top if desired. Cool and cut into squares. Serve with Cool Whip.

title: Danish Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. shortening 1 3/4 c. sugar 3 eggs 3 c. flour sifted 1 1/2 tsp. soda 1 tsp. salt 1 c. buttermilk 1 Tbsp. orange juice 1 c. nuts 2 c. chopped dates 1 grated orange rind 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. shortening 1 3/4 c. sugar 3 eggs 3 c. flour sifted 1 1/2 tsp. soda 1 tsp. salt 1 c. buttermilk 1 Tbsp. orange juice 1 c. nuts 2 c. chopped dates 1 grated orange rind 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: Mix shortening sugar eggs flour soda salt buttermilk orange juice nuts dates orange rind and vanilla. Bake in a tube pan at 350\u00b0 for 1 1/4 hours. When done while still hot pour sauce over cake.

title: Sherried Beef
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 lb. chuck cubes 1/2 envelope onion soup mix 2 cans cream of celery soup 3/4 can sherry (dry). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 lb. chuck cubes 1/2 envelope onion soup mix 2 cans cream of celery soup 3/4 can sherry (dry). Recipe: Mix the onion soup mix celery soup and sherry; pour over meat in large casserole or roasting pan. Cover; bake at 325\u00b0 for 3 hours. Stir occasionally. Add water if needed. Quick and easy!!

title: Hot Fruit Punch
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (32 oz.) jar cranberry juice cocktail 3 1/2 c. water 1 (6 oz.) can frozen orange juice 6 sticks cinnamon 12 whole allspice. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (32 oz.) jar cranberry juice cocktail 3 1/2 c. water 1 (6 oz.) can frozen orange juice 6 sticks cinnamon 12 whole allspice. Recipe: Combine all ingredients in glass bowl. Microwave on High for 12 to 14 minutes or until hot about 160\u00b0.

title: French Potato Soup
ingredients: Ingredients: 6 to 8 large red potatoes 1 small onion finely chopped 1 stick Parkay margarine 1 can evaporated milk salt and pepper to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 6 to 8 large red potatoes 1 small onion finely chopped 1 stick Parkay margarine 1 can evaporated milk salt and pepper to taste. Recipe: Peel and cut potatoes into bite size pieces. In large pan put enough water to first cover potatoes. Cook until done. Add milk salt and pepper. In small skillet lightly saute onions in melted Parkay. Add to potato mixture and simmer for about 20 minutes stirring often.

title: Walla-Walla Onion Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 sweet onions thinly sliced 1 Tbsp. olive oil 3 Tbsp. butter 2 eggs 1 c. half and half 2 Tbsp. flour 1 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper pinch of nutmeg 2 oz. Swiss cheese grated chopped parsley (garnish). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 sweet onions thinly sliced 1 Tbsp. olive oil 3 Tbsp. butter 2 eggs 1 c. half and half 2 Tbsp. flour 1 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper pinch of nutmeg 2 oz. Swiss cheese grated chopped parsley (garnish). Recipe: Prepare and partially bake a crust to fit a 9-inch pie pan using a basic pie dough recipe. Saute onions in oil and butter over low heat until golden yellow. Beat together eggs half and half flour salt pepper and nutmeg then add onions and half of the grated cheese. Pour into crust; sprinkle remaining cheese on top and bake at 375\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes or until golden brown. Garnish with parsley. Serves 4.

title: Coal Flowers
ingredients: Ingredients: piece of coal clear glass bowl water blueing salt coloring. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: piece of coal clear glass bowl water blueing salt coloring. Recipe: Place a piece of coal in a clear glass bowl.

title: Raisin-Walnut Bread
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/4 c. raisins 1 1/4 c. water 1 1/2 tsp. baking soda 3 Tbsp. oil 2 eggs 1 c. sugar 1 tsp. vanilla 2 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. chopped walnuts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/4 c. raisins 1 1/4 c. water 1 1/2 tsp. baking soda 3 Tbsp. oil 2 eggs 1 c. sugar 1 tsp. vanilla 2 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. chopped walnuts. Recipe: In small saucepan bring raisins soda and oil to a boil. Remove from heat and set aside to cool. In large bowl beat eggs sugar and vanilla well. Add cooled raisin mixture with flour and salt and egg mixture. Stir until well mixed. Bake in buttered 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan at 350\u00b0 for 50 to 60 minutes or until it tests done.

title: Sausage Stars
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. cooked crumbled sausage 1 1/2 c. grated sharp Cheddar cheese 1 1/2 c. grated Monterey Jack cheese 1 c. prepared Hidden Valley Ranch original salad dressing mix 1 (2.25 oz.) can sliced ripe olives 1/2 c. chopped red peppers 1 pkg. fresh or frozen won ton wrappers or egg roll wrappers cut in 4ths vegetable oil. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. cooked crumbled sausage 1 1/2 c. grated sharp Cheddar cheese 1 1/2 c. grated Monterey Jack cheese 1 c. prepared Hidden Valley Ranch original salad dressing mix 1 (2.25 oz.) can sliced ripe olives 1/2 c. chopped red peppers 1 pkg. fresh or frozen won ton wrappers or egg roll wrappers cut in 4ths vegetable oil. Recipe: Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Blot sausage dry with paper towels. Combine with cheeses salad dressing olives and red peppers. Lightly grease a mini muffin tin and press 1 wrapper in each cup. Brush with oil. Bake 5 minutes until golden. Remove from tin. Place on a baking sheet and fill with sausage mixture. Bake 5 minutes until bubbly. Makes 4 to 5 dozen.

title: Dijon Chicken
ingredients: Ingredients: 6 whole chicken breasts halved pepper 1 1/2 c. sour cream 1 (8 oz.) pkg. Italian breadcrumbs parsley salt garlic powder 1 1/2 c. Dijon mustard. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 6 whole chicken breasts halved pepper 1 1/2 c. sour cream 1 (8 oz.) pkg. Italian breadcrumbs parsley salt garlic powder 1 1/2 c. Dijon mustard. Recipe: Lightly sprinkle chicken with salt pepper and garlic powder. Combine sour cream and mustard in a shallow dish mixing well. Dip each chicken breast into mustard mixture and dredge in breadcrumbs. Arrange chicken in single layer in baking pans. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 50 minutes.

title: Sweet Potato Or Pumpkin Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 5 eggs 1 3/4 c. brown sugar 3/4 c. butter 1 tsp. vanilla 2 baked sweet potatoes or can pumpkin 3 c. unbleached flour 1 1/2 tsp. baking powder 1 tsp. soda 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. nutmeg 1 1/2 tsp. ginger 1 c. raisins 1 can crushed pineapple with juice 1 c. pecans. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 5 eggs 1 3/4 c. brown sugar 3/4 c. butter 1 tsp. vanilla 2 baked sweet potatoes or can pumpkin 3 c. unbleached flour 1 1/2 tsp. baking powder 1 tsp. soda 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. nutmeg 1 1/2 tsp. ginger 1 c. raisins 1 can crushed pineapple with juice 1 c. pecans. Recipe: Beat with spoon. Sift dry ingredients. Bake in Bundt pan 1 hour and 5 minutes at 325\u00b0 for pumpkin; 1 1/2 hours with potatoes or until done.

title: Bouillabaisse
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. minced onions 1/2 c. minced leeks 1/2 c. olive oil 4 cloves mashed garlic 1 1/2 c. drained canned tomatoes or 1/4 tomato paste 2 1/2 qt. water 6 parsley sprigs 1/2 tsp. thyme 2 big pinches saffron 4 lb. fish heads or 1 qt. clam juice and reduce water to 1 1/2 qt. 6 to 8 lb. assorted fish and shellfish (scallops prawns clams and mussels) 3 to 4 lb. firm white fish. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. minced onions 1/2 c. minced leeks 1/2 c. olive oil 4 cloves mashed garlic 1 1/2 c. drained canned tomatoes or 1/4 tomato paste 2 1/2 qt. water 6 parsley sprigs 1/2 tsp. thyme 2 big pinches saffron 4 lb. fish heads or 1 qt. clam juice and reduce water to 1 1/2 qt. 6 to 8 lb. assorted fish and shellfish (scallops prawns clams and mussels) 3 to 4 lb. firm white fish. Recipe: Cook onions and leeks\tslowly in the oil until tender but not browned. Add other ingredients to onions and cook uncovered at a moderate boil for 30 minutes.\tStrain the stock add salt and pepper to taste. Add clams and mussels to stock first cover\tpot and bring to boil. Cook about 5 minutes or until some of them begin to open then add fish. Wait about 3 minutes then add scallops and prawns. The soup is ready when the shellfish is open and the prawns are pink (don't wait for a boil or cook too long). Taste continually and serve immediately when done. Serve with crusty French bread and Rouille (recipe follows).

title: Earthquake Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 German chocolate cake mix mixed according to directions on box 1 c. coconut 1 c. chopped pecans 8 oz. Philadelphia cream cheese 1 stick oleo 1 lb. confectioners sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 German chocolate cake mix mixed according to directions on box 1 c. coconut 1 c. chopped pecans 8 oz. Philadelphia cream cheese 1 stick oleo 1 lb. confectioners sugar. Recipe: Grease and flour or \Pam\ the bottom and sides of a 9 x 13-inch cake pan. Spread the coconut and pecans in the bottom of cake pan; add cake mix on top. Cream together the cream cheese oleo and confectioners sugar. Drop the creamed mixture by spoonfuls over the unbaked cake. It will pretty much cover the top of the cake. Bake in a 350\u00b0 oven for 45 minutes. It will look like a disaster but taste great!

title: Ham Cheese Ball
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese softened 1/4 c. mayonnaise 2 c. ground chopped ham 2 Tbsp. chopped parsley 4 green onions chopped 1/4 tsp. dried mustard 1/2 tsp. hot Tabasco 1 c. chopped pecans. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese softened 1/4 c. mayonnaise 2 c. ground chopped ham 2 Tbsp. chopped parsley 4 green onions chopped 1/4 tsp. dried mustard 1/2 tsp. hot Tabasco 1 c. chopped pecans. Recipe: Cream the cream cheese and mayonnaise and add rest of ingredients except pecans. Chill 2 hours then work into a ball and roll in chopped nuts. Serve with Wheatsworth crackers or Sociables.

title: Orange Julius
ingredients: Ingredients: couple of oranges 2 Tbsp. honey. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: couple of oranges 2 Tbsp. honey. Recipe: Put in blender. Add crushed ice until desired thickness. Add enough milk to fill blender approximately 1 cup.

title: Quick Potato Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 lb. quartered red potatoes 1/2 c. diagonally sliced green onions 1 small green pepper coarsely chopped 1/2 c. salad dressing 1 Tbsp. coarse ground mustard. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 lb. quartered red potatoes 1/2 c. diagonally sliced green onions 1 small green pepper coarsely chopped 1/2 c. salad dressing 1 Tbsp. coarse ground mustard. Recipe: Add potatoes to boiling water; cook 14 minutes or until tender. Drain. Toss with remaining ingredients. Refrigerate.

title: Banana Bread
ingredients: Ingredients: 2/3 c. margarine 1 1/2 c. sugar 2 tsp. baking powder 4 Tbsp. milk 1/2 c. chopped pecans 2 eggs 1 1/2 c. flour 1/4 tsp. salt 1 c. mashed bananas 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2/3 c. margarine 1 1/2 c. sugar 2 tsp. baking powder 4 Tbsp. milk 1/2 c. chopped pecans 2 eggs 1 1/2 c. flour 1/4 tsp. salt 1 c. mashed bananas 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: Cream margarine and sugar; add eggs. Sift flour baking powder and salt together. Add flour mixture and milk to creamed ingredients then add mashed bananas nuts and vanilla. Pour into a greased loaf pan or bake as cupcakes. (Makes 2 dozen cupcakes.) Bake at 350\u00b0. Cook the loaf for 45 minutes cook the muffins for 25 minutes.

title: Smooth-N-Creamy Frosting
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (4 oz.) pkg. Jell-O instant pudding (any flavor) 1/4 c. confectioners sugar 1 c. cold milk 1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (4 oz.) pkg. Jell-O instant pudding (any flavor) 1/4 c. confectioners sugar 1 c. cold milk 1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip. Recipe: Combine pudding mix sugar and milk. Beat slowly with electric mixer until well blended. Fold in Cool Whip. Spread on cake at once. Makes about 4 cups or enough for two 9-inch layer cakes.

title: Plattar(Swedish Pancakes)
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. flour 2 Tbsp. sugar 1/4 tsp. salt 3 eggs 3 c. milk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. flour 2 Tbsp. sugar 1/4 tsp. salt 3 eggs 3 c. milk. Recipe: Sift flour into bowl. Add sugar and salt. Add eggs and milk gradually stirring until well blended let stand 2 hours. Heat Swedish pancake pan (or ordinary pancake pan) and butter well. Beat batter again. Pour by tablespoonfuls into sections of pan and fry on both sides until nicely browned. Place on very hot platter; serve immediately with Lingonberries.

title: Rhubarb And Orange Marmalade
ingredients: Ingredients: 6 c. rhubarb cut up fine 6 c. sugar 2 oranges ground up fine. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 6 c. rhubarb cut up fine 6 c. sugar 2 oranges ground up fine. Recipe: Wash and cut up rhubarb. Measure 6 cups of sugar. Mix well and let stand 2 hours or more. Wash and grind up 2 oranges and add to rhubarb and sugar. Boil about 20 minutes.

title: Chinese Chicken Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 to 2 whole chicken breasts cooked cooled shredded or sliced thin 1/4 pkg. saifon 1 can wide Chinese won ton 1 head lettuce 1 to 2 cucumbers peeled 2 to 4 stalks celery 1 bell pepper 1 to 2 bunches scallions (including green part) 1 bunch radishes 6 Tbsp. white sesame seed. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 to 2 whole chicken breasts cooked cooled shredded or sliced thin 1/4 pkg. saifon 1 can wide Chinese won ton 1 head lettuce 1 to 2 cucumbers peeled 2 to 4 stalks celery 1 bell pepper 1 to 2 bunches scallions (including green part) 1 bunch radishes 6 Tbsp. white sesame seed. Recipe: Cook saifon a little at a time in 1-inch of hot oil. Cook until noodles \explode.\ Turn and cook other side. Remove and drain on paper towel. Thinly slice the lettuce cucumbers celery bell pepper scallions and radishes. (Please improvise on salad if you wish.) Put in large bowl and refrigerate. Toast sesame seeds until lightly browned.

title: Shirley Temple(Nonalcoholic Mixed Drink)
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 dash grenadine 6 oz. ginger ale or to fill maraschino cherry orange slice. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 dash grenadine 6 oz. ginger ale or to fill maraschino cherry orange slice. Recipe: Fill a Collins or highball glass with ice. Add grenadine and fill with ginger ale. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and an orange slice. Makes 1 serving. Preparation time: 2 minutes.

title: Nannaw'S Jam Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 sticks oleo 2 c. sugar 1 c. blackberry jam 1 tsp. allspice 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. nutmeg 1 tsp. cloves 6 eggs 3 c. flour 1 tsp. baking powder 1 1/2 tsp. soda 1 c. buttermilk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 sticks oleo 2 c. sugar 1 c. blackberry jam 1 tsp. allspice 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. nutmeg 1 tsp. cloves 6 eggs 3 c. flour 1 tsp. baking powder 1 1/2 tsp. soda 1 c. buttermilk. Recipe: Sift dry ingredients together. Dissolve soda in buttermilk. Cream butter sugar jam and eggs with mixer. Add dry ingredients alternately with liquid. Bake in 3 greased and floured 9-inch pans at 350\u00b0. Put frosting between layers and on outside of cake.

title: Marinated Cucumber And Sweet Onion Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 medium sweet onions 2 cucumbers 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 c. dark vinegar 1/2 c. water 1/4 c. sugar pepper to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 medium sweet onions 2 cucumbers 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 c. dark vinegar 1/2 c. water 1/4 c. sugar pepper to taste. Recipe: Slice cucumbers and onions. Combine and sprinkle with 1/2 of salt. Set aside. Combine other ingredients in a saucepan and heat (hot but not boiling). Pour over vegetables; let cool and refrigerate until ready to serve.

title: Irish Stew
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 cans of Castleberry Pork BBQ 2 cans of Castleberry beef BBQ 1 large can of All White Chicken Meat drained 2 cans of creamed corn do not drain 2 cans stewed tomatoes. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 cans of Castleberry Pork BBQ 2 cans of Castleberry beef BBQ 1 large can of All White Chicken Meat drained 2 cans of creamed corn do not drain 2 cans stewed tomatoes. Recipe: Mix together in a crockpot and let simmer on low several hours. You can also cook on low in a pot on the stove. You can experiment and add other vegetables that you like as well. It is really easy and delicious. Serve with garlic bread and salad.

title: Flaky Pie Crust
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 cup warm milk 1 cup solid shortening 2 cups self rising flour. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 cup warm milk 1 cup solid shortening 2 cups self rising flour. Recipe: Mix all ingredients into a bowl. Pour onto floured surface. Cover with flour and shape into a ball.

title: Frozen Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 40 marshmallows 1 pt. whipping cream 2 glasses pimento cheese 1 c. Miracle Whip 1 large can crushed pineapple walnuts (optional). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 40 marshmallows 1 pt. whipping cream 2 glasses pimento cheese 1 c. Miracle Whip 1 large can crushed pineapple walnuts (optional). Recipe: Cream cheese and add pineapple. Slice in marshmallows and nuts. Fold in whipped cream. Put in cupcake holders in muffin tins. Freeze. Will keep up to 6 months.

title: Doughnuts
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 1/4 c. flour 2 tsp. baking powder 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. nutmeg 2 beaten eggs 2/3 c. sugar 1 tsp. vanilla 2/3 c. milk 1/4 c. margarine. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 1/4 c. flour 2 tsp. baking powder 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. nutmeg 2 beaten eggs 2/3 c. sugar 1 tsp. vanilla 2/3 c. milk 1/4 c. margarine. Recipe: Mix ingredients together. Cut and fry in hot grease at 375\u00b0. Cook about 1 minute on each side.

title: Holiday Broccoli
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen cut broccoli 1 or 2 chicken bouillon cubes 2 (10 1/2) cans condensed cream of celery soup 1/2 c. grated sharp cheese strips of pimento. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen cut broccoli 1 or 2 chicken bouillon cubes 2 (10 1/2) cans condensed cream of celery soup 1/2 c. grated sharp cheese strips of pimento. Recipe: Cook broccoli with bouillon cubes and water until just tender. Heat celery soup. Pour hot soup over broccoli. Garnish with cheese and pimento. Serve at once. Makes 6 servings.

title: Crystal'S Cherry Delight
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) cream cheese 1 (14 oz.) Eagle Brand milk 1 (14 oz.) cherry pie filling 1 or 2 packs graham crackers. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) cream cheese 1 (14 oz.) Eagle Brand milk 1 (14 oz.) cherry pie filling 1 or 2 packs graham crackers. Recipe: Simply sprinkle graham crackers on bottom of pan. Mix cream cheese and Eagle Brand together. Spread over graham crackers. Put cherry pie filling on top. Refrigerate. Ready to eat 2 hours later.

title: Pretty Party Punch
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 liter Sprite or ginger ale 1/2 can frozen apple juice concentrate 1 medium bottle white grape juice 1 1/2 lemons squeezed or approximately 4 Tbsp. juice. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 liter Sprite or ginger ale 1/2 can frozen apple juice concentrate 1 medium bottle white grape juice 1 1/2 lemons squeezed or approximately 4 Tbsp. juice. Recipe: Mix together all the ingredients. (Make sure the Sprite and grape juice are chilled.) You can also float slices of lemon on top.

title: Vinegar Pie Crust
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 c. flour 1 Tbsp. sugar pinch of salt 1 3/4 c. shortening 1/2 c. cold water 1 Tbsp. vinegar 1 egg. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 c. flour 1 Tbsp. sugar pinch of salt 1 3/4 c. shortening 1/2 c. cold water 1 Tbsp. vinegar 1 egg. Recipe: Combine flour sugar and salt. With a pastry blender cut shortening into flour. In a small bowl combine water vinegar and egg. Beat this mixture. Pour liquid mixture into flour mixture. Use a fork to lift ingredients until enough moisture is spread to form a ball with your hands. This makes a flaky and tender pie crust and forms much easier than most.

title: Macaroni Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. macaroni 8 oz. mild Cheddar cheese 3/4 c. milk 1 tsp. salt 1 tsp. pepper 1 egg 1 Tbsp. butter. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. macaroni 8 oz. mild Cheddar cheese 3/4 c. milk 1 tsp. salt 1 tsp. pepper 1 egg 1 Tbsp. butter. Recipe: Boil macaroni for 8 to 10 minutes in salt. Drain do not rinse.
