Stir together flour 1/4 cup sugar and 1/4 teaspoon salt. Cut in butter until like coarse meal. Add milk; stir only until moistened. Drop from tablespoon into bubbling sauce making 6 dumplings. Cover tightly; simmer 15 minutes without uncovering. Serve hot. Sprinkle with sugar if desired. Serves 6.

title: Heavenly Hash
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 pt. whipping cream 3 c. mini marshmallows 1 tsp. vanilla 1/4 c. sugar 1 can drained pineapple tidbits (20 oz.). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 pt. whipping cream 3 c. mini marshmallows 1 tsp. vanilla 1/4 c. sugar 1 can drained pineapple tidbits (20 oz.). Recipe: Whip cream to soft peaks. Add sugar and vanilla. Fold in marshmallows and pineapple. Store in refrigerator. Tastes best made one day in advance. Really good served on plain cake.

title: Hamburger Potato Hot Dish
ingredients: Ingredients: 6 potatoes peeled and sliced 1 onion sliced 1 1/2 lb. raw hamburger 1 large can beef vegetable soup 1/2 can water. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 6 potatoes peeled and sliced 1 onion sliced 1 1/2 lb. raw hamburger 1 large can beef vegetable soup 1/2 can water. Recipe: Place potatoes into large pan. Layer onions over top. Pour soup and water mixture on top. Bake 1 to 1 1/2 hours at 350\u00b0.

title: Potatoes Romanoff
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 pkg. frozen hash browns 1 small onion 2 Tbsp. oleo 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 can Cheddar cheese soup 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 c. sour cream 1 (13 oz.) can evaporated milk (not diluted) 1/2 c. crushed cornflakes 1/2 c. margarine. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 pkg. frozen hash browns 1 small onion 2 Tbsp. oleo 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 can Cheddar cheese soup 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 c. sour cream 1 (13 oz.) can evaporated milk (not diluted) 1/2 c. crushed cornflakes 1/2 c. margarine. Recipe: Thaw potatoes; spread over 9 x 12-inch baking dish. Top with cornflakes and margarine. In saucepan saute onion in 2 tablespoons oleo. Stir in soups milk sour cream salt and pepper. Bake for 50 minutes.

title: Enchilada Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground chuck 1 onion chopped 1 pkg. flour tortillas 1 can enchilada sauce 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 can cream of chicken soup 6 oz. grated cheese (approximately). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground chuck 1 onion chopped 1 pkg. flour tortillas 1 can enchilada sauce 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 can cream of chicken soup 6 oz. grated cheese (approximately). Recipe: Brown beef and onions in microwave on High for 4 minutes. Drain if necessary. Stir to crumble meat. Add enchilada sauce and soups. In a 3-quart casserole dish layer tortillas meat mixture and cheese. Repeat layers except cheese. Microwave on Medium about 20 minutes or until heated through. Top with grated cheese and let stand until melted.

title: Recipe For A Happy Family
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 Husband 1 Wife Children; 1 Bible for each 1 Home generous portions of Prayer 3 c. Love firmly packed 1 pkg. Work 1 pkg. Playing Together 1 portion Patience 1 portion Understanding 1 small Paddle 1 c. Kisses. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 Husband 1 Wife Children; 1 Bible for each 1 Home generous portions of Prayer 3 c. Love firmly packed 1 pkg. Work 1 pkg. Playing Together 1 portion Patience 1 portion Understanding 1 small Paddle 1 c. Kisses. Recipe: Mix moderately and sprinkle with awareness. Bake in moderate oven of everyday life using as fuel all grudges and past unpleasantness. Cool. Turn out onto platter of cheerfulness. Garnish with tears and laughter in large helpings. Serve God country and community.

title: Country Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. Velveeta cheese cubed (I use about 3/4 lb.) 1 c. milk 1/2 c. Miracle Whip 2 c. chopped turkey or chicken cooked 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas and carrots cooked and drained 5 oz. spaghetti cooked and drained 1 Tbsp. chopped chives or minced onions. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. Velveeta cheese cubed (I use about 3/4 lb.) 1 c. milk 1/2 c. Miracle Whip 2 c. chopped turkey or chicken cooked 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas and carrots cooked and drained 5 oz. spaghetti cooked and drained 1 Tbsp. chopped chives or minced onions. Recipe: Heat Velveeta milk and salad dressing over low heat. Stir until sauce is smooth. Add remaining ingredients. Mix well. Pour into 2-quart casserole. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 to 40 minutes or until hot. Serves 8.

title: Party Pizza Appetizers(Makes 90)
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. hot sausage cooked drained and crumbled 1 c. chopped onion 1/2 c. sharp cheese grated 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese (from wedge) 1 1/2 tsp. oregano 1 tsp. garlic salt 1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce 1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste 3 cans flaky biscuits. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. hot sausage cooked drained and crumbled 1 c. chopped onion 1/2 c. sharp cheese grated 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese (from wedge) 1 1/2 tsp. oregano 1 tsp. garlic salt 1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce 1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste 3 cans flaky biscuits. Recipe: Combine all ingredients except biscuits. Separate each biscuit into 3 pizza rounds. Spread with mixture. Put pizza on cookie sheet and store in plastic bags. Bake frozen pizzas at 425\u00b0 for 10 minutes. Great for a cocktail party.

title: Strawberry Bread
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. flour 2 c. sugar 1 tsp. baking soda 1 tsp. cinnamon 4 eggs beaten 1 1/4 c. vegetable oil 2 pkg. (10 oz.) frozen strawberries thawed and chopped. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. flour 2 c. sugar 1 tsp. baking soda 1 tsp. cinnamon 4 eggs beaten 1 1/4 c. vegetable oil 2 pkg. (10 oz.) frozen strawberries thawed and chopped. Recipe: Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Combine dry ingredients in large bowl. Form a shallow well in center of mixture and add remaining ingredients. Stir well. Spoon mixture into two greased and floured loaf pans. Bake 1 hour. Cool 10 minutes in pans.

title: Red Lobster Cheese Garlic Biscuits
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 cups Bisquick 2/3 cup milk 1/2 cup shredded cheddar cheese 1/2 cup butter melted 1/4 tsp. garlic powder. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 cups Bisquick 2/3 cup milk 1/2 cup shredded cheddar cheese 1/2 cup butter melted 1/4 tsp. garlic powder. Recipe: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Mix Bisquick milk and cheese until soft dough forms. Beat vigorously for 30 seconds. Drop dough by spoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheet. Bake 8 to 10 minutes until golden brown. Mix butter and garlic powder. Brush over warm biscuits before removing from the baking sheet. Serve warm.

title: Date Rolled Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. butter 1 c. white sugar 1 c. brown sugar 1 tsp. salt 3 beaten eggs 1 Tbsp. vanilla 4 c. flour 1 1/2 tsp. soda 1 Tbsp. cold water. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. butter 1 c. white sugar 1 c. brown sugar 1 tsp. salt 3 beaten eggs 1 Tbsp. vanilla 4 c. flour 1 1/2 tsp. soda 1 Tbsp. cold water. Recipe: Mix the flour and soda together. Roll 1/2 dough on floured board into a rectangle 1/2-inch thick. Spread filling all over top (then sprinkle with chopped English walnuts if desired). Roll like a jelly roll and place in refrigerator. When firm slice and bake 10 to 12 minutes at 350\u00b0 or 10 minutes at 375\u00b0 (top of cookie may be sprinkled with sugar and top with 1/2 walnut before baking).

title: Pineapple Mold
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 small (3 oz.) pkg. lemon jello 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lime jello 2 c. boiling water 10 oz. (1 1/4 c.) cottage cheese 1 (No. 2 ) can crushed pineapple 2/3 c. walnuts 1 c. cream 1 c. mayonnaise (not salad dressing) 1 to 3 Tbsp. horseradish to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 small (3 oz.) pkg. lemon jello 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lime jello 2 c. boiling water 10 oz. (1 1/4 c.) cottage cheese 1 (No. 2 ) can crushed pineapple 2/3 c. walnuts 1 c. cream 1 c. mayonnaise (not salad dressing) 1 to 3 Tbsp. horseradish to taste. Recipe: Use a nonstick spray to wet a 1 1/2-quart ring mold (takes an afternoon to jell). Combine jello(s) and boiling water. Stir to dissolve. Let cool slightly. Stir in cottage cheese crushed pineapple walnuts.

title: Play Doh
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour 1/2 c. salt 1 Tbsp. alum 1 c. hot water 1 Tbsp. cooking oil food coloring. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour 1/2 c. salt 1 Tbsp. alum 1 c. hot water 1 Tbsp. cooking oil food coloring. Recipe: Mix all together and slowly whisk into dry ingredients. Place mixture over medium-high heat and cook stirring constantly until mixture thickens and loses its wet look. Pour out on countertop or board and knead until of even consistency.

title: Layered Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 head shredded lettuce 1 box frozen peas 4 hard-boiled eggs cut up 1/2 lb. bacon cooked and crumbled 1 can sliced water chestnuts 1/2 head shredded lettuce 1 pkg. Ranch dressing 1 c. mayonnaise 1 c. sour cream shredded Cheddar cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 head shredded lettuce 1 box frozen peas 4 hard-boiled eggs cut up 1/2 lb. bacon cooked and crumbled 1 can sliced water chestnuts 1/2 head shredded lettuce 1 pkg. Ranch dressing 1 c. mayonnaise 1 c. sour cream shredded Cheddar cheese. Recipe: Layer first 6 ingredients as listed in 9 x 13-inch pan. Mix dressing mayonnaise and sour cream and spread on top of salad. Sprinkle with shredded cheese. Cover and refrigerate. Can be made the night before.

title: Sour Cream Potatoes
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 lb. bag frozen hash browns thawed 1 pt. sour cream 2 c. or 10 oz. grated Cheddar cheese 2 cans cream of chicken soup 1/2 c. melted butter 1 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1/2 c. chopped onion. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 lb. bag frozen hash browns thawed 1 pt. sour cream 2 c. or 10 oz. grated Cheddar cheese 2 cans cream of chicken soup 1/2 c. melted butter 1 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1/2 c. chopped onion. Recipe: Mix everything together and pour into a 13 x 9-inch pan. Top with 1/4 cup melted butter and 2 cups crushed cornflakes mixed together. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes.

title: Creamy Banana Pudding
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (14 oz.) can Eagle Brand condensed milk 1 1/2 c. cold water 1 (3 1/2 oz.) pkg. instant vanilla pudding and pie filling mix 2 c. whipping cream whipped 36 vanilla wafers 3 medium bananas. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (14 oz.) can Eagle Brand condensed milk 1 1/2 c. cold water 1 (3 1/2 oz.) pkg. instant vanilla pudding and pie filling mix 2 c. whipping cream whipped 36 vanilla wafers 3 medium bananas. Recipe: In large bowl combine milk and water. Add pudding mix. Beat well until blended. Fold in whipping cream. Spoon 1 cup pudding mixture into 2 1/2-quart round glass bowl. Top with 1/3 each of the vanilla wafers bananas and pudding. Repeat layers twice ending with pudding mixture. Chill thoroughly. Garnish if desired.

title: Hush Puppies
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. corn meal 1/2 c. flour 1/2 tsp. baking soda 3/4 c. buttermilk 2 tsp. salt 1 large finely cut onion. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. corn meal 1/2 c. flour 1/2 tsp. baking soda 3/4 c. buttermilk 2 tsp. salt 1 large finely cut onion. Recipe: Combine corn meal flour and baking soda in a mixing bowl. Stir in buttermilk and beat until batter is smooth. Stir in salt and onion. Drop heaping tablespoonfuls of batter into a deep fryer; fry until golden brown. Drain on paper toweling before serving.

title: Ground Beef Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 lb. ground beef 1 small onion 1 clove garlic 1 c. bell pepper 1/2 c. celery 1 small tomato paste 1 small tomato sauce 1 small can mushrooms (stems and pieces) 1 small can creamed corn 1 small jar sliced olives 1 (8 oz.) pkg. egg noodles 1 stick sharp cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 lb. ground beef 1 small onion 1 clove garlic 1 c. bell pepper 1/2 c. celery 1 small tomato paste 1 small tomato sauce 1 small can mushrooms (stems and pieces) 1 small can creamed corn 1 small jar sliced olives 1 (8 oz.) pkg. egg noodles 1 stick sharp cheese. Recipe: Brown beef. Cook pepper celery and onion in a small amount of fat then add to ground beef and cook about 20 minutes. Cook noodles according to package directions. Combine noodles with meat mixture. Layer meat and noodle mixture with grated cheese and bake about 30 minutes at 350\u00b0.

title: Lemon Fluff Jello
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon Jell-O 1 c. boiling water large can crushed pineapple with juice 8 oz. cream cheese 1/2 c. sugar 8 oz. Cool Whip 1/2 c. chopped pecans (optional). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon Jell-O 1 c. boiling water large can crushed pineapple with juice 8 oz. cream cheese 1/2 c. sugar 8 oz. Cool Whip 1/2 c. chopped pecans (optional). Recipe: Mix pineapple and sugar in saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer on stove 15 minutes. Remove from heat and cool. Mix Jell-O and boiling water. Stir in softened cream cheese and mix well then add pineapple and nuts. Chill until thickened then fold in Cool Whip. Put in Pyrex dish and chill until firm.

title: Quick Fruit Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can cherry pie filling 1 (No. 2) can chunk pineapple 2 c. miniature marshmallows 4 very large bananas sliced 1/2 c. chopped pecans. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can cherry pie filling 1 (No. 2) can chunk pineapple 2 c. miniature marshmallows 4 very large bananas sliced 1/2 c. chopped pecans. Recipe: Pour all ingredients into a large bowl and stir. Mix well. This salad may be served second day if not used the first.

title: Breaded Steak Rolls
ingredients: Ingredients: cube steaks bread crumbs or bread parsley flakes garlic powder onion powder tomato sauce Parmesan cheese salt and pepper. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: cube steaks bread crumbs or bread parsley flakes garlic powder onion powder tomato sauce Parmesan cheese salt and pepper. Recipe: You will also need wooden toothpicks.

title: Dirt Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 pkg. instant French vanilla pudding (unprepared keep in dry form) 8 oz. cream cheese softened 3 1/2 c. milk 3/4 c. powdered sugar 1 pkg. Oreos 8 or 12 oz. whipped topping. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 pkg. instant French vanilla pudding (unprepared keep in dry form) 8 oz. cream cheese softened 3 1/2 c. milk 3/4 c. powdered sugar 1 pkg. Oreos 8 or 12 oz. whipped topping. Recipe: In deep bowl put pudding cream cheese and 1/2 cup of milk. Mix until creamy with hand mixer. Add powdered sugar and mix thoroughly then add remaining milk 1/2 cup at a time and mix until creamy. Crumble enough Oreo cookies to line bottom of dish as a crust in a lasagna pan. Add the pudding mix and top with whipped topping. Refrigerate until serving. Prior to serving crumble a few more Oreos on the top to provide a crisp crunchy taste.

title: Rich Beef And Gravy(Crock-Pot Recipe)
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 to 2 1/2 lb. round steak 1 (1 1/2 oz.) pkg. onion soup mix 1/4 c. water 1 (10 1/2 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 to 2 1/2 lb. round steak 1 (1 1/2 oz.) pkg. onion soup mix 1/4 c. water 1 (10 1/2 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup. Recipe: Mix dry and liquid ingredients in crock-pot. Cut steak into small pieces. Add to other ingredients. Cover and cook on low for 6 to 8 hours. Serve over mashed potatoes noodles or rice. Serves 4 to 6.

title: Chicken Maranda
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 large chicken cooked skinned and deboned 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 can cream of celery soup 1 small can Pet milk (same amount of regular milk may be used) 1 Tbsp. sage 1 pkg. cornbread mix 1 c. chicken broth. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 large chicken cooked skinned and deboned 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 can cream of celery soup 1 small can Pet milk (same amount of regular milk may be used) 1 Tbsp. sage 1 pkg. cornbread mix 1 c. chicken broth. Recipe: Put chicken in large casserole dish. Spread chicken soup celery soup and milk over chicken. Mix all these well with chicken. Mix remaining ingredients and add last for topping. (Can use cornmeal and egg with sage and chicken broth instead of packaged mixes. Add cornbread last.) Bake at 450\u00b0 for 20 minutes or until bread is golden brown.

title: Apple-Banana Bread
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 eggs beaten 1 1/2 c. mashed bananas 1 c. brown sugar packed 1/2 c. oil 1 tsp. salt 1/3 c. milk 3 1/2 c. flour 1 3/4 tsp. baking soda 1 3/4 tsp. baking powder 1 large apple chopped 1 c. chopped nuts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 eggs beaten 1 1/2 c. mashed bananas 1 c. brown sugar packed 1/2 c. oil 1 tsp. salt 1/3 c. milk 3 1/2 c. flour 1 3/4 tsp. baking soda 1 3/4 tsp. baking powder 1 large apple chopped 1 c. chopped nuts. Recipe: Combine eggs banana sugar oil and milk. In a separate bowl mix flour salt baking soda and baking powder. Add to banana mixture. Fold in apple and nuts. Pour batter into 3 small greased and floured pans or two (9 x 5-inch) pans. Bake at 325\u00b0 for about 1 hour. Cool in pans 10 minutes; remove to wire racks to cool.

title: Mock Lobster Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 30 soda crackers 1 1/2 c. celery finely chopped 1 small green pepper chopped 3 eggs boiled and diced 1 small onion diced 1 1/2 c. tomato juice 1 1/2 c. mayonnaise. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 30 soda crackers 1 1/2 c. celery finely chopped 1 small green pepper chopped 3 eggs boiled and diced 1 small onion diced 1 1/2 c. tomato juice 1 1/2 c. mayonnaise. Recipe: Crush the soda crackers in a large bowl. Mix all vegetables together in another bowl then mix tomato juice and mayonnaise with all the vegetables. Pour this mixture over the crushed crackers. Let all of this mixture stand in the refrigerator overnight. Serve on crackers or on a bed of lettuce.

title: Buttermilk Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. sugar 3/4 c. Crisco 3 eggs 2 c. all-purpose flour 1 tsp. baking powder 1/2 tsp. baking soda 1/8 tsp. salt 1 c. buttermilk 1 Tbsp. almond flavoring 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. sugar 3/4 c. Crisco 3 eggs 2 c. all-purpose flour 1 tsp. baking powder 1/2 tsp. baking soda 1/8 tsp. salt 1 c. buttermilk 1 Tbsp. almond flavoring 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: Cream sugar and shortening. Beat in eggs 1 at a time. Sift dry ingredients together. Blend in alternating with buttermilk. Beat well. Add almond and vanilla. Mix well. Bake in greased and floured Bundt pan for 1 hour at 350\u00b0.

title: Foolproof Chocolate Fudge
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 6 oz. pkg. semi-sweet chocolate morsels 1 14 oz. can Eagle Brand sweetened condensed milk Dash salt 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla extract 1/2 C. chopped nuts optional. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 6 oz. pkg. semi-sweet chocolate morsels 1 14 oz. can Eagle Brand sweetened condensed milk Dash salt 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla extract 1/2 C. chopped nuts optional. Recipe: In heavy saucepan over low heat melt morsels with sweetened condensed milk. Stir in vanilla and spread evenly onto wax paper lined 8-inch square pan. Chill 2 hours or until set. Turn fudge onto cutting board peel off paper and cut into squares. Cover and store at room temperature.

title: Sweet And Sour Seashells
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. small seashells cooked 2 Tbsp. corn oil 3/4 c. sugar 1/2 c. cider vinegar 1/2 c. wine vinegar 1/2 c. water 3 Tbsp. French's mustard 1/8 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. black pepper 2 small cucumbers 2 small onions diced. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. small seashells cooked 2 Tbsp. corn oil 3/4 c. sugar 1/2 c. cider vinegar 1/2 c. wine vinegar 1/2 c. water 3 Tbsp. French's mustard 1/8 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. black pepper 2 small cucumbers 2 small onions diced. Recipe: Pour all ingredients over noodles and let marinate in refrigerator for 3 to 4 hours. Wash cucumbers and leave skins on. Cut cucumbers in half lengthwise then slice.

title: Cornbread Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 pkg. Jiffy cornbread mix cooked cooled and crumbled 1 1/2 c. chopped onion 1 medium green pepper chopped 3 medium firm tomatoes 8 to 10 slices bacon cooked drained and crumbled 1 1/2 c. cubed light Velveeta cheese 1 1/2 c. salad dressing or mayo 2 Tbsp. mustard salt and pepper to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 pkg. Jiffy cornbread mix cooked cooled and crumbled 1 1/2 c. chopped onion 1 medium green pepper chopped 3 medium firm tomatoes 8 to 10 slices bacon cooked drained and crumbled 1 1/2 c. cubed light Velveeta cheese 1 1/2 c. salad dressing or mayo 2 Tbsp. mustard salt and pepper to taste. Recipe: Mix well and let set overnight. Will make 2 quarts and 1 pint. You can cut this in half.

title: Ham And Rice Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1/2 c. milk 1 1/3 c. precooked rice 1 c. diced ham. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1/2 c. milk 1 1/3 c. precooked rice 1 c. diced ham. Recipe: Mix all ingredients in 8 x 8-inch pan. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 25 minutes.

title: Zucchini Muffins
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 1/2 c. flour 1 1/2 c. sugar 1 c. chopped pecans 1/2 c. quick cooking oats 1 Tbsp. baking powder 1 tsp. salt 1 tsp. cinnamon 4 eggs 1 medium zucchini shredded 3/4 c. oil. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 1/2 c. flour 1 1/2 c. sugar 1 c. chopped pecans 1/2 c. quick cooking oats 1 Tbsp. baking powder 1 tsp. salt 1 tsp. cinnamon 4 eggs 1 medium zucchini shredded 3/4 c. oil. Recipe: Preheat oven to 400\u00b0. Grease muffin cups. In large bowl mix the first 7 ingredients. Beat eggs; stir in oil and zucchini. Stir all together until moistened. Bake for 25 minutes.

title: Chicken Parmesan
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 boneless chicken breasts Italian dressing Progresso bread crumbs 1 jar spaghetti sauce 1 whole small peeled onion 1 peeled clove garlic spaghetti noodles Mozzarella cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 boneless chicken breasts Italian dressing Progresso bread crumbs 1 jar spaghetti sauce 1 whole small peeled onion 1 peeled clove garlic spaghetti noodles Mozzarella cheese. Recipe: Dip chicken in Italian dressing then bread crumbs. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes. Add a layer of Mozzarella cheese the last few minutes (3 to 5) of cooking. Cook jar of spaghetti sauce over low heat. Add onion and garlic clove. Remove when finished cooking. Cook spaghetti noodles. Prepare plate.

title: Simple Cherry-Pineapple Crisp
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can crushed pineapple 1 can cherry pie filling 1 box yellow cake mix 1 stick margarine. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can crushed pineapple 1 can cherry pie filling 1 box yellow cake mix 1 stick margarine. Recipe: Spread crushed pineapple in the bottom of baking dish. Spread cherry pie filling over the pineapple. Spread yellow cake mix over pineapple and cherry filling. Melt margarine and drizzle over the other ingredients. Bake at 350\u00b0 until golden brown on top.

title: Wacky Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 c. flour 2 c. sugar 1/2 c. cocoa 1 tsp. salt 2 tsp. baking soda 2 Tbsp. vinegar 1 c. oil 2 c. cold water. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 c. flour 2 c. sugar 1/2 c. cocoa 1 tsp. salt 2 tsp. baking soda 2 Tbsp. vinegar 1 c. oil 2 c. cold water. Recipe: Mix all ingredients together. Pour into greased and floured 9 x 13-inch pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 to 40 minutes.

title: Cherry Torte
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. soft butter 1 c. sugar 2 tsp. vanilla 4 to 5 egg yolks 1/4 tsp. soda 1 tsp. baking powder 3 c. flour. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. soft butter 1 c. sugar 2 tsp. vanilla 4 to 5 egg yolks 1/4 tsp. soda 1 tsp. baking powder 3 c. flour. Recipe: Spread out on cookie sheet and make edges up side. Cover with cherry pie filling. Beat egg whites until stiff. Add 6 tablespoons sugar. Cover filling and sprinkle with ground nuts. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes.

title: Red Raspberry Cordial
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 c. raspberries 4 c. sugar 2 c. gin or vodka. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 c. raspberries 4 c. sugar 2 c. gin or vodka. Recipe: In a 1-gallon jar fitted with a lid combine the raspberries sugar and the gin. Stir the mixture well. Secure the lid. Let mixture stand stirring it once a week for 4 months. Strain the mixture through a cheesecloth lined sieve into a pitcher pressing hard on the solids. Return it to the jar. Makes about 4 cups.

title: Pavlova(Australia'S National Dessert)
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 egg whites at room temperature 1/4 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. cream of tartar 1 c. sugar 2 c. sweetened whipping cream 3 c. fruit of your choice. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 egg whites at room temperature 1/4 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. cream of tartar 1 c. sugar 2 c. sweetened whipping cream 3 c. fruit of your choice. Recipe: Line cookie sheet with wax paper; grease lightly. Draw 8-inch circle in middle of sheet. Beat egg whites until foamy. Add salt and cream of tartar; beat until stiff glossy peaks form. Add sugar gradually; beat 2 minutes.

title: Chunky Cheddar Chili Beans
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1 can kidney beans rinsed and drained 1/2 c. chopped onions 1 lb. can whole tomatoes chopped 6 oz. can tomato paste 1 Tbsp. chili powder 2 tsp. sugar 1 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper cubed Cheddar cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1 can kidney beans rinsed and drained 1/2 c. chopped onions 1 lb. can whole tomatoes chopped 6 oz. can tomato paste 1 Tbsp. chili powder 2 tsp. sugar 1 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper cubed Cheddar cheese. Recipe: Brown beef and onions. Drain. Add all ingredients. Cover and simmer 45 minutes. Add cheese just before serving while hot.

title: Lazy Day Chicken
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/4 lb. boneless skinless chicken breast 1 can Hunt's Special chunky tomato sauce 2 Tbsp. dried onion flakes 1 packet instant beef flavored broth mix 1/2 c. water. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/4 lb. boneless skinless chicken breast 1 can Hunt's Special chunky tomato sauce 2 Tbsp. dried onion flakes 1 packet instant beef flavored broth mix 1/2 c. water. Recipe: Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Place chicken in baking pan that has been sprayed with a nonstick cooking spray. In a small bowl combine remaining ingredients and pour over chicken. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Remove cover; continue baking 30 minutes longer.

title: Chicken Pot Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: breast of chicken cooked and diced 1 can cream of celery soup 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 soup can water 1 can Veg-All well drained. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: breast of chicken cooked and diced 1 can cream of celery soup 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 soup can water 1 can Veg-All well drained. Recipe: Mix all together and pour into a 9 x 13-inch baking dish.

title: Frito Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 tomatoes diced 1 head lettuce chopped 2 c. grated cheese 1 medium bag Fritos 1 bottle Catalina dressing 1 can Ranch Style beans. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 tomatoes diced 1 head lettuce chopped 2 c. grated cheese 1 medium bag Fritos 1 bottle Catalina dressing 1 can Ranch Style beans. Recipe: Drain beans. Mix all ingredients together except Fritos. Add Fritos just before serving.

title: Marinated Beef Slices
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 lb. cooked sirloin or roast beef (rare) 1 onion thinly sliced and separated in rings 3/4 tsp. salt dash of pepper 1 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice 1 c. dairy sour cream. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 lb. cooked sirloin or roast beef (rare) 1 onion thinly sliced and separated in rings 3/4 tsp. salt dash of pepper 1 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice 1 c. dairy sour cream. Recipe: Slice meat in julienne strips. Add sliced onion salt and pepper to taste. Sprinkle lemon juice over mixture and mix in sour cream. Chill well. Serve in crystal bowl with crackers. Great appetizer!

title: Chicken And Stuffing Bake
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 c. cut cooked chicken or turkey 1 medium stalk celery chopped 1/2 c. water 1 c. condensed cream of chicken soup 3 1/2 c. herb seasoned croutons 1 medium onion 1/3 c. margarine or butter 1 1/2 c. water. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 c. cut cooked chicken or turkey 1 medium stalk celery chopped 1/2 c. water 1 c. condensed cream of chicken soup 3 1/2 c. herb seasoned croutons 1 medium onion 1/3 c. margarine or butter 1 1/2 c. water. Recipe: Place chicken in ungreased 2-quart casserole or 9 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan. Toss croutons celery and onion with the 1/2 cup water and the margarine until croutons are moistened. Reserve about 1 1/2 cups of this stuffing. Spread remaining stuffing over chicken. Mix soup with 1 1/2 cups water; pour over stuffing. Top with reserved stuffing. Cook uncovered in a 350\u00b0 oven for about 30 minutes.

title: Turkey Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 c. or 1 (28 oz.) can turkey cut into small chunks (including juice) 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 can cream of celery soup 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 1/2 c. Minute rice. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 c. or 1 (28 oz.) can turkey cut into small chunks (including juice) 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 can cream of celery soup 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 1/2 c. Minute rice. Recipe: Mix together and bake for 40 minutes at 350\u00b0.

title: Pancakes
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 egg 1 c. all-purpose flour 2 Tbsp. oil 1 c. buttermilk 1 Tbsp. sugar 1 tsp. baking powder 1/2 tsp. baking soda 1/2 tsp. salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 egg 1 c. all-purpose flour 2 Tbsp. oil 1 c. buttermilk 1 Tbsp. sugar 1 tsp. baking powder 1/2 tsp. baking soda 1/2 tsp. salt. Recipe: Beat egg until fluffy. Beat in remaining ingredients until smooth. For thinner pancakes add 1/4 cup milk. Cook on griddle or skillet until golden brown. Makes about 9 pancakes.

title: Easy Jello Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 8 oz. cottage cheese 6 oz. Cool Whip 3 oz. Jell-O fruit well drained. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 8 oz. cottage cheese 6 oz. Cool Whip 3 oz. Jell-O fruit well drained. Recipe: You may use any combination of Jell-O and fruit you want. (Lime Jell-O and pineapple orange Jell-O and mandarin oranges.)

title: Linguine Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. linguine cooked 1 large tomato 1 large cucumber 1 large onion 1 bottle Italian dressing (16 oz.) 1/2 jar Salad Supreme. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. linguine cooked 1 large tomato 1 large cucumber 1 large onion 1 bottle Italian dressing (16 oz.) 1/2 jar Salad Supreme. Recipe: For option try broccoli. Mix all together.

title: Hobo Bread(Brown Bread)
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 1/2 c. leftover coffee or prepared instant 4 tsp. baking soda 2 c. raisins 1 c. white sugar 1 1/2 c. chopped nuts 4 c. sifted flour 1/4 tsp. salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 1/2 c. leftover coffee or prepared instant 4 tsp. baking soda 2 c. raisins 1 c. white sugar 1 1/2 c. chopped nuts 4 c. sifted flour 1/4 tsp. salt. Recipe: You will need 3 coffee cans.

title: Meltaways
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) softened cream cheese 1 c. softened margarine or butter 2 c. flour. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) softened cream cheese 1 c. softened margarine or butter 2 c. flour. Recipe: Mix in a bowl the cream cheese margarine or butter and flour. Wrap in wax paper and refrigerate overnight. Divide in quarters and roll each into 8-inch circles. Melt 1 stick of butter and brush on dough then sprinkle filling. Cut each circle into 8 triangles rolling large end to pointed end and pinch ends. Beat egg yolk with 2 tablespoons water and brush on top.

title: Snickerdoodles
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 c. butter softened 1/2 c. shortening 1 1/2 c. sugar 2 eggs 2 3/4 c. flour 2 tsp. cream of tartar 1 tsp. soda 1/4 tsp. salt 2 Tbsp. sugar 2 tsp. cinnamon. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 c. butter softened 1/2 c. shortening 1 1/2 c. sugar 2 eggs 2 3/4 c. flour 2 tsp. cream of tartar 1 tsp. soda 1/4 tsp. salt 2 Tbsp. sugar 2 tsp. cinnamon. Recipe: Heat oven to 400\u00b0. Mix thoroughly the butter shortening 1 1/2 cups sugar and eggs. Blend in flour cream of tartar soda and salt. Shape dough by rounded teaspoonful into balls. Mix 2 tablespoons sugar and the cinnamon. Roll balls in mixture and place 2-inches apart on ungreased baking sheet. Bake 8 to 10 minutes or until set. Remove immediately from baking sheet.

title: Sundown Cooler
ingredients: Ingredients: 34 oz. lemon lime soda 1 (1 liter) bottle dry white wine 1 lemon thinly sliced 1 lime thinly sliced. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 34 oz. lemon lime soda 1 (1 liter) bottle dry white wine 1 lemon thinly sliced 1 lime thinly sliced. Recipe: Chill ingredients; pour over ice and sliced fruit. Makes 16 punch cups.

title: Oreo Dirt Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/4 lb. oreo cookies 1/4 C margarine 1 C powdered sugar 8 oz cream cheese 12 oz Cool Whip 2 small packages instant chocolate pudding 3 1/2 C milk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/4 lb. oreo cookies 1/4 C margarine 1 C powdered sugar 8 oz cream cheese 12 oz Cool Whip 2 small packages instant chocolate pudding 3 1/2 C milk. Recipe: Crush oreos and layer 1/2 on bottom of glass bowl or flower pot. Cream together margarine powdered sugar and cream cheese. Add Cool Whip dry pudding mix and milk mixing well. Pour on top of oreos. Add remaining crushed oreos to top.

title: Parmesan Meat Loaf
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1 c. large curd cottage cheese 1/2 c. oatmeal 1 egg beaten 1/4 c. catsup 2 Tbsp. mustard 2 tsp. chopped onion 1 tsp. salt pepper to taste 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1 c. large curd cottage cheese 1/2 c. oatmeal 1 egg beaten 1/4 c. catsup 2 Tbsp. mustard 2 tsp. chopped onion 1 tsp. salt pepper to taste 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese. Recipe: Combine all ingredients except Parmesan cheese. Mix thoroughly. Pack lightly into an 8-inch square baking pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes. Sprinkle top with cheese. Bake 10 minutes longer. Let stand for 5 minutes. Cut into squares. Yields 6 servings.

title: Spinach Squares
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. all-purpose flour 1 tsp. baking powder 2 eggs beaten 1 c. milk 1/4 c. melted butter or margarine 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese 1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped spinach thawed and drained. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. all-purpose flour 1 tsp. baking powder 2 eggs beaten 1 c. milk 1/4 c. melted butter or margarine 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese 1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped spinach thawed and drained. Recipe: In a large bowl combine flour salt and baking powder. Stir in beaten eggs milk and butter. Add remaining ingredients and stir until moistened. Pour into lightly greased 9 x 13-inch pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 minutes. Cut into 1-inch squares. Makes 2 dozen.

title: Sweet Baked Beans
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 small cans pork and beans 1 small onion chopped 1 large dill pickle chopped 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. brown sugar 1 Tbsp. ketchup 1 tsp. mustard. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 small cans pork and beans 1 small onion chopped 1 large dill pickle chopped 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. brown sugar 1 Tbsp. ketchup 1 tsp. mustard. Recipe: Mix altogether in a baking dish. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes. Spread bacon strips across (optional).

title: Butterscotch Torte
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 egg yolks 1 c. sugar 1 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. almond 1/2 tsp. baking powder 3 egg whites 1 c. graham cracker crumbs 1/2 c. chopped nuts 1/2 pt. whipping cream. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 egg yolks 1 c. sugar 1 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. almond 1/2 tsp. baking powder 3 egg whites 1 c. graham cracker crumbs 1/2 c. chopped nuts 1/2 pt. whipping cream. Recipe: Mix together egg yolks sugar vanilla almond and baking powder. Set aside. Whip egg whites until very stiff and fold into yolk mixture. Also fold in graham cracker crumbs and nuts. Pour into greased 9 x 13-inch cake pan. Bake at 325\u00b0 for 30 minutes. Cool. Whip the whipping cream and spread over cool cake.

title: Mexican Bean Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 cans Ranch Style red beans washed and dried in colander 1 tomato chopped 1 onion chopped 3/4 lb. grated cheese (Cheddar) pepper to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 cans Ranch Style red beans washed and dried in colander 1 tomato chopped 1 onion chopped 3/4 lb. grated cheese (Cheddar) pepper to taste. Recipe: At the last minute before serving add 1 cup Catalina dressing and about 1/2 bag crushed Fritos.

title: Hungarian Goulash
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 lb. beef (chuck or rump) 4 Tbsp. fat 1 c. sliced onions 1 small clove garlic minced 3/4 c. catsup 3/8 c. Worcestershire sauce 1 tsp. vinegar 1 Tbsp. brown sugar 2 1/2 tsp. paprika 2 tsp. salt 1 tsp. dry mustard dash of red pepper 3 c. water 2 Tbsp. flour 1/4 c. water parsley to taste cooked noodles. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 lb. beef (chuck or rump) 4 Tbsp. fat 1 c. sliced onions 1 small clove garlic minced 3/4 c. catsup 3/8 c. Worcestershire sauce 1 tsp. vinegar 1 Tbsp. brown sugar 2 1/2 tsp. paprika 2 tsp. salt 1 tsp. dry mustard dash of red pepper 3 c. water 2 Tbsp. flour 1/4 c. water parsley to taste cooked noodles. Recipe: Cut beef into 1-inch pieces and brown in hot fat. Add onion and garlic; brown lightly. Mix together catsup Worcestershire sauce vinegar brown sugar paprika salt mustard and pepper. Stir in with meat. Add 3 cups water; cover and simmer 2 to 2 1/2 hours. Thicken with mixture of 2 tablespoons flour and 1/4 cup water. Pour goulash over cooked noodles and garnish with parsley. Serves 8.

title: Broccoli Cornbread
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 box Jiffy corn muffin mix 4 eggs 3/4 c. cottage cheese 1 small onion finely chopped 10 oz. broccoli chopped 1 stick melted butter 1 tsp. salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 box Jiffy corn muffin mix 4 eggs 3/4 c. cottage cheese 1 small onion finely chopped 10 oz. broccoli chopped 1 stick melted butter 1 tsp. salt. Recipe: Mix cottage cheese and salt. Add eggs. Mix broccoli onion and butter. Then add cornmeal mix. Beat until smooth. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 20 minutes or until golden brown.

title: Orange Blossoms
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 pkg. yellow cake mix 1 c. orange juice 1/2 c. lemon juice 2 lb. sifted confectioners sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 pkg. yellow cake mix 1 c. orange juice 1/2 c. lemon juice 2 lb. sifted confectioners sugar. Recipe: Prepare cake mix according to package directions. Place 1 teaspoon of batter in each well-greased miniature muffin pans. Bake at 325\u00b0 for about 10 minutes.

title: Corn Pudding
ingredients: Ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 2 Tbsp. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 2 eggs 1 1/4 c. milk 1/2 stick butter melted 1 1/2 pt. corn drained. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 2 Tbsp. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 2 eggs 1 1/4 c. milk 1/2 stick butter melted 1 1/2 pt. corn drained. Recipe: Mix all ingredients together. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 1 hour.

title: Chicken Cordon Blue
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 chicken breasts (halves) 3 slices Swiss or Jack cheese 3 slices cooked ham 1 tsp. paprika 1/2 c. white wine 1 c. whipping cream 3 Tbsp. flour 1 tsp. salt pepper to taste 3 Tbsp. butter 1 chicken bouillon cube. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 chicken breasts (halves) 3 slices Swiss or Jack cheese 3 slices cooked ham 1 tsp. paprika 1/2 c. white wine 1 c. whipping cream 3 Tbsp. flour 1 tsp. salt pepper to taste 3 Tbsp. butter 1 chicken bouillon cube. Recipe: Pound breasts until thin. Lay slice of cheese and ham on each breast; roll and insert toothpicks to secure. Mix flour salt pepper and paprika in plastic bag. Put breasts in bag and shake to coat. Melt butter in frying pan and brown chicken rolls on all sides. Add white wine and bouillon cube. Cover and simmer 30 minutes. Remove chicken from pan. Add cream to pan and cook on medium-high for 3 minutes until smooth and creamy. Pour over chicken. Serves 3.

title: Corn Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can creamed corn 1 can whole corn 1 stick margarine 1 box Jiffy corn bread mix 1 (16 oz.) container fat free sour cream. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can creamed corn 1 can whole corn 1 stick margarine 1 box Jiffy corn bread mix 1 (16 oz.) container fat free sour cream. Recipe: In a large mixing bowl mix well the 2 cans of corn margarine (melted) and the corn bread mix (dry). Stir in approximately 3/4 of the sour cream. Mix well.

title: Poppy Seed Bread
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 pkg. Betty Crocker butter pecan cake mix 1 small pkg. instant coconut pudding 1 c. boiling water 2 Tbsp. poppy seed 1/2 c. oil 4 eggs. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 pkg. Betty Crocker butter pecan cake mix 1 small pkg. instant coconut pudding 1 c. boiling water 2 Tbsp. poppy seed 1/2 c. oil 4 eggs. Recipe: Mix boiling water and poppy seed together. Set aside. Mix remaining ingredients. Add seed and water mixture. Pour into 2 greased loaf pans. Bake at 325\u00b0 for 1 hour. Freezes well.

title: Buttermilk Brownie Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. butter 1/3 c. cocoa 2 c. flour 2 c. sugar 1 tsp. soda 1/2 tsp. salt 2 slightly beaten eggs 1/2 c. buttermilk 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. butter 1/3 c. cocoa 2 c. flour 2 c. sugar 1 tsp. soda 1/2 tsp. salt 2 slightly beaten eggs 1/2 c. buttermilk 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: In a saucepan combine butter cocoa and 1 cup water. Bring to a boil and stir constantly. Remove from heat. In a large bowl sift together flour sugar soda and salt. Stir in eggs buttermilk and vanilla. Add cocoa mixture; mix until blended. Pour into a greased 15 x 10 x 1-inch pan. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 20 minutes. Immediately pour frosting over brownies; spread evenly.

title: Seven Layer Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: lettuce tomatoes boiled eggs cut grated cheese 2 cans English peas drained Miracle Whip mayonnaise bacon bits. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: lettuce tomatoes boiled eggs cut grated cheese 2 cans English peas drained Miracle Whip mayonnaise bacon bits. Recipe: Layer all ingredients in order listed. Cover with Miracle Whip mayonnaise and sprinkle bacon bits on top. Refrigerate.

title: Taco Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 lb. ground beef 2 c. chopped onions 1 c. chopped celery 1 c. chopped green bell pepper 3 Tbsp. cumin seed 3 cloves garlic minced 4 tsp. chili powder salt and pepper to taste 8 oz. Velveeta cheese shredded 1 (10 oz.) can Ro-Tel tomatoes 18 c. chopped lettuce 8 tomatoes chopped 1 (16 oz.) pkg. corn chips crushed. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 lb. ground beef 2 c. chopped onions 1 c. chopped celery 1 c. chopped green bell pepper 3 Tbsp. cumin seed 3 cloves garlic minced 4 tsp. chili powder salt and pepper to taste 8 oz. Velveeta cheese shredded 1 (10 oz.) can Ro-Tel tomatoes 18 c. chopped lettuce 8 tomatoes chopped 1 (16 oz.) pkg. corn chips crushed. Recipe: Combine first 7 ingredients in crock-pot; mix well. Add salt and pepper. Cook on low for 3 to 4 hours or until done to taste. Heat cheese and tomatoes in saucepan until cheese melts stirring constantly. Layer lettuce ground beef sauce tomatoes cheese sauce and crushed corn chips on individual plates. Yield: 12 servings.

title: Pizza Dippers
ingredients: Ingredients: 10 oz. can Pillsbury refrigerator pizza crust 2 Tbsp. margarine 1 1/2 tsp. pizza seasonings 4 oz. (1 c.) shredded Mozzarella cheese 8 oz. pizza sauce (warm). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 10 oz. can Pillsbury refrigerator pizza crust 2 Tbsp. margarine 1 1/2 tsp. pizza seasonings 4 oz. (1 c.) shredded Mozzarella cheese 8 oz. pizza sauce (warm). Recipe: Grease 1 large cookie sheet and unroll pizza dough cutting the rectangle in half crosswise then cutting 8 (1-inch) strips. Place strips apart on cookie sheet and brush with margarine. Sprinkle evenly with seasoning and put into 350\u00b0 oven for 11 to 17 minutes. Bring out long enough to sprinkle cheese on top and return to melt. Serve immediately with warm pizza sauce to dip. Makes 16 servings.

title: Madge'S Refrigerator Rolls
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 Tbsp. sugar 1 pkg. yeast 1/2 c. lukewarm water 1 pt. milk 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 c. shortening or oleo 1 Tbsp. salt 2 egg whites beaten stiff 6 c. sifted flour. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 Tbsp. sugar 1 pkg. yeast 1/2 c. lukewarm water 1 pt. milk 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 c. shortening or oleo 1 Tbsp. salt 2 egg whites beaten stiff 6 c. sifted flour. Recipe: Put sugar over yeast in lukewarm water and let foam. Scald milk sugar oleo and salt. When cool add dissolved yeast. Fold in egg whites stir in flour. Dough should be soft. Do not add more flour. Let stand covered until double in size. Stir down and put covered in refrigerator. Let set overnight. Bake in muffin tins. Two small balls dipped in melted oleo forms one roll.

title: Super Sundae Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 pt. (1 qt.) vanilla ice cream 1 (6 oz.) graham cracker pie crust 1 jar strawberry topping 1 bottle chocolate sundae syrup 1/2 c. nuts whipped cream maraschino cherries. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 pt. (1 qt.) vanilla ice cream 1 (6 oz.) graham cracker pie crust 1 jar strawberry topping 1 bottle chocolate sundae syrup 1/2 c. nuts whipped cream maraschino cherries. Recipe: In a mixing bowl stir slightly softened ice cream until smooth. Spoon the ice cream into the pie crust and cover. Place pie in freezer for several hours until hard. Remove pie from freezer and let stand for 10 minutes to soften. Spoon strawberry topping onto serving plate. Cut pie and place on top of strawberry topping. Garnish with chocolate sundae syrup and other toppings as desired. Sprinkle with nuts and a cherry. Return to freezer.

title: Cranberry-Orange Relish For Poultry
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 oranges peeled and sectioned 1 (16 oz.) can whole cranberry sauce 1 (16 oz.) can pear halves drained and chopped 1 apple (unpeeled) chopped 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. raisins 1/4 c. chopped pecans 1 Tbsp. vinegar 1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon 1/2 tsp. ground ginger. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 oranges peeled and sectioned 1 (16 oz.) can whole cranberry sauce 1 (16 oz.) can pear halves drained and chopped 1 apple (unpeeled) chopped 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. raisins 1/4 c. chopped pecans 1 Tbsp. vinegar 1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon 1/2 tsp. ground ginger. Recipe: Combine all ingredients in a saucepan; bring to a boil over medium heat. Reduce heat and simmer until thick. Let cool and store in refrigerator.

title: Swedish Heirloom Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 c. shortening 1/2 c. butter softened 1 c. sifted powdered sugar 1/2 tsp. salt 2 c. all-purpose flour 1 Tbsp. water 1 Tbsp. vanilla extract 1 1/4 c. ground almonds powdered sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 c. shortening 1/2 c. butter softened 1 c. sifted powdered sugar 1/2 tsp. salt 2 c. all-purpose flour 1 Tbsp. water 1 Tbsp. vanilla extract 1 1/4 c. ground almonds powdered sugar. Recipe: Cream shortening and butter until light and fluffy. Add powdered sugar and salt. Mix well. Stir in flour. Stir in water vanilla and almonds. Shape dough into 1-inch balls. Place on ungreased baking sheets. Flatten slightly. Bake at 325\u00b0 for 12 to 15 minutes or until done. Dredge cookies in powdered sugar while they're still warm. Yields about 8 dozen.

title: Garden Cabbage Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 small cabbage finely shredded 1 bunch green onions chopped 1 carrot shredded 1 small green pepper finely chopped 6 radishes thinly sliced 1 cucumber finely chopped Dressing. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 small cabbage finely shredded 1 bunch green onions chopped 1 carrot shredded 1 small green pepper finely chopped 6 radishes thinly sliced 1 cucumber finely chopped Dressing. Recipe: Combine all ingredients except dressing. Cover and chill. Toss with dressing just before serving. Yields 8 to 10 servings.

title: Kentucky Pecan Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. white corn syrup 1 c. brown sugar 1/2 tsp. salt 1/3 c. melted butter 1 tsp. vanilla 3 whole eggs slightly beaten 1 c. pecans finely chopped. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. white corn syrup 1 c. brown sugar 1/2 tsp. salt 1/3 c. melted butter 1 tsp. vanilla 3 whole eggs slightly beaten 1 c. pecans finely chopped. Recipe: Mix all ingredients. Bake 45 minutes in preheated oven at 350\u00b0. Decorate with whole pecan halves.

title: London Broil
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 flank steak (1 1/2 lb. or so) 1 c. salad oil 1 Tbsp. vinegar 1 clove garlic minced salt and pepper. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 flank steak (1 1/2 lb. or so) 1 c. salad oil 1 Tbsp. vinegar 1 clove garlic minced salt and pepper. Recipe: Place steak in shallow pan. Combine oil vinegar and garlic. Pour over steak. Cover and let stand in refrigerator for 3 hours or better yet overnight turning several times. Preheat broiler. Broil steak 3-inches from heat about 5 minutes. Season. Turn; broil 3 minutes. Add more seasoning. Remove to cutting board. Carve very thin slices diagonally across the grain. Serves 4 to 5.

title: Hello Dolly Bars
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 stick of Oleo 1 c. Graham Cracker Crumbs 1 c. Chocolate Chips 1 c. Butterscotch Chips 1 c. Walnuts chopped optional 1 c. Coconut shedded 1 c. Condensed Milk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 stick of Oleo 1 c. Graham Cracker Crumbs 1 c. Chocolate Chips 1 c. Butterscotch Chips 1 c. Walnuts chopped optional 1 c. Coconut shedded 1 c. Condensed Milk. Recipe: Melt oleo in a pan. Add graham cracker. Mix and spread in bottom of a 9 x 13 inch greased pan. Layer chocolate chips butterscotch chips walnuts if desired and shredded coconut. Pour condensed milk on top and bake at 350\u00b0 for 30-35 minutes. Cool and cut into bars.

title: Macaroni And Cheese Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. sharp cheese grated 8 oz. macaroni cooked and drained 1 can condensed cream of mushroom soup 2 oz. jar pimento 1 c. mayonnaise 1/2 onion grated. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. sharp cheese grated 8 oz. macaroni cooked and drained 1 can condensed cream of mushroom soup 2 oz. jar pimento 1 c. mayonnaise 1/2 onion grated. Recipe: Mix all ingredients. Before baking cover with crumbled cheese crackers and dot with butter. Bake at 325\u00b0 for 40 minutes.

title: Betsy'S Chocolate Fudge Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 sq. unsweetened chocolate 2 1/4 c. sifted flour 2 tsp. baking powder 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 c. butter 2 1/4 c. packed light brown sugar 3 eggs 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla 1 c. sour cream 1 c. boiling water. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 sq. unsweetened chocolate 2 1/4 c. sifted flour 2 tsp. baking powder 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 c. butter 2 1/4 c. packed light brown sugar 3 eggs 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla 1 c. sour cream 1 c. boiling water. Recipe: Melt chocolate in small bowl over hot water; cool. Grease and flour 2 to 3 (9-inch) cake pans. Sift flour baking soda and salt onto wax paper. Beat butter until soft in large bowl. Add brown sugar and eggs; beat with mixer at high speed until light and fluffy (5 minutes). Beat in vanilla and chocolate. Stir in dry ingredients alternating with sour cream. Beat well with wooden spoon after each addition. Stir in boiling water (batter will be thin). Pour into pan and bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 minutes. Cool pans on rack for 10 minutes; turn out on racks. Cool completely and ice with Chocolate Fudge Frosting.

title: Cream Cheese Squares
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 box yellow cake mix 1 egg 1 stick margarine 1 box 10x sugar 2 eggs 8 oz. cream cheese softened. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 box yellow cake mix 1 egg 1 stick margarine 1 box 10x sugar 2 eggs 8 oz. cream cheese softened. Recipe: Mix the cake mix egg and margarine good and press into a 9 x 12-inch sheet cake pan. Next mix and cream together good the sugar 2 eggs and sour cream. Spread on top of cake mixture. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 40 minutes. Cut when cool.

title: Beef Barbecue
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 to 5 lb. boneless chuck roast 1 c. ketchup 1/2 c. water 1/2 tsp. mustard 4 Tbsp. lemon juice 2 Tbsp. vinegar 1 onion finely chopped. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 to 5 lb. boneless chuck roast 1 c. ketchup 1/2 c. water 1/2 tsp. mustard 4 Tbsp. lemon juice 2 Tbsp. vinegar 1 onion finely chopped. Recipe: Cook on top of stove several hours. (Meat will eventually shred.) Cook on low to medium heat. If liquid disappears add water and ketchup (if needed). Cut beef in pieces and put into pot; add all ingredients to the beef. Cook 3 to 4 hours.

title: Chicken Stroganoff
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. chicken breasts 2 Tbsp. vegetable oil 2 medium onions 1/2 lb. mushrooms (2 c.) thinly sliced 1 Tbsp. cornstarch 1/8 tsp. pepper 2 Tbsp. water 1 (8 oz.) pkg. yogurt hot cooked noodles 1 tsp. minced garlic 1/2 c. chicken broth. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. chicken breasts 2 Tbsp. vegetable oil 2 medium onions 1/2 lb. mushrooms (2 c.) thinly sliced 1 Tbsp. cornstarch 1/8 tsp. pepper 2 Tbsp. water 1 (8 oz.) pkg. yogurt hot cooked noodles 1 tsp. minced garlic 1/2 c. chicken broth. Recipe: Slice chicken into thin strips. In a large skillet over medium heat heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil. Add onions. Saute 2 minutes. Add mushrooms and saute 3 minutes longer. Remove vegetables from skillet; reserve. Heat remaining oil in skillet. Add chicken and garlic. Cook as for stir-fry. Return vegetables to skillet. Add broth and pepper. In a small bowl combine water and cornstarch. Stir into skillet mixture. Over medium heat bring to a boil and boil 1 minute stirring constantly. Remove from heat and stir in yogurt. Heat gently over low heat (do not boil). Serve over noodles.

title: Cream Pie And Pudding(Microwave)
ingredients: Ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 3/8 c. flour 1/4 tsp. salt 2 eggs or 3 egg yolks 2 c. milk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 3/8 c. flour 1/4 tsp. salt 2 eggs or 3 egg yolks 2 c. milk. Recipe: Microwave Directions: Combine sugar flour and salt in deep 2-quart glass mixing bowl. Add eggs and milk. Beat with whisk until smooth. Microwave at Full power for 8 minutes stirring 3 times. Proceed as recipe directs.

title: Crispix Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (12 oz.) pkg. butterscotch morsels 1 (6 oz.) pkg. semi-sweet chocolate morsels 1 1/2 c. salted peanuts 4 c. Kellogg's Crispix cereal. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (12 oz.) pkg. butterscotch morsels 1 (6 oz.) pkg. semi-sweet chocolate morsels 1 1/2 c. salted peanuts 4 c. Kellogg's Crispix cereal. Recipe: Combine butterscotch and semi-sweet chocolate morsels in a large saucepan. Stir constantly over low heat until smooth. Remove from heat and add peanuts and cereal. Stir gently until well coated. Drop by teaspoons onto waxed paper. Chill until firm.

title: Rum Balls
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 c. finely crushed vanilla wafers 1 c. finely chopped nuts (any kind) 1 1/2 c. powdered sugar separated 1 c. semi-sweet chocolate 1/2 c. light corn syrup 1/3 c. rum. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 c. finely crushed vanilla wafers 1 c. finely chopped nuts (any kind) 1 1/2 c. powdered sugar separated 1 c. semi-sweet chocolate 1/2 c. light corn syrup 1/3 c. rum. Recipe: Combine crushed wafers nuts and 1/2 cup powdered sugar in large bowl; set aside. Melt chocolate with corn syrup. Stir in rum until smooth. Pour chocolate mixture over crumb mixture; mix thoroughly. Roll into 1-inch balls. Place on wax paper. Roll each ball in remaining 1 cup powdered sugar. Store in airtight container for at least 3 days before serving.

title: Millionaire Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. flour 2 c. sugar 2 tsp. soda 2 eggs 1 c. coconut 1 c. chopped nuts 1 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. salt 20 oz. can crushed pineapple and juice. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. flour 2 c. sugar 2 tsp. soda 2 eggs 1 c. coconut 1 c. chopped nuts 1 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. salt 20 oz. can crushed pineapple and juice. Recipe: Beat together. Bake in a 9 x 13-inch pan at 350\u00b0 for 45 to 55 minutes.

title: Hawaiian Carrots
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. pkg. carrots 1 (No. 2) can and 1 small can crushed pineapple drained 3 Tbsp. cornstarch 1/2 c. brown sugar 1/2 stick oleo. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. pkg. carrots 1 (No. 2) can and 1 small can crushed pineapple drained 3 Tbsp. cornstarch 1/2 c. brown sugar 1/2 stick oleo. Recipe: Scrape and cut carrots into small pieces or chunks. Cook and drain; salt. Drain pineapple. Use 1/2 cup pineapple juice cornstarch oleo and sugar and cook until thick. Add carrots and pineapple to sauce and simmer 10 minutes. Better if made a day ahead.

title: Ginny'S Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 to 4 bunches red leaf lettuce 12 oz. shredded Mozzarella cheese 6 to 8 oz. chopped walnuts 2 pkg. Good Seasons Italian dressing mixed according to directions. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 to 4 bunches red leaf lettuce 12 oz. shredded Mozzarella cheese 6 to 8 oz. chopped walnuts 2 pkg. Good Seasons Italian dressing mixed according to directions. Recipe: Wash dry and break lettuce into bite size pieces. Toss in cheese and walnuts. Mix with dressing prior to serving.

title: Onion Soup
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 large onions thinly sliced 1 Tbsp. butter 1 Tbsp. vegetable oil 1/4 tsp. sugar 2 Tbsp. flour 6 c. beef broth 1/4 c. white wine 4 to 8 slices French bread 2 tsp. vegetable oil 1 to 2 c. grated Swiss cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 large onions thinly sliced 1 Tbsp. butter 1 Tbsp. vegetable oil 1/4 tsp. sugar 2 Tbsp. flour 6 c. beef broth 1/4 c. white wine 4 to 8 slices French bread 2 tsp. vegetable oil 1 to 2 c. grated Swiss cheese. Recipe: Cook onions in butter and oil for 15 minutes in Dutch oven; stir occasionally. Add sugar and cook 15 minutes until onions are brown. Sprinkle onions with flour; blend in hot broth wine and seasonings. Simmer for 30 minutes. Lightly toast garlic bread in 350\u00b0 oven for 20 minutes. Baste each slice with 1/2 teaspoon oil and garlic. Serve soup with toast floating on the soup. Sprinkle the toast with cheese. Bake for 15 minutes. Serve hot. Makes 4 to 8 servings.

title: Banana Walnut Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 3/4 c. shortening (butter) 2 1/4 c. sugar 3 c. cake flour sifted 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla 3/4 tsp. salt 1 1/2 c. chopped walnuts 6 Tbsp. sour milk 1 1/2 c. banana pulp 3 eggs beaten well 3 tsp. baking powder 3/4 tsp. soda. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3/4 c. shortening (butter) 2 1/4 c. sugar 3 c. cake flour sifted 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla 3/4 tsp. salt 1 1/2 c. chopped walnuts 6 Tbsp. sour milk 1 1/2 c. banana pulp 3 eggs beaten well 3 tsp. baking powder 3/4 tsp. soda. Recipe: Cream shortening and gradually add sugar; cream together until light and fluffy. Add eggs. Sift flour before measuring then add baking powder soda and salt. Add the sour milk and flour mixture alternating with the egg sugar and butter mixture. Beat after each addition. Add banana pulp; beat well. Add nuts. Pour into greased Bundt pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 50 to 60 minutes.

title: Fish And Broccoli Roll-Ups(Serves 4)
ingredients: Ingredients: 16 oz. flounder or haddock 4 c. broccoli 8 lemon wedges 1/2 c. salad dressing. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 16 oz. flounder or haddock 4 c. broccoli 8 lemon wedges 1/2 c. salad dressing. Recipe: Cut fish into strips. Cut broccoli into small pieces. Alternate broccoli pieces and rolled fish strips onto kabob spears adding lemon wedges to each end. Baste with salad dressing. Broil 8 to 10 minutes.

title: Fat Free Pizza Treats
ingredients: Ingredients: toasted English muffins pizza sauce 1 Tbsp. (skim) Mozzarella cheese Parmesan cheese grated onion sliced mushrooms chopped green pepper. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: toasted English muffins pizza sauce 1 Tbsp. (skim) Mozzarella cheese Parmesan cheese grated onion sliced mushrooms chopped green pepper. Recipe: Top English muffins with pizza sauce and toppings of your choice ending with cheese. Toast in toaster oven until cheese melts.

title: Sesame Chicken Wings
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 1/2 Tbsp. light soy sauce 1/2 garlic clove minced 1/2 tsp. minced fresh ginger 1 Tbsp. honey freshly ground black pepper to taste 2 lb. chicken wings wing tips cut off 1 Tbsp. Oriental sesame oil 2 Tbsp. sesame seed toasted lightly. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 1/2 Tbsp. light soy sauce 1/2 garlic clove minced 1/2 tsp. minced fresh ginger 1 Tbsp. honey freshly ground black pepper to taste 2 lb. chicken wings wing tips cut off 1 Tbsp. Oriental sesame oil 2 Tbsp. sesame seed toasted lightly. Recipe: In a bowl whisk together the soy sauce the garlic the ginger the honey and the pepper. Add the wings; toss them to coat and let them marinate covered and chilled for 2 hours. Line a baking pan with foil and arrange the wings drained (reserving the marinade) in one layer on the foil. Brush the wings with the oil; sprinkle them with the sesame seed and bake them in the middle of a preheated 400\u00b0 oven basting them occasionally with the reserved marinade for 30 to 35 minutes or until they are browned. Serves 4 as an hors d'oeuvre.

title: Imitation Crabmeat Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 lb. imitation crabmeat 1 pkg. spiral pasta 8 oz. sour cream 10 oz. mayonnaise 3 to 4 sticks celery 3 to 4 green onions (about 1/4 c.) 6 oz. water chestnuts 6 oz. frozen pea pods 1/4 tsp. dill weed 1/4 tsp. onion powder 1/4 tsp. Beau Monde 1/4 tsp. celery salt 1/4 tsp. pepper. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 lb. imitation crabmeat 1 pkg. spiral pasta 8 oz. sour cream 10 oz. mayonnaise 3 to 4 sticks celery 3 to 4 green onions (about 1/4 c.) 6 oz. water chestnuts 6 oz. frozen pea pods 1/4 tsp. dill weed 1/4 tsp. onion powder 1/4 tsp. Beau Monde 1/4 tsp. celery salt 1/4 tsp. pepper. Recipe: Shred crabmeat into thin strips 1/4 to 1/2-inch x 3 to 4-inches long. Cook pasta and drain. Add pasta to crabmeat then add all other ingredients. Chill for at least 1/2 hour before serving.

title: Macaroni And Cottage Cheese
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 c. uncooked macaroni 1 small carton cottage cheese 1/2 stick butter salt and pepper to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 c. uncooked macaroni 1 small carton cottage cheese 1/2 stick butter salt and pepper to taste. Recipe: Cook macaroni until tender. Drain. Put into dish and mix in 1 small carton cottage cheese. Brown butter in skillet and pour over mixture. Salt and pepper to taste. Serve.

title: String Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/4 c. chopped green onion 1 jar spaghetti sauce 8 oz. spaghetti cooked and drained 1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese 2 eggs beaten 2 tsp. butter 1 c. cottage cheese 1/2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/4 c. chopped green onion 1 jar spaghetti sauce 8 oz. spaghetti cooked and drained 1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese 2 eggs beaten 2 tsp. butter 1 c. cottage cheese 1/2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese. Recipe: Cook beef onion and green pepper in large skillet over medium-high heat until meat is brown stirring to separate meat; drain fat. Stir in spaghetti sauce mix well. Combine Parmesan cheese eggs and butter in large bowl; mix well. Place in bottom of 13 x 9-inch pan; spread cottage cheese over top. Pour sauce mixture over cottage cheese. Sprinkle Mozzarella over top. Bake in preheated 350\u00b0 oven until cheese melts about 20 minutes.

title: Easters Hamburgers
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can tomato sauce 1/2 tsp. dry mustard 2 Tbsp. brown sugar salt and pepper chili powder. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can tomato sauce 1/2 tsp. dry mustard 2 Tbsp. brown sugar salt and pepper chili powder. Recipe: Brown hamburger patties. Slice raw onions on top. Pour mixture over hamburgers. Bake 1 hour at 350\u00b0.

title: Coconut Macaroons
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 1/3 c. coconut 2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour 2 egg whites maraschino cherries 1/3 c. sugar 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. almond extract. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 1/3 c. coconut 2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour 2 egg whites maraschino cherries 1/3 c. sugar 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. almond extract. Recipe: Combine first 4 ingredients. Stir in beaten egg whites and almond extract; mix well. Lightly grease cookie sheet. Cut cherries in quarters. Drop by teaspoonful onto cookie sheet about 1-inch apart. Top with cherry. Bake at 325\u00b0 for 20 to 25 minutes. Take out when edges are golden.

title: Cranberry Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 oranges 2 apples 1 lb. cranberries No. 2 can crushed pineapple 2 small pkg. Jell-O * 1 1/2 c. sugar 2 c. water 1 c. chopped nuts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 oranges 2 apples 1 lb. cranberries No. 2 can crushed pineapple 2 small pkg. Jell-O * 1 1/2 c. sugar 2 c. water 1 c. chopped nuts. Recipe: Put oranges apples and cranberries through food chopper. Drain pineapple and add. Dissolve Jell-O sugar in water (heat to dissolve thoroughly). Mix into mixture well and add chopped nuts. Let set in refrigerator about 24 hours before serving.

title: Lazy Day Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 large can fruit cocktail drained 2 cans mandarin oranges drained 1 large can crushed pineapple with juice 1 box instant vanilla pudding 1 box instant lemon pudding 1 large container Cool Whip. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 large can fruit cocktail drained 2 cans mandarin oranges drained 1 large can crushed pineapple with juice 1 box instant vanilla pudding 1 box instant lemon pudding 1 large container Cool Whip. Recipe: Mix all ingredients by hand. Fold in Cool Whip. Refrigerate all day or overnight. Will keep for 7 to 10 days in fridge.

title: Pear Relish
ingredients: Ingredients: 16 pears peeled cored and ground 6 medium onions ground 8 green peppers ground 4 sweet red peppers ground 2 hot peppers ground 6 c. vinegar (5% acidity) 6 c. sugar 3 Tbsp. mustard seed 2 Tbsp. pickling salt 1 Tbsp. ground turmeric 1 tsp. ground allspice 1 tsp. ground cinnamon 1 tsp. ground ginger. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 16 pears peeled cored and ground 6 medium onions ground 8 green peppers ground 4 sweet red peppers ground 2 hot peppers ground 6 c. vinegar (5% acidity) 6 c. sugar 3 Tbsp. mustard seed 2 Tbsp. pickling salt 1 Tbsp. ground turmeric 1 tsp. ground allspice 1 tsp. ground cinnamon 1 tsp. ground ginger. Recipe: Let pears onions and peppers stand in separate containers for 1 hour. Pour boiling water over each; drain well. Combine pears onion peppers vinegar sugar and seasonings in a large kettle. Bring to a boil reduce heat and simmer uncovered for 30 minutes. Pour hot mixture into hot sterilized jars leaving 1/4 inch headspace. Remove air bubbles and wipe jar rims. Cover at once with metal lids and screw on bands. Process in boiling water bath for 20 minutes. Let stay in a cool place for 1 month before using. Chill before serving. Makes 10 pints.

title: Strawberry Bread
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 1/2 c. fresh crushed strawberries or 2 (10 oz.) containers frozen strawberries thawed 4 eggs 1 1/4 c. salad oil 3 c. flour 2 c. sugar 1 Tbsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. soda 1 tsp. salt 1 c. chopped nuts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 1/2 c. fresh crushed strawberries or 2 (10 oz.) containers frozen strawberries thawed 4 eggs 1 1/4 c. salad oil 3 c. flour 2 c. sugar 1 Tbsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. soda 1 tsp. salt 1 c. chopped nuts. Recipe: Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Grease and flour two 9 x 5-inch loaf pans. In a medium bowl stir berries eggs and oil. In a large bowl combine flour sugar cinnamon soda salt and nuts. Add berry mix to dry ingredients and stir until blended. Pour into greased pans. Bake 1 hour or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.

title: Strawberry Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 pkg. strawberry jello 1 c. boiling water 1 large can crushed pineapple 3 mashed bananas 1 c. chopped pecans 1 or 2 c. sour cream. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 pkg. strawberry jello 1 c. boiling water 1 large can crushed pineapple 3 mashed bananas 1 c. chopped pecans 1 or 2 c. sour cream. Recipe: Dissolve jello and water; add rest of ingredients. Pour half in pan to set. Spread on cream. Add rest of jello.

title: Chili Beef Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can tomato soup 1 can chili beef soup 3/4 lb. extra lean ground beef 1 c. macaroni 3 slices sharp processed American cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can tomato soup 1 can chili beef soup 3/4 lb. extra lean ground beef 1 c. macaroni 3 slices sharp processed American cheese. Recipe: Cook macaroni in boiling salted water until done (10 to 12 minutes). Drain thoroughly. Brown ground beef in skillet. Add the soups and the macaroni. Heat for 5 to 7 minutes stirring occasionally until the mixture is bubbly. Slice cheese slices in half diagonally and put on top of hot mixture. Cover for a few minutes to allow cheese to melt slightly. Serve at once. Serves 6.

title: Bread
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. warm water 1 pkg. yeast (RapidRise) 3 Tbsp. melted butter or shortening 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 tsp. salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. warm water 1 pkg. yeast (RapidRise) 3 Tbsp. melted butter or shortening 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 tsp. salt. Recipe: Dissolve yeast in warm water. Add other ingredients then add 1 to 1 1/2 cups whole wheat flour. Blend with electric mixer. Add slowly bread flour (3 1/2 to 4 cups; total wheat and bread flour should be 5 cups). After 3 cups flour are mixed with electric mixer fold the balance of flour with a wooden spoon. Put on a floured board or wax paper and knead. Next put in oiled bowl. Oil top of dough and press wax paper down over dough. Let rise until doubled in bulk. Divide dough and put in pans and let rise again. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes to 1 hour or until golden brown and pulled away from sides. This will make 2 big loaves or 4 small loaves.

title: Salmon Casserole Baked In Sour Cream
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (1 lb.) can salmon drained and juice reserved 1 Tbsp. lemon juice 1/2 tsp. salt pepper to taste 1 c. sour cream 1/2 tsp. dry dill weed 1 medium onion thinly sliced 1 Tbsp. chopped parsley. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (1 lb.) can salmon drained and juice reserved 1 Tbsp. lemon juice 1/2 tsp. salt pepper to taste 1 c. sour cream 1/2 tsp. dry dill weed 1 medium onion thinly sliced 1 Tbsp. chopped parsley. Recipe: Place salmon liquid in mixing bowl add lemon juice salt pepper sour cream and dill weed. Mix to smooth sauce. Break salmon in large chunks; place in greased 1-quart casserole. Pour sour cream sauce over salmon. Spread with onion; sprinkle with parsley. Cover and bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes. Yields 4 servings.

title: Carrie'S Cabbage Soup
ingredients: Ingredients: 6 c. shredded green cabbage 1 c. chopped onion 2 c. diced celery 1/2 c. diced green pepper 1/2 tsp. thyme 1/4 tsp. marjoram 1 Tbsp. anisette 6 peeled ripe red tomatoes 2 pkg. dry onion soup mix 2 cans beef bouillon water 1/4 tsp. tarragon 2 Tbsp. granulated sugar 8 oz. tomato sauce 1 lb. ground beef browned (optional) 1 lb. sausage (link Polish Italian kielbasi or ground browned or precooked). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 6 c. shredded green cabbage 1 c. chopped onion 2 c. diced celery 1/2 c. diced green pepper 1/2 tsp. thyme 1/4 tsp. marjoram 1 Tbsp. anisette 6 peeled ripe red tomatoes 2 pkg. dry onion soup mix 2 cans beef bouillon water 1/4 tsp. tarragon 2 Tbsp. granulated sugar 8 oz. tomato sauce 1 lb. ground beef browned (optional) 1 lb. sausage (link Polish Italian kielbasi or ground browned or precooked). Recipe: Combine all ingredients except meat with enough water to cover. Bring to a rolling boil then simmer for about 3 hours adding choice of meat in last 20 minutes. (The use of fresh herbs enhances flavor.)

title: Chicken And Pasta Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) pkg. egg noodles cooked and drained 3 chicken breasts cooked and cut up in small pieces seedless green grapes sliced almonds. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) pkg. egg noodles cooked and drained 3 chicken breasts cooked and cut up in small pieces seedless green grapes sliced almonds. Recipe: Dressing: Mix mayonnaise Ranch dressing creamy Italian dressing and a little sugar together and blend to taste. Pour over and toss.

title: Calico Beans
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can lima beans drained 1 can pork and beans 1 can red beans 1 can black-eyed peas 1 lb. hamburger 1/2 lb. chopped bacon 1 medium onion chopped 1/2 c. celery chopped 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce 1/2 c. brown sugar 1 c. catsup 1 Tbsp. liquid smoke 1 Tbsp. mustard 1 Tbsp. vinegar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can lima beans drained 1 can pork and beans 1 can red beans 1 can black-eyed peas 1 lb. hamburger 1/2 lb. chopped bacon 1 medium onion chopped 1/2 c. celery chopped 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce 1/2 c. brown sugar 1 c. catsup 1 Tbsp. liquid smoke 1 Tbsp. mustard 1 Tbsp. vinegar. Recipe: Brown hamburger and bacon. Add 1 medium chopped onion and the celery. Mix sauce sugar catsup liquid smoke mustard and vinegar. Mix beans and sauce with meat; bake in a casserole dish at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes.

title: Ham Roll-Up
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 lb. thin-sliced boiled ham soft cream cheese breadsticks. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 lb. thin-sliced boiled ham soft cream cheese breadsticks. Recipe: Spread cream cheese on ham. Place breadstick on cheese. Roll up.

title: Penne Al'Arrabbiato
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 cans (14 oz.) Italian-style tomatoes chopped 1 to 2 Tbsp. olive oil 3 to 4 cloves garlic 1 Tbsp. minced parsley (more if fresh parsley is used) whole tiny red peppers (to your taste) salt pasta (DeCecco; penne plain or rigati). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 cans (14 oz.) Italian-style tomatoes chopped 1 to 2 Tbsp. olive oil 3 to 4 cloves garlic 1 Tbsp. minced parsley (more if fresh parsley is used) whole tiny red peppers (to your taste) salt pasta (DeCecco; penne plain or rigati). Recipe: Put on water to boil (and when boiling put in penne). Meanwhile saute garlic in the olive oil briefly then add tomatoes parsley whole peppers and salt. (Always prepare this sauce in an open skillet.) Simmer until pasta is cooked. Mix the sauce with the drained pasta and top with sprigs of fresh parsley.

title: Corn Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can creamed corn 1 can whole corn drained 2 eggs 1 stick oleo 1 (8 oz.) sour cream 1 small box corn muffin mix. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can creamed corn 1 can whole corn drained 2 eggs 1 stick oleo 1 (8 oz.) sour cream 1 small box corn muffin mix. Recipe: Mix all together in bowl and place in 2 to 3-quart casserole. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes.

title: Vegetable Dip
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. mayonnaise 2 c. sour cream 1/2 c. chopped green onions 1/2 c. chopped green pepper 1/2 c. diced pimentos 1/4 c. Bac*Os 1/2 tsp. Tabasco 1/4 tsp. garlic powder or salt salt and pepper to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. mayonnaise 2 c. sour cream 1/2 c. chopped green onions 1/2 c. chopped green pepper 1/2 c. diced pimentos 1/4 c. Bac*Os 1/2 tsp. Tabasco 1/4 tsp. garlic powder or salt salt and pepper to taste. Recipe: Mix all ingredients and let set in refrigerator several hours or overnight. It gets better with age and will keep well for 2 weeks.

title: Spinach Dip
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach 2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 1/2 c. chopped green parsley 1/2 c. chopped green onions 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. Season-All 1/2 tsp. black pepper 1/4 tsp. garlic powder 2 bottles Sangaree Punch 5 oz. cognac 2 oz. Triple Sec (cheaper) or quantro 5 oz. vodka 2 oz. Meyers rum (dark). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach 2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 1/2 c. chopped green parsley 1/2 c. chopped green onions 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. Season-All 1/2 tsp. black pepper 1/4 tsp. garlic powder 2 bottles Sangaree Punch 5 oz. cognac 2 oz. Triple Sec (cheaper) or quantro 5 oz. vodka 2 oz. Meyers rum (dark). Recipe: Slice paper thin California oranges limes and lemons. Pour punch over mold of ice. Put fruit in 1 hour before. Whoop-see-doo!

title: Easy Chicken Pot Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can Veg-All vegetables 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 can cream of onion soup 1 can cream of mushroom soup approximately 2 c. chicken cooked and cut into bite-size pieces 1 1/2 sticks butter or margarine melted 1 1/2 c. flour 1 c. milk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can Veg-All vegetables 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 can cream of onion soup 1 can cream of mushroom soup approximately 2 c. chicken cooked and cut into bite-size pieces 1 1/2 sticks butter or margarine melted 1 1/2 c. flour 1 c. milk. Recipe: Spray 9 x 13-inch baking dish lightly with cooking spray. Line bottom of dish with chicken pieces. Mix together Veg-All and 3 cans of soup in large bowl. Spread this mixture on top of chicken. In the same bowl mix melted butter milk and flour and pour this over soup. Bake at 350\u00b0 for approximately 30 to 40 minutes until crust is brown.

title: Fruit Pizza
ingredients: Ingredients: Pillsbury sugar cookie dough 1- 8 oz. pkg. cream cheese 1/3 c. sugar fruit of your choice. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: Pillsbury sugar cookie dough 1- 8 oz. pkg. cream cheese 1/3 c. sugar fruit of your choice. Recipe: Spread cookie dough out on a baking sheet. Bake for 12 - 13 minutes at temperature on pkg. let cool. Slide knife under cookie to loosen.

title: Grasshopper Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 22 Oreo cookies 1/4 c. margarine 1/4 c. creme de menthe 1 (7 oz.) jar Marshmallow Fluff 1 pt. whipped cream. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 22 Oreo cookies 1/4 c. margarine 1/4 c. creme de menthe 1 (7 oz.) jar Marshmallow Fluff 1 pt. whipped cream. Recipe: Crush cookies and mix with margarine. Press into pie plate and bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 minutes. Make sure it's cool before you fill.

title: Squash Souffle
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. cooked yellow squash 2 Tbsp. butter or Land O Lakes sweet cream spread 1 c. milk (1%) salt and pepper 4 egg whites 1 c. Ritz cracker crumbs 1 c. grated reduced fat Cheddar cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. cooked yellow squash 2 Tbsp. butter or Land O Lakes sweet cream spread 1 c. milk (1%) salt and pepper 4 egg whites 1 c. Ritz cracker crumbs 1 c. grated reduced fat Cheddar cheese. Recipe: Cut squash in cubes; cook in lightly salted water until tender then drain. Add butter and mash until pulp. Add well beaten eggs milk and cracker crumbs. Pour into Pam sprayed casserole dish; cover with cheese. Bake at 350\u00b0 until firm in the center approximately 30 to 45 minutes. Serves 6 to 8.

title: Loris'S Egg Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 6 hard-boiled eggs 1 small jar pimento 1/3 c. Miracle Whip 1 chopped sweet gherkin pickle 1/4 c. chopped onion 1/4 c. chopped green pepper 1 tsp. salt dash of paprika. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 6 hard-boiled eggs 1 small jar pimento 1/3 c. Miracle Whip 1 chopped sweet gherkin pickle 1/4 c. chopped onion 1/4 c. chopped green pepper 1 tsp. salt dash of paprika. Recipe: With a potato masher mix eggs onion pepper and pickle. Stir in mayonnaise. Add drained pimentos and seasonings. Chill and serve.

title: Apple Kuchen
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 recipe Basic Sweet Dough 4 apples peeled and sliced 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 c. melted butter. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 recipe Basic Sweet Dough 4 apples peeled and sliced 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 c. melted butter. Recipe: Divide Basic Sweet Dough into 2 portions. Press into 2 buttered 8 x 8-inch baking pans. Press apples rounded side up into dough. Sprinkle with mixture of sugar and cinnamon; drizzle with butter. Let rise in a warm place until doubled in bulk. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 40 to 50 minutes or until golden brown. Cool on wire rack. Serves 16.

title: Eggplant-Tomato Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 small eggplant 4 tomatoes salt and pepper oregano flakes 1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 small eggplant 4 tomatoes salt and pepper oregano flakes 1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese. Recipe: Peel and cut eggplant into 1/4-inch slices. Peel tomatoes and slice. In a 2-quart casserole dish arrange a layer of eggplant; sprinkle with salt and pepper. Put a layer of tomatoes on top; sprinkle with salt pepper and oregano flakes you have crushed with your fingers and cheese. Repeat layers until casserole is full ending with cheese on top.
