Cover; bake in a 400\u00b0 oven for 30 to 40 minutes or until eggplant is tender when tested with fork.

title: Strawberry Bread
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 c. flour 2 c. sugar 1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. baking soda 1 tsp. salt 1 c. cooking oil 4 beaten eggs 2 c. crushed strawberries 1 1/4 c. chopped walnuts or pecans (optional). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 c. flour 2 c. sugar 1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. baking soda 1 tsp. salt 1 c. cooking oil 4 beaten eggs 2 c. crushed strawberries 1 1/4 c. chopped walnuts or pecans (optional). Recipe: Combine flour sugar cinnamon soda and salt. Combine oil eggs and strawberries. Stir into flour mixture just until moistened. Add nuts if desired. Pour batter into 2 greased loaf pans. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour.

title: Salsa
ingredients: Ingredients: 6 tomatoes diced 1 (4 oz.) can chopped green chilies 1 bunch green onions chopped 1 1/2 c. celery finely diced 2 medium yellow onions chopped 1 c. chopped cilantro or parsley 2 (15 oz.) cans tomato sauce 1 tsp. cumin garlic (fresh or powdered) to taste salt and pepper. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 6 tomatoes diced 1 (4 oz.) can chopped green chilies 1 bunch green onions chopped 1 1/2 c. celery finely diced 2 medium yellow onions chopped 1 c. chopped cilantro or parsley 2 (15 oz.) cans tomato sauce 1 tsp. cumin garlic (fresh or powdered) to taste salt and pepper. Recipe: Mix all ingredients and chill 1 hour before serving. Stir before serving. (Mixture will have the consistency of gelatin if you don't.)

title: Meatball Stew
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. cornflakes cereal 1 egg 1 (10 1/2 oz.) can beef broth 1/2 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper 1 lb. ground beef 2 Tbsp. vegetable oil 1 (10 3/4 oz.) can tomato soup 1/2 c. water 1/4 tsp. thyme 2 c. frozen sliced carrots * 1 medium onion sliced and separated into rings 1 can whole white potatoes drained* dried parsley flakes. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. cornflakes cereal 1 egg 1 (10 1/2 oz.) can beef broth 1/2 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper 1 lb. ground beef 2 Tbsp. vegetable oil 1 (10 3/4 oz.) can tomato soup 1/2 c. water 1/4 tsp. thyme 2 c. frozen sliced carrots * 1 medium onion sliced and separated into rings 1 can whole white potatoes drained* dried parsley flakes. Recipe: *I use fresh carrots and potatoes.

title: Cauliflower-Broccoli Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 box frozen cauliflower 1 box frozen broccoli 1/2 stick butter 1 c. cream of mushroom soup 1/2 c. milk 8 oz. Velveeta cheese 1 c. cooked rice. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 box frozen cauliflower 1 box frozen broccoli 1/2 stick butter 1 c. cream of mushroom soup 1/2 c. milk 8 oz. Velveeta cheese 1 c. cooked rice. Recipe: Simmer the cauliflower and broccoli. Melt the butter in skillet and add cream of mushroom soup milk and Velveeta cheese. Cook all ingredients until the cheese is melted totally. Combine cauliflower and broccoli mixture with soup and cheese mixture with cooked rice. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes uncovered.

title: Cabbage Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 c. chopped celery 1/2 c. chopped bell pepper 1 small onion chopped margarine 3 c. shredded cabbage 1/4 c. water 1 c. cream of celery soup pimento Pepperidge Farm herb stuffing. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 c. chopped celery 1/2 c. chopped bell pepper 1 small onion chopped margarine 3 c. shredded cabbage 1/4 c. water 1 c. cream of celery soup pimento Pepperidge Farm herb stuffing. Recipe: Saute celery pepper and onion in small amount of margarine. Add shredded cabbage and water. Cover and steam for 5 to 6 minutes. Remove from heat; add cream of celery soup and pimento for color. Mix well. Put in casserole dish. Cover with Pepperidge Farm herb stuffing and butter mixed together. Bake for 20 minutes at 350\u00b0.

title: Best Ever Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 8 oz. fine spaghetti broken into bits or 7 oz. Mexican angel hair pieces 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/2 c. chopped green pepper 1/2 c. chopped celery 2 c. chopped tomatoes salt and pepper 1/4 tsp. curry 1 can cream of celery small amount of mayonnaise. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 8 oz. fine spaghetti broken into bits or 7 oz. Mexican angel hair pieces 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/2 c. chopped green pepper 1/2 c. chopped celery 2 c. chopped tomatoes salt and pepper 1/4 tsp. curry 1 can cream of celery small amount of mayonnaise. Recipe: Cook spaghetti and let it cool off. Add all vegetables and spices. Stir in celery soup and if too stiff add small amount of mayonnaise.

title: Black Bottom Cupcakes
ingredients: Ingredients: 8 oz. cream cheese 1 egg 1/3 c. sugar 1/8 tsp. salt 6 oz. chocolate chips 1 1/2 c. flour 1 c. sugar 1/4 c. cocoa 1 tsp. baking soda 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. water 1/3 c. cooking oil 1 Tbsp. vinegar 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 8 oz. cream cheese 1 egg 1/3 c. sugar 1/8 tsp. salt 6 oz. chocolate chips 1 1/2 c. flour 1 c. sugar 1/4 c. cocoa 1 tsp. baking soda 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. water 1/3 c. cooking oil 1 Tbsp. vinegar 1 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: Combine first four ingredients and mix well. Stir in chocolate chips. Mix together flour 1 cup sugar cocoa soda and salt. Add water oil vinegar and vanilla. Beat well. Fill cupcake papers 1/3 full of chocolate mixture. Top each with cream cheese mixture. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 to 35 minutes. Makes 18 to 20 cupcakes

title: Tuna Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 large can tuna fish 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 large box Kraft macaroni and cheese dinner 3/4 c. celery 1/2 c. onion 2 c. frozen or canned peas drained 1/2 c. water salt and pepper to taste. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 large can tuna fish 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 large box Kraft macaroni and cheese dinner 3/4 c. celery 1/2 c. onion 2 c. frozen or canned peas drained 1/2 c. water salt and pepper to taste. Recipe: Make macaroni and cheese according to package directions. If peas are frozen cook and drain. Cook celery and onion and drain. Add all ingredients. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 minutes in large baking dish.

title: Oatmeal Pie(Cheap Pecan Pie)
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 eggs 2 sticks margarine 3/4 c. uncooked oatmeal (quick) 1 1/4 c. dark Karo syrup 1 1/4 c. white sugar 3/4 c. coconut 2 tsp. vanilla. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 eggs 2 sticks margarine 3/4 c. uncooked oatmeal (quick) 1 1/4 c. dark Karo syrup 1 1/4 c. white sugar 3/4 c. coconut 2 tsp. vanilla. Recipe: Cream margarine and eggs. Add next 5 ingredients to the margarine egg mixture and blend together. Put into 2 unbaked pie shells. Bake 1 hour at 325\u00b0.

title: Chili Con Carne
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. hamburger 1 medium-size garlic finely cut 2 to 3 tsp. chili powder 2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 (No. 2 1/2) can tomatoes 1/2 c. chopped onion 1 (No. 303) can kidney beans 1/2 lb. spaghetti. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. hamburger 1 medium-size garlic finely cut 2 to 3 tsp. chili powder 2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 (No. 2 1/2) can tomatoes 1/2 c. chopped onion 1 (No. 303) can kidney beans 1/2 lb. spaghetti. Recipe: Heat a heavy skillet over moderate heat. Add hamburger onion and garlic. Stir until meat is browned. Stir in next 3 ingredients well. Turn beans (that have been rinsed in cold water and drained) and tomatoes into meat mixture. Heat to boiling; add spaghetti. Reduce heat to simmer. Cook 30 minutes stirring often. If chili is too thick add a little hot water. Serves 4.

title: Swiss Chicken Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 6 chicken breast halves 6 (4 x 4) slices Swiss cheese 1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream chicken soup (undiluted) 1/4 c. milk 2 c. Pepperidge Farm herb stuffing mix 1/4 c. melted margarine. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 6 chicken breast halves 6 (4 x 4) slices Swiss cheese 1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream chicken soup (undiluted) 1/4 c. milk 2 c. Pepperidge Farm herb stuffing mix 1/4 c. melted margarine. Recipe: Arrange chicken breasts in a lightly greased 12 x 8 x 2 baking dish. Top with a slice of Swiss cheese. Combine soup and milk. Stir well. Spoon over chicken. Sprinkle with stuffing mix. Drizzle butter over crumbs. Cover and bake at 350\u00b0 for 50 minutes. Yields 6 servings.

title: Happy Face Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 1/2 lb. butter 3 lb. sugar (6 c.) 3 c. eggs 2 c. water 5 1/2 lb. flour 1/3 c. baking powder 3 tsp. salt 2 Tbsp. vanilla 2 1/3 c. powdered milk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 1/2 lb. butter 3 lb. sugar (6 c.) 3 c. eggs 2 c. water 5 1/2 lb. flour 1/3 c. baking powder 3 tsp. salt 2 Tbsp. vanilla 2 1/3 c. powdered milk. Recipe: Combine and mix well the butter sugar eggs and water. Add flour baking powder salt vanilla and powdered milk. Mix well. Roll cut out and bake at 350\u00b0.

title: No Bake Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 pkg. almond bark 2 c. miniature marshmallows 2 c. salted peanuts 2 c. Rice Krispies 2 c. Cap'n Crunch. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 pkg. almond bark 2 c. miniature marshmallows 2 c. salted peanuts 2 c. Rice Krispies 2 c. Cap'n Crunch. Recipe: Melt almond bark with package directions. Stir in all other ingredients. Drop and shape on waxed paper.

title: Slinky(Apple Flavored Low Calorie Quencher)
ingredients: Ingredients: 2/3 c. sparkling mineral water 2/3 c. unsweetened apple juice 1 Tbsp. freshly squeezed lemon juice a few apple slices and sprig of mint. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2/3 c. sparkling mineral water 2/3 c. unsweetened apple juice 1 Tbsp. freshly squeezed lemon juice a few apple slices and sprig of mint. Recipe: Pour water and apple juice into a glass. Stir in lemon juice. Garnish with apple slices and mint.

title: Peach Cobbler
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 stick butter 1 c. flour 1 c. sugar 2 c. milk 2 c. fresh peaches. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 stick butter 1 c. flour 1 c. sugar 2 c. milk 2 c. fresh peaches. Recipe: Melt butter in Pyrex dish. Sift dry ingredients together. Pour batter into melted butter. Pour fruit into batter. Don't stir. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 40 or 45 minutes.

title: Green Bean Specialty
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 pieces bacon cooked and drained (reserve the grease) 4 Tbsp. grease 4 Tbsp. brown sugar 4 Tbsp. vinegar 2 Tbsp. mustard. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 pieces bacon cooked and drained (reserve the grease) 4 Tbsp. grease 4 Tbsp. brown sugar 4 Tbsp. vinegar 2 Tbsp. mustard. Recipe: Heat green beans (2 cans) and drain. Mix last 4 ingredients and heat. Pour liquid mixture over the beans. Crumble bacon on top. Serve hot.

title: Raspberry Nut Perfection(Serves 8)
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (1 lb. 6 oz.) can red raspberry or other favorite pie filling 1/3 c. water 1/2 pkg. white cake mix 1 egg 1/2 c. flaked coconut 1/2 c. chopped pecans 1/2 c. melted butter. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (1 lb. 6 oz.) can red raspberry or other favorite pie filling 1/3 c. water 1/2 pkg. white cake mix 1 egg 1/2 c. flaked coconut 1/2 c. chopped pecans 1/2 c. melted butter. Recipe: Spread pie filling in bottom of 8-inch square pan. Combine cake mix water and egg; beat well. Pour over pie filling. Sprinkle coconut and pecans on top. Drizzle melted butter over top. Bake in a 350\u00b0 oven for 40 minutes. Serve warm.

title: Mexican Chicken
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 whole chicken 1 chopped onion 1/2 lb. cheese 1/2 bag Doritos (taco flavored) crushed 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 can Ro-Tel. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 whole chicken 1 chopped onion 1/2 lb. cheese 1/2 bag Doritos (taco flavored) crushed 1 can cream of chicken soup 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 can Ro-Tel. Recipe: Boil chicken in water. Cool and cut into pieces. Put in a 9 x 13-inch dish. Place on top of chicken in following order: chopped onion grated cheese and crushed Doritos.

title: 10 Minute Peanut Brittle
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. light corn syrup 1/4 tsp. salt 1 to 1 1/2 c. raw peanuts 1 Tbsp. butter or margarine 1 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. soda. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. light corn syrup 1/4 tsp. salt 1 to 1 1/2 c. raw peanuts 1 Tbsp. butter or margarine 1 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. soda. Recipe: In 2-quart casserole (I use 2-quart measuring cup) mix the sugar syrup and salt. Microwave on High for 5 minutes. Stir in peanuts. Microwave on High for 2 to 6 minutes or until syrup and peanuts are lightly browned stirring after every 2 minutes of cooking time. Stir in butter vanilla and baking soda until light and foamy. Spread to 1/4-inch thickness on a large well-buttered cookie sheet. When cool break into small pieces.

title: Onion Dressing
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (14 oz.) can evaporated skim milk 1/2 c. vinegar 1 envelope (about 1 1/2 oz.) onion soup mix 1/3 c. catsup 1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce 1/4 tsp. red pepper sauce. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (14 oz.) can evaporated skim milk 1/2 c. vinegar 1 envelope (about 1 1/2 oz.) onion soup mix 1/3 c. catsup 1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce 1/4 tsp. red pepper sauce. Recipe: In a covered jar shake all ingredients together well. Makes 2 1/2 cups dressing.

title: Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 stick margarine 1/2 c. milk 1/2 c. cocoa 2 c. sugar 3 c. oats 3/4 c. peanut butter 1 tsp. vanilla 1/4 c. nuts (optional). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 stick margarine 1/2 c. milk 1/2 c. cocoa 2 c. sugar 3 c. oats 3/4 c. peanut butter 1 tsp. vanilla 1/4 c. nuts (optional). Recipe: Melt butter in saucepan. Add milk cocoa and sugar. Stir well and boil for 1 minute. Take\tfrom heat and immediately add peanut butter. Stir well. Add vanilla\toats and nuts;\tstir well. Drop from teaspoon quickly onto wax paper.

title: Pastry Crunch
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (24 oz.) vanilla flavored candy coating 3 c. corn and rice cereal 2 c. chow mein noodles 2 c. small pretzel twists 1 c. salted peanuts 1 c. pecan pieces. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (24 oz.) vanilla flavored candy coating 3 c. corn and rice cereal 2 c. chow mein noodles 2 c. small pretzel twists 1 c. salted peanuts 1 c. pecan pieces. Recipe: Place candy coating in microwave. Melt according to directions. Stir melted coating in remaining ingredients. Spread on wax paper to cool. Break into pieces and store in an airtight container.

title: Chippewa Soup
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 qt. carrots diced 2 qt. onions chopped 1 qt. celery diced 1 lb. green split peas 2 qt. tomato puree 6 cloves garlic 1 gal. of water 10 oz. smoked ham 2 potatoes diced 1 oz. marjoram 1 oz. basil 1 oz. oregano 1 oz. thyme 4 bay leaves 4 oz. curry powder (we use Javin Brand) Salt and pepper. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 qt. carrots diced 2 qt. onions chopped 1 qt. celery diced 1 lb. green split peas 2 qt. tomato puree 6 cloves garlic 1 gal. of water 10 oz. smoked ham 2 potatoes diced 1 oz. marjoram 1 oz. basil 1 oz. oregano 1 oz. thyme 4 bay leaves 4 oz. curry powder (we use Javin Brand) Salt and pepper. Recipe: Soak the split peas overnight. In a large pot (preferably 3-4 gallons) heat a small amount of oil until very hot. Add the carrots onions and celery and sweat the vegetables. Add the garlic and sweat a few more minutes. Add the curry powder to the vegetables and stir until curry is thoroughly mixed with the vegetables. Add all remaining ingredients to the pot. Bring this to a boil reduce heat and simmer for approximately three hours. Adjust the seasoning with salt and pepper. Remove the bay leaves and puree the soup through a food mill or in an electric blender. Chill thoroughly. This is the base for Chippewa Soup. It should be slightly salty because it is the base and needs to be creamed before use.

title: Coconut Cream Pie(Low Calorie)
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 baked pie crust 2 boxes sugar-free instant vanilla pudding 1 c. coconut 3 c. low-fat milk 4 oz. Cool Whip (lite). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 baked pie crust 2 boxes sugar-free instant vanilla pudding 1 c. coconut 3 c. low-fat milk 4 oz. Cool Whip (lite). Recipe: Mix pudding mix with 3 cups milk. Add coconut.\tPour in baked or graham pie crust. Cover with Cool Whip. Sprinkle with toasted coconut. Keep in refrigerator.

title: Voodoo Chicken
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 1/2 lb. chicken pieces 2 c. white vinegar 2 Tbsp. soy sauce 1 large onion sliced 4 cloves garlic peeled and left whole 1/2 tsp. black pepper 4 Tbsp. Dijon mustard 6 Tbsp. ketchup 2 Tbsp. milk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 1/2 lb. chicken pieces 2 c. white vinegar 2 Tbsp. soy sauce 1 large onion sliced 4 cloves garlic peeled and left whole 1/2 tsp. black pepper 4 Tbsp. Dijon mustard 6 Tbsp. ketchup 2 Tbsp. milk. Recipe: Mix together vinegar soy sauce onions garlic and pepper. Add chicken and marinate overnight. Remove chicken. Combine mustard and ketchup; coat chicken pieces well. Bake chicken skin side down for 30 minutes. Turn chicken pieces over. Mix together remaining mustard and ketchup coating mix milk and remaining marinade. Pour over chicken pieces and bake an additional 45 minutes. Serve over rice. Baking temperature is 350\u00b0. Baking time is 1 hour and 15 minutes total.

title: Chicken Divan
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 whole chicken breasts 20 oz. pkg. chopped frozen broccoli 2 cans cream of celery soup 1 tsp. curry powder 2 tsp. lemon juice 6 to 8 slices American cheese 8 oz. sharp Cheddar cheese 1 c. plain bread crumbs 1/2 stick margarine. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 whole chicken breasts 20 oz. pkg. chopped frozen broccoli 2 cans cream of celery soup 1 tsp. curry powder 2 tsp. lemon juice 6 to 8 slices American cheese 8 oz. sharp Cheddar cheese 1 c. plain bread crumbs 1/2 stick margarine. Recipe: Butter sides and bottom of 13 x 9-inch dish. Boil and debone chicken. Chop in bite size pieces. Steam broccoli until crisp and lay broccoli in bottom of dish. Spread chicken on top. Place American cheese evenly on top of chicken. Open 2 cans soup and place 1/2 teaspoon curry powder and 1 teaspoon lemon juice in each can. Stir. Pour the soup on top of the cheese and spread evenly. Slice Cheddar cheese and place evenly over soup. Melt 1/2 stick margarine. Add 1 cup bread crumbs and stir until moist. Sprinkle crumb mixture on top of casserole. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 to 40 minutes.

title: Old Fashioned Tea Cakes
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. butter 2 c. sugar 4 eggs 1 Tbsp. milk 1 tsp. nutmeg 1 tsp. vanilla 4 c. flour (sifted 3 times) 3 Tbsp. baking powder. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. butter 2 c. sugar 4 eggs 1 Tbsp. milk 1 tsp. nutmeg 1 tsp. vanilla 4 c. flour (sifted 3 times) 3 Tbsp. baking powder. Recipe: Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs one at a time mixing well after each addition. Add milk nutmeg and vanilla. Sift flour and baking powder together and combine with other mixture. Add enough additional flour to roll out and cut. Bake on ungreased cookie sheet in oven at 325\u00b0 for 15 minutes. Yield: approximately 4 dozen. Happy eating!

title: French Toast And Sauce
ingredients: Ingredients: 4 eggs beaten 1/2 c. milk 1/2 c. frozen lemonade thawed 1/4 tsp. salt 8 Tbsp. butter divided 8 slices day-old bread. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 4 eggs beaten 1/2 c. milk 1/2 c. frozen lemonade thawed 1/4 tsp. salt 8 Tbsp. butter divided 8 slices day-old bread. Recipe: In a wide shallow bowl beat 1st four ingredients. For each slice melt 1 tablespoon of butter in skillet. Dip bread in egg mixture; turn and coat the other side. Cook slices in butter browning on both sides. Serve with Sauce as follows.

title: Spaghetti Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 6 oz. spaghetti 2 Tbsp. olive oil 1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese 2 eggs well beaten or equivalent egg substitute 1 c. cottage cheese or Ricotta 1 lb. low-fat ground beef 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/4 green pepper chopped 2 c. spaghetti sauce (approximately) 1/2 c. shredded Mozzarella (2 oz.). Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 6 oz. spaghetti 2 Tbsp. olive oil 1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese 2 eggs well beaten or equivalent egg substitute 1 c. cottage cheese or Ricotta 1 lb. low-fat ground beef 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/4 green pepper chopped 2 c. spaghetti sauce (approximately) 1/2 c. shredded Mozzarella (2 oz.). Recipe: Cook spaghetti (about 3 cups). Stir olive oil into hot spaghetti. Stir in Parmesan cheese and eggs. Form spaghetti mixture into a \crust\ in a 10-inch pie plate sprayed with Pam. Spread cottage cheese over bottom of spaghetti crust.

title: Baked Corn
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 can whole kernel corn drained 1 can cream-style corn 8 oz. sour cream 1 stick oleo melted 1 box Jiffy corn bread mix. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 can whole kernel corn drained 1 can cream-style corn 8 oz. sour cream 1 stick oleo melted 1 box Jiffy corn bread mix. Recipe: Mix all together well. Bake 1 hour at 350\u00b0.

title: Chicken Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 c. diced cooked chicken 1 c. chopped celery 1 c. cooked rice 1 can cream of chicken soup 3/4 c. mayonnaise 1 c. chopped pecans 1/2 c. melted butter 1 diced onion. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 c. diced cooked chicken 1 c. chopped celery 1 c. cooked rice 1 can cream of chicken soup 3/4 c. mayonnaise 1 c. chopped pecans 1/2 c. melted butter 1 diced onion. Recipe: Mix all ingredients together in buttered casserole dish. Sprinkle grated cheese over top of casserole. Bake at 350\u00b0 until bubbly at least 1 hour. Makes 4 to 6 servings.

title: Favorite Chocolate Cake
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 3/4 c. flour 2 eggs 1 tsp. baking powder 1 tsp. red food coloring 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. soda 1 1/2 c. sugar 7 Tbsp. cocoa 1/2 c. shortening 1 c. buttermilk. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 3/4 c. flour 2 eggs 1 tsp. baking powder 1 tsp. red food coloring 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. soda 1 1/2 c. sugar 7 Tbsp. cocoa 1/2 c. shortening 1 c. buttermilk. Recipe: Sift all dry ingredients in a large mixing bowl. Stir. Add the rest and beat with electric mixer for 2 minutes. Pour into greased and floured pans (2). I use small tube pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes. Tube pan takes 40 minutes.

title: Blue Muffins
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 egg 1 c. milk 2 Tbsp. melted shortening 2 Tbsp. sugar 2 c. flour 2 c. blueberries. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 egg 1 c. milk 2 Tbsp. melted shortening 2 Tbsp. sugar 2 c. flour 2 c. blueberries. Recipe: Mix thoroughly. Pour into muffin pans and bake at 350\u00b0.

title: Devils Chicken(Pollo Alla Diavola)
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 (3 to 4 lb.) chicken 1/2 c. olive oil 2 Tbsp. hot pepper sauce (Tabasco sauce) or to taste juice of 2 lemons ground pepper to taste 1 tsp. salt. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 (3 to 4 lb.) chicken 1/2 c. olive oil 2 Tbsp. hot pepper sauce (Tabasco sauce) or to taste juice of 2 lemons ground pepper to taste 1 tsp. salt. Recipe: Using poultry shears cut the bird open by cutting down the backbone. Flatten a bit by pounding with your hand so that the chicken is \butterflied\. Mix the remaining ingredients in a large bowl; marinate the bird for 2 hours.

title: Friendship Tea
ingredients: Ingredients: 1/2 c. instant tea 2 c. Tang 1 pkg. Wyler's lemonade mix (3 oz.) 1 tsp. cinnamon 2 c. sugar. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1/2 c. instant tea 2 c. Tang 1 pkg. Wyler's lemonade mix (3 oz.) 1 tsp. cinnamon 2 c. sugar. Recipe: Mix 3 heaping tablespoonfuls per cup of hot water.

title: Heath Bar Pie
ingredients: Ingredients: 3 Heath bars chopped fine 1 medium container whipping topping 1 graham cracker pie crust chocolate curls or chopped nuts. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 3 Heath bars chopped fine 1 medium container whipping topping 1 graham cracker pie crust chocolate curls or chopped nuts. Recipe: Mix chopped Heath bars with whipped topping and pour into crust. Top with chocolate curls or chopped nuts. Refrigerate.

title: Victorian Baked French Toast
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 c. brown sugar 1/3 c. butter 2 Tbsp. light corn syrup 8 slices French bread (1-inch thick) 5 eggs 1 1/2 c. milk 1 tsp. cinnamon. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 c. brown sugar 1/3 c. butter 2 Tbsp. light corn syrup 8 slices French bread (1-inch thick) 5 eggs 1 1/2 c. milk 1 tsp. cinnamon. Recipe: Cook brown sugar butter and corn syrup in small saucepan until butter melts. Pour into 9 x 13-inch pan. Layer bread in pan squeezing together to fit. Mix eggs milk and cinnamon. Pour over bread (you can cover and refrigerate overnight). Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes or until center is done and lightly browned.

title: Quick Swedish Meatballs
ingredients: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1 c. soft bread crumbs 1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 1/4 c. dry onion soup mix 1/4 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. nutmeg 1 1/2 c. milk 1 pkg. stroganoff sauce mix. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1 c. soft bread crumbs 1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese 1/4 c. dry onion soup mix 1/4 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. nutmeg 1 1/2 c. milk 1 pkg. stroganoff sauce mix. Recipe: Combine meat bread crumbs cheese soup mix seasonings and 1/4 cup milk; mix thoroughly (with hands). Form into small balls. Brown lightly; remove to a baking dish. Drain excess grease leaving small amount in skillet. Blend in sauce mix and remaining milk (add more or less milk for desired thickness). Cook until thick and bubbly. Pour over meat balls. Bake in a 350\u00b0 oven for 30 to 45 minutes.

title: Irish Stew(Microwave)
ingredients: Ingredients: 2 lb. lamb cut in 1-inch cubes 2 c. water 1 envelope onion soup mix 1 bay leaf 2 medium carrots sliced thin 2 baked potatoes 1/4 c. flour. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2 lb. lamb cut in 1-inch cubes 2 c. water 1 envelope onion soup mix 1 bay leaf 2 medium carrots sliced thin 2 baked potatoes 1/4 c. flour. Recipe: In 4-quart casserole combine lamb 1 1/4 cups water soup mix and bay leaf. Heat covered 7 to 8 minutes on High. Continue cooking on power level 3 for 35 to 40 minutes. Stir occasionally. Add carrots heat on level 3 for 15 minutes until ingredients are done. Stir once. Peel and cube potatoes and add to stew. Blend flour and remaining water. Heat 5 minutes on High or until thickened stirring twice. Serves 6.

title: Peach Salad
ingredients: Ingredients: 2-3 oz boxes Peach Jello 1 large jar Peach Baby food 1 can Condensed Milk 1-8 oz pkg. cream cheese softened 2/3 c. hot water 1/2 c. sugar 1 large can crushed pineapple not drained. Recipe:
directions: Ingredients: 2-3 oz boxes Peach Jello 1 large jar Peach Baby food 1 can Condensed Milk 1-8 oz pkg. cream cheese softened 2/3 c. hot water 1/2 c. sugar 1 large can crushed pineapple not drained. Recipe: Mix jello with hot water and sugar. Allow to come to a boil. Take off stove and add peaches and pineapple.
